Text1: Haka ya furta a cikin jawabin sa na murnar cikar Najeriya shekaru 61 da samun ‘yanci.
Text1 Translation: He said the same in his speech celebrating Nigeria's 61st year of independence.
Text2: Ya yi wannan iƙirarin e a cikin jawabin sa na murnar cikar Najeriya 61 da samun ‘yanci a ranar Juma’a.
Text2 Translation: He made this claim in his speech to celebrate Nigeria's 61st anniversary of independence on Friday.

Text1: RASHIN TSARO: ‘Yan bindiga sun arce da Kwamishinan Hukumar Ƙidaya ta Ƙasa, sun nemi a biya su Naira miliyan 500
Text1 Translation: INSECURITY: The bandits appealed to the Commissioner of the National Census Commission, they asked for a payment of 500 million naira
Text2: Kotu ta nemi Bawa ya buga wasiƙar neman afuwar Bello a wasu jaridun Najeriya, sannan kuma ya biya shi diyyar naira miliyan 10.
Text2 Translation: The court asked Bawa to publish Bello's apology letter in some Nigerian newspapers, and also to pay him 10 million naira compensation.

Text1: Amma ana saura kwana ɗaya sai ya kira ɗan takarar mataimakin gwamna ya ce ba zai halarta ba, don haka a fasa kawai.
Text1 Translation: But with one day left, he called the deputy governor candidate and said that he will not attend, so just break it up.
Text2: Gwamna Okowa dai shi ne ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa na Atiku Abubakar a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: Governor Okowa is the vice presidential candidate of Atiku Abubakar in the 2023 election.

Text1: Buhari ya tashi zuwa Saudiyya, zai yi Umra ta ƙarshe a matsayin sa na shugaban kasa
Text1 Translation: Buhari has left for Saudi Arabia, he will perform his last Umrah as the president
Text2: Wannan ne karo na farko da babu sunan Muhammadu Buhari a cikin ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa, tun daga 2003 har zuwa yau tsawon shekaru 20.
Text2 Translation: This is the first time that there is no name of Muhammadu Buhari in the presidential candidates, since 2003 until today for 20 years.

Text1: Gusau ya ce masu son kawo tashin hankali a ƙasa kaɗai za su iya watsa waɗannan ƙarairayi don cimma wani buri na su na siyasa.
Text1 Translation: Gusau said that only those who want to bring violence to the country can spread these lies to achieve their political goals.
Text2: “Amma saboda ba na son tayar da fitinar da za ta hargitsa PDP baki ɗaya, sai na haƙura don a zauna lafiya.
Text2 Translation: "But because I don't want to stir up trouble that will disrupt the PDP as a whole, I have to be patient in order to live peacefully.

Text1: A Abuja kuwa, Jam’iyyar Peter Obi ta ragargaji su O’o da O’o a rumfunan zaɓen kewayen Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: In Abuja, Peter Obi's party defeated O'o and O'o in the polling booths around the Presidential Palace.
Text2: Peter Obi ya lashe yawancin rumfunan zaɓen kewaye da fadar ta Shugaban Ƙasa a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: Peter Obi won most of the polling stations around the Presidential Palace in Abuja.

Text1: Shugaban karamar hukumar Gulani Ilu Dayyabu ya ce ambaliyar ta ci gidaje da shaguna sama da 100 a kauyukan Kukawa, Bularafa da Bulunkutu.
Text1 Translation: Gulani Local Government Chairman Ilu Dayyabu said the flood has destroyed more than 100 houses and shops in the villages of Kukawa, Bularafa and Bulunkutu.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ce ta lashe kujerar shugaban karamar hukumar Kajuru a zaben Kaduna da ka yi ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: The PDP won the seat of Kajuru local government chairman in the Kaduna election held on Saturday.

Text1: Bayan haka kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Mohammed Shehu ya tabbatar yin garkuwa da daliban kwalejin ranar Laraba da safe.
Text1 Translation: After that, the spokesman of the state police force, Mohammed Shehu, confirmed the kidnapping of the students of the college on Wednesday morning.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Abimbola Oyeyemi ya tabbatar cewa mutumin na fama da matsalar tabuwar hankali.
Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the state police force, Abimbola Oyeyemi confirmed that the man is suffering from a mental disorder.

Text1: Shi ma ɗan takarar gwamna aka yi masa ƙarin geji, daga naira miliyan 200 zuwa har naira biliyan 1.
Text1 Translation: The gubernatorial candidate was also given more money, from 200 million naira to 1 billion naira.
Text2: Shi kuma ɗan takarar majalisar tarayya daga naira miliyan 10 zuwa naira miliyan 70.
Text2 Translation: He is a candidate for the federal parliament from 10 million naira to 70 million naira.

Text1: Har yanzu dai ya na tsare a Hedikwatar DSS tun cikin watan Yuni, 2021, bayan kamo shi da aka yi daga ƙasar Kenya.
Text1 Translation: He is still detained at the DSS Headquarters since June, 2021, after his arrest from Kenya.
Text2: An naɗa Buni shugabancin kwamitin tafiyar da APC na mutum 13, a cikin watan Yuni, 2020, bayan an wancakalar da shugabancin Adams Oshiomhole.
Text2 Translation: Buni was appointed the chairman of the 13-man APC steering committee in June, 2020, after the leadership of Adams Oshiomhole was replaced.

Text1: A karshe dai shine ya zo ma uku a zaɓen inda Amaechi ya zo na biyu Ahmed Lawan ya zo na hudu.
Text1 Translation: In the end, he came third in the election where Amaechi came second and Ahmed Lawan came fourth.
Text2: Yin garkuwa da Uboh shine karo na biyu da mahara ke yi a jihar a cikin makonni uku da suka wuce.
Text2 Translation: The abduction of Uboh is the second attack by assailants in the state in the past three weeks.

Text1: WAEC ta yi wannan sanarwa ce a ranar Litinin a Legas, lokacin da ake bayyana sakamakon jarabawar SSCE (May/June).
Text1 Translation: WAEC made this announcement on Monday in Lagos, when the results of the SSCE (May/June) examination were announced.
Text2: Amaechi ya sha ragargazar ce a ranar Alhamis, lokacin da ya bayyana a gaban Kwamiti domin kare kasafin 2022 na ma’aikatar sa.
Text2 Translation: Amaechi was defeated on Thursday, when he appeared before the Committee to defend the 2022 budget of his ministry.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba Peter Obi ne ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban kasa a zaben 2019, na jam’iyyar PDP ta re da Atiku Abubakar.
Text1 Translation: If it is not forgotten, Peter Obi is the vice presidential candidate in the 2019 election, of the PDP party against Atiku Abubakar.
Text2: Dino Melaye ya sha ƙasa a zaben fidda gwani na jam’iyyar PDP a Kogi
Text2 Translation: Dino Melaye lost in the PDP primaries in Kogi

Text1: Gwamnatin Jihar Neja ta jaddada cewa a cikin shekaru biyu ‘yan ta’adda masu garkuwa da mutane su raba aƙalla 151, 380 daga gidajen su.
Text1 Translation: The government of Niger State has emphasized that in two years, the terrorist kidnappers should separate at least 151, 380 people from their homes.
Text2: A Rijau kuwa an raba mutane 5,809 daga gidajen su.
Text2 Translation: In Rijau, 5,809 people were separated from their homes.

Text1: TSANANIN KISHI: Kotu ta yanke wa kafintan da ya kwarara wa tsohuwar budurwarsa da saurayinta  ruwan batir  hukuncin ɗaurin shekara 7 a gidan kaso
Text1 Translation: SEVERE JEALOUSY: The court sentenced the carpenter who poured battery water on his ex-girlfriend and her boyfriend to 7 years in prison
Text2: “A wannan rana Agu ya kwarara wa tsohuwar budurwarsa da sabon saurayinta ruwan batir bayan ya binciki wurin da suka shan iska.
Text2 Translation: "On that day, Agu poured battery water on his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend after investigating the place where they had been drinking.

Text1: A ranar Juma’a ce Ɗan Majalisar Tarayya Gudaji Kazaure ya yi wannan zargi.
Text1 Translation: On Friday, the member of the Federal Assembly, Gudaji Kazaure, made this accusation.
Text2: Mambobin sun yi ganawa ce ranar Alhamis a Majalisa, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Sanata Phillip Aduda, ɗan PDP da ke wakiltar Gundumar FCT Abuja a Majalisar Dattawa.
Text2 Translation: The members had a meeting on Thursday at the House of Assembly, under the leadership of Senator Phillip Aduda, a member of the PDP representing FCT Abuja District in the Senate.

Text1: RIKICIN JAM’IYYA: Gwamnonin PDP sun ƙaryata zargin sun nemi Uche Secondus ya sauka daga shugabancin jam’iyya
Text1 Translation: PARTY CONFLICT: PDP governors deny allegations they asked Uche Secondus to step down as party chairman
Text2: Gwamnonin jam’iyyar PDP sun ƙaryata zargin da aka yi masu cewa sun nemi Shugaban Jam’iyya na Ƙasa,  Uche Secondus ya sauka daga shugabancin jam’iyya.
Text2 Translation: The governors of the PDP party denied the allegations that they asked the National Chairman of the party, Uche Secondus to step down from the leadership of the party.

Text1: KATSINA A HANNUN ‘YAN BINDIGA: Mahara sun sako basaraken da su ka kama bayan ya shafe kwanaki 26 a hannun su
Text1 Translation: KATSINA IN THE HANDS OF GUNS: The attackers released the prince they captured after spending 26 days in their hands
Text2: An sako Sarkin Bunguɗu, bayan ya shafe kwanaki 32 a hannun Ƴan bindiga
Text2 Translation: The King of Bungudu was released after spending 32 days in the hands of bandits

Text1: Haka kuma Ɗanmadami ya ce sojojin da ke sintiri sun bindige  ‘yan bindiga bakwai a Ungwan  Birni cikin Ƙaramar Hukumar Kajuru duk a Jihar Kaduna.
Text1 Translation: Danmadami also said that the soldiers on patrol shot dead seven bandits in Ungwan Birni in Kajuru Local Government, all in Kaduna State.
Text2: Rundunar sojin Najeriya dake aiki a karkashin ‘Operation Forest Sanity’ sun kashe ‘yan bindiga biyu a karamar hukumar Chikun dake jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The Nigerian Army operating under 'Operation Forest Sanity' killed two bandits in Chikun Local Government Area of ​​Kaduna State.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya tabbatar da cewa bashin da ke kan wuyan Najeriya ya kai naira tiriliyan 42.8.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has confirmed that Nigeria's debt is 42.8 trillion naira.
Text2: ‘Yan Najeriya da dama sun ce bashin Naira tiriliyan 22.7 da Buhari ya karɓa a CBN ba ya cikin doka.
Text2 Translation: Many Nigerians have said that the 22.7 trillion Naira loan that Buhari received from the CBN is illegal.

Text1: Daga watan Satumbar 2017 zuwa ranar 12 ga Yuni 2022 an samu mutum 653 da ake zargin sun kamu da cutar a jihohi 33.
Text1 Translation: From September 2017 to June 12, 2022, there were 653 suspected cases of the disease in 33 states.
Text2: Daga cikin mutum 262 din da aka gano an samu tabbacin cewa kashi 40.1% sun kamu da cutar a jihohi 23.
Text2 Translation: Out of the 262 people identified, it was confirmed that 40.1% were infected in 23 states.

Text1: “A yankin arewa kusan kashi 90% na mutanen yankin basu shiga shafukan yanar gizo.
Text1 Translation: "In the northern region, almost 90% of the people in the region do not access websites.
Text2: Hakan ya nuna farashin shiga takarar Shugaban Ƙasa a 2023, ya nunƙa na shekarar 2015 kusan da kashi 300%.
Text2 Translation: This shows that the cost of participating in the presidential race in 2023, compared to 2015, is almost 300%.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Ademola Adesanya ya bada belin Oladeji akan Naira 100,000 sannan da shaidu biyu.
Text1 Translation: Magistrate Ademola Adesanya granted Oladeji bail in the sum of 100,000 Naira and two witnesses.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Anas Isa ya bada belin Sebanjo akan naira 500,000 tare da gabatar da wadanda za su tsaya masa biyu.
Text2 Translation: Judge Anas Isa granted bail to Sebanjo at 500,000 naira and presented those who will stand for him.

Text1: Kwamishinan Tsaron jihar Kaduna Samuel Aruwan, ya zargi wata kafar yada labarai ta yanar gizo da kirkirar karya da kuma tunzura jama’a a kansa.
Text1 Translation: The Kaduna State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan, has accused an online media outlet of creating lies and inciting the public against him.
Text2: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Kaduna Samuel Aruwan ya bayyana cewa Talatar wannan mako ce ta karshe da za a ci kasuwar Kawo dake cikin garin Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan, has stated that Tuesday this week will be the last day that the Kawo market in Kaduna will be closed.

Text1: Babban kotu dake Gwagwalada, Abuja ta raba auren shekara 15 dake tsakanin Okpanachi Yahaya da Zainab Adejoh saboda laifin cin amana a aure.
Text1 Translation: The High Court in Gwagwalada, Abuja has dissolved the 15-year marriage between Okpanachi Yahaya and Zainab Adejoh for adultery.
Text2: Muhibbat ta roki kotun ta raba auren saboda babu sauran soyayya a tsakanin ma’auratan.
Text2 Translation: Muhibbat asked the court to dissolve the marriage because there is no more love between the couple.

Text1: KIWON LAFIYA: Me cece cutar Monkey pox, alamun kamuwa da cutar, hanyoyin da za a kiyaye don gujewa kamuwa da cutar
Text1 Translation: HEALTH: What is monkey pox, symptoms of infection, precautions to avoid infection
Text2: Hanyoyin da za a bi don gujewa kamuwa daga cutar
Text2 Translation: Ways to follow to avoid infection from the disease

Text1: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa (INEC) ta bayyana cewa daga cikin mutum 93,469,008 da su ka yi rajista, mutum 87,209,007 ne su ka karɓi katin su.
Text1 Translation: The National Electoral Commission (INEC) stated that out of the 93,469,008 people who registered, 87,209,007 people received their cards.
Text2: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa INEC, ta bayyana Ademola Adeleke na PDP cewa ya yi nasara a zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Osun.
Text2 Translation: The National Electoral Commission, INEC, has declared Ademola Adeleke of the PDP that he has won the governorship election in Osun State.

Text1: Bayan haka a jihar Neja ne sifeton ‘yan sanda ɗaya ya rasa ransa a Kauyen Bangi dake karamar hukumar Mariga.
Text1 Translation: After that, in Niger state, a police inspector lost his life in Bangi village in Mariga local government.
Text2: Bayan haka a ranar 13 ga Janairu 2022 jami’an tsaro sun gano mabuyar ‘yan bindiga a kan dutsen Anaba dake karamar hukumar Magama.
Text2 Translation: After that on January 13, 2022, the security forces discovered the hideout of the bandits on Anaba Mountain in Magama Local Government.

Text1: Yadda hukumar NDLEA ta kama muggan kwayoyi masu nauyin kilogiram 509 a jihohi 8 a kasar nan
Text1 Translation: How the NDLEA agency seized drugs weighing 509 kilograms in 8 states in this country
Text2: Hukumar NDLEA ta bayyana yadda ta kama muggan kwayoyi masu nauyin kilogiram 500 da masu safarae kwayoyin a jihohi 8 a kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: The NDLEA has disclosed how it has seized drugs weighing 500 kilograms and drug traffickers in 8 states in the country.

Text1: Kuta ya ce an kada kuri’u 768,402 inda a ciki akwai lalatattu 11,499 da masu kyau 756,903.
Text1 Translation: Kuta said that 768,402 votes were cast in which there were 11,499 bad votes and 756,903 good ones.
Text2: An kada kuri’u 889,950 inda daga ciki an samu kuri’u  873,020 masu kyau, 26,936 lalatattu.
Text2 Translation: 889,950 votes were cast, of which 873,020 were good and 26,936 were damaged.

Text1: Tuni dai Buhari ya dawo Najeriya tun a ranar Juma’a, inda bai zarce Landan jiyya ba, kamar yadda aka tsara lokacin tafiyar sa.
Text1 Translation: Buhari has already returned to Nigeria since Friday, where he did not go beyond London for treatment, as scheduled for his trip.
Text2: A ranar Talata ce Buhari ya bar Najeriya ya lula Kenya, inda zai halarci taron magance ƙalubalen rashin kyawon yanayi a Afrika.
Text2 Translation: On Tuesday, Buhari left Nigeria for Kenya, where he will participate in a meeting to address the challenges of climate change in Africa.

Text1: Ta yi kira ga mutane da su ci gaba da tsaftace muhallansu musamman abinci da ruwan sha domin guje wa kamuwa da cutar.
Text1 Translation: She called on people to continue cleaning their homes, especially food and drinking water to avoid contracting the disease.
Text2: Bunza ya yi kira ga mutane da su rika tsaftace jikin su, muhalli da abincin su domin gujewa kamuwa da cutar.
Text2 Translation: Bunza called on people to clean their body, environment and food to avoid contracting the disease.

Text1: Tunda gwamnati ta gaza, a bari ƴan Najeriya su mallaki bindigogi kawai – Ado Doguwa
Text1 Translation: Since the government has failed, let Nigerians only own guns - Ado Doguwa
Text2: ” Kawai a kyale mutane su mallaki makamai kawai su kare kansu domin gwamnati ta gaza, jami’an tsaro sun gaza.
Text2 Translation: "Just allow people to own weapons to protect themselves because the government has failed, the security forces have failed.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai Abba Anwar ne ya yi sanarwar ga manema labarai a ranar Alhamis a Kano.
Text1 Translation: Broadcasting spokesman Abba Anwar made the announcement to journalists on Thursday in Kano.
Text2: Sanarwar da ya fito daga Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na Ma’aikatar ‘Yan Sanda, ta ƙara da cewa dama akwai batun kashe kuɗaɗen a cikin kasafin 2021.
Text2 Translation: The announcement from the Publicity Spokesperson of the Ministry of Police, added that there is a possibility of spending money in the 2021 budget.

Text1: Tashar makamashin nukiliya ta Ukraniya ita ce mafi girma a duk faɗin Turai baki ɗaya.
Text1 Translation: Ukraine's nuclear power plant is the largest in all of Europe.
Text2: Wannan harƙallar  dai ita ce mafi girma da ake fallasawa daga cikin manyan harƙalloli tun bayan hawan mulkin Buhari a 2015.
Text2 Translation: This case is the biggest that has been exposed among the major cases since Buhari came to power in 2015.

Text1: Gwamnan Zamfara, Bello Matawalle ya umari ƴan jihar su mallaki bindigogi domin su kare kansu.
Text1 Translation: The Governor of Zamfara, Bello Matawalle has ordered the citizens of the state to own guns to protect themselves.
Text2: Shugaban madu rinjaye na majalisar Tarayya Honarabul Ado Doguwa ya kalubalanci hwamnatin tarayya ta kyale ƴan Najeriya su Mallaki bindigogi fomin kare kansu.
Text2 Translation: The Majority Leader of the Federal Assembly, Honorable Ado Doguwa, has challenged the federal government to allow Nigerians to own firearms for self-defense.

Text1: A kasashin dai Gwamnatin Tarayya za ta ciwo bashin naira tiriliyan 8.27, kuma za ta biya bashin naira tiriliyan 6.31.
Text1 Translation: In the country, the Federal Government will incur a debt of 8.27 trillion naira, and will pay the debt of 6.31 trillion naira.
Text2: Hakan ya haifar da Gwamnatin Buhari za ta sauka ta bar bashin naira tiriliyan 23.7  da karɓa ba bisa ƙa’ida ba a CBN.
Text2 Translation: As a result, the Buhari government will step down and leave the debt of 23.7 trillion naira illegally received from the CBN.

Text1: Malam Uba Sani ne zai kara da Isah Ashiru na PDP a zaɓen da kuma sauran ƴan takara da ke wasu jam’iyyun.
Text1 Translation: Malam Uba Sani will face Isah Ashiru of PDP in the election and other candidates from other parties.
Text2: Wike da wasu gwamnonin PDP huɗu dai su na so Shugaban PDP Iyorchia Ayu ya sauka, a zaɓi ɗan kudu ya riƙe shugabancin jam’iyyar.
Text2 Translation: Wike and four other PDP governors wanted PDP Chairman Iyorchia Ayu to step down and a southerner should be elected to hold the leadership of the party.

Text1: Ya ce idan ya tafi, guduwa zai yi, tunda akwai sauran watanni goma na wa’adin sa da bai kammala ba.
Text1 Translation: He said that if he leaves, he will run away, since there are still ten months of his term that he has not completed.
Text2: Ƙoƙarin Ugwuanyi na tafiya Majalisar Dattawa bayan kammala wa’adin mulkin shekara takwas bai yi nasara ba.
Text2 Translation: Ugwuanyi's attempt to go to the Senate after completing his eight-year term was unsuccessful.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe dagacin garin Maisamari  Sufiyanu dake karamar hukumar Sardauna, Jihar Taraba.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed Maisamari Sufiyanu town in Sardauna Local Government Area, Taraba State.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutane  uku da ‘yan sanda 10 a garin Ngaski da Gafara dake karamar hukumar Ngaski a jihar Kebbi.
Text2 Translation: Bandits have killed three people and 10 policemen in Ngaski and Gafara town in Ngaski local government in Kebbi state.

Text1: Ya ce duk wani laifi da ɗan Najeriya zai aikata, to za a ga ya danne haƙƙin wani ɗan ƙasa ne.
Text1 Translation: He said that any crime committed by a Nigerian, it will be seen as a violation of the rights of another citizen.
Text2: Usman ya ce lokaci ya yi da ƴan Najeriya za su rika haɗa mutane irin haka da hukuma domin a kawo karshen abin.
Text2 Translation: Usman said it is time for Nigerians to connect people like this with the authorities to put an end to it.

Text1: Babafemi ya ce mutanen su biyu sun yi bahayan hodar ibilis din bayan sun yi kwanaki uku tsare a hannun hukumar.
Text1 Translation: Babafemi said that the two men made the drug after spending three days in custody in the hands of the agency.
Text2: “Bayan kwanaki biyu da Uwadiegwu ya yi wa matarsa duka ne aka kwantar da Ogochukwu a asibiti inda daga nan ta ce ga garin kunan.
Text2 Translation: "Two days after Uwadiegwu beat his wife, Ogochukwu was admitted to the hospital where she then said to the town that she was dead.

Text1: Kotun ta bada belin Jagun akan naira 100,000 da gabatar da shaida daya a kotun.
Text1 Translation: The court granted Jagun bail for 100,000 naira and presented one witness in the court.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Damilola Sekoni ya bada belin Okunola akan Naira miliyan daya tare da gabatar da shaidu biyu dake aiki.
Text2 Translation: Magistrate Damilola Sekoni granted Okunola bail at one million naira with the presentation of two active witnesses.

Text1: Kwamitin wanda  Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Mamman Tsafe ya shugabanta ya ce an gayyaci sarakunan domin su kare kansu a wajen zaman kwamitin.
Text1 Translation: The committee chaired by Mamman Tsafe State Security Commissioner said the chiefs were invited to defend themselves at the committee meeting.
Text2: Kwamishinan rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar  Ayuba ElkanaElkana ya ce rundunar ba za ta ja da baya ba wajen yaki da duk ‘yan bindiga a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The state police commissioner Ayuba Elkana Elkana said the force will not back down in the fight against all bandits in the state.

Text1: Haka nan a tuhuma ta 35 zuwa ta 39, an yanke masa wasu shekarun biyu ko tarar naira 500,000.
Text1 Translation: Similarly, in charges 35 to 39, he was sentenced to two years or a fine of 500,000 naira.
Text2: An sace shi sati biyu kafin a yanke kafofin sadarwa ta waya a wasu bangare na Jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: He was abducted two weeks before telephone communication was cut off in some parts of Kaduna State.

Text1: Hakan na kunshe ne a wata sako da ya aika wa Vanguard ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: This was contained in a message he sent to Vanguard on Saturday.
Text2: Hakan na kunshe ne a jawabin da kwamishina Sani yayi a wajen wani taron daliban jihar Kaduna dake jami’ar jihar Kaduna, KADSU ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: This was contained in the speech made by Commissioner Sani at a meeting of Kaduna State students at the Kaduna State University, KADSU on Thursday.

Text1: A kotun Enema ya musanta laifin da ake zarginsa da su.
Text1 Translation: In court, Enema denied the crime he was accused of.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Umar Mayana ya yanke hukuncin daure Waziri a kurkuku duk da cewa ya musanta aikata laifufukan da ake zarginsa da su.
Text2 Translation: Judge Umar Mayana sentenced Waziri to prison even though he denied committing the crimes he was accused of.

Text1: A Katsina, Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Hukumar Gidajen Kurkuku, Najib Idris, ya ce an tsaurara tsaro ne saboda hana kai harin.
Text1 Translation: In Katsina, the Spokesperson of the Prisons Authority, Najib Idris, said security was tightened to prevent the attack.
Text2: Amma dai ya ce an ƙarfafa matakan tsaro a gidajen kurkuku, tun bayan farmakin da ‘yan ta’adda su ka kai a Kurkukun Kuje.
Text2 Translation: But he said security measures have been strengthened in prisons, since the attack by terrorists in Kuje Prison.

Text1: Lauyan dake kare Falilat, Akintan Olukayode ya ce Falilat da ƴan adashen  na kokarin sasanta kansu a wajen kotu.
Text1 Translation: Falilat's lawyer, Akintan Olukayode, said that Falilat and the adashene are trying to settle themselves outside the court.
Text2: Kwamitin wanda  Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Mamman Tsafe ya shugabanta ya ce an gayyaci sarakunan domin su kare kansu a wajen zaman kwamitin.
Text2 Translation: The committee chaired by Mamman Tsafe State Security Commissioner said the chiefs were invited to defend themselves at the committee meeting.

Text1: Mahangar Zamani sabon shiri ne daga BBC Hausa wanda za a rika sakawa a shafin Youtube duk mako daga ranar Asabar 2 ga watan Agusta.
Text1 Translation: Mahangar Zamani is a new program from BBC Hausa that will be posted on YouTube every week from Saturday, August 2.
Text2: Madina Maishanu ce za ta rika gabatar da shirin talbijin din a shafin YouTube a yanar gizo duk mako.
Text2 Translation: Madina Maishanu will present the TV show on the YouTube page every week.

Text1: A labarin, Shugaban Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa ya tabbatar wa Thabo Mbeki za a gudanar da sahihin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: In the news, the Chairman of the National Electoral Commission assured Thabo Mbeki that a valid presidential election will be held.
Text2: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa (INEC), ta tabbatar wa ‘yan Nijeriya da duniya cewa za ta gudanar da sahihin zaɓe kuma wanda zai kasance karɓaɓɓe.
Text2 Translation: The National Electoral Commission (INEC) has assured Nigerians and the world that it will conduct a fair and credible election.

Text1: Ya ce Hushpuppi dai ya ga hotunan shi Kyari ɗin a shafin sa na Facebook, ya na sanye da kayan gargajiya har ya yi sha’awa.
Text1 Translation: He said that Hushpuppi had seen photos of Kyari on his Facebook page, he was wearing traditional clothes and he was interested.
Text2: “To daga nan sai ya ga wasu hotuna da na ke sanye da kayan gargajiya a shafi na na soshiyal midiya.
Text2 Translation: "Then he saw some pictures of me wearing traditional clothes on my social media page.

Text1: Sannan kuma a jihar Oyo hukumar ta kama wani  dillalin kwayoyi mai suna Mustapha Ijabula mai shekara 22 da kwayoyin tramadol 1,900.
Text1 Translation: And in Oyo state, the agency arrested a drug dealer named Mustapha Ijabula, 22 years old, with 1,900 pills of tramadol.
Text2: Hukumar ta kama Ijabula a Yola jihar Adamawa yayin da hukumar ke caje mutane da motoci a kan hanyar Legas zuwa Ibadan.
Text2 Translation: The agency arrested Ijabula in Yola, Adamawa state while the agency was charging people and vehicles on the road from Lagos to Ibadan.

Text1: Dama a ranar 29 Ga Nuwamba ne gwamnatin tarayya ta amince za ta ayyana su da suna ‘yan ta’adda, bayan kotu ta bayar da umarni.
Text1 Translation: Right on November 29, the federal government agreed to declare them as terrorists, after the court gave instructions.
Text2: A kan haka bayan kotu ta bada umarnin tsare shi, ta ce za a ci gaba da shari’ar a ranar 13 Ga Oktoba.
Text2 Translation: Accordingly, after the court ordered his detention, it said that the case will continue on October 13.

Text1: PDP ta yi rugurugu da APC a kujerun ƴan majalisar  Wakilai, Bilbis ya Kada Marafa a kujerar sanata
Text1 Translation: PDP clashed with APC in the seats of the House of Representatives, Bilbis Kada Marafa in the senatorial seat
Text2: Mambobin sun yi ganawa ce ranar Alhamis a Majalisa, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Sanata Phillip Aduda, ɗan PDP da ke wakiltar Gundumar FCT Abuja a Majalisar Dattawa.
Text2 Translation: The members had a meeting on Thursday at the House of Assembly, under the leadership of Senator Phillip Aduda, a member of the PDP representing FCT Abuja District in the Senate.

Text1: Jami’an Kwastam sun kama manyan motoci 73 dankare da buhunan shinkafa da ganyen wiwi a jihar Ogun
Text1 Translation: Customs officials seized 73 trucks loaded with potatoes, bags of rice and weed leaves in Ogun state
Text2: Hukumar kwastam reshen jihar Ogun ta kama manyan motoci 73 da suka shigo kasarnan dankare da buhunan shinkafa 44,933 jihar.
Text2 Translation: The Ogun state branch of customs has seized 73 trucks that brought 44,933 bags of potatoes and rice into the state.

Text1: Buhari ya ce an samu gagarumin ci gaba a Ma’aikatar Bunƙasa Tattalin Arzikin Fasahar Sadarwar Zamani, wato Digital Economy.
Text1 Translation: Buhari said that there has been significant progress in the Ministry of Economic Development of the Digital Economy.
Text2: Buhari ya ce kuma an yi titinan ne a yankunan da ke da muhimmanci wajen inganta tattalin arzikin faɗin ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: Buhari said that the roads were built in areas that are important in improving the economy of the country.

Text1: Wata ma’aikaciyar babbar asibitin Talata Mafara mai suna Maryam ta ce an kawo mutum biyar daga kauyen Ruwan Bore da suka ji mumunar rauni asibitin.
Text1 Translation: An employee of Talata Mafara General Hospital named Maryam said that five people from Ruwan Bore village who were seriously injured were brought to the hospital.
Text2: Kwamishina Yekini ya ce tuni an garzaya da waɗanda suka ji rauni asibitin sojoji na 44 domin a basu magani.
Text2 Translation: Commissioner Yekini said that the injured have already been rushed to the 44th military hospital for treatment.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Koledoye Adeniyi bayan ya saurari ma’auratan ya dage shari’ar zuwa ranar 31 ga Maris.
Text1 Translation: Judge Koledoye Adeniyi after hearing the couple adjourned the case to March 31.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Adeniyi Koledoye ya raba auren ne bayan Mojidi ya yi watsi da kokarin daidaita su da kotu da mutane suka yi kokarin yi.
Text2 Translation: Judge Adeniyi Koledoye dissolved the marriage after Mojidi abandoned efforts to reconcile them with the court that people tried to do.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun yi garkuwa da dalibai mata a jihar Zamfara
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have kidnapped female students in Zamfara state
Text2: AN GUDU NA A TSIRA BA: Ƴan bindiga sun yi garkuwa da mutane 11 a Shimfiɗa, jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: 11 people have been kidnapped by bandits in Shimfida, Katsina state

Text1: Ya ce rundunar ta fara yin da bincike domin ceto mutanen da aka yi garkuwa da su.
Text1 Translation: He said that the army has started to search for the rescue of the kidnapped people.
Text2: Adam ya ce rundunar ta fara gudanar da bincike domin kamo sauran mutanen da suka tada rikicin.
Text2 Translation: Adam said that the force has started an investigation to arrest the other people who started the conflict.

Text1: Ganduje ya ce zai kira manajojin bankunan da ke Jihar Kano domin a samu mafita daga matsalar ƙarancin kuɗaɗe da al’ummar jihar sa ke ciki.
Text1 Translation: Ganduje said that he will call the bank managers in Kano State to find a solution to the problem of lack of funds that the people of his state are going through.
Text2: Arabi ya samu rakiyar Gwamna Abdullahi Ganduje na Jihar Kano da babban malamin addinin Musulunci a Ɗariƙar Tijjaniya a Najeriya, Sheikh Ɗahiru Bauchi.
Text2 Translation: Arabi was accompanied by Governor Abdullahi Ganduje of Kano State and the chief Islamic teacher of the Tijjaniya School in Nigeria, Sheikh Dahiru Bauchi.

Text1: Shugaban hukumar Ibrahim Muhammad ya sanar da haka  a garin Fatakwal a farkon wannan mako.
Text1 Translation: The head of the agency, Ibrahim Muhammad, announced this in Fatakwal town at the beginning of this week.
Text2: Shugaban hukumar Wada Chedi ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ta fito daga ofishinsa a farkon wannan mako.
Text2 Translation: The head of the Wada Chedi board announced this in a document issued from his office earlier this week.

Text1: An danƙara wa ‘yan sanda naira biliyan huɗu domin zuba fetur a motocin sintiri
Text1 Translation: Four billion naira was given to the police to fuel the patrol cars
Text2: A cewar sa wannan ne karo na farko a aka taɓa bai wa ‘yan sanda muƙudan kuɗaɗen zuba wa motocin sintiri mai.
Text2 Translation: According to him, this is the first time that the police have been given money to fuel the patrol cars.

Text1: A zaɓen 1999, Jihohin Yarabawa   ba su zaɓi PDP ba, dukkan gwamnonin su na AD ne.
Text1 Translation: In the 1999 elections, the Yoruba states did not vote for PDP, all their governors are from AD.
Text2: Amma a zaɓen 2003 PDP a ƙarƙashin Obasanjo sai da ta ƙwace jihohin Yarabawa dukkan duniya su, sai Legas ce kaɗai ta gagare shi.
Text2 Translation: But in the 2003 election, the PDP under Obasanjo had to take all the Yoruba states, but only Lagos failed.

Text1: Hukumar AEPB ta garƙame ma’aikatun  ranar Talata saboda tulin bashin naira biliyan 10 da take bin ma’aikatun na haraji da sauransu.
Text1 Translation: The AEPB ordered the ministries on Tuesday because of the pile of debts of 10 billion naira that it owes to the ministries for taxes and others.
Text2: Hukumar tara Haraji ta Jihar Kaduna ta garkame wasu bankuna 4 saboda kin biyan tulin harajin naira miliyan N300.5
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna State Tax Collector has arrested 4 banks for refusing to pay N300.5 million in taxes.

Text1: Zuwa yanzu mutum 238,420 suka kamu, an sallami mutum 212,770 sannan akwai mutum 21,989 dake dauke da cutar.
Text1 Translation: So far 238,420 people have been infected, 212,770 people have been discharged and there are 21,989 people with the disease.
Text2: “Zuwa yanzu mutum miliyan 1.6 dake dauke da cutar na karbar magani sannan suna rayuwar su cikin koshin lafiya a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: "So far, 1.6 million people with the disease are receiving treatment and are living a healthy life in Nigeria.

Text1: Afrika ta Kudu ta ayyana cewa ta yanke shawarar ficewa daga mamba ɗin Kotun Hukunta Manyan Laifuka ta Ƙasa da Ƙasa (ICC) a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: South Africa announced its decision to withdraw from the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Tuesday.
Text2: A ranar 24 Ga Maris, Kotun Ƙoli ta kori ƙarar, tare da cewa hukuncin da Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta yanke ya na nan daram.
Text2 Translation: On March 24, the Supreme Court dismissed the appeal, saying that the decision of the Federal High Court stands.

Text1: Sun samu nasarar tone nakiyar ce (IED) bayan wasu masu kishi sun gaggauta kai rahoton ganin bam ɗin a ofishin ‘yan sanda.
Text1 Translation: They managed to unearth the IED after some enthusiasts immediately reported the sighting of the bomb to the police station.
Text2: Nguroje ya ce Hamsatu ta rasu bayan an kaita asibiti cikin gaggawa amma Muhammed na tsare a ofishin ‘yan sanda.
Text2 Translation: Nguroje said Hamsatu died after being rushed to the hospital but Muhammed was detained at the police station.

Text1: Sun bayyana wannan matsayar da su ka cimma a ranar Lahadi, bayan sun tashi daga wani taron gaggawa a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: They announced this decision they reached on Sunday, after leaving an emergency meeting in Abuja.
Text2: Adamu ya jaddada wannan matsaya ta Gwamnatin Tarayya, bayan tashi daga Taron Majalisar Zartaswa, wanda Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya jagoranta, a ranar Laraba.
Text2 Translation: Adamu emphasized this position of the Federal Government, after leaving the Cabinet meeting, chaired by President Muhammadu Buhari, on Wednesday.

Text1: Gwamna Buni ya fadi haka ne a wata takarda da mai taimaka masa kan harkokin yada labarai Mamman Mohammed ya saka wa hannuranar Litinin.
Text1 Translation: Governor Buni said this in a document signed by his media assistant Mamman Mohammed on Monday.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar Mohammed Shehu ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da aka raba wa manema labarai a garin Gusau.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the army, Mohammed Shehu, announced this in a document distributed to the media in Gusau town.

Text1: Wata daliba kuma mazauniyar Karu Kadijat Idris ta ce tana siyan kayan gwanjo saboda arha da yadda yake da saukin samu.
Text1 Translation: Another student, a resident of Karu Kadijat Idris, said she buys auction items because they are cheap and easy to find.
Text2: Ma’aikaciyar banki Kadijat Idris ta ce kayan gwanjo musamman jaka da takalma sun fi aminci saboda mutum zai dade yana amfani da su.
Text2 Translation: Bank employee Kadijat Idris said auction goods especially bags and shoes are safer because one will use them for a long time.

Text1: Shugaban yaƙin zaɓen ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Anambra, Andy Uba, Afam Ogene ya aika wa ƴan APGA da wannan gargaɗi.
Text1 Translation: The campaign chairman of Anambra state governorship candidate, Andy Uba, Afam Ogene has sent this warning to APGA members.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, Andy Uba ya taɓa tsayawa takarar gwamnan Jihar Anambra, har ya ci zaɓe a cikin 2007.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, Andy Uba once ran for the governorship of Anambra State, until he won the election in 2007.

Text1: ‘Yan banga wanda aka fi sanin su da  ‘Yan Sakai’ sun kashe mutum 11 a kauyen  Mande dake karamar hukumar Gwadabawa.
Text1 Translation: "Vigilantes" known as "Yan Sakai" killed 11 people in Mande village in Gwadabawa local government.
Text2: Adamu ya ce rundunar ta kama wadannan mutane a kauyen  Dasin Bwate dake karamar hukumar Fufore.
Text2 Translation: Adamu said the force arrested these people in Dasin Bwate village in Fufore local government.

Text1: Hukumar Hisbah ta jihar Kano ta kama wasu matasa su 19 da suka halarci taron daurin auren wasu maza biyu, Abba da Mujahid a jihar.
Text1 Translation: The Kano State Hisbah Commission has arrested 19 youths who attended the wedding ceremony of two men, Abba and Mujahid in the state.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Adamawa ta kama wasu mutane  21 da ake zargi Mayu ne sun cinye  wasu mutum 7 a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The Adamawa state police force has arrested 21 people suspected of having eaten 7 people in the state.

Text1: An kai wa gidan Mary Odili farmakin neman yin bincike a gidan ta bisa umarnin wani alƙalin ƙaramar kotu na bogi a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: Mary Odili's house was raided to search her house on the orders of a fake small court judge in Abuja.
Text2: Malami ya ƙaryata tantagaryar ɗan iskan da ya ce ya na da alaƙa da maharan gidan Mary Odili
Text2 Translation: The teacher denied the allegations of the assailant who said he was related to the attackers of Mary Odili's house

Text1: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar ta ce ‘yan jagaliyan siyasa ne suka kashe daya daga cikin mutanen da suka mutu a taron Toib Mutallib
Text1 Translation: The state police said that one of the people who died in the Toib Mutallib meeting was killed by political gangs.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Jigawa ta bayyana cewa ta fara farautar wani matashi mai shekara 22 da ya kashe wansa da wuka a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The Jigawa State Police has announced that it has started hunting for a 22-year-old man who killed his brother with a knife in the state.

Text1: Adamu ya yi wannan bayani a ranar Talata, lokacin da ya ke ganawa da Mambobin Tarayya ‘yan APC a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: Adamu made this statement on Tuesday, when he was meeting with APC Federal Members in Abuja.
Text2: Ndume ya yi wannan tsokaci a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a ranar Alhamis, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: Ndume made this comment during a press conference on Thursday in Abuja.

Text1: Ina rokon kotu ta raba aure na da Yusuf kada wata rana ya kashe ni da duka – Ramatu a Kotu
Text1 Translation: I am asking the court to dissolve my marriage with Yusuf so that one day he will kill me and beat me - Ramatu in Court
Text2: Ramat ta ce tana bukatar kotu ta taba auren kada wata rana Yusuf ya kashe ta da duka.
Text2 Translation: Ramat said that she needs the court to marry her so that one day Yusuf will kill her with a beating.

Text1: “Jami’an tsaron sun kwato bindiga kirar AK47 guda daya da harsashi 30 a cikin bindigan, wayar salula 7 da babur Kiran Honda guda daya.
Text1 Translation: "The security officers recovered one AK47 gun with 30 bullets in the gun, 7 cell phones and one Honda motorcycle.
Text2: “An kwato bindiga guda daya kirar AK47, harsasai 35, babura guda biyu da basu da rajista da layuka a maɓoyar maharan.
Text2 Translation: "One AK47 rifle, 35 bullets, two unregistered motorcycles and lines from the hideout of the attackers were recovered.

Text1: Wannan jarida dai ta buga labarin INEC ta nemi kotu iznin yi wa na’urorin BVAS garambawul kafin zaɓen gwamnoni.
Text1 Translation: This newspaper published the story of INEC asking the court for permission to reform the BVAS machines before the governorship elections.
Text2: Ɓangarorin biyu sun nemi kotu ta ba su iznin binciken na’urorin da INEC ta yi amfani da su wajen zaɓe.
Text2 Translation: Both parties asked the court to allow them to inspect the equipment used by INEC in the election.

Text1: Mataimakin gwamnan Anambra ya sauya sheƙa daga APGA zuwa APC
Text1 Translation: The deputy governor of Anambra has defected from APGA to APC
Text2: Mataimakin gwamnan jihar Anambra Nkem Okeke ya sauya sheka daga jam’iyyar APGA zuwa APC.
Text2 Translation: Anambra State Deputy Governor Nkem Okeke has defected from APGA to APC.

Text1: Shi ma Mustapha Inuwa, ya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen nasarar Masari a zaɓen 2015, lokacin ya na shugaban APC a Jihar Katsina.
Text1 Translation: Mustapha Inuwa also played an important role in the victory of Masari in the 2015 election, when he was the chairman of the APC in Katsina State.
Text2: Ya ce Ƙaramar Hukuma ɗaya tal APC ta yi nasara a zaɓen Shugaban Ƙasa a Jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: He said that the Local Authority of the APC won the Presidential election in Kaduna State.

Text1: An shirya taron ne a Abuja ranar Laraba, a ƙarƙashin ƙungiyar dRPC.
Text1 Translation: The meeting was organized in Abuja on Wednesday, under the auspices of dRPC.
Text2: “Shi ɗan siyasar Abuja aikin shi kaɗai ya baza babbar riga ya shirya taron gangami, daga ranar kuma ba a ƙara ganin shi a jihar.
Text2 Translation: "He is a politician in Abuja, the job alone is to put on a big shirt and organize a rally, and from that day he is no longer seen in the state.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe ɗan sanda ɗaya a kauyen Ihiala dake jihar Anambra
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have killed a policeman in Ihiala village in Anambra state
Text2: Ya ce an tsinci gawar Nneka ranar 29 ga Agusta a gonar rogo dake kauyen Nguzu Edda kusa da jihar Abia.
Text2 Translation: He said Nneka's body was found on August 29 in a cassava field in Nguzu Edda village near Abia state.

Text1: Yadda Ƴan bindiga suka kashe Ƴan sanda biyu a Ɓaure,  jihar Katsina
Text1 Translation: How gunmen killed two policemen in Baure, Katsina state
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe mutum 10 a kauyen Yasore, jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: Gunmen killed 10 people in Yasore village, Katsina state

Text1: An bi Saraki da sharri a lokacin, ta yadda duk matsalar da ta faru sai a ce don Saraki na Shuagaban Majalisar Dattawa ne.
Text1 Translation: Saraki was treated badly at that time, so that all the problems that happened had to be said to be because of Saraki, the President of the Senate.
Text2: Ta bi diddigin ayyukan da aka ware kuɗaɗe aka ce an yi a cikin kasafin 2019 da na 2020.
Text2 Translation: She followed up on the projects that were allocated funds and said to have been done in the 2019 and 2020 budgets.

Text1: KURUNKUS: Mr LA ne ɗan takarar kujerar Sanatan Kaduna ta Tsakiya na PDP ba Sardaunan Badarawa ba – Kotun Koli
Text1 Translation: KURUNKUS: Mr LA is the candidate for the Kaduna Central Senatorial seat of the PDP and not Sardaunaun Badarawa - Supreme Court
Text2: Ɗan takarar Sanata na Kaduna ta tsakiya Mohammaed Sani Dattijo, ya halarci taron rabon kuɗin.
Text2 Translation: The senatorial candidate for Kaduna Central, Mohammad Sani Dattijo, participated in the distribution of the money.

Text1: Can a Jihar Zamfara kuwa, Gwamna Matawalle zai sauka ya bar Zamfarawa a hannun ‘yan bindiga, ma’aikatan jihar na bin sa albashin wata uku.
Text1 Translation: In Zamfara State, Governor Matawalle will step down and leave Zamfara people in the hands of bandits, the state workers owe him three months salary.
Text2: Ya ce Peter Obi wanda ya taɓa yin gwamna a Jihar Anambra, ya na baya can nesa fintinkau da Tinubu.
Text2 Translation: He said that Peter Obi, who was once the governor of Anambra State, was far away from Tinubu.

Text1: Garba Shehu ya ce Gudaji ai kowa ya san cewa mutumin Shugaban Ƙasa ne, babu mai iya hana shi ganin Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: Garba Shehu said that everyone knows that Gudaji is the President of the Nation, no one can prevent him from seeing the President of the Nation.
Text2: “Shi kan sa Shugaban PDP Iyorchia Ayu ai ya yi Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa, ya kuma san cewa abu ne mai wahala tsige shugaban ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: "He made PDP President Iyorchia Ayu the President of the Senate, and he knows that it is difficult to impeach the president.

Text1: A ranar Litini din makon jiya wasu mutane suka cinna wa wani basarake da ‘ya’yan sa maza uku wuta suka kone ƙurmus a jihar Ogun.
Text1 Translation: On Monday last week, some people set fire to a prince and his three sons in Ogun state.
Text2: A ranar Litinin makon jiya mahara suna kashe mutum daya a taron karshen shekara da ake yi a kauyen Igbaye jihar Osun.
Text2 Translation: On Monday last week, assailants killed one person at the end of the year gathering in Igbaye village, Osun state.

Text1: A cikin alhini an bayyana rasuwar tsohon Mai Shari’a a Kotun Duniya, kuma tsohon Ministan Shari’a, Bola Ajibola.
Text1 Translation: The death of the former Judge at the World Court, and the former Minister of Justice, Bola Ajibola was announced in grief.
Text2: Tsohon gwamnan jihar Legas, Bola Tinubu ya bayyana cewa bashi da ɗan da ya kai matsayin bayyana kansa ɗan takarar shugaban kasa a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: The former governor of Lagos State, Bola Tinubu has stated that he does not have a son who is worthy of declaring himself a presidential candidate in Nigeria.

Text1: “Sannan kuma jami’an tsaron mu  ba su da manyan bindigogi irin waɗanda Boko Haram su ka kai wa Kurkukun Kuje hari da su.”
Text1 Translation: "And our security forces don't have big guns like the ones Boko Haram used to attack Kuje Prison."
Text2: Makonni biyu da suka wuce kuma an nuno Boko Haram sun kama wasu jami’an tsaron ƙasar nan su biyu kuma sun kashe su.
Text2 Translation: Two weeks ago, it was revealed that Boko Haram had arrested two national security officers and killed them.

Text1: Ya ce hukumar zaɓe ba za ta bai wa wani uzirin yin zaɓe ba tare da katin shaidar rajista ba.
Text1 Translation: He said the electoral commission will not excuse anyone from voting without a registration card.
Text2: Odinkalu wanda ƙwararren lauya ne, ya ce bai yi tsammanin INEC a ƙarƙashin shugabancin Muhammadu Buhari za ta yi zaɓe sahihi ba.
Text2 Translation: Odinkalu, who is a lawyer, said he did not expect INEC under the presidency of Muhammadu Buhari to conduct a fair election.

Text1: Bayan haka shugaban hukumar ya ce nan gaba dalibai za su iya samun satifiket din jarabawar ta yanar gizo.
Text1 Translation: After that, the head of the board said that in the future, students will be able to get the exam certificate online.
Text2: Oloyede ya ce dalibai biyar daga cikin 10 din da suka fi samun maki maiyawa a jarabawar sun zabi Jami’ar ‘Convenant’ dake Ota, Jihar Ogun.
Text2 Translation: Oloyede said that five out of the 10 students who scored the highest marks in the examination chose Covenant University in Ota, Ogun State.

Text1: A gefe ɗaya kuma, ADC ta kware wa PDP da LP baya, ta ce ba ta jayayya da INEC ko Tinubu.
Text1 Translation: On the other hand, ADC has backed PDP and LP and said that it does not argue with INEC or Tinubu.
Text2: ADC ta kware wa PDP da LP baya, ta ce ba ta jayayya da INEC ko Tinubu
Text2 Translation: ADC has backed PDP and LP, she said she is not arguing with INEC or Tinubu

Text1: A zaɓen 1999, Jihohin Yarabawa   ba su zaɓi PDP ba, dukkan gwamnonin su na AD ne.
Text1 Translation: In the 1999 elections, the Yoruba states did not vote for PDP, all their governors are from AD.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, Gwamna Umahi na daga cikin nafarkon gwamnonin yankin Inyamirai da suka canja sheka daga PDP zuwa APC.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, Governor Umahi is one of the first governors of Inyamirai region who switched from PDP to APC.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Katsina Gambo Isa ya shaida wa wakilin mu cewa zai bibiyi lamarin sannan ya kira shi.
Text1 Translation: Katsina State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson Gambo Isa told our correspondent that he will follow up on the matter and call him.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Gambo Isa ya tabbatar da rasuwan ‘yan sandan.
Text2 Translation: Gambo Isa state police spokesman confirmed the death of the policemen.

Text1: A ranar Juma’a ce Ɗan Majalisar Tarayya Gudaji Kazaure ya yi wannan zargi.
Text1 Translation: On Friday, the member of the Federal Assembly, Gudaji Kazaure, made this accusation.
Text2: A ranar Laraba ce Elumelu ya shawarci ‘Yan Majalisar Tarayya ya ce duk su fece zuwa gida, Abuja ba tsaro.
Text2 Translation: On Wednesday, Elumelu advised the members of the Federal Assembly to go home, Abuja is not safe.

Text1: Jega ya ce wannan labari ya samo asaline daga gungun wasu yan PdP da basu kaunar Tinubu da zaman lafiya a Kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Jega said that this story originated from a group of PdP members who did not love Tinubu and peace in this country.
Text2: Ya ce Almajirai da mabarata na kwararowa ne saboda rashin tsaron da ake fama da shi a wasu jihohin dake Arewacin kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: He said that students and beggars are pouring in because of the lack of security in some states in the North of the country.

Text1: Uba ya ce daya daga cikin manyan ayyukan da gwamnatin Buhari ta yi shine gina gadar Neja wanda har yanzu ana gina ta.
Text1 Translation: Uba said that one of the major projects done by the Buhari administration is the construction of the Niger Bridge which is still under construction.
Text2: Fashola ya ce kwanan nan Gwamnatin Buhari za ta gina shingayen karɓar haraji daga direbobi a manyan titinan Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: Fashola said that the Buhari government will soon build roadblocks to collect taxes from drivers on the main roads in Nigeria.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya gabatar  Kasafin 2023 na naira tiriliyan 20:51, a gaban Majalisar Tarayya.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari presented the 2023 Budget of 20:51 trillion naira before the Federal Assembly.
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa za a kashe wa jami’o’in gwamnati da manyan makarantu naira biliyan 470 a 2023.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has announced that 470 billion naira will be spent on government universities and tertiary institutions in 2023.

Text1: Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta bayyana cewa zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 ya samu ci gaba sosai fiye da zaɓukan baya da aka gudanar.
Text1 Translation: The President's office has stated that the 2023 presidential election has progressed much more than previous elections.
Text2: “An samu ci gaba sosai a wannan zaɓen na shugaban ƙasa, idan aka kwatanta da zaɓukan da aka yi a baya.
Text2 Translation: "There has been a lot of progress in this presidential election, compared to previous elections.

Text1: Yadda ƴan bindiga suka yi wa mata fyade suka yi garkuwa da mutum 6  a jihar Zamfara
Text1 Translation: How bandits raped women and kidnapped 6 people in Zamfara state
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe mutum 10 a kauyen Yasore, jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: Gunmen killed 10 people in Yasore village, Katsina state

Text1: KORONA: Mutum 189 sun kamu, 3 sun mutu tsakanin ranakun Litini zuwa Talata a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: CORONA: 189 people were infected, 3 died between Monday and Tuesday in Nigeria
Text2: A ranar Litini mutum 90 ne suka kamu, mutum daya ya mutu
Text2 Translation: On Monday, 90 people were infected and one person died

Text1: Yadda ƴan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da dalibai 10 na makarantar Sakandare a Kachia, Kaduna
Text1 Translation: How bandits kidnapped 10 students of a secondary school in Kachia, Kaduna
Text2: Yadda Ƴan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da manoma biyu suka bukaci a biya naira miliyan 10 kuɗin fansa
Text2 Translation: How bandits kidnapped two farmers and demanded a ransom of 10 million naira

Text1: “A karo na farko gwamnoni 20 da ke kan mulki duk ba su kawo yawan ƙuri’un da aka jefa a jihohin su ba.
Text1 Translation: "For the first time, the 20 governors who are in power did not bring the number of votes cast in their states.
Text2: A Ƙaramar Hukumar Aguata ya yi masu fintinkau, inda su biyun idan aka haɗa ƙuri’un su, ba su kai yawan na Soludo ba.
Text2 Translation: In the Local Government, Aguata won the majority, where both of them, when their votes are combined, are not equal to the number of Soludo.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Emmanuel Idowu ya yi watsi da rokon sassaucin da Ajala ya nema saboda rashin ikon yanke hukuncin akan karar.
Text1 Translation: Judge Emmanuel Idowu rejected Ajala's request for leniency because he lacked jurisdiction over the case.
Text2: Bayan ya saurari bayanan da Bamgbose ya yi alkalin kotun Adeniyi Koledoye ya yanke hukuncin raba auren saboda babu sauran kauna a tsakanin ma’auratan.
Text2 Translation: After listening to Bamgbose's statements, Judge Adeniyi Koledoye decided to dissolve the marriage because there was no more love between the couple.

Text1: Jami’in mai kula da zaben Farfesa Umar Zaiyan na Jami’ar Tarayya ta Birnin Kebbi ne ya sanar da sakamakon zaben ranar Lahadi a Dutse.
Text1 Translation: The election supervisor Professor Umar Zaiyan of the Federal University of Birnin Kebbi announced the results of Sunday's election in Dutse.
Text2: Jami’in hulda da jami’a na rundunar Lawan Shiisu ya sanar da haka wa manema labarai ranar Litini a garin Dutse.
Text2 Translation: Lawan Shiisu, the public relations officer of the command, announced this to the media on Monday in Dutse town.

Text1: Sannan kuma ta ce naira 80,000 din da mijin ya biya sadakin ta, za ta maida masa da su.
Text1 Translation: And she said that the 80,000 naira that the husband paid for her dowry, she will return it to him.
Text2: “Sun nemi a biya su kuɗin fansa naira miliyan 500, mun ce masu ba mu da waɗannan kuɗaɗe, kuma babu inda za mu same su.
Text2 Translation: "They asked for a ransom of 500 million naira, we said that we do not have this money, and we are nowhere to find it.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe ‘yan sanda uku a New Haven dake karamar hukumar  Enugu ta Arewa.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have killed three policemen in New Haven, Enugu North Local Government Area.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum uku a garin Bali dake karamar hukumar Bali a jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Bandits killed three people in Bali town in Bali local government in Taraba state.

Text1: KAKAKIN MAJALISA: Doguwa ya janye wa Abbas, wasu ƴan takara biyu sun bi sahu suma
Text1 Translation: SPEAKER OF THE ASSEMBLY: Doguwa withdrew for Abbas, two other candidates followed suit
Text2: Bayan Doguwa wasu ƴan takara biyu suma sun janye wa Abbas.
Text2 Translation: After Doguwa, two other candidates also withdrew for Abbas.

Text1: BA A BORI DA SANYIN JIKI: Ken Nnamani ya fito takarar shugaban ƙasa a APC, ya karaya da farashin fam ɗin naira miliyan 100
Text1 Translation: NOT RUNNING WITH COLD BODY: Ken Nnamani ran for the presidency in APC, he was disappointed by the price of 100 million naira
Text2: Shi dai Ken Nnamani ya ce tsadar farashin takarar shugaban ƙasa bai yi lebur da haƙiƙanin halin ƙarfin aljihun ɗan Najeriya ba.”
Text2 Translation: It is Ken Nnamani who said that the cost of running for the presidency is not in line with the true nature of the pockets of Nigerians.

Text1: Ya ce za a fara zaman tantance su a ranar Alhamis, da ƙarfe 10 na safe.
Text1 Translation: He said that their evaluation session will begin on Thursday, at 10 o'clock in the morning.
Text2: Hukumar ta Kuma ce za a fara jigilar matafiyan daga ranar 31 ga watan Mayu.
Text2 Translation: The Kuma agency will start transporting the travelers from May 31.

Text1: Saboda haka tunanin su a yanzu shi ne Tinubu bai amince da kowanen su ba, sai na jikin sa kaɗai.”
Text1 Translation: Therefore, their thinking now is that Tinubu does not trust any of them, except for his body."
Text2: “Ba don ni da na tsaya bayan Buhari ba, da bai zama shugaban ƙasa ba.” Haka Tinubu ya furta a wurin.
Text2 Translation: "If I had not stood behind Buhari, he would not have become the president." That's what Tinubu said there.

Text1: Umar ya koma PDP, shi kuma Ɗanƙani takarar gwamna zai yi a ƙarƙashin AA.
Text1 Translation: Umar has returned to PDP, and Dankani will run for governor under AA.
Text2: Omisore kuwa kafin ya koma PDP, ya yi Mataimakin Gwamna a Jihar Osun, ƙarƙashin jam’iyyar AD.
Text2 Translation: Before Omisore joined the PDP, he served as Deputy Governor in Osun State, under the AD party.

Text1: Kotu ta ce Ayu a yanzu ba shugaban PDP ba ne, daga yanzu har zuwa ranar da za ta yi hukunci tukunna.
Text1 Translation: The court said that Ayu is not the president of the PDP, from now until the day she decides.
Text2: Tun a ranar Talata Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya ya bayyana matakin da ya ce za su ɗauka tunda Shugaban Ƙasa ya ƙi sa wa dokar hannu.
Text2 Translation: On Tuesday, the Speaker of the Federal Assembly announced the action he said they would take since the President refused to sign the law.

Text1: Jaridar Daily Post wanda ta wallafa labarin ya ce maharan sun afka kauyen a safiyar Asabar bisa babura.
Text1 Translation: The Daily Post, which published the story, said the attackers attacked the village on Saturday morning on motorcycles.
Text2: Mazauna kauyen Zak dake karamar hukumar Wase sun ce maharan sun afka kauyen su domin kashe kowa a kauyen.
Text2 Translation: Residents of Zak village in Wase local government said the attackers attacked their village to kill everyone in the village.

Text1: NDLEA ta kama mutum biyu da suka kantara bahayan ƙullin hodar ibilis 193 da suka haɗiya a Abuja
Text1 Translation: NDLEA arrests two men who were found in possession of 193 pills of Ibil that they swallowed in Abuja
Text2: NDLEA ta kama dan Najeriya da ya hadiye kullin hodar ibilis 92 a filin jirgin saman Abuja
Text2 Translation: NDLEA has arrested a Nigerian man who swallowed 92 packets of narcotics at the Abuja airport

Text1: Mahmud Gaya wanda shine ɗan majalisan da ke kan kujera ya lashe zaɓen da ƙuri’u 198 inda shi kuma Bashir ya samu kuri’u 16 kacal.
Text1 Translation: Mahmud Gaya who is the sitting member of parliament won the election with 198 votes while Bashir got only 16 votes.
Text2: APC ta kwashi zunzurutun kuri’u har 7,280 inda ɗan takaran PDP Hahaha Garba ya samu ƙuri’u 4,063.
Text2 Translation: APC won 7,280 votes while PDP candidate Hahaha Garba got 4,063 votes.

Text1: Shi da kan sa Adamu ya bayyana cewa ‘daga sama aka ce na fito takara.’
Text1 Translation: Adamu himself stated that 'it was said from above that I came forward to contest.'
Text2: ‘Daga sama aka ce min na fito takarar shugabancin APC’ – Sanata Adamu
Text2 Translation: 'I was told from above that I am contesting for the leadership of APC' - Senator Adamu

Text1: RAHOTO: Akalla yaran da basu makarantar boko a Najeriya sun kai miliyan 6.9
Text1 Translation: REPORT: There are at least 6.9 million children who are out of school in Nigeria
Text2: “Alkaluman yawan yaran da basu makarantar boko a kasar nan ya ragu a dalilin Shirin BESDA da gwamnatin Buhari bullo da shi.
Text2 Translation: "The number of children who do not have formal education in this country has decreased due to the BESDA program launched by the Buhari government.

Text1: Jibrin ya yi wannan karin hake ne a lokacin da yake amsa tambayoyi da talbijin din Channels ranar Lahadi.
Text1 Translation: Jibrin made this remark while answering questions on Channels TV on Sunday.
Text2: Malami ya yi wannan ƙarin bayanin a ranar Litinin, lokacin da ya ke amsa tambayoyi ga Gidan Talabijin na Channels, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The teacher made this additional statement on Monday, when he was answering questions to Channels Television, in Abuja.

Text1: Haka nan kuma don taya murna ga Atiku bisa nasarar da ya samu a zaben fidda gwanin PDP wanda aka yi kwanakin baya.
Text1 Translation: Also to congratulate Atiku on his victory in the PDP primaries held a few days ago.
Text2: Amaechi ya ce ” Ina taya ka murnar nasarar da ka samu a zaɓen fidda gwani na shugaban kasa da aka kammala ranar Laraba.
Text2 Translation: Amaechi said, "I congratulate you on your victory in the presidential primaries that concluded on Wednesday.

Text1: A Katsina, Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Hukumar Gidajen Kurkuku, Najib Idris, ya ce an tsaurara tsaro ne saboda hana kai harin.
Text1 Translation: In Katsina, the Spokesperson of the Prisons Authority, Najib Idris, said security was tightened to prevent the attack.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Gwamnan Zamfara, Zailani Bappa ya ce shi bai ga wani abin tada ƙura ba don an nuno hoton Matawalle da Karmanawa tare.
Text2 Translation: Zamfara Governor's Broadcasting Spokesperson, Zailani Bappa, said he did not see any reason for the photo of Matawalle and Karmanawa to be shown together.

Text1: Fitacciyar Jami’ar Maryam Abacha da ke Kano ta saka wa ginin sashen Koyon Zamantakewa da Gudanarwa na jami’ar sunan tsohon mataimakin shugaban kasa, Atiku Abubakar.
Text1 Translation: The famous Maryam Abacha University in Kano has named the building of the Department of Social Studies and Management of the university after the former Vice President, Atiku Abubakar.
Text2: Jihar Kano kuwa, wakilai sun zaɓi ɗan tsohon shugaban kasa Mohammed Abacha ne ɗan takarar gwamna na jam’iyyar PDP.
Text2 Translation: In Kano state, the representatives chose the son of the former president, Mohammed Abacha, as the governorship candidate of the PDP party.

Text1: Shugaban Ƙungiyar Dattawan Yankin Middle Belt, Monday Morgan, ya ragargaji APC saboda ta fitar da ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa da mataimakin sa duk musulmi.
Text1 Translation: The Chairman of the Middle Belt Elders Association, Monday Morgan, criticized the APC for fielding candidates for the presidency and vice president who are all Muslims.
Text2: Sannan kuma Wike ya ragargaji ɗaukar Gwamna Okowa na Jihar Delta matsayin ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa ga Atiku.
Text2 Translation: And Wike failed to appoint Governor Okowa of Delta State as the vice presidential candidate for Atiku.

Text1: Ya ce a lokacin da yake kauye an bayyana masa cewa zinnan da matarsa ke yi ne ya sa yake fama da rashin lafiya.
Text1 Translation: He said that when he was in the village, it was revealed to him that his wife's adultery was the reason he was suffering from illness.
Text2: Ya ce an kuma tabbatar masa cewa za a iya buga wadatattu a cikin ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: He said that he was also assured that there will be enough to be published in this country.

Text1: Akalla mutum 12 ne suka mutu a wani mummunar rikicin da aka yi tsakanin ‘yan bindiga da ‘yan kungiyar sa kai a jihar Filato.
Text1 Translation: At least 12 people died in a serious conflict between bandits and members of the volunteer group in Plateau State.
Text2: Akalla mutum 13 ne ‘yan bindiga suka kashe a harin da suka kai garin Batsari jihar Katsina ranar Talata da yamma.
Text2 Translation: At least 13 people were killed by bandits in an attack on Batsari town in Katsina state on Tuesday evening.

Text1: Kungiyar kiwon lafiya ta duniya WHO ta bayyana cewa mutum 257 ne suka kamu da cutar a kasashen dake karkashin ta.
Text1 Translation: The World Health Organization (WHO) stated that 257 people have contracted the disease in the countries under its control.
Text2: “Zuwa yanzu mutum miliyan 1.6 dake dauke da cutar na karbar magani sannan suna rayuwar su cikin koshin lafiya a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: "So far, 1.6 million people with the disease are receiving treatment and are living a healthy life in Nigeria.

Text1: Sakataren Gwamnatin Jihar Bauchi Ibrahim Kashim ya lashe takarar Gwamna a ƙarƙashin PDP a jihar, a ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: The Secretary to the Bauchi State Government, Ibrahim Kashim won the governorship contest under the PDP in the state, on Wednesday.
Text2: Haka kuma a jihar Bauchi, ɗan takara ɗaya tilo da ya fito takarar kujerar gwamnan jihar Ibrahim Kashim ne aka zaba ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar.
Text2 Translation: Also in Bauchi state, the only candidate who ran for the governorship of the state, Ibrahim Kashim, was elected as the candidate for the governorship of the state.

Text1: “Ba a taɓa yin tantagaryar mai fashin ƙuri’u da maguɗin zaɓe kamar Obasanjo ba.
Text1 Translation: "There has never been a fight against a voter and an election fraudster like Obasanjo.
Text2: Domin a Tarihi ba a taɓa yin Shugaban Majalisar da ya tsone wa Shugaban Ƙasa ido kamar sa ba.
Text2 Translation: Because in history, there has never been a Speaker of Parliament who has looked down on the President like him.

Text1: BAYANIN BUHARI GA GUNGUN GWAMNONIN APC: ‘Ba zan yi wa zaɓen 2023 katsalandan ba’
Text1 Translation: BUHARI'S STATEMENT TO APC GOVERNMENT GROUP: 'I will not interfere with the 2023 elections'
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya jaddada wa Gwamnonin APC cewa ba zai yi wa zaɓen 2023 katsalandan ba.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari assured the APC Governors that he will not interfere with the 2023 elections.

Text1: Dukkan jam’iyyu 18 sun zaɓi ‘yan takarar su na zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Kogi, kuma jam’iyyu 17 ne su ka yi hakan a Imo da Bayelsa.
Text1 Translation: All 18 parties have chosen their candidates for the governorship election in Kogi State, and 17 parties have done so in Imo and Bayelsa.
Text2: Dangane da hakan sai ya ce ya na goyon bayan A’isha Binani 100 bisa 100, a takarar da tacke yi ta gwamnan Jihar Adamawa.
Text2 Translation: Regarding that, he said that he supports A'isha Binani 100 percent, in her contest for the governorship of Adamawa State.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba Hukumar Zaɓe ta Jihar Kaduna ta ɗage zaɓen ƙananan hukumomi hudu saboda matsalar tsaro a zaɓen 4 ga wata.
Text1 Translation: If it is not forgotten, the Kaduna State Electoral Commission has postponed the election of four local governments due to the security problem in the election on the 4th of the month.
Text2: Jihar Kaduna na daga cikin jihohi hudu a yankin Arewa Maso Yamma da matsalar rashin tsaro ya tsananta.
Text2 Translation: Kaduna State is one of the four states in the North West region where the problem of insecurity has worsened.

Text1: Malami na takarar ɗarewa kujerar gwamnan Kebbi idan wadin mulkin Abubakar Bagudu ya cika a 2023.
Text1 Translation: Malami is contesting for Kebbi governorship if Abubakar Bagudu's term ends in 2023.
Text2: Ko ba komai dai soke dokar zai taimaki malami a matsayin sa wanda zai tsaya takarar gwamnan Jihar Kebbi a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: If nothing else, the repeal of the law will help the teacher as the one who will run for the governorship of Kebbi State in the 2023 election.

Text1: Har yanzu akwai sauran fasinjoji tsare a hannun ƴan bindigan wanda ke jiran tsammani.
Text1 Translation: There are still other passengers in the hands of the gunmen who are waiting to be arrested.
Text2: A jihar Neja, har yanzu ƴan makarantan Islamiya akalla 200 na can tsare hannun ƴan bindiga ba a kai ga ceto su ba.
Text2 Translation: In Niger state, at least 200 Islamic school children are still in the hands of bandits and have not been rescued.

Text1: “Saboda haka CBN ba zai bari a yi amfani da shi ba wajen kawo wa zaɓen 2023 cikas.
Text1 Translation: “Therefore, the CBN will not allow it to be used to disrupt the 2023 elections.
Text2: “Karya wannan umarni kuma zai kawo wa jam’iyyar tarnaƙi wajen yin nasara a zaɓen 2023 a Zamfara.
Text2 Translation: "Breaking this order will also hinder the party from winning the 2023 elections in Zamfara.

Text1: KORONA: Mutum 859 sun kamu, mutum 2 sun mutu ranar Litini a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: CORONA: 859 people were infected, 2 people died on Monday in Nigeria
Text2: Akalla mutum 189 ne suka kamu da cutar korona a Najeriya daga ranar Litini zuwa Talata.
Text2 Translation: At least 189 people have contracted the corona virus in Nigeria from Monday to Tuesday.

Text1: Maharan sun bukaci a biya naira miliyan 100 kafin su sake shi shima.
Text1 Translation: The attackers demanded a payment of 100 million naira before releasing him as well.
Text2: Sama da naira miliyan 20 aka biya ƙudin fansa kafin Ƴan Bindiga suka sake ni – Sarkin Ɓungudu
Text2 Translation: Over 20 million naira was paid as ransom before the Gunmen released me - the King of Bungudu

Text1: “Onyekwe dan asalin karamar hukumar Owerri ta yamma ne a jihar Imo.
Text1 Translation: “Onyekwe is a native of Owerri West Local Government Area of ​​Imo State.
Text2: Mba ya ce Emeh dan asalin kauyen Nguzu Edda ne dake karamar hukumar Afikpo ta Kudu a jihar Ebonyi.
Text2 Translation: Mba said Emeh is a native of Nguzu Edda village in Afikpo South Local Government Area of ​​Ebonyi State.

Text1: Kakakin Malami bai Umar Gwandu bai amsa kira da PREMIUM TIMES ta yi masa don samun karin bayani akan haka ba.
Text1 Translation: The spokesperson for Mr. Umar Gwandu did not respond to a call by PREMIUM TIMES to get more information on the matter.
Text2: Wakilin PREMIUM TIMES ya kira lambar Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Katsina, Gambo Isa, amma bai ɗauki waya ba.
Text2 Translation: A PREMIUM TIMES correspondent called the Katsina State Police Spokesperson, Gambo Isa, but he did not pick up the phone.

Text1: Mataimakin Kakakin Majalisa ya goyi bayan gaggauta haramta baburan acaɓa a ƙasar nan
Text1 Translation: The Deputy Speaker of the House of Representatives has supported the immediate banning of motorcycles in this country
Text2: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta bayyana cewa ta na shirin haramta haya da baburan acaɓa a faɗin ƙasar nan, domin ƙoƙarin daƙile matsalar tsaro.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Government has announced that it is planning to ban the rental of motorbikes across the country, in an effort to curb the security problem.

Text1: Babbar Kotun Jihar Kogi ta bayar da umarnin a kama Shugaban EFCC a tsare shi a kurkuku, saboda ya keta alfarmar kotu.
Text1 Translation: The Kogi State High Court has ordered the arrest of the Chairman of the EFCC and his detention in prison, because he violated the dignity of the court.
Text2: Amma sai ya jajirce cewa shi sai ya yi amfani da umarnin Babbar Kotun Umuahia, wadda ta bayar da umarnin a soke wannan sashen ɗungurugum.
Text2 Translation: But he was determined that he had to use the order of the Umuahia High Court, which ordered the cancellation of this dungurugum section.

Text1: mazaɓun Victoria Garden City dake jihar Legas a ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: Victoria Garden City Constituency in Lagos State on Saturday.
Text2: NDLEA ta kama Beauty a hanyar zuwa jihar Legas daga Benin City ranar 6 ga Yuli.
Text2 Translation: NDLEA arrested Beauty on her way to Lagos state from Benin City on July 6.

Text1: Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta ƙaryata zargin an dagargaje naira tiriliyan 89 na wasu kuɗaɗen harajin da aka daɗe ana tarawa.
Text1 Translation: The President's Office has denied the allegation that 89 trillion naira of some tax money that has been collected for a long time has been misappropriated.
Text2: Majiya daga Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta ce an yafe wa Dariye da Nyame ne bisa dalillai na rashin lafiya da kuma tsufa.
Text2 Translation: A source from the Presidency said that Dariye and Nyame were pardoned due to ill health and old age.

Text1: Sannan a wani gefe kuma ana sukar yadda ya dauki Musulmi kamar sa ya zama mataimakin takarar shugaban ƙasa, maimakon ya ɗauki Kirista.
Text1 Translation: And on the other side, they are criticizing the way he chose a Muslim as if he was the vice presidential candidate, instead of choosing a Christian.
Text2: Tinubu ya kuma bada labarin yadda aka ƙi ɗaukar sa ya zama Mataimakin Shugaban Ƙasa a 2015, saboda wai shi Musulmi ne, kamar Buhari.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu also told the story of how he was rejected to be the Vice President in 2015, because he is a Muslim, like Buhari.

Text1: Bola Tinubu ne ya yi mulki tsawon shekaru takwas daga 1999 zuwa 2007, a ƙarƙashin AD.
Text1 Translation: Bola Tinubu ruled for eight years from 1999 to 2007, under AD.
Text2: “PDP ta riƙe mulki shekaru 16, waɗanda daga ciki Kudu maso Yamma ta riƙe shekaru takwas a ƙarƙashin Obasanjo.
Text2 Translation: “PDP held power for 16 years, of which the South West held eight years under Obasanjo.

Text1: Haka kuma Rowland ya Yi ƙarin bayani dangane da yadda ƙwararrun likitocin Najeriya fiye da 5,000 su ka yi hijira zuwa Ingila.
Text1 Translation: Rowland also explained more about how more than 5,000 Nigerian doctors have migrated to England.
Text2: An tabbatar da cewa fiye da ƙwararrun likitoci ‘yan Najeriya 5,000 ne su ka tsallake zuwa Ingila a cikin shekaru takwas.
Text2 Translation: It has been confirmed that more than 5,000 Nigerian doctors have migrated to England in eight years.

Text1: A matsayi na na ɗan Najeriya, zan samar da tsaro a ƙasar nan.
Text1 Translation: As a Nigerian, I will provide security in this country.
Text2: “Zan iya irin wannan aiki a ko’ina a Najeriya, a matsayi na na lauya mai lasisi.” Inji shi a cikin fushi.
Text2 Translation: "I can do this kind of work anywhere in Nigeria, in my capacity as a licensed lawyer." He said in anger.

Text1: Ngige ya kasance cikin mutum sama da 30 masu neman takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC da PDP.
Text1 Translation: Ngige was among more than 30 candidates for the presidency under APC and PDP.
Text2: Bulaliyar Majalisar Dattawa, kuma Sanata mai wakiltar Abiya ta Arewa, Orji Kalu, ya bayyana janyewar sa daga takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC.
Text2 Translation: Senator representing Abia North, Orji Kalu, has announced his withdrawal from the presidential race under the APC.

Text1: “Zuwa yanzu mutum 5,518 dake dauke da cutar na amsar magani inda daga ciki mutum 5,192 sun warke.
Text1 Translation: "So far, 5,518 people with the disease are responding to treatment, out of which 5,192 people have recovered.
Text2: “Zuwa yanzu mutum miliyan 1.6 dake dauke da cutar na karbar magani sannan suna rayuwar su cikin koshin lafiya a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: "So far, 1.6 million people with the disease are receiving treatment and are living a healthy life in Nigeria.

Text1: Tuni dai su ka kafa kwamitin mambobi 13 ƙarƙashin shugabancin Nicholas Mutu, ɗan PDP daga jihar Delta a matsayin shugaban kwamiti.
Text1 Translation: They have already formed a committee of 13 members under the leadership of Nicholas Mutu, a PDP member from Delta state as the chairman of the committee.
Text2: Wike da wasu gwamnonin PDP huɗu dai su na so Shugaban PDP Iyorchia Ayu ya sauka, a zaɓi ɗan kudu ya riƙe shugabancin jam’iyyar.
Text2 Translation: Wike and four other PDP governors wanted PDP Chairman Iyorchia Ayu to step down and a southerner should be elected to hold the leadership of the party.

Text1: Lauyoyi masu kare hukumar zaɓe INEC da na zaɓaɓɓen shugaban kasa Bola Tinubu duk sun amince da hukuncin kotun.
Text1 Translation: Lawyers defending the electoral commission INEC and President-elect Bola Tinubu all agreed with the court's decision.
Text2: Ɗan takarar shugaban kasa na LP ya doke Bola Tinubu na APC a karamar hukumar Ikeja, inda nan ne mazabar Tinubu ya yake.
Text2 Translation: The presidential candidate of LP defeated Bola Tinubu of APC in Ikeja local government, where Tinubu's constituency is located.

Text1: A hirar dai Buhari ya ce an bai wa Kanu damar kare kan sa, maimakon ya riƙa surfa wa Najeriya zagi daga waje.
Text1 Translation: In the interview, Buhari said that Kanu was given the opportunity to defend himself, instead of insulting Nigeria from outside.
Text2: “Mun ba shi damar da zai kare kan sa a Najeriya, maimakon ya riƙa surfa mana zagi daga Turai.”
Text2 Translation: "We gave him the opportunity to defend himself in Nigeria, instead of insulting us from Europe."

Text1: Gwamnatin Buhari na gudanar da watandar ayyuka 800 da aikin titina  masu tsawon kilomita 13,000 a ƙasar nan – Fashola
Text1 Translation: The Buhari administration is carrying out 800 projects and 13,000 kilometers of road construction in this country - Fashola
Text2: Fashola ya ce Gwamnatin Tarayya za ta duba yiwuwar karɓar aikin kwalta mai tsawon kilomita 30 daga Takum zuwa Chanchangi, daga hannun Gwamnatin Jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Fashola said the Federal Government will look into the possibility of receiving the 30km asphalt project from Takum to Chanchangi, from the Taraba State Government.

Text1: Waɗannan mahara sun sha cewa gwamnatin tarayya ta san abin da su ke buƙata bai wuce a saki mutanen su da ke tsare ba.
Text1 Translation: These attackers have repeatedly said that the federal government knows that what they need is nothing more than the release of their detained people.
Text2: A wancan lokacin, Gwamnatin Tarayya ta bayyana cewa ba haka kawai gabagaɗi ake fitowa a ayyana cewa ‘yan bindiga su ma ‘yan ta’adda ne ba.
Text2 Translation: At that time, the Federal Government stated that it is not only bold to declare that bandits are also terrorists.

Text1: CIKIN SHEKARU BAKWAI: Gwamnati na ta yi titina da tsawon su ya kai kilomita 1,500 – Buhari a jawabin Kasafin 2023
Text1 Translation: IN SEVEN YEARS: My government has built 1,500 kilometers of roads - Buhari in his 2023 budget speech
Text2: Gwamnatin Buhari na gudanar da watandar ayyuka 800 da aikin titina  masu tsawon kilomita 13,000 a ƙasar nan – Fashola
Text2 Translation: The Buhari administration is carrying out 800 projects and 13,000 kilometers of road construction in this country - Fashola

Text1: Zan iya zuwa kai tsaye na shaida da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari cewa na ga inda aka kashe naira biliyan 157.
Text1 Translation: I can go directly and testify to President Muhammadu Buhari that I saw where 157 billion naira was spent.
Text2: “Ni fa dama tun tashi na na ke da da burin zama shugaban ƙasa, kuma na shaida wa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari haka.
Text2 Translation: "I have always wanted to be the president of the country since I was born, and I told President Muhammadu Buhari that.

Text1: Misali “Gwanatin Najeriya na shirin kara albashin masu yin NYSC zuwa nera dubu 45.
Text1 Translation: For example, "The Nigerian government plans to increase the salary of NYSC candidates to N45,000.
Text2: A cewar wani rahoton jaridar Premium Times, a shekarar 2011 gwamnatin Najeriya ta kara albashin NYSC daga nera 9,775 zuwa 19,800.
Text2 Translation: According to a report by Premium Times, in 2011 the Nigerian government increased the NYSC salary from N9,775 to N19,800.

Text1: Oseji ta ce tallafin da kasar Birtaniya ke badawa duk shekara a Najeriya ya kai kashi 80% na kuɗaɗen da ake kashewa daga  asusun.
Text1 Translation: Oseji said that the support given by the UK every year in Nigeria is 80% of the money spent from the fund.
Text2: Malami ya ce kuɗaɗen na daga cikin irin kuɗaɗen da Najeriya ta yi yarjejeniyar a maido mata ne, tsakanin ta da Amurka da Birtaniya.
Text2 Translation: The teacher said that the money is one of the money that Nigeria has made an agreement to return to her, between her and the United States and the United Kingdom.

Text1: A ranar Litini ne alkali Muntari Dandago ya yanke ya Sadiya hukuncin zama a kurkuku na tsawon watanni shida.
Text1 Translation: On Monday, Judge Muntari Dandago sentenced Sadiya to six months in prison.
Text2: Kotu ta yanke wa dan damfara hukuncin sharar kotu na tsawon watanni shida
Text2 Translation: The court sentenced the fraudster to six months of contempt of court

Text1: Fadar ta fitar da sanarwa cewa, “zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 ya fi zaɓukan baya inganci.”
