Text1 Translation: The palace issued a statement saying, "the 2023 presidential election is more valid than previous elections."
Text2: Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta bayyana cewa zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 ya samu ci gaba sosai fiye da zaɓukan baya da aka gudanar.
Text2 Translation: The President's office has stated that the 2023 presidential election has progressed much more than previous elections.

Text1: Dike ya ce haramta yanka naman jakuna ba shi ne zai bunƙasa tattalin arzikin ƙasar nan ba.
Text1 Translation: Dike said that banning the slaughter of donkey meat will not develop the economy of this country.
Text2: “Maraɗi ba ta kai muhimmancin Kudu maso Gabas ga tattalin arzikin ƙasar nan ba.
Text2 Translation: "Maradi is not as important as the South East for the economy of this country.

Text1: Laifin da matan suka aikata ya saba wa dokar hukunta masu aikata laifuka na jihar Legas na shekarar 2015 sashe na 287 da 411.
Text1 Translation: The crime committed by the women is against the Criminal Code of Lagos State of 2015 section 287 and 411.
Text2: Ya ce laifin da wadannan mata suka yi ya saba wa tanadin sashe na 198 na dokar manyan laifuka.
Text2 Translation: He said the crime committed by these women is against the provisions of Section 198 of the Criminal Code.

Text1: ” Saboda haka ba za mu amince da kokarin gudanar da zaben jam’iyyar na jihar Kano da ake shirin yi a karshen mako ba.
Text1 Translation: "Therefore, we will not accept the efforts to conduct the party's election in Kano state which is planned to be held this weekend.
Text2: Batun cewa gwamnatin jihar Kano na shirin saka dokar haramtawa mata tuka mota a jihar karya ne.
Text2 Translation: The issue that the Kano state government is planning to introduce a law prohibiting women from driving in the state is false.

Text1: Minista Agba ya ce kashi 72 cikin 100 na matalauta duk a yankunan karkara su ke.
Text1 Translation: Minister Agba said that 72 percent of the poor are in rural areas.
Text2: Victoria ta ce abu na farko shi ne a fara yin ƙoƙarin kakkaɓe ‘yan ta’adda daga yankunan karkara ƙarƙaf.
Text2 Translation: Victoria said that the first thing is to start trying to eradicate terrorists from rural areas.

Text1: Kwamishinan Tsaron jihar Kaduna Samuel Aruwan, ya zargi wata kafar yada labarai ta yanar gizo da kirkirar karya da kuma tunzura jama’a a kansa.
Text1 Translation: The Kaduna State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan, has accused an online media outlet of creating lies and inciting the public against him.
Text2: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Kaduna, Samuel Aruwan ya bayyana haka wata takarda da ya fitar ranar Lahadi.
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan stated this in a document he issued on Sunday.

Text1: Khalifa Sanusi ya koma karatun babbar digiri PhD a fannin shari’ar musulunci a jami’ar kasar Birtaniya
Text1 Translation: Khalifa Sanusi has returned to study for a PhD in Islamic law at a British university
Text2: Tsohon sarkin Kano Muhammadu Sanusi II ya koma jami’ar Landan domin Karatun babban Digiri kan shari’ar musulunci.
Text2 Translation: The former emir of Kano, Muhammadu Sanusi II, has returned to the University of London to study for a master's degree in Islamic law.

Text1: Ya ce a shekarar da ta gabata hukumar ta samu Karin kashi 12% na kudaden shiga.
Text1 Translation: He said that last year the agency received 12% more revenue.
Text2: Ya ce hukumar ta samu karin kashi 8.79 na daliban da suka yi nasara a jarabawar a shekaran 2021 fiye da shekarar 2020.
Text2 Translation: He said the board had 8.79 percent more students who passed the exam in 2021 than in 2020.

Text1: Can a Jihar Zamfara kuwa, Gwamna Matawalle zai sauka ya bar Zamfarawa a hannun ‘yan bindiga, ma’aikatan jihar na bin sa albashin wata uku.
Text1 Translation: In Zamfara State, Governor Matawalle will step down and leave Zamfara people in the hands of bandits, the state workers owe him three months salary.
Text2: “Abin da yanzu ake ciki a Zamfara shi ne, mu na da ma’aikatan da ba a biya su albashin wata biyu ba.
Text2 Translation: "The current situation in Zamfara is that we have workers who have not been paid their salaries for two months.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe dagacin Maisamari a yayin da yake sallar Isha’i bayan buɗa baki
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed Maisamari while he was praying Isha'i after opening his mouth
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe dagacin garin Maisamari  Sufiyanu dake karamar hukumar Sardauna, Jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen killed Maisamari Sufiyanu town in Sardauna Local Government Area, Taraba State.

Text1: Majiya ta bayyana har da sunan Lai Mohammed Ministan Yaɗa Labarai a cikin waɗanda su ka kamu.
Text1 Translation: The source also revealed the name of Lai Mohammed, the Minister of Information, among those who were arrested.
Text2: Tun lokacin dakatarwar dai Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na APC a Jihar Adamawa, Mohammed Abdullahi ya bayyana cewa kalaman na Sulaiman abin damuwa ne matuƙa.
Text2 Translation: Since the suspension, the APC Media Spokesperson in Adamawa State, Mohammed Abdullahi has stated that Sulaiman's comments are very worrying.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta taɓa buga labarin yadda aka riƙa watandar maƙudan biliyoyin kuɗaɗe a NDDC.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa once published the story of how billions of dollars were stolen from NDDC.
Text2: A ranar Asabar Premium Times ta buga labarin cewa wasu hadiman Buhari da ke aiki a Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa sun kamu da cutar korona.
Text2 Translation: On Saturday, Premium Times published the news that some of Buhari's servants working in the Presidential Palace have contracted the corona virus.

Text1: An nemi ofishin rajistara na kotu ya tabbatar da kadarar da za a bayar a matsayin beli, kuɗin ta ya kai Naira miliyan 500 ɗin.
Text1 Translation: The court registry office was asked to confirm the property to be given as bail, its amount is 500 million Naira.
Text2: A cikin shekaru huɗu, zai karɓi naira miliyan 56.2, kusan rabin kuɗin fam ɗin da ya saya na Naira miliyan 100 kenan.
Text2 Translation: In four years, he will receive 56.2 million naira, almost half of the money he bought for 100 million naira.

Text1: “Ni da shi duk yaran Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ne, kuma ya na son mu ƙwarai da gaske.
Text1 Translation: “He and I are both children of President Muhammadu Buhari, and he loves us very much.
Text2: “Ni fa dama tun tashi na na ke da da burin zama shugaban ƙasa, kuma na shaida wa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari haka.
Text2 Translation: "I have always wanted to be the president of the country since I was born, and I told President Muhammadu Buhari that.

Text1: ” Kawai a kyale mutane su mallaki makamai kawai su kare kansu domin gwamnati ta gaza, jami’an tsaro sun gaza.
Text1 Translation: "Just allow people to own weapons to protect themselves because the government has failed, the security forces have failed.
Text2: Malison ya yi kira ga gwamnati da ta aiko da ƙarin zaratan jami’an tsaro domin kare rayukan da dukiyoyin mutane a masarautar su.
Text2 Translation: Malison called on the government to send more security forces to protect the lives and property of people in their kingdom.

Text1: A lokacin ƙaddamar da aikin, Ameachi ya ce za a kammala shi kafin ƙarshen wa’adin mulkin Buhari a ranar 29 Ga Mayu.
Text1 Translation: At the launch of the project, Ameachi said it will be completed before the end of Buhari's tenure on May 29.
Text2: Buhari ya ce ana kayutata zaton ƙaddamar da shi a cikin watan Disamba, kafin ƙarshen wannan shekarar.
Text2 Translation: Buhari said that it is expected to be launched in December, before the end of this year.

Text1: Haka kuma ya hana na dukkan ƙananan hukumomin Jihar Legas, wadda ke ƙarƙashin jam”iyyar AD a lokacin.
Text1 Translation: He also banned all local governments in Lagos State, which was under the AD party at the time.
Text2: Kakakin jam’iyyar na Legas, Seye Oladepo ne ya bayyana haka a ranar Asabar, biyo bayan komawar wani dandazon mambobin APC na jihar zuwa PDP.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the party in Lagos, Seye Oladepo, said this on Saturday, following the return of a large number of members of the APC in the state to the PDP.

Text1: ‘Yan sanda uku da sojoji biyu na daga cikin jami’an tsaron da ‘yan bindiga suka kashe a kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Three policemen and two soldiers are among the security officers killed by bandits in this country.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe ‘yan sanda uku a New Haven dake karamar hukumar  Enugu ta Arewa.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen have killed three policemen in New Haven, Enugu North Local Government Area.

Text1: PDP ta yi rugurugu da APC a kujerun ƴan majalisar  Wakilai, Bilbis ya Kada Marafa a kujerar sanata
Text1 Translation: PDP clashed with APC in the seats of the House of Representatives, Bilbis Kada Marafa in the senatorial seat
Text2: Ɗan majalisan dake wakiltar Kabba/Buni a majalisar Tarayya, Tajuddeen Yusuf ya kada fitaccen ɗan siyasa Dino Melaye a zaɓen fidda gwani na kujerar sanata.
Text2 Translation: The member of parliament representing Kabba/Buni in the Federal Parliament, Tajuddeen Yusuf defeated prominent politician Dino Melaye in the primary election for the senatorial seat.

Text1: Wannan abin takaicin dai ya faru a kauyen Nzam dake karamar hukumar Anambra ta Yamma.
Text1 Translation: This unfortunate incident happened in Nzam village in Anambra West Local Government Area.
Text2: Lekia da kungiyar sa sun rika aikata wannan ta’asa ne a kauyen Okwali dake karamar hukumar Khana.
Text2 Translation: Lekia and his group used to commit this atrocity in Okwali village in Khana local government.

Text1: Rundunar Yaƙin Tinubu 2023 ta ce  turnuƙun rikicin da wasu hasalallun gwamnonin PDP ke yi da shugabannin jam’iyyar su, alheri ne ga jam’iyyar APC.
Text1 Translation: The Tinubu 2023 War Command said that the end of the conflict that some PDP governors are having with their party leaders is a boon for the APC party.
Text2: IDAN KURA NA MAGANIN ZAWO…: PDP ta ce APC ta ji da matsalolin da ke jikin Tinubu, ta daina magana kan rikicin rundunar ATIKU 2023
Text2 Translation: IF THE DUST OF THE MEDICINE COMES...: PDP says APC is aware of the problems in Tinubu's body, it has stopped talking about the ATIKU 2023 crisis

Text1: Shi kuma Tajuddeen Abbas wakilin tarayya daga Jihar Kaduna, shi su ke so ya zama Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya.
Text1 Translation: Tajuddeen Abbas, the federal representative from Kaduna State, wants to be the Speaker of the Federal Assembly.
Text2: A ƙarshen makon jiya ne PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin cewa Tinubu ya ‘yarda’ Tajuddeen Abbas ya zama Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya.
Text2 Translation: At the end of last week, PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the news that Tinubu has 'approved' Tajuddeen Abbas to become the Speaker of the Federal Assembly.

Text1: Ofishin Mahukuntan Amurka da ke Gundumar California ta Jihar Los Angeles dai ya bayyana cewa ranar 21 Ga Satumba za a yanke wa Hushpuppi hukunci.
Text1 Translation: The United States Attorney's Office in the District of California, Los Angeles, announced that Hushpuppi will be sentenced on September 21.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba a ranar 8 ga Mayu Pauline ta bayyana cewa za ta fito takarar kujerar sanata na yankin  Filato ta kudu.
Text2 Translation: If we don't forget, on May 8, Pauline announced that she will run for the senatorial seat in the South Plateau area.

Text1: A hirar dai Buhari ya ce an bai wa Kanu damar kare kan sa, maimakon ya riƙa surfa wa Najeriya zagi daga waje.
Text1 Translation: In the interview, Buhari said that Kanu was given the opportunity to defend himself, instead of insulting Nigeria from outside.
Text2: Da ya ke magana, Buhari ya ce ba za a saki Nnamdi Kanu ba, sai dai ya kare kan sa a kotu kawai.
Text2 Translation: While speaking, Buhari said that Nnamdi Kanu will not be released, he will only defend himself in court.

Text1: A ranar 8 Ga Disamba ne Buhari ya aika wa Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta Abuja wannan wasiƙar rashin amincewar ta ta saurari ƙarar.
Text1 Translation: On December 8, Buhari sent this letter of objection to the Federal High Court in Abuja to hear the case.
Text2: Lawan ya bayyana haka a ranar Laraba a majalisa, kwana ɗaya bayan Shugaba Buhari ya aika masu da wasiƙar ƙin sa wa ƙudirin hannu.
Text2 Translation: Lawan stated this on Wednesday in parliament, a day after President Buhari sent a letter refusing to sign the resolution.

Text1: Ya koma aikin ne bayan ya shafe makonni baya Najeriya a cikin yanayi na rashin tabbas ɗin takamaimen abin da ya ke yi a Amurka.
Text1 Translation: He returned to work after spending weeks in Nigeria in a state of uncertainty as to what he was doing in America.
Text2: Yarjejeniyar dai ta nuna ba za a biya su kashi 3 ɗin ba, har sai bayan sun kammala aikin na su.
Text2 Translation: The agreement shows that they will not be paid the 3 percent, until after they have completed their work.

Text1: NERC ta ce ƙarin ya zama dole idan aka yi la’akari da ƙarin wutar lantarkin da kamfanonin Disco ɗin ke rabawa a cikin ƙasar nan.
Text1 Translation: NERC said that more is necessary considering the additional electricity that the Disco companies are distributing in the country.
Text2: NERC ta ce ƙarin ya zama wajibi saboda tsadar gas, tashin farashin kayayyaki a ƙasar  nan, tsadar dalar Amurka da sauran su.
Text2 Translation: NERC said that the increase is necessary due to the high cost of gas, rising prices of goods in the country, the high cost of the US dollar and others.

Text1: Sanarwar da Kakakin APC Olafunde Abdul’aziz ya fitar, ya ce Ladoja ya rasu bayan fama da rashin lafiya.
Text1 Translation: A statement released by APC Speaker Olafunde Abdul'aziz said Ladoja died after suffering from illness.
Text2: Ya rasu safiyar Talata bayan ya yi fama da wata gajeriyar rashin lafiya.
Text2 Translation: He died Tuesday morning after a short illness.

Text1: “Domin idan mu ka kafa dokar hana jiragen yaƙin Rasha shawagi a Ukraniya, to kenan za mu harbo duk jirgin Rasha da ya keta Ukraniya.
Text1 Translation: "Because if we establish a law prohibiting Russian warplanes from flying in Ukraine, then we will shoot down any Russian plane that violates Ukraine."
Text2: “Duk ƙasar da ta kafa mana dokar hana jiragen mu kai hari Ukraniya, to ita ma ta shigo yaƙin kenan.
Text2 Translation: "Any country that has established a law prohibiting our planes from attacking Ukraine, then it has also entered the war."

Text1: Ya ce APC ta kassara ƙasar nan har ta kusa durƙusar da ita, za ta ɓace, a neme ta a rasa bayan zaɓen 2023.
Text1 Translation: He said APC has failed this country to the point of bringing it to its knees, it will disappear, it will be lost after the 2023 election.
Text2: Ya ce LP za ta bada mamaki sosai a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa nan da 2023.
Text2 Translation: He said that the LP will be very surprising in the presidential election in 2023.

Text1: An shirya taron ne a Abuja ranar Laraba, a ƙarƙashin ƙungiyar dRPC.
Text1 Translation: The meeting was organized in Abuja on Wednesday, under the auspices of dRPC.
Text2: Shugaban hukumar Tony Ojukwu ya sanar da haka a taron da gidauniyar ROOST da NHRC suka shirya kuma aka yi a Abuja ranar Litinin.
Text2 Translation: Tony Ojukwu announced this at a meeting organized by ROOST Foundation and NHRC in Abuja on Monday.

Text1: Sai dai kum.akwai ministan Shari’a Abubakar Malami wanda shima da ya fito takarar gwamnan Kebbi amma kuma dalilin wannan sanarwa ya janye.
Text1 Translation: However, there is also the Minister of Shari'a Abubakar Malami who also ran for the Kebbi governorship but because of this announcement he withdrew.

Text2 Translation: The teacher has withdrawn from the Kebbi governorship contest despite the noise that he has been making that the people forced him to come out

Text1: Gwamnan Zamfara Bello Matawalle ya kori Sarakunan Zurmi da na Ɗansadau saboda samunsu da hannu dumu duma cikin harkallar ‘yan  bindiga a jihar.
Text1 Translation: Governor Bello Matawalle of Zamfara sacked the Chiefs of Zurmi and Dansadau for being involved in bandits in the state.
Text2: Tun bayan canja sheka da gwamnan jihar Zamfara Bello Matawalle yayi, ake ta kai ruwa rana tsakanin sa da mataimakin gwamnan jihar.
Text2 Translation: Since the transfer of Zamfara state governor Bello Matawalle, there has been a heated exchange between him and the deputy governor of the state.

Text1: Shi kuma Atiku ya na tare da Gwamna Ahmadu Fintiri na Jihar Adamawa.
Text1 Translation: Atiku was with Governor Ahmadu Fintiri of Adamawa State.
Text2: Gwamnan jihar Adamawa Ahmadu Fintiri ya yi nasara a zaben fidda gwani na jam’iyyar PDP da aka yi a Yola babbabn birnin jihar Adamawa.
Text2 Translation: The governor of Adamawa state, Ahmadu Fintiri, won the primary election of the PDP party held in Yola, the capital of Adamawa state.

Text1: Ya ce akwai tubabbun ‘yan Boko Haram da dama su na nan ana koya masu horon koyar da su sana’o’in hannu.
Text1 Translation: He said there are a number of Boko Haram converts who are being trained by those who teach them handicrafts.
Text2: Gwamna Babagana Zulum na Jihar Barno, ya ce aƙalla akwai tubabbun ‘yan Boko Haram cike fal a sansani uku da aka tanadar masu.
Text2 Translation: Governor Babagana Zulum of Barno State, said that at least there are Boko Haram converts in three camps that have been prepared for them.

Text1: Kotu ta yanke wasu ‘yan bindiga dake yin farfesu da kayan cikin mutane hukuncin mutuwa ta hanyar rataya
Text1 Translation: The court has sentenced some bandits who were involved in drug dealing with people's internal organs to death by hanging
Text2: Kotun koli dake Fatakwal jihar Rivers ta yanke wa wani mai garkuwa da mutane hukuncin kisa ta hanyar rataya.
Text2 Translation: The Supreme Court in Port Rivers State has sentenced a kidnapper to death by hanging.

Text1: OK ya bayyana haka a ranar Laraba lokacin da ya ke kare kasafin ofishin sa na 2023 a Majalisar Tarayya.
Text1 Translation: OK stated this on Wednesday when he was defending the budget of his office for 2023 in the Federal Assembly.
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya gabatar  Kasafin 2023 na naira tiriliyan 20:51, a gaban Majalisar Tarayya.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari presented the 2023 Budget of 20:51 trillion naira before the Federal Assembly.

Text1: A Jihar Ribas an ƙidaya ƙuri’un ƙananan hukumomi 21 daga cikin 23 na jihar.
Text1 Translation: In Rivers State, the votes of 21 of the 23 local governments in the state have been counted.
Text2: Jihar Katsina na sahun gaba cikin jihohin da zaman lafiya ya gagara a wasu ƙananan hukumomi masu yawa shekaru da dama.
Text2 Translation: Katsina State is one of the states where peace has been elusive in many local governments for many years.

Text1: Tun a ranar Lahadi sai da Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta ƙaryata zargin wasoson naira tiriliyan 89 da Gudaji Kazaure ya yi.

Text1: “Mu roƙon da mu ke wa Gwamnatin Tarayya shi ne a ba mu lasisin shigo da man jiragen mu.

Text1: Laifin da matan suka aikata ya saba wa dokar hukunta masu aikata laifuka na jihar Legas na shekarar 2015 sashe na 287 da 411.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa ya na matuƙar tausayin yadda ‘yan Najeriya su ka shiga mawuyacin hali, sanadiyyar ƙarancin sabbin kuɗaɗe.

Text1: Tsakanin 2012 zuwa Mayu, 2015 kafin hawan Buhari, CBN na bin gwamnatin tarayya bashi na naira biliyan 654.9 kacal.

Text1 Translation: Peter Obi of LP won 582,454 votes in Lagos state, while Bola Tinubu of APC won 572,606.

Text1: Usman, wanda aka fi sani da Mr LA, ya yi wannan furuci a lokacin ganawar sa da manema labarai a Zariya, a ranar Lahadi.

Text1: Cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar a shafin sa na Tiwita, ya ce “ban taɓa karɓar naira bilyan 1 a hannun wani a Legas ba.

Text1: Ƙididdiga ta nuna tsakanin Janairu zuwa ƙarshen Afrilu 2020, Najeriya ta bashin Naira biliyan 943.12.
Text1 Translation: Statistics show that between January and the end of April 2020, Nigeria owed 943.12 billion Naira.
Text2: Amma tsakanin Janairu zuwa Oktoba 2022, kaɗai a wannan shekarar, Gwamnatin Buhari ta ciwo bashin naira tiriliyan 5.6 daga CBN.
Text2 Translation: But between January and October 2022, this year alone, Buhari's government incurred a debt of 5.6 trillion naira from the CBN.

Text1 Translation: Abdullahi said he learned of his wife's birth on Monday on his way home from the shop where he was learning the tire trade
Text2: “Maharan sun  saka wa kauyen harajin Naira 2,500 akan kwani gida sannan za a hada kudin daga ranar Alhamis zuwa Litini wato yau.

Text1: Daga cikin mutum 262 din da aka gano an samu tabbacin cewa kashi 40.1% sun kamu da cutar a jihohi 23.

Text1: Kalu ya daɗe ya na kakabin neman a yi adalci a bar ‘yan ƙabilar Igbo su yi takarar shugabancin ƙasa a 2023 a tsakanin su.
Text1 Translation: For a long time, Kalu has been calling for justice and allowing the Igbo people to run for the presidency in 2023 among themselves.
Text2: “Na zo nan domin na sanar da ku aniya ta ta neman fitowa takarar shugaban ƙasa a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: "I came here to inform you of my intention to run for president in the 2023 election.

Text1: Da muka yi bincike a google, mun gano rahotannin da suka ambaci hukuncin kotun da aka yanke a watan Fabrairun 2020.
Text1 Translation: When we searched on google, we found reports that mentioned the court decision that was made in February 2020.
Text2: Da muka yi karin bincike mun gano wani bidiyo mai tsawon minti biyu na wani labarin da aka sanya a tashar NTA.
Text2 Translation: When we did more research, we found a two-minute video of a story that was posted on NTA channel.

Text1: NEMA ta yi gargaɗin yiwuwar mummunar ambaliya a wasu sansan jihar Kwara
Text1 Translation: NEMA has warned of the possibility of severe flooding in some camps in Kwara state
Text2: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa ta Ƙasa (NEMA), ta yi kakkausan gargaɗin cewa a wannan daminar akwai yiwuwar ɓarkewar mummunar ambaliya a Jihar Kwara.
Text2 Translation: The National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA), has issued a strong warning that this monsoon there is a possibility of severe flooding in Kwara State.

Text1: Gwamnatin Najeriya ta yanke wa malaman jami’o’i albashin watan da su ka karɓa bayan komawa aiki daga yajin aikin watanni takwas.
Text1 Translation: The Nigerian government has cut the salaries of university teachers for the month they received after returning to work from the eight-month strike.
Text2: Baya ga ASUU, gwamnati ta riƙe albashin sauran ƙungiyoyin ma’aikatan gwamnatin tarayya da su ka tafi yajin aiki har na tsawon watanni huɗu.
Text2 Translation: Apart from ASUU, the government has withheld the salaries of other unions of federal government employees who went on strike for four months.

Text1: Akpan ya ce a dalilin haka Nseobot da Anirdi za su biya Iniubong Naira miliyan 4.2.
Text1 Translation: Akpan said that for this reason Nseobot and Anirdi will pay Iniubong 4.2 million Naira.
Text2: “Sun nemi a biya su kuɗin fansa naira miliyan 500, mun ce masu ba mu da waɗannan kuɗaɗe, kuma babu inda za mu same su.
Text2 Translation: "They asked for a ransom of 500 million naira, we said that we do not have this money, and we are nowhere to find it.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun afka ofishin ‘yan sanda dake Isu a jihar Imo inda suka kashe ‘yan sanda biyu a wurin.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen attacked the police station in Isu in Imo state and killed two policemen there.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe DPO da ‘yan sanda biyu a Katsina
Text2 Translation: Gunmen killed a DPO and two policemen in Katsina

Text1: RAHOTO: Akalla yaran da basu makarantar boko a Najeriya sun kai miliyan 6.9
Text1 Translation: REPORT: There are at least 6.9 million children who are out of school in Nigeria
Text2: RAHOTO: Akalla ‘ƴan Najeriya miliyan 48 ne ke ƙantara kashi ‘bahaya’ a waje
Text2 Translation: REPORT: At least 48 million Nigerians are living 'unsafe' abroad

Text1: Ya ƙara da cewa yanzu haka waɗanda su ka yi garkuwa da su, su na can cikin wani daji a Jihar Neja.
Text1 Translation: He added that the people you kidnapped are now in a forest in Niger State.
Text2: Sannan ya ƙara da cewa kashi 90 cikin 100 na waɗanda Korona ta kashe ba a yi musu rigakafin cutar ba.
Text2 Translation: He then added that 90 percent of those killed by Corona were not vaccinated against the disease.

Text1: Ya ce an garzaya da shi asibiti inda likitoci su ka tabbatar da cewa ya rigaya ya mutu.
Text1 Translation: He said he was rushed to the hospital where the doctors confirmed that he was already dead.
Text2: “An Kai wadannan mutane babban asibitin Ringim inda a asibitin likita ya tabbatar cewa mutum biyu sun mutu.
Text2 Translation: "These people were taken to Ringim General Hospital where the doctor confirmed that two people died.

Text1: Shi ma ɗan takarar gwamna aka yi masa ƙarin geji, daga naira miliyan 200 zuwa har naira biliyan 1.
Text1 Translation: The gubernatorial candidate was also given more money, from 200 million naira to 1 billion naira.
Text2: An yi wa ɗan takarar sanata ƙarin geji daga naira miliyan 40, zuwa miliyan 200.
Text2 Translation: The senatorial candidate was given an additional salary from 40 million naira to 200 million naira.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a  ranar 20 ga Mayu.
Text1 Translation: The trial will continue on May 20.
Text2: Ya ce za a ci gaba da shari’a  ranar 24 ga Maris.
Text2 Translation: He said that the trial will continue on March 24.

Text1: Maharan sun kashe mutum 8, sun jikkata da dama wanda ke kwance yanzu haka a asibitin sojoji na 44.
Text1 Translation: The attackers killed 8 people, injured many who are now in the 44th military hospital.
Text2: An kashe mutum 8 sannan da dama an yi garkuwa da su har yanzu suna tsare a hannun ƴan bindigan.
Text2 Translation: 8 people were killed and many were kidnapped and are still being held by the bandits.

Text1: Zuwa Disamba 2018 kuma bashin ya kai Naira tiriliyan 5.4, zuwa Disamba 2019 kuwa ya kai naira tiriliyan 8.7.
Text1 Translation: By December 2018, the debt reached 5.4 trillion Naira, and by December 2019, it reached 8.7 trillion Naira.
Text2: Yanzu kuwa zuwa Disamba 2022, bashin ya kai naira tiriliyan 23.8, kuma ko sisi gwamnati ba ta taɓa ko fara biya ba.
Text2 Translation: Now by December 2022, the debt has reached 23.8 trillion naira, and the government has not even begun to pay it.

Text1: Ya yi wannan sanarwa ce lokacin da ya ke karanta jawabin Kasafin 2023 a gaban Majalisar Tarayya, a ranar Juma’a.
Text1 Translation: He made this statement when he was reading the 2023 Budget speech before the Federal Assembly, on Friday.
Text2: WAEC ta yi wannan sanarwa ce a ranar Litinin a Legas, lokacin da ake bayyana sakamakon jarabawar SSCE (May/June).
Text2 Translation: WAEC made this announcement on Monday in Lagos, when the results of the SSCE (May/June) examination were announced.

Text1: SHUGABANCIN MAJALISAR DATTAWA:  Akpabio da zaɓaɓɓun sanatocin APC sun gana da Tinubu a Fatakwal
Text1 Translation: LEADERSHIP LEADERSHIP: Akpabio and elected APC senators meet Tinubu at Fatakwal
Text2: Zaɓaɓɓun sanatocin APC sun gana da Zaɓaɓɓen Shugaban Ƙasa, Bola Tinubu a Fatakwal babban birnin Jihar Ribas.
Text2 Translation: APC senators-elect met with the President-elect, Bola Tinubu at the Port of Rivers State capital.

Text1: Uba Sani ya ziyarci masarautar Lere ya yi alwashin kwarara ayyukan ci gaba idan ya zama gwamna
Text1 Translation: Uba Sani visited Lere emirate and vowed to carry out development activities if he becomes governor
Text2: Ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Kaduna ƙarkashin APC, sanata Uba Sani ya yi alwashin kwarara atyukan ci gaba a masarautar da sauran masarautun dake wannan yanki.
Text2 Translation: The governorship candidate of Kaduna State under the APC, Senator Uba Sani has vowed to flow development activities in the emirate and other emirates in this region.

Text1: Bayan haka wasu fasinjoji dun shaida cewa an samu jinkiri wajen tashin jirgin su da zai sauka a Abuja saboda hatsarin da aka yi.
Text1 Translation: After that, some passengers testified that there was a delay in their flight to Abuja due to the accident.
Text2: An tsaida ta sa ne saboda ya samu kariya bayan an zaɓe shi Gwamnan Bauchi, a watan Mayu, 2019.
Text2 Translation: He was arrested because he got protection after he was elected the Governor of Bauchi, in May, 2019.

Text1: Mazauna karamar hukumar sun tabbatar cewa ‘yan bindigan sun yi garkuwa da mutane da dama inda a ciki akwai mata biyu.
Text1 Translation: Residents of the local government have confirmed that the bandits have kidnapped many people including two women.
Text2: Wani dan jarida dake zama a kauyen Aliyu Musa ya ce ‘yan bindigan sun yi garkuwa da mutane da dama har da mata biyu.
Text2 Translation: A journalist who lives in Aliyu Musa village said that the bandits have kidnapped many people including two women.

Text1: Ƙungiyar Lauyoyi ta Ƙasa ce ta bayar da sanarwar tabbacin kama yin garkuwar da shi a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: The National Bar Association announced the confirmation of his arrest on Tuesday.
Text2: Ƙudirin neman kafa dokar taƙaita wa shugaban ƙasa yin gabagaɗin tsige shugaban EFCC ya tsallake siraɗin karatu na biyu a zauren majalisa a ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: The motion seeking to enact a law restricting the President from impeachment of the EFCC chairman passed the second reading in the House of Assembly on Tuesday.

Text1: Sun zargi Ayu wanda tsohon Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa ne da rashin taɓuka komai a zaɓen gwamna da PDP ta yi a jihar Benuwai.
Text1 Translation: They accused Ayu, who is a former President of the Senate, of not appearing in the gubernatorial election conducted by the PDP in Benue State.
Text2: Ƴan takaran gwamna su tara a jihar Kaduna sun janye daga takarar su domin mara wa PDP baya a zaɓen gwamna dakr tafe.
Text2 Translation: Nine gubernatorial candidates in Kaduna state have withdrawn from their candidacy to support the PDP in the upcoming gubernatorial election.

Text1: Akalla mutum 78 ne ‘yan bindiga suka kashe a makon jiya a Najeriya, daga ranar 1 zuwa 5 ga Mayu.
Text1 Translation: At least 78 people were killed by bandits last week in Nigeria, from May 1 to May 5.
Text2: Haka kuma a cikin makon jiya an kashe sama da mutum 30 a harin Kagoro, baya ga gidaje sama da 200 da aka kona.
Text2 Translation: Also, in the last week, more than 30 people were killed in the Kagoro attack, in addition to more than 200 houses that were burned.

Text1: Aƙalla akwai masu takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC har mutum 23.
Text1 Translation: There are at least 23 presidential candidates under the APC.
Text2: Bulaliyar Majalisar Dattawa, kuma Sanata mai wakiltar Abiya ta Arewa, Orji Kalu, ya bayyana janyewar sa daga takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC.
Text2 Translation: Senator representing Abia North, Orji Kalu, has announced his withdrawal from the presidential race under the APC.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba, kwanan baya ‘yan bindiga sun kashe sojoji 30 a wurin haƙar ma’adinai a Jihar Neja.
Text1 Translation: Not to be forgotten, gunmen recently killed 30 soldiers at a mining site in Niger State.
Text2: ‘Yan kungiyar IPOB sun fille kan sojoji biyu sannan ‘yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 56 a jihar Zamfara.
Text2 Translation: IPOB members beheaded two soldiers and bandits killed 56 people in Zamfara state.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa ya na matuƙar tausayin yadda ‘yan Najeriya su ka shiga mawuyacin hali, sanadiyyar ƙarancin sabbin kuɗaɗe.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has said that he is very sorry that Nigerians are in a difficult situation, due to the lack of new funds.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ta bayyana cewa gwamnatin Muhammadu Buhari mai mulki ta ci amanar ƴan Najeriya a tsawon mulkinta a ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has declared that the ruling Muhammadu Buhari government has betrayed Nigerians during its rule in this country.

Text1: Domin ko a wasan su kafin doke Spain, an nuno Hakimi ya rungume mahaifiyar sa bayan tashi daga wasa a cikin sitadiyan.
Text1 Translation: Because even in their game before beating Spain, Hakimi was shown hugging his mother after leaving the game in the stadium.
Text2: Kafin a fara bugun daga kai sai mai tsaron gida, an nuno ‘yan wasan Morocco sun yi da’ira su na karanta Suratul Fatiha.
Text2 Translation: Before the kick-off, the Moroccan players were shown forming a circle and reciting Suratul Fatiha.

Text1: Kakakin jam’iyyar APC na jihar Jigawa Bashir Kundu ya tabbatar da rasuwar Baba Buji.
Text1 Translation: Jigawa state APC spokesperson Bashir Kundu confirmed the death of Baba Buji.
Text2: Kakakin jam’iyyar na Legas, Seye Oladepo ne ya bayyana haka a ranar Asabar, biyo bayan komawar wani dandazon mambobin APC na jihar zuwa PDP.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the party in Lagos, Seye Oladepo, said this on Saturday, following the return of a large number of members of the APC in the state to the PDP.

Text1: Malami ya bayar da dalilan sa a cikin wata sanarwa da Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran sa Umar Gwandu ya raba wa manema labarai a ranar Alhamis.
Text1 Translation: The teacher gave his reasons in a statement that his Broadcasting Spokesman Umar Gwandu shared with the media on Thursday.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaba Buhari, Garba Shehu ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar.
Text2 Translation: President Buhari's Broadcasting Spokesman, Garba Shehu stated this in a statement he issued.

Text1: Ya ce APC ta kassara ƙasar nan har ta kusa durƙusar da ita, za ta ɓace, a neme ta a rasa bayan zaɓen 2023.
Text1 Translation: He said APC has failed this country to the point of bringing it to its knees, it will disappear, it will be lost after the 2023 election.
Text2: Bayan haka ta kara da cewa lallai jam’iyyar APC ce za ta yi nasara a zaben shugaban kasa mai zuwa.
Text2 Translation: After that she added that the APC will definitely win the next presidential election.

Text1: Babban sakataren ma’aikatar aiyukkan cikin gida Shuaib Belgore ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ya fitar ranar Laraba a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Home Affairs Shuaib Belgore announced this in a document he issued on Wednesday in Abuja.
Text2: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Samuel Aruwan ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ya raba wa manema labarai ranar Talata a garin Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The state security commissioner Samuel Aruwan announced this in a document he shared with the media on Tuesday in Kaduna.

Text1: Kakakin rundunar ya ce Olabisi na babban asibitin Idi Iroko likitoci na duba shi sai dai bai fadi inda ya ji rauni ba.
Text1 Translation: The spokesperson of the command said that Olabisi of Idi Iroko General Hospital was examined by doctors but he did not fall where he was injured.
Text2: Nasel ya ce ‘yan sanda sun yi gaggwar kai Nasela asibiti inda a asibitin ya rasu yayin da likitoci ke duba shi.
Text2 Translation: Nasel said that the police rushed Nasela to the hospital where he died while the doctors were examining him.

Text1: Babafemi ya ce sakamakon binciken da rundunar ta gudanar ya nuna Nwabueze dan asalin kauyen Mmaku ne dake jihar Enugu.
Text1 Translation: Babafemi said the results of the investigation conducted by the command showed that Nwabueze is a native of Mmaku village in Enugu state.
Text2: Ya ce binciken da rundunar ta gudanar ya nuna cewa karya Wasiu ya yi sannan shine ya ce wa matarsa Kehinde ta gudu.
Text2 Translation: He said the investigation conducted by the force showed that Wasiu lied and told his wife Kehinde to run away.

Text1: Kwamishinan tsaro na jihar Samuel Aruwan ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ya aika wa namema labaraia garin Kaduna.
Text1 Translation: The state security commissioner Samuel Aruwan announced this in a letter he sent to Kaduna newsmen.
Text2: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Samuel Aruwan ya sanar da haka a garin Kaduna a cikin makon jiya.
Text2 Translation: The state security commissioner Samuel Aruwan announced this in Kaduna last week.

Text1: A cikin raddin, ASUU ta ce “yajin aikin bai isa haka nan ba, tukunna ma tukun, tunda gwamnati ta maida darajar jami’o’i kamar darajar sakandare.”
Text1 Translation: In the reply, ASUU said that "the strike is not enough, not even now, since the government has made universities like high schools."
Text2: “Ai yajin aiki tukunna ma tukun, tunda dai gwamnati ta sakwarkwatar da darajar ilmi a jami’o’i, sun koma kusan daraja ɗaya da sakandare.
Text2 Translation: "There has been a strike for a long time, since the government has reduced the level of education in universities, they have returned to almost the same level as high school.

Text1: ” Sannan kuma wanda ake zargin (Mamu) ya kitsa kashe jami’an tsaro da dama a yankin Arewa ta tsakiya da Arewa maso Gabashin Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: And the suspect (Mamu) killed many security officers in the North Central and North Eastern regions of Nigeria.
Text2: ‘Yan bindigan sun kashe mutum 78 a yankin Kudu maso Gabas, Arewa maso Gabas da Arewa maso Yamma.
Text2 Translation: The bandits killed 78 people in the South-East, North-East and North-West regions.

Text1: Sai dai kuma a cikin makon da ya yi ƙorafin ne, sai Ministar Harkokin Kuɗaɗe ta ce tulin bashin ba mai kumbura ciki ba n.
Text1 Translation: However, in the week that he complained, the Minister of Finance said that the pile of debt is not bloated.
Text2: Ministar Harkokin Kuɗaɗe Zainab Ahmed ta bayyana cewa har yanzu bashin da Najeriya ke ciwowa bai kumbura mata cikin da zai iya fashewa ba.
Text2 Translation: The Minister of Finance, Zainab Ahmed, said that Nigeria's debt burden has not yet swelled to the point where it could explode.

Text1: Atiku Abubakar na PDP ya samu 75,750.
Text1 Translation: Atiku Abubakar of PDP got 75,750.
Text2: Shi kuma Atiku Abubakar na PDP ya samu 89,554.
Text2 Translation: Atiku Abubakar of PDP got 89,554.

Text1: Lamarin ya faru ne a wurin zaman sauraren ra’ayoyin jama’a dangane da ƙudirin neman kafa dokar da za ta haramta kama jakai barkatai ana kamawa.
Text1 Translation: The incident took place at the hearing of the public's opinion regarding the resolution to seek the establishment of a law that will prohibit the arrest of people who are arrested.
Text2: Ba wai a riƙa tsugunawa teburin mai shayi ana cewa majalisa za ta tirsasa kafa dokar ba.
Text2 Translation: It's not like sitting at the tea table and saying that the parliament will rush to enact the law.

Text1: Kuma a rage bai wa wasu kamfanoni iznin karɓar haraji a madadin gwamnatin tarayya ana biyan su lada.
Text1 Translation: And less give permission to some companies to collect taxes on behalf of the federal government and they are rewarded.
Text2: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta amince a fara gina shingayen karɓar haraji daga motocin haya da waɗanda ba na haya ba a kan manyan titinan Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Government has approved the construction of toll booths from rental and non-rental vehicles on Nigerian highways.

Text1: Ministan Harkokin ‘Yan Sanda Maigari Dingyaɗi, ya ce gwamnati na ci gaba da nazarin hukuncin da kotu ta yanke kafin ta ɗauki mataki na gaba.
Text1 Translation: The Minister of Police Affairs, Maigari Dingyadi, said that the government is continuing to study the decision of the court before taking the next step.
Text2: Ministan Harkokin Makamashi, Abubakar Aliyu ya ce Gwamnati na nan na bakin ƙoƙarin ganin an inganta tare da ƙara yawan wutar lantarkin da ake samarwa.
Text2 Translation: The Minister of Energy, Abubakar Aliyu said that the government is working to improve and increase the amount of electricity that is produced.

Text1: A ranar Laraba ce Gwamnatin Najeriya ta fara kwaso ‘yan ƙasar ta, waɗanda yaƙi ya ritsa da su a Sudan.
Text1 Translation: On Wednesday, the Nigerian government began repatriating its citizens, who were involved in the war in Sudan.
Text2: A ranar Laraba ce Majalisar Dattawa ta fara zaman nazarin Kasafin 2023 na naira tiriliyan 20.5, wanda Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya gabatar a ranar Juma’a.
Text2 Translation: On Wednesday, the Senate began the review session of the 2023 Budget of 20.5 trillion naira, which was presented by President Muhammadu Buhari on Friday.

Text1: PDP ta kafa kwamitin tantance masu takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa
Text1 Translation: The PDP has established a committee to identify candidates for the vice president
Text2: Peter Obi, mataimakin shugaban kasa na takarar Atiku Abubakar a zaɓen 2019, ya ƙaddamar da fitowa takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin PDP a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: Peter Obi, the vice presidential candidate for Atiku Abubakar in the 2019 election, has announced that he will contest for the presidency under the PDP in the 2023 election.

Text1: Kotu ta bada belin matashin da ake zargin ya kutsa cikin coci yin sata kan naira 100,000
Text1 Translation: The court granted bail to the youth who allegedly broke into the church and stole 100,000 naira
Text2: Kotu ta bada belin barawon babur kan Naira 100,000
Text2 Translation: The court granted bail to the motorcycle thief for 100,000 Naira

Text1: A ranar Laraba ce Gwamnatin Najeriya ta fara kwaso ‘yan ƙasar ta, waɗanda yaƙi ya ritsa da su a Sudan.
Text1 Translation: On Wednesday, the Nigerian government began repatriating its citizens, who were involved in the war in Sudan.
Text2: A ranar Laraba ce Majalisar Dattawa ta amince da sunayen mutane 19 waɗanda Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya aika, a matsayin Kwamishinonin Zaɓe (REC).
Text2 Translation: On Wednesday, the Senate approved the names of 19 people sent by President Muhammadu Buhari as Electoral Commissioners (REC).

Text1: NDLEA ta kama hodar ibilis da wasu haramtattun kwayoyi da aka shigo da su Najeriya daga Brazil da Canada
Text1 Translation: The NDLEA seized Ibilis and other illegal drugs imported into Nigeria from Brazil and Canada
Text2: Hukumar NDLEA ta kama hodar ibilis da ganyen Skunk masu nauyin kilogiram 126.95 da aka shigo da su kasan daga kasashen waje.
Text2 Translation: The NDLEA has seized 126.95 kilograms of Ibilis and Skunk leaves imported from foreign countries.

Text1: Haka ya furta a wurin taron wanda mambobin Majalisar Tarayya na Kudu Maso Kudu suka halarta tare da shugabannin PDP na shiyya.
Text1 Translation: He said this at the meeting which was attended by members of the Federal Council of the South-South along with the PDP zonal leaders.
Text2: Wannan kakkausan jawabi yazo ne sa’o’i kaɗan bayan Mambobin Majalisar Tarayya  na PDP sun nemi Secondus ya sauka daga shugabancin jam’iyyar.
Text2 Translation: This strong speech came a few hours after the members of the Federal Council of the PDP asked Secondus to step down from the leadership of the party.

Text1: Gazawar gwamnatin Buhari ta su ce can, kada a rika dora wa  su Tinubu laifi, babu ruwan su – Tsohon Ministan Buhari
Text1 Translation: The failure of Buhari's government says that they should not blame Tinubu, they have nothing to do with it - Buhari's former minister
Text2: Ministan Albarkatun Ruwa Suleiman Adamu ya bayyana cewa gwamnatin shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ta samar wa mutum miliyan 12.5 ruwan fanfo a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: The Minister of Water Resources Suleiman Adamu has stated that the administration of President Muhammadu Buhari has provided tap water to 12.5 million people in Nigeria.

Text1: Bisa ga sashe 137 na dokar hukuncin duk wanda aka kama da laifin fyade shine daurin rai da rai a kurkuku.
Text1 Translation: According to section 137 of the law, the punishment for anyone who is arrested for the crime of rape is life imprisonment.
Text2: An dai bijiro da wannan doka a bisa yadda Sashe na 70 na Dokar Sadarwa ta Najeriya, ta 2003 ta gindaya sharaɗi.
Text2 Translation: This law was introduced in accordance with Section 70 of the Nigerian Telecommunications Act, 2003.

Text1: “Ya kamata jama’a su sani Sojojin Najeriya ƙwararru ne kuma mabiya dokokin da ke cikin kundin tsarin mulkin Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: "People should know that the Nigerian Army is professional and abides by the laws contained in the Nigerian constitution.
Text2: Tuni suka wancakalar da ita suka ce ya saba wa irin dokar da ya kamata ya shiga cikin kundin tsarin mulkin Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: They have already criticized her and said that it is against the law that should be included in the constitution of Nigeria.

Text1: Buhari ya bada labarin irin gaganiyar da ya sha wajen daƙile cin hanci da rashawa.
Text1 Translation: Buhari told the story of his success in fighting corruption.
Text2: Ya bada labarin irin gaganiyar da ya riƙa sha da wasu gwamnoni dangane da yadda su ke riƙon ƙananan hukumomin su.
Text2 Translation: He told the story of the discussion he had with some governors regarding the way they are handling their local governments.

Text1: BAYA BA ZANI A RANAR ZAƁE: Jami’an tsaro sun watse daga rumfar zaɓen Buhari, bayan Shugaban Ƙasa da matar sa A’isha sun dangwala ƙuri’a
Text1 Translation: I DON'T KNOW ON ELECTION DAY: Security officers dispersed from Buhari's polling booth, after the President and his wife Aisha cast their votes.
Text2: Jami’an tsaron EFCC, ICPC, NDLEA sun watse daga rumfar zaɓen da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari da matar sa A’isha sun dangwala ƙuri’ar su.
Text2 Translation: The EFCC, ICPC, NDLEA security officers dispersed from the polling booth where President Muhammadu Buhari and his wife Aisha cast their votes.

Text1: Yadda alkalin wasa ya dagula wasan kwallon ƙafa tsakanin Tunisia da Mali
Text1 Translation: How the referee disturbed the football match between Tunisia and Mali
Text2: Alƙalin wasan da ya hura wasa tsakanin Mali da Tunisia ya birkice, kwakwalwar sa ta dagule, ya ruɗe, inda ya hura tashi ana minti 85.
Text2 Translation: The referee who refereed the match between Mali and Tunisia fell back, his brain was confused, he was confused, and he blew the whistle in the 85th minute.

Text1: Mbazulike ya sha wa Buhari alwashin cewa sakin Nnamdi zai samar da zaman lafiya a yankin Kudu maso Gabas.
Text1 Translation: Mbazulike swore to Buhari that the release of Nnamdi will bring peace in the South East region.
Text2: Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya sha alwashin samar wa ‘yan Najeriya tsaro a duk inda suka a fadin kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has vowed to provide security to Nigerians wherever they are across the country.

Text1: Bayan haka Makinde ya ce adadin yawan kudaden kayan da hukumar ta kama ya kai Naira Miliyan 4,886,647,634.92.
Text1 Translation: After that, Makinde said that the amount of money seized by the agency was 4,886,647,634.92 million Naira.
Text2: Makinde ya ce a lissafe dai jimlar kudaden kayan da hukumar ta kama ya kai naira miliyan 143,905,508.
Text2 Translation: Makinde said that the total amount of money seized by the agency is 143,905,508 million naira.

Text1: Sai dai kuma jami’an kurkukun sun ce an kamo 442, amma kuma har yanzu babu labarin sauran 443 da su ka tsere.
Text1 Translation: However, the prison officials said that 442 were arrested, but there is still no news of the other 443 who escaped.
Text2: Ya ce baya ga tulin jami’an tsaron da aka kashe, har yanzu wasu sun ɓace babu labarin su.
Text2 Translation: He said that apart from the many security personnel who were killed, some are still missing.

Text1: Sannan kuma ta ce naira 80,000 din da mijin ya biya sadakin ta, za ta maida masa da su.
Text1 Translation: And she said that the 80,000 naira that the husband paid for her dowry, she will return it to him.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Mrs Patricia Adetuyibi ta ce  kowannen su, Precious da Idris za su biya belin Naira 500,000 sannan su gabatar da shaida Kuma
Text2 Translation: Judge Mrs Patricia Adetuyibi said each of them, Precious and Idris will pay a bail of 500,000 Naira and present evidence.

Text1: Yadda Ƴan bindiga suka kashe ‘yan sanda uku a jihar Kogi
Text1 Translation: How bandits killed three policemen in Kogi state
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutane  uku da ‘yan sanda 10 a garin Ngaski da Gafara dake karamar hukumar Ngaski a jihar Kebbi.
Text2 Translation: Bandits have killed three people and 10 policemen in Ngaski and Gafara town in Ngaski local government in Kebbi state.

Text1: Jam’iyyar PDP ta bayyana cewa ba ta amince da sakamakon yawan ƙuri’un da jam’iyyar LP ta Peter Obi ta samu a Jihar Legas ba.
Text1 Translation: The People's Democratic Party (PDP) has declared that it does not accept the results of the majority of votes that Peter Obi's LP got in Lagos State.
Text2: “Ban amince da sakamakon da LP ta samu ba, ba wai don ba mu yi nasara ba.
Text2 Translation: "I don't agree with the results obtained by LP, not because we didn't win."

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 6 ga Oktoba.
Text1 Translation: The trial will continue on October 6.
Text2: Za a cigaba da shari’a ranar 6 ga Oktoba.
Text2 Translation: The trial will continue on October 6.

Text1: A kan haka ne APM ta ce Shettima ya fito takara a wurare biyu, wato takarar sanata da ta mataimakin shugaban ƙasa a lokaci guda.
Text1 Translation: Based on this, APM said that Shettima ran for two positions, that is, the senatorial and vice-presidential contests at the same time.
Text2: SHARI’AR ZARGIN  SHETTIMA YA FITO TAKARA WURI BIYU: Kotu ta kori ƙarar da PDP ta nemi a soke takarar Tinubu da Shettima
Text2 Translation: SHETTIMA'S ALLEGATION COURT HAS BROUGHT OUT TWO CANDIDATES: Court dismisses PDP's appeal to cancel Tinubu's and Shettima's candidacy

Text1: Kamar yadda suka saba, ‘Yan Kungiyar Shi’a sun halarcin zaman coci ranar Kirsimeti a Zaria
Text1 Translation: As usual, the members of the Shia group attended the church service on Christmas Day in Zaria

Text2 Translation: Every Christmas day, members of the group attend church with Christians in Zaria to congratulate them on the day.

Text1: Saboda PDP ta kasa kawo hujjar da za ta nuna cewa Shettima ya fito takarar sanata a lokaci guda.
Text1 Translation: Because PDP failed to bring evidence to show that Shettima ran for senator at the same time.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba a ranar 8 ga Mayu Pauline ta bayyana cewa za ta fito takarar kujerar sanata na yankin  Filato ta kudu.
Text2 Translation: If we don't forget, on May 8, Pauline announced that she will run for the senatorial seat in the South Plateau area.

Text1: Mohammed ya fadi haka ne a taron ranar cutar ta duniya a garin Bauchi.
Text1 Translation: Mohammed said this at the World AIDS Day conference in Bauchi.

Text1: Za a kulle jami’o’in ne daga ranar 22 ga Fabrairu zuwa 14 ga Maris, kafin da kuma bayan zaɓe.
Text1 Translation: The universities will be closed from February 22 to March 14, before and after the elections.
Text2: An maida shi Hedikwatar EFCC a ranar 18 Ga Maris, inda ya kwashe sati ɗaya a kulle kafin a bayar da belin sa.
Text2 Translation: He was transferred to the EFCC Headquarters on March 18, where he spent a week in jail before his bail was granted.

Text1: Shehu ya ce ai dokar ƙasa ma ta haramta wani ɗan majalisar tarayya ya yi sakataren kwamitin da manyan jami’an gwamnati ke ciki.
Text1 Translation: Shehu said that the law of the land also prohibits a member of the federal parliament from being the secretary of a committee that includes senior government officials.

Text2 Translation: However, Garba Shehu replied to him that the committee of which Gudaji Kazaure has been dissolved has already been dissolved and he said that he is the secretary of the committee.

Text1: Mazauna garin Abuja sun bayyana ra’ayoyinsu game da saka gwanjo a tattaunawar sanin ra’ayoyin mutane wanda kamfanin Dillancin Labaran Najeriya NAN.

Text2 Translation: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Education of the state, Yusuf Saleh, disclosed this to the News Agency of Nigeria NAN.

Text1: Gwamna Samuel Ortom na Jihar Benuwai ya sha kaye a takarar zaɓen sanatan da ya tsaya.
Text1 Translation: Governor Samuel Ortom of Benue State was defeated in the senatorial election he stood for.
Text2: Gwamna Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi na Jihar Enugu ya sha ƙasa a takarar Sanatan Enugu ta Arewa da ya fito a ƙarƙashin PDP.
Text2 Translation: Governor Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi of Enugu State has lost in the Enugu North Senatorial contest that he contested under the PDP.

Text1: PDP ce kaɗai za ta iya maida wa ‘yan Najeriya annuri a fuskokin su – Liyel Mike
Text1 Translation: PDP is the only one that can make Nigerians shine - Liyel Mike

Text2 Translation: He said that PDP is now the only party left in Nigeria, and it will win the next election.

Text1: ” Sannan gwamnati ta fito da hanyoyi daga wannan shekara 2021 zuwa 2025 da za su taimaka wajen kawo karshen harkallar muggan kwayoyi a kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: ” Then the government came up with ways from this year 2021 to 2025 that will help to end the problem of drugs in this country.
Text2: Hukumar NDLEA ta bayyana yadda ta kama muggan kwayoyi masu nauyin kilogiram 500 da masu safarae kwayoyin a jihohi 8 a kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: The NDLEA has disclosed how it has seized drugs weighing 500 kilograms and drug traffickers in 8 states in the country.

Text1: Kusan sati ɗaya kenan a kullum sai Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa ya bayyana ficewar aƙalla Sanata ɗaya daga APC.
Text1 Translation: It has been almost a week since the President of the Senate announced the departure of at least one senator from the APC.
Text2: Bulaliyar Majalisar Dattawa, kuma Sanata mai wakiltar Abiya ta Arewa, Orji Kalu, ya bayyana janyewar sa daga takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC.
Text2 Translation: Senator representing Abia North, Orji Kalu, has announced his withdrawal from the presidential race under the APC.

Text1: Ya bayyana haka ne a wata tattaunawa da ya yi da Kamfanin Dillancin Labarai na Najeriya (NAN).
Text1 Translation: He stated this in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN).
Text2: Sakataren Yaɗa Labarai na PDP na Ƙasa, Ɗebo Ologunagba ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar yau Laraba.
Text2 Translation: The Publicity Secretary of the PDP, Dbo Ologunagba stated this in a statement he issued today Wednesday.

Text1: Rundunar soji ta ce wasu dakarunta biyu sun ji rauni amma tuni har an kaisu asibiti a na basu magani.
Text1 Translation: The military said that two of its soldiers were injured but they were already taken to the hospital for treatment.

Text1: NDLEA ta kama dan Najeriya da ya hadiye kullin hodar ibilis 92 a filin jirgin saman Abuja

Text1: Saboda haka ne Kwamitin Abejide ya ce a biya Naira miliyan 20 ga iyalan kowane mutum ɗaya da kwastan ɗin su ka kashe su 20.
Text1 Translation: That is why the Abejide Committee said that 20 million Naira should be paid to the families of each person whose customs killed 20 of them.

Text1: Sai dai kuma Abdulrahman ya ce  bai kamata a yi mata auren dole ba.

Text1: Shugaban Jam’iyyar APC Abdullahi Adamu ya gargaɗi dukkan ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC su guji caccakar Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari.
Text1 Translation: The Chairman of the APC, Abdullahi Adamu, has warned all presidential candidates under the APC to refrain from criticizing President Muhammadu Buhari.

Text1: A jihar Filato da Bauchi da Kaduna kuma an kama barayin shanu da masu safarar ƙananan yara da ‘yan bindiga da masu fashi da makami.

Text1: Jalige ya shauda wa Kamfanin Dillacin Labaran Najeriya NAN cewa babu wanda ya rasa ransa ko kuma rauni a fashewar bam din.

Text1 Translation: SEVENTH TIME IN FOUR MONTHS: Gunmen set fire to the INEC office in Imo, three days after attacking another office

Text1: Tuni dai su ka kafa kwamitin mambobi 13 ƙarƙashin shugabancin Nicholas Mutu, ɗan PDP daga jihar Delta a matsayin shugaban kwamiti.

Text1: Ya yi kira ga shugaban ƙasa Muhammadu Buhari da ya tsananin bada umarnin a saki sauran fasinjojin dake tsare.

Text1 Translation: Adesina said the Niger Delta Regional Development Commission (NRC) built the student hostel opened by Buhari in the university.

Text2 Translation: Fashola said that the Buhari government will soon build roadblocks to collect taxes from drivers on the main roads in Nigeria.

Text1: Shin da gaske ne kotu a Najeriya ta umurci kamfanin MTN ya biya Mr Anenih naira miliyan 5.5?
Text1 Translation: Did the court in Nigeria really order MTN to pay Mr Anenih 5.5 million naira?

Text2 Translation: The High Court in Abuja found MTN guilty and ordered the company to pay Mr Emmanuek five million naira..”

Text1: ‘Yan Majalisar Wakilai ta Ƙasa su uku daga Jihar Katsina sun fice daga APC, sun koma PDP ƙarƙashin rundunar yaƙin kamfen din Atiku Abubakar.

Text1: Mahaifin sa Olusola Saraki ya yi Shugaban Masu Rinjaye na Majalisar Dattawa, a zamanin Jamhuriya ta Biyu, wadda aka fi sani da zamanin mulkin Shagari.
Text1 Translation: His father, Olusola Saraki, was the Senate Majority Leader during the Second Republic, known as the Shagari regime.

Text1: Amma ya kasance an sanar wa Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa kafin a kai ga saura kwanaki 45 a yi zaɓen da ya janye tsayawa takarar.”
Text1 Translation: But he was notified to the National Electoral Commission before the 45 days left for the election to withdraw his candidacy."

Text2 Translation: The Justice has ordered the National Electoral Commission (INEC) to delete the name of Andy Uba from the list of candidates for the Anambra governorship election in 2021.

Text1: Saboda a cikin daftarin manufofin gwamnati na, na bayyana yadda zan inganta rayuwar ma’aikatan ƙasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Because in my draft government policies, I have explained how I will improve the lives of the workers in this country.

Text2 Translation: The US government has stated that the Nigerian military, SSS and police are violating the rights of the people in the country due to corruption and the corruption of the justice department.

Text1: Sai sai kuma bai yi nasara ba a zaɓen fidda gwani da aka yi zargin tafka maguɗi a wajen yin sa.

Text1: ANA WATA GA WATA: Jam’iyyar APM ta garzaya kotu, ta nemi a ƙwace nasarar Tinubu a bai wa Atiku da ya zo na biyu
Text1 Translation: ANA MOTH TO MONTH: APM party went to court, asked to take away Tinubu's victory and give it to Atiku who came second
Text2: Tun a ranar 29 Ga Mayu ne Atiku ya yi nasarar lashe zaɓen fidda gwani na PDP, inda Wike ne ya zo na biyu.
Text2 Translation: On May 29, Atiku won the PDP primaries, where Wike came second.

Text1: Ya zuwa lokacin rubuta wannan labari dai Babbar Kotun Tarayya ba ta kai ga damƙa wannan ƙara a hannun kowane mai shari’a ba.
Text1 Translation: As of the time of writing this article, the Federal High Court has not handed over this case to any judge.
Text2: Bisa tsarin dokar Najeriya, Babbar Kotun Tarayya ke bada odar a tura mutumin da wata ƙasa ke tuhuma zuwa ƙasar da ke tuhumar sa ɗin.
Text2 Translation: According to Nigerian law, the Federal High Court orders the extradition of a person accused by a country to the country that is accusing him.

Text1: Ƙungiyar ta ce, “Akpabio ba ya ƙaunar ‘yan Arewa, ba mu yarda ya zama  Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa ba”, cewar Sa’idu, Shugaban Dattawan Arewa Mazauna Kudu.
Text1 Translation: The group said, "Akpabio does not love the people of the North, we do not want him to be the President of the Senate", according to Saidu, the President of the North Residents.

Text1: RASHIN TSARO: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 15 a makon jiya a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: UNSAFE: Gunmen killed 15 people last week in Nigeria

Text1: Tawagar jami’an yaɗa labaran Shugaban Ƙasa ne ke shirya taron.
Text1 Translation: The meeting is organized by the delegation of the President's press officers.

Text1: ” Daga 2020 zuwa yanzu ƴan bindiga sun kashe mutum sama da 18,000.

Text1: Majalisar dokokin Jigawa ta karyata labarin yunkurin tsige Kakakinta
Text1 Translation: The Jigawa House of Assembly has denied the news of an attempt to impeach its Speaker

Text1: Victoria ta ce abu na farko shi ne a fara yin ƙoƙarin kakkaɓe ‘yan ta’adda daga yankunan karkara ƙarƙaf.

Text1: “PDP ta riƙe mulki shekaru 16, waɗanda daga ciki Kudu maso Yamma ta riƙe shekaru takwas a ƙarƙashin Obasanjo.

Text1 Translation: How bandits killed 16 people and kidnapped many people in Taraba state

Text1: Ta ce Birtaniya ba ta goyon bayan kowane ɗan takara daga cikin masu takarar shugaban ƙasa su 18.
Text1 Translation: She said that the UK does not support any of the 18 presidential candidates.

Text1: Famuyide ya ce za ci gaba da shari’a  ranar 19 ga Janairu 2023.

Text1: Ƴan sanda sun kama magidancin da ya kashe matarsa  don ci gadon dukiyar ta
Text1 Translation: The police have arrested the husband who killed his wife to inherit her property

Text1: Hukumar Agajin Gaggawa ta Ƙasa (NEMA), ta yi kakkausan gargaɗin cewa a wannan daminar akwai yiwuwar ɓarkewar mummunar ambaliya a Jihar Kwara.
Text1 Translation: The National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA), has issued a strong warning that this monsoon there is a possibility of severe flooding in Kwara State.
Text2: A lokacin, Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa INEC, ta bayyana Ademola Adeleke na PDP cewa ya yi nasara a zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Osun.
Text2 Translation: At that time, the National Electoral Commission, INEC, declared Ademola Adeleke of the PDP that he won the Osun State governorship election.

Text1: Ya ce rundunar za ta kai wadannan mutane kotu da zaran sun kammala bincike.

Text1: Chibuikem ya zana jarabawar a jihar Legas kuma ya samu maki 358 daga cikin maki 400.
Text1 Translation: Chibuikem sat the exam in Lagos state and scored 358 out of 400.

Text2 Translation: Moyinoluwa sat the exam in Kwara state and scored 346 marks.

Text1: Sai dai kuma ranar Laraba Lai ya zargi ‘yan jarida, musamman PREMIUM TIMES da cewa ta buga bayanin sa ba daidai ba.
Text1 Translation: However, on Wednesday Lai accused journalists, especially PREMIUM TIMES, of publishing his information incorrectly.

Text1: Ministan Harkokin Sufuri, Mu’azu Sambo ne ya bayyana haka, a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai na Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa.

Text1: Shugaban Marasa Rinjaye na Majalisar Tarayya Ndudi Elumelu ne ya nemi a amince da su, kuma nan take aka amince.
Text1 Translation: Ndudi Elumelu, the leader of the Independents of the Federal Assembly, asked for their approval, and it was immediately approved.

Text2 Translation: The Federal Council has agreed that the 23.7 trillion Naira loan that Buhari received from the CBN should not be paid for 40 years.

Text1: Ina roƙon a ba ni shi domin dama ce ta samar da zaman lafiya a yankin mu.
Text1 Translation: I am asking for it to be given to me because it is an opportunity to create peace in our region.

Text1: Wase ne ya bayyana wannan matsaya ta su a ranar Litinin a otal ɗin Hilton, wurin ƙaddamar da takarar Muktar Betara, a Abuja.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba tun bayan zaben fidda gwani da Atiku ya kada Nysome Wike rashin jituwa ya barke tsakanin su.
Text1 Translation: If we don't forget that after the primary election where Atiku defeated Nysome Wike, disagreements broke out between them.

Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, Wike supported Tambuwal in the primary election of PDP presidential candidates.

Text1: Wannan fallasar manyan ɓarayin gwamnati ita ce mafi girma da ‘yan jarida su ka taɓa yi daga cikin ƙasashe 117 na duniya.
Text1 Translation: This exposure of the big thieves of the government is the biggest that the journalists have ever done among the 117 countries of the world.

Text1: Majiyar ta ce sun haɗa baki sun kacaccala naira biliyan 22 a tsakanin su, kuɗaɗen aikin tashar wutar lantarki ta Zungeru.

Text2 Translation: Sunrise Power & Transmission Co. was the first to be awarded the contract for the construction of a power station in Mambilla.

Text1: Gwamnan Zamfara mai barin gado, Bello Matawalle ya yi kira ga Hukumar EFCC ta binciki jami’an Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa da Ministocin Najeriya.

Text2: EFCC ta faɗaɗa binciken ta har kan manyan jami’an Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa da Ministoci na Majalisar Zartaswa.””
Text2 Translation: The EFCC has expanded its investigation to include senior officials of the Presidency and Cabinet Ministers.

Text1: Misali “Gwanatin Najeriya na shirin kara albashin masu yin NYSC zuwa nera dubu 45.
Text1 Translation: For example, "The Nigerian government plans to increase the salary of NYSC candidates to N45,000.

Text1: Adamu ya yi bayanin a lokacin da ya ke zantawa da manema labarai a Abuja, a ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: Adamu made the disclosure while talking to journalists in Abuja, on Saturday.

Text1: Tsohon sanatan Kaduna ta tsakiya Sanata Shehu Sani ya ce babu maraban ƴan bindiga da ‘Deliget’ a siyasan Najeriya.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 28 ga Afrilu.

Text1: Tinubu ya kai ziyarar kwanaki biyu ce inda ya buɗe wasu ayyukan raya jiha da Gwamna Nyesom Wike ya gayyace shi buɗewa.

Text2 Translation: On Talace day, President Muhammadu Buhari landed in Owerri, for a visit to open some state development projects implemented by Governor Hope Uzodinma.

Text1: An yi wa ɗan takarar sanata ƙarin geji daga naira miliyan 40, zuwa miliyan 200.

Text1: Alhassan ya ce Bilkisu tana nemi kotu ta raba auren ta da Musa saboda bata kaunar sa kuma.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe wani dan achaba mai suna Abejide Ojo ranar Alhamis dinmakon jiya a hanyar  Ilemeso zuwa Isan zuwa Ekiti a jihar  Ekiti.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed an Achaba man named Abejide Ojo on Thursday last night on the road from Ilemeso to Isan to Ekiti in Ekiti state.
Text2: NDLEA ta kama Beauty a hanyar zuwa jihar Legas daga Benin City ranar 6 ga Yuli.
Text2 Translation: NDLEA arrested Beauty on her way to Lagos state from Benin City on July 6.

Text1: Ya ce shi ba zai tsaya sake wani zaɓen fidda gwani ba, ko ma da jam’iyya ta ce a sake ɗin.

Text1: ƘARSHEN ALEWA ƘASA: Yadda kotu ta ƙwace tulin dukiyar katafaren ɗan damfara Okeke
Text1 Translation: THE END OF CANDY DOWN: How the court confiscated the wealth of the biggest fraudster Okeke

Text2 Translation: The Federal High Court in Lagos has seized all the money, property, houses and cars owned by the biggest fraudster Obinwanne Okeke in Nigeria.

Text1 Translation: The Supreme Court has set a date for deciding the eligibility trial for the senatorial contest between Bashir Machina and Senator Ahmad Lawan
Text2: A kan haka sai Peters ya roƙi Kotun Ƙoli ta ayyana Sanata Lawan a matsayin ɗan takarar Sanatan Shiyyar Yobe ta Arewa, na jam’iyyar APC.

Text1: “Ba zan taɓa zaɓe ko goyon bayan takarar Atiku Abubakar ba.

Text1: Ganduje ya ce Gwamantin Jihar Kano da APC Reshen Jihar Kano duk ba su goyon bayan ƙirƙiro sauya launin kuɗi a daidai wannan lokaci.

Text2 Translation: Ganduje said that he will call the bank managers in Kano State to find a solution to the problem of lack of funds that the people of his state are going through.

Text1: A zaman da kotun ta yi Yusuf bai zo kotun ba.

Text2 Translation: During all the sessions of the court, Aliyah did not come to the court even for one day.

Text1: Wani mazaunin kauyen Gidan Kane ya ce ‘yan bindiga sun kashe mutane uku a wasu kauyuka a daren Lahadin da ya gabata.

Text1: Moses Ebuga, yayi wannan kiran a wani taron da kungiyar ta yi da manema labarai a ranar Litinin a garin Jos.

Text1: Yadda sojoji suka kashe gaggan ƴan bindiga biyu a Kaduna, suka ƙwato tulin kayan sojoji
Text1 Translation: How the soldiers killed two armed bandits in Kaduna, and seized a pile of military equipment

Text2 Translation: IPOB members beheaded two soldiers and bandits killed 56 people in Zamfara state.

Text1: Sai dai kuma ba a sani ba ko Babbar Kotun Tarayya za ta bayar da belin Okorocha kafin a kai ga lokacin tantance shi.
Text1 Translation: However, it is not known whether the Federal High Court will grant bail to Okorocha before the time of his assessment.

Text2 Translation: Judge Nkeonye Maha of the Federal Court granted their bail at 5 million naira each.

Text1: Jami’ar Maryam Abacha, Kano, ta raɗa wa titin jami’ar sunan marigayiya Haneefa
Text1 Translation: Maryam Abacha University, Kano, named the university road after the late Haneefa

Text2 Translation: Maryam Abacha University, MAAUN named the building of the university after the late Magajiya Danbatta

Text1: Akalla mutum 12 ne suka mutu a wani mummunar rikicin da aka yi tsakanin ‘yan bindiga da ‘yan kungiyar sa kai a jihar Filato.

Text2: ‘Yan kungiyar IPOB sun fille kan sojoji biyu sannan ‘yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 56 a jihar Zamfara.

Text1: Kwamishinan Zaɓen Adamawa, Farfesa Hudu Ari ne ya bayyana sunan ta a matsayin wadda ta kayar da Gwamna Ahmadu Pintiri na PDP.
Text1 Translation: The Electoral Commissioner of Adamawa, Professor Hudu Ari announced her name as the one who defeated Governor Ahmadu Pintiri of PDP.

Text2 Translation: APGA's Charles Soludo won the governorship election in the 8 local governments whose results were announced by the Electoral Commission.

Text1: Fashola ya yi wannan bayani a lokacin da ya ke duba aikin titin a ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: Fashola made this statement while inspecting the road work on Wednesday.

Text2 Translation: Fashola made this statement while inspecting the Chanchangi Bridge project in Takum Local Government in Taraba State.

Text1: Maharan sun kashe mazauna garin mutum 6 a harin da suka yi a daren ranar Lahadi.

Text2 Translation: At least 13 people were killed by bandits in an attack on Batsari town in Katsina state on Tuesday evening.

Text1: Ya ce ya kuma yanke hukuncin canja sheka saboda matsalolin rashin hadin kai da ake fama da shi a jami’iyyar rashin adalci a shugabancin jam’iyyar.
Text1 Translation: He said that he decided to transfer because of the problems of disunity in the party and injustice in the leadership of the party.

Text1: Domin ko a wasan su kafin doke Spain, an nuno Hakimi ya rungume mahaifiyar sa bayan tashi daga wasa a cikin sitadiyan.
Text1 Translation: Because even in their game before beating Spain, Hakimi was shown hugging his mother after leaving the game in the stadium.

Text1: Matawalle ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwa wadda ya ke magana kan binciken su gwamnoni masu barin gado da EFCC ke yi.
Text1 Translation: Matawalle stated this in a statement in which he was talking about the investigation of outgoing governors by the EFCC.

Text2 Translation: I am pleading with the EFCC not to stop its investigation on outgoing governors alone.

Text1: Lamarin ya faru a ranar 14 Ga Satumba, wanda tun bayan nan ba a sake jin ɗuriyar sa ba.
Text1 Translation: The incident took place on September 14, after which no one has been heard from.
Text2: Amma kuma daga nan ba mu ƙara jin wani bayani ba, ko muryar sa ba a sake ji ba.
Text2 Translation: But since then we have not heard any more information, nor has his voice been heard again.

Text1: ZAƁEN GWAMNA A KANO: Har ƙarfe 12 na ranar zaɓe ana ta raba wa talakawa taliya da atamfofi
Text1 Translation: GOVERNOR ELECTION IN KANO: Until 12 o'clock on election day pasta and bread are distributed to the poor
Text2: Charles Soludo na APGA ya lashe zaɓen gwamna a ƙananan hukumomi 10 ɗin da hukumar zaɓe ta bayyana sakamakon su.
Text2 Translation: APGA's Charles Soludo won the governorship election in the 10 local governments whose results were announced by the Electoral Commission.

Text1: Amincewar da su ya ƙara tabbata a taron manyan jam’iyyar da aka gudanar ranar Alhamis a Abuja.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun kai wa wasu matsugunan fulani makiyaya hari a jihar Anambra.

Text1: Ya Kuma mika godiyarsa ga gwamnatin jihar Adamawa bisa goyan bayan da ta rika bai wa hukumar daga shekarun da suka gabata zuwa yanzu.
Text1 Translation: He also expressed his gratitude to the Adamawa state government for the support it has been giving to the agency from the past years until now.

Text2 Translation: But he also said that the Kano State Government is giving the agency all the support it needs.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba a watan Maris ne ‘yan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da fasinjojin jirgin kasa da ya taso daga Abuja zuwa Kaduna.
Text1 Translation: If we don't forget, in March, bandits kidnapped the passengers of a train traveling from Abuja to Kaduna.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba a 2012, ƴan bindiga sun tada bamabamai a ginin ofishin jaridar dake Abuja da Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: If we don't forget in 2012, bandits detonated bombs in the office building of the newspaper in Abuja and Kaduna.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun yi awon gaba da wasu manoma biyu a kauyen Ileogbo dake jihar Osun.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen kidnapped two farmers in Ileogbo village in Osun state.
Text2: A karamar hukumar Maigatari dake jihar Jigawa ‘yan bindiga sun kashe ma’aikacin hukumar shige da fice ta ƙasa sannan wasu mutum biyu sun ji rauni.
Text2 Translation: In Maigatari local government in Jigawa state, bandits killed an employee of the National Immigration Agency and two others were injured.

Text1: Gazawar gwamnatin Buhari ta su ce can, kada a rika dora wa  su Tinubu laifi, babu ruwan su – Tsohon Ministan Buhari
Text1 Translation: The failure of Buhari's government says that they should not blame Tinubu, they have nothing to do with it - Buhari's former minister
Text2: “Kada ma a kawo mana wani rainin wayau a ce wai babu ruwan addini idan ana maganar siyasa.
Text2 Translation: "We should not be disrespected to say that religion has nothing to do with politics.

Text1: Madina Maishanu ce za ta rika gabatar da shirin talbijin din a shafin YouTube a yanar gizo duk mako.
Text1 Translation: Madina Maishanu will present the TV show on the YouTube page every week.
Text2: Abinda ya rage a baya za a rika yin su ta yanar gizo har a karkare, amma sabon aji dalibai za su koma.
