Text1: Wannan abin takaicin dai ya faru a kauyen Nzam dake karamar hukumar Anambra ta Yamma.
Text1 Translation: This unfortunate incident happened in Nzam village in Anambra West Local Government Area.
Text2: Gwamnatin jihar Kaduna ta tabbatar da harin da ‘yan bindiga su ka sake kai wa a kauyen Runji dake karamar hukumar Zangon Kataf.
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna state government has confirmed the attack by bandits in Runji village in Zangon Kataf local government.

Text1: Garba ya bayyana haka lokacin da ya ke tattaunawa a ranar Litinin a Katsina.
Text1 Translation: Garba said this while speaking on Monday in Katsina.
Text2: Ya bayyana haka a ranar Litinin lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a otal ɗin Hilton, ranar Talata, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: He disclosed this on Monday when he was meeting with the press at the Hilton Hotel, on Tuesday, in Abuja.

Text1: Saboda haka Onuu ya roki kotu ta raba auren haka nan, ya gaji kowa ya kama gaban sa.
Text1 Translation: Therefore, Onuu asked the court to dissolve the marriage like this, he was tired of everyone standing before him.
Text2: Magidanci ya roki kotu ta raba auren shekara 33 saboda rashin mutunci da matarsa ke gurza masa
Text2 Translation: The husband asked the court to dissolve the 33-year-old marriage because of the dishonor that his wife is pushing him

Text1: Ɗaliban kwalejin Shehu Shagari dake Sokoto sun kashe wata ɗaliba da ake zargin ta yi kalaman ɓatanci ga Annabi SAW.
Text1 Translation: The students of Shehu Shagari College in Sokoto killed a student who allegedly made insulting words to the Prophet SAW.
Text2: Gwamnatin jihar Sokoto ta rufe Kwalejin Ilimi na Shehu Shagari dake jihar Sokoto.
Text2 Translation: The Sokoto state government has closed the Shehu Shagari College of Education in Sokoto state.

Text1: A wannan hadari mutum 12 ne suka mutu inda mata da yara kanana suka fi yawa daga cikin su.
Text1 Translation: In this accident, 12 people died, most of whom were women and children.
Text2: Onyeuko ya ce ‘yan Boko Haram 1,755 sun tuba inda a cikinsu akwai maza 280, mata 523 da yara kanana 952.
Text2 Translation: Onyeuko said 1,755 members of Boko Haram have converted, including 280 men, 523 women and 952 children.

Text1: Ya ce jami’an tsaron sun fatattaki ‘yan bindigan ne bayan sun samu bayanai na siri game da maharan a garin Fatika.
Text1 Translation: He said that the security forces defeated the bandits after they received secret information about the attackers in Fatika town.
Text2: “Jami’an mu sun yi batakashi da ‘yan bindiga ranar Alhamis a kauyen Baure bayan rundunar ta samu bayanin siri kan maɓoyar maharan a dajin Baure.
Text2 Translation: "Our officers clashed with the bandits on Thursday in Baure village after the force received information about the hideout of the attackers in Baure forest.

Text1: Ya ce rundunar ta fara yin da bincike domin ceto mutanen da aka yi garkuwa da su.
Text1 Translation: He said that the army has started to search for the rescue of the kidnapped people.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Yemisi Opalola ta ce rundunar za na gudanar da bincike domin ceto wadanda aka yi garkuwa da su.
Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the state police force, Yemisi Opalola, said that the force will conduct investigations to rescue the hostages.

Text1: “Hukumar ta gano cewa Kwasare dan asalin karamar hukumar  Kware ne, jihar Sokoto amma yana zaune a Goron Dutse jihar Kano.
Text1 Translation: "The commission found that Kwasare is a native of Kware local government, Sokoto state but lives in Goron Dutse, Kano state.
Text2: Mazaunan kauyen  Ruwan Bore dake karamar hukumar Talatan Mafara a jihar Zamfara sun tabbatar cewa ‘yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 11 a kauyen ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: Residents of Ruwan Bore village in Talatan Mafara local government in Zamfara State confirmed that bandits killed 11 people in the village on Saturday.

Text1: TAKARAR GWAMNAN KADUNA: Uba Sani ya mika fom din takara ga uwar jam’iyya
Text1 Translation: KADUNA GOVERNOR CANDIDATE: Uba Sani submitted the nomination form to the mother of the party
Text2: A yau Talata ne sanata Uba Sani ya mika fom din takarar gwamna da ya siya ga uwar jam’iyya a Abuja bayan ya cika.
Text2 Translation: Today, Tuesday, Senator Uba Sani handed over the gubernatorial candidacy form he bought to the mother of the party in Abuja after it was filled.

Text1: Ya ce da zaran an kama su za a kai su kotu domin yanke musu hukunci.
Text1 Translation: He said that as soon as they are arrested, they will be taken to court for sentencing.
Text2: Tuni ya amsa laifin sa, kuma cikin wannan shekarar ce za a yanke masa hukunci.
Text2 Translation: He has already pleaded guilty, and will be sentenced this year.

Text1: Akpanudoedehe ya ce jami’iyyar APC ba ta ji dadin yadda yadda ‘yan bindiga ke kisan mutane a jihar Zamfara da sauran jihohin Arewacin kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Akpanudoedehe said that the APC party is not happy with the way bandits are killing people in Zamfara state and other northern states of the country.
Text2: Mba ya ce rundunar ta kama wadannan mutane tare da wasu ‘yan ta’adda 50 a fadin kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: Mba said the force arrested these people along with 50 other terrorists across the country.

Text1: Haka dai Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Edo, Chidi Nwabuzor ya tabbatar.
Text1 Translation: This was confirmed by the Edo State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson, Chidi Nwabuzor.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Katsina Gambo Isa ya shaida wa wakilin mu cewa zai bibiyi lamarin sannan ya kira shi.
Text2 Translation: Katsina State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson Gambo Isa told our correspondent that he will follow up on the matter and call him.

Text1: “Ɗan takara zai iya janyewa daga takarar da ya yi nasara a zaɓen fidda gwani.
Text1 Translation: "A candidate can withdraw from the contest who won the primary election.
Text2: A jihar Benuwai, Titus Uba ne ya lashe zaɓen fidda gwani na ƴan takarar gwamnan jihar na PDP.
Text2 Translation: In Benue state, Titus Uba won the primary election of PDP governorship candidates.

Text1: A Arewa maso Yamma Danmadami ya ce Operation Hadarin Daji sun kashe mahara 16 sannan sun kama wasu mutum 7 a yankin.
Text1 Translation: In the North West, Danmadami said that Operation Hadarin Daji killed 16 attackers and arrested 7 others in the area.
Text2: Sojoji sun kashe ‘yan ta’adda 31, sun kama 70 a yankin Arewa maso Gabas
Text2 Translation: The army killed 31 terrorists and arrested 70 in the North East region

Text1: MAI RABON GANIN BAƊI: Ƴan sanda sun ceto mutum 39 da ƴan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da su Zamfara
Text1 Translation: 39 people kidnapped by bandits in Zamfara have been rescued by the police
Text2: A kauyen Dansadau dake karamar hukumar Maru  jihar Zamfara ne ‘yan sanda suka ceto mutum bakwai da aka yi garkuwa da su.
Text2 Translation: In Dansadau village in Maru local government of Zamfara state, the police rescued seven people who were kidnapped.

Text1: Gwamnonin na Najeriya sun gargaɗi CBN cewa wannan bahangurɓar canjin kuɗi za ta haifar da karayar tattalin arzikin Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: Nigerian governments have warned the CBN that this exchange rate crisis will lead to the collapse of the Nigerian economy.
Text2: Dokar CBN ta cikin Kundin Dokokin Najeriya ta ce, “idan gwamnatin tarayya na fama da giɓin kasafin kuɗaɗe, za ta iya ramcen kuɗi daga CBN.
Text2 Translation: The CBN Act in the Code of Laws of Nigeria states, "if the federal government is facing a budget deficit, it can borrow money from the CBN."

Text1: Wannan sokewa dai ya kasance an yi abin da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ke so kenan, wato a soke dokar.
Text1 Translation: This repeal is what President Muhammadu Buhari wanted, that is to repeal the law.
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya tabbatar wa ‘yan Najeriya da duniya cewa zai tabbatar da an shirya sahihin zaɓe a shekarar 23 kuma a cikin lumana.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has assured Nigerians and the world that he will ensure that the 23rd election is organized in a peaceful manner.

Text1: Amma dai ya ce an ƙarfafa matakan tsaro a gidajen kurkuku, tun bayan farmakin da ‘yan ta’adda su ka kai a Kurkukun Kuje.
Text1 Translation: But he said security measures have been strengthened in prisons, since the attack by terrorists in Kuje Prison.
Text2: An yi tattaunawar ce kan makomar biyo bayan Boko Haram ɓangaren ISWAP sun kai wa Kurkukun Abuja da ke Kuje.
Text2 Translation: Discussions were held on the future of Boko Haram after ISWAP took them to the Abuja Prison in Kuje.

Text1: Tinubu ya kai ziyarar kwanaki biyu ce inda ya buɗe wasu ayyukan raya jiha da Gwamna Nyesom Wike ya gayyace shi buɗewa.
Text1 Translation: Tinubu made a two-day visit where he inaugurated some state development projects that Governor Nyesom Wike invited him to open.
Text2: Tinubu ya yi wannan jawabi a Fatakwal, babban birnin Jihar Ribas, inda ya kai ziyarar buɗe ayyuka bisa gayyatar Gwamna Nyesom Wike na Jihar.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu made this speech in Fatakwal, the capital of Rivers State, where he paid an opening visit at the invitation of Governor Nyesom Wike of the state.

Text1: ZIYARAR BUHARI JIHAR IMO: Dattawan ƙabilar Igbo za su sake bijiro da neman a saki Nnamdi Kanu don a zauna lafiya a yankin
Text1 Translation: BUHARI'S VISIT TO IMO STATE: The elders of the Igbo tribe will again demand the release of Nnamdi Kanu for peace in the region
Text2: A waccan ziyarar dai dattawan ƙabilar Igbo sun faɗi ba nauyi, sun kuma tashi ba nauyi a gaban Buhari.
Text2 Translation: During that visit, the elders of the Igbo tribe fell down and stood up before Buhari.

Text1: Ƙauyen Randa wanda ke cikin Mazaɓar Matumji a Ƙaramar Hukumar Maru a Jihar Zamfara, ya na ƙarƙashin Masarautar Ɗansadau.
Text1 Translation: Randa village which is in Matumji Constituency in Maru Local Government in Zamfara State, is under the Kingdom of Dansadau.
Text2: Uwar jam’iyyar APC ta kori Shugaban Riƙo na APC na Ƙaramar Hukumar Yola ta Kudu, a Jihar Adamawa, mai suna Sulaiman Adamu.
Text2 Translation: The mother party of APC has dismissed the Acting Chairman of APC of Yola South Local Government, in Adamawa State, named Sulaiman Adamu.

Text1: Ya ce a lokacin da yake kauye an bayyana masa cewa zinnan da matarsa ke yi ne ya sa yake fama da rashin lafiya.
Text1 Translation: He said that when he was in the village, it was revealed to him that his wife's adultery was the reason he was suffering from illness.
Text2: Ibrahim ya bayyana cewa mai martaba sarkin gaya ya rasu ne a bayan fama da yayi da gajeruwar rashin lafiya.
Text2 Translation: Ibrahim said that the noble king of Gaya died after suffering from a short illness.

Text1: Dama dai shiga ƙungiyar NATO da Ukraniya ta yi niyyar yi, na ɗaya daga cikin dalilan da Rasha ta kai mata mamaya.
Text1 Translation: Ukraine's intention to join NATO is one of the reasons why Russia invaded it.
Text2: Ukraniya ta bi sahun wasu ƙasashe irin ta na Turai ta Gabas, ta nemi shiga ƙawance Ƙungiyar NATO ta ƙasashen Turai ta Yamma da Amurka.
Text2 Translation: Ukraine joined the ranks of other Eastern European countries and sought to join the NATO alliance of Western European countries and the United States.

Text1: Ba za su yi wa wa ɗan takarar shugaban kasa na APC butulci  ba.
Text1 Translation: They will not be naive to the APC presidential candidate.
Text2: Gwamna Yahaya Bello na Jihar Kogi ya fusata, tare da cewa ba zai janye daga takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC ba.
Text2 Translation: Governor Yahaya Bello of Kogi State was angry, saying that he will not withdraw from the presidential race under the APC.

Text1: Hukumar ta kama shi a ranar 3 ga Yuly a Ojoo park za shi jihar Sokoto inda daga nan ya wuce zuwa kasar Algeria.
Text1 Translation: The agency arrested him on the 3rd of July in Ojoo Park, Sokoto State, from where he went to Algeria.
Text2: NDLEA ta kama Beauty a hanyar zuwa jihar Legas daga Benin City ranar 6 ga Yuli.
Text2 Translation: NDLEA arrested Beauty on her way to Lagos state from Benin City on July 6.

Text1: Nan take Gwamna Zulum ya bada umarnin a ba su naira miliyan 20, domin jajantawa gare su, kuma saƙon ya isa gare su nan take.
Text1 Translation: Governor Zulum immediately ordered that 20 million naira be given to them, to condole with them, and the message reached them immediately.
Text2: Jaridar PREMIUM TIMES HAUSA ta ga Yadda gwamna Muhammad Badaru ya sanya dokar hannu a wata takardar dake bada umarnin nan take.
Text2 Translation: The newspaper PREMIUM TIMES HAUSA has seen how Governor Muhammad Badaru has signed a document giving the immediate order.

Text1: Tun cikin watan Yuli Buhari ya naɗa su kuma ya aika sunayen a Majalisar Dattawa, inda ya nemi ta amince da su.
Text1 Translation: Since July, Buhari appointed them and sent the names to the Senate, where he asked them to approve them.
Text2: Shi ne maimakon gwamnatin Buhari ta nemi amincewar Majalisar Dattawa, sai yanzu ta nema a makare, bayan an karɓa, an kashe tuni.
Text2 Translation: Instead of the Buhari government asking for the approval of the Senate, it has now asked for it late, after it was accepted, it has already been killed.

Text1: A ranar Alhamis ɗin nan ce kotu ta sa ranar fara sauraren gabatar da Mamu a kotu.
Text1 Translation: On Thursday, the court set the date for the hearing of Mamu's presentation in court.
Text2: A ranar Alhamis ɗin nan farashin gangar ɗanyen mai samfurin ‘Brent’ ya koma dala 83.64.
Text2 Translation: On Thursday, the price of a barrel of crude oil 'Brent' went to 83.64 dollars.

Text1: “An kama masu garkuwa da mutane 157 inda daga ciki an kai mutum 145 kotu sannan ana  yin bincike akan sauran mutum 12.
Text1 Translation: "157 kidnappers have been arrested, of which 145 people have been taken to court and the remaining 12 people are being investigated.
Text2: “An kama barayin dabbobi mutum 244 an kai mutum 230 daga cikinsu kotu sannan ana kan gudanar da bincike akan mutum 14.
Text2 Translation: "244 animal thieves were arrested and 230 of them were taken to court and 14 people are being investigated.

Text1: Ko ba komai dai soke dokar zai taimaki malami a matsayin sa wanda zai tsaya takarar gwamnan Jihar Kebbi a zaɓen 2023.
Text1 Translation: If nothing else, the repeal of the law will help the teacher as the one who will run for the governorship of Kebbi State in the 2023 election.
Text2: Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta Abuja ta soke takarar Andy Uba na APC a zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Anambra da aka gudanar cikin watan Nuwamba.
Text2 Translation: The Federal High Court in Abuja annulled the candidacy of Andy Uba of APC in the Anambra State governorship election held in November.

Text1: FYADE: Kotu ta yanke wa matashi  mai shekaru 26 hukuncin daurin rai da rai
Text1 Translation: FYADE: The court sentenced a 26-year-old man to life imprisonment
Text2: Kotu ta yanke wa mutumin da ya yi wa ‘yar shekara 17 fyade hukuncin daurin rai da rai
Text2 Translation: The court sentenced the man who raped a 17-year-old girl to life imprisonment

Text1: Bayan sun kama Mamu, SSS sun ce sun samu kakin sojoji da wasu kuɗaɗe a gidan sa.
Text1 Translation: After arresting Mamu, the SSS said they found military uniforms and some money in his house.
Text2: Sun samu nasarar tone nakiyar ce (IED) bayan wasu masu kishi sun gaggauta kai rahoton ganin bam ɗin a ofishin ‘yan sanda.
Text2 Translation: They managed to unearth the IED after some enthusiasts immediately reported the sighting of the bomb to the police station.

Text1: “Ka san da farko cewa ya yi naira miliyan 100 ya ke so a biya shi.
Text1 Translation: "You know first of all that he made 100 million naira and he wants to be paid.
Text2: Majiya ta bayyana cewa masu garkuwa sun nemi a biya su Naira miliyan 60, amma daga baya su ka rage zuwa Naira miliyan 40.
Text2 Translation: The source stated that the kidnappers asked to be paid 60 million Naira, but later they reduced it to 40 million Naira.

Text1: Ɗaya daga cikin Daliget ɗin dake halartar gangamin jam’iyyar APC a Abuja ya yanke jiki ya faɗi a daidai yana kwankwadan shayi da safiyar Talata.
Text1 Translation: One of the Delegates attending the APC rally in Abuja cut his body and fell while he was having tea on Tuesday morning.
Text2: Kwankwaso ya siya fom ɗin ne a ofishin jam’iyyar dake Abuja ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: Kwankwaso bought the form at the party office in Abuja on Tuesday.

Text1: Gwamnatin jihar Sokoto ta rufe Kwalejin Ilimi na Shehu Shagari dake jihar Sokoto.
Text1 Translation: The Sokoto state government has closed the Shehu Shagari College of Education in Sokoto state.
Text2: Gwamnatin jihar Sokoto ta sanar da rufe kwalejin har sai illa mashaAllahu.
Text2 Translation: The Sokoto state government has announced the closure of the college until further notice.

Text1: Gwamnan Jihar Barno Babagana Zulum ya yi je ta’aziyyar mutuwar Burgediya Janar Dzarma Zirkusu, a gidan sa da ke cikin Barikin Sojoji a Kaduna.
Text1 Translation: Barno State Governor Babagana Zulum has condoled the death of Brigadier General Dzarma Zirkusu, at his home in the Army Barracks in Kaduna.
Text2: Mayaƙan Boko Haram ɓangaren ‘yan ISWAP sun kashe Burgediya Janar Dzarma Zirkusu a yankin Ƙaramar Hukumar Askira Uba, cikin Jihar Barno.
Text2 Translation: Boko Haram fighters from ISWAP have killed Brigadier General Dzarma Zirkusu in Askira Uba Local Government Area, Barno State.

Text1: Saboda haka Onuu ya roki kotu ta raba auren haka nan, ya gaji kowa ya kama gaban sa.
Text1 Translation: Therefore, Onuu asked the court to dissolve the marriage like this, he was tired of everyone standing before him.
Text2: Ita kuwa Tolu Mai shekaru 65 ta roki kotu da kada ta raba auren ta saboda tana son mijinta.
Text2 Translation: 65-year-old Tolu asked the court not to dissolve her marriage because she loves her husband.

Text1: ” Yanzu lokaci yayi da muma za mu nuna masa ƙauna mu mara masa baya domin samun nasara a zaɓe mai zuwa.
Text1 Translation: "Now it's time for us to show him love and support him to win the next election.
Text2: Ya ce yanzu a Najeriya PDP kaɗai ce mai jam’iyyar da ta rage, kuma ita za ta lashe zaɓe mai zuwa.
Text2 Translation: He said that PDP is now the only party left in Nigeria, and it will win the next election.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe ‘yan sanda uku a New Haven dake karamar hukumar  Enugu ta Arewa.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have killed three policemen in New Haven, Enugu North Local Government Area.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga wanda ake zargin makiyaya sun kashe mutum 6 a kauyukan Tse Ngojov da Tse Valem Yaweh dake karamar hukumar Logo.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen suspected to be herdsmen killed 6 people in the villages of Tse Ngojov and Tse Valem Yaweh in Logo local government.

Text1: Mafi yawa daga cikin mutanen da aka kashe ‘yan yankin Arewa maso Yamma sai kuma yankin Kudu maso Yammacin kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Most of the people who were killed are from the North-West region and then the South-West region of the country.
Text2: Mafi yawan kisan da aka yi a wannan mako ya auku ne a Arewa maso Yammacin kasar nan sannan da daya a yankin Gabashin kasar.
Text2 Translation: Most of the killings this week took place in the North West of the country and one in the Eastern region of the country.

Text1: Su huɗun su na goyon bayan Wike ne, wanda ya jagorance su bijire wa PDP bayan an tsayar da Atiku takarar shugaban ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: The four of them are supporters of Wike, who led them to defy the PDP after Atiku was nominated for the presidency.
Text2: Wike da wasu gwamnonin PDP huɗu dai su na so Shugaban PDP Iyorchia Ayu ya sauka, a zaɓi ɗan kudu ya riƙe shugabancin jam’iyyar.
Text2 Translation: Wike and four other PDP governors wanted PDP Chairman Iyorchia Ayu to step down and a southerner should be elected to hold the leadership of the party.

Text1: Enoboreya ya tabbatar cewa hukumar za ta kama duk wadanda ke da hannu a harin domin yanke musu hukunci.
Text1 Translation: Enoboreya confirmed that the agency will arrest all those involved in the attack to bring them to justice.
Text2: Ya ce za a maka wadannan mutane kotu domin a yanke musu hukunci da zarar hukumar ta kammala bincike.
Text2 Translation: He said that these people will be brought to court to be sentenced once the commission completes its investigation.

Text1: Wannan na kunshe ne a hukuncin da kotun ta yanke wanda mai shari’a Polycarp Hamman ya karanta ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: This is contained in the decision of the court which was read by Judge Polycarp Hamman on Wednesday.
Text2: A ranar Litini ne alkali Muntari Dandago ya yanke ya Sadiya hukuncin zama a kurkuku na tsawon watanni shida.
Text2 Translation: On Monday, Judge Muntari Dandago sentenced Sadiya to six months in prison.

Text1: Bayan haya kakakin rundunar ‘yan  sandan jihar Tochukwu Ikenga ya tabbatar da aukuwar haka a wani takarda da ya fitar daga ofishinsa.
Text1 Translation: After hiring the spokesperson of the state police force, Tochukwu Ikenga, confirmed the incident in a document he issued from his office.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar ƴan sandan jihar Bauchi Ahmed Wakil ya bayyana cewa an babake gidaje shida da shaguna 7 a rikicin.
Text2 Translation: Bauchi State Police spokesperson Ahmed Wakil said that six houses and seven shops were ransacked in the conflict.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun saki faston cocin Katolika da suka sace bayan an biya miliyoyin naira kuɗin fansa
Text1 Translation: The bandits released the pastor of the Catholic church they kidnapped after millions of naira were paid
Text2: Sama da naira miliyan 20 aka biya ƙudin fansa kafin Ƴan Bindiga suka sake ni – Sarkin Ɓungudu
Text2 Translation: Over 20 million naira was paid as ransom before the Gunmen released me - the King of Bungudu

Text1: ‘Yan sanda sun ce sun fara binciken waɗanda su ka yi kisan domin a kamo su a hukunta su.
Text1 Translation: The police said they have started investigating the killers so that they can be caught and punished.
Text2: Osuji ya ce da ‘yan sanda ke binciken wadannan mata sun ƙasa bada dalilin fitowar su waje a cikin daren da aka kama su.
Text2 Translation: Osuji said that when the police were investigating these women, they failed to give a reason for their going out on the night they were arrested.

Text1: RIKICIN GWAMNATI DA ASUU: Malaman jami’o’i sun yi asarar albashin watanni takwas na yajin aikin su – Ministan Ilmi
Text1 Translation: GOVERNMENT AND ASUU CONFLICT: University teachers have lost eight months of their strike wages - Minister of Education
Text2: Gwamnatin Najeriya ta yanke wa malaman jami’o’i albashin watan da su ka karɓa bayan komawa aiki daga yajin aikin watanni takwas.
Text2 Translation: The Nigerian government has cut the salaries of university teachers for the month they received after returning to work from the eight-month strike.

Text1: A jihar Filato kuwa, Peter Obi ya bi Daraktan Kamfen ɗin Tinubu har gida a Filato, ya kunyata shi.
Text1 Translation: In Plateau State, Peter Obi followed Tinubu's Campaign Director to his house in Plateau and embarrassed him.
Text2: GADANGARƘAMAR NAIRA MILIYAN 702: Kotu ta yanke wa Okupe, Daraktan Kamfen ɗin Peter Obi ɗaurin shekaru biyu a kurkuku
Text2 Translation: 702 MILLION NAIRA SCAM: Court sentences Okupe, Peter Obi's Campaign Director to two years in prison

Text1: Shi dai Bala ya samu ƙuri’u 20 ne kacal a zaɓen fidda gwani na shugaban ƙasa a PDP.
Text1 Translation: Bala only got 20 votes in the PDP presidential primaries.
Text2: A jihar Benuwai, Titus Uba ne ya lashe zaɓen fidda gwani na ƴan takarar gwamnan jihar na PDP.
Text2 Translation: In Benue state, Titus Uba won the primary election of PDP governorship candidates.

Text1: Sai dai kum.akwai ministan Shari’a Abubakar Malami wanda shima da ya fito takarar gwamnan Kebbi amma kuma dalilin wannan sanarwa ya janye.
Text1 Translation: However, there is also the Minister of Shari'a Abubakar Malami who also ran for the Kebbi governorship but because of this announcement he withdrew.
Text2: Malami na takarar ɗarewa kujerar gwamnan Kebbi idan wadin mulkin Abubakar Bagudu ya cika a 2023.
Text2 Translation: Malami is contesting for Kebbi governorship if Abubakar Bagudu's term ends in 2023.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga wanda ake zargin makiyaya sun kashe mutum 6 a kauyukan Tse Ngojov da Tse Valem Yaweh dake karamar hukumar Logo.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen suspected to be herdsmen killed 6 people in the villages of Tse Ngojov and Tse Valem Yaweh in Logo local government.
Text2: Mahara sun kashe mutum 13 a kauyen Karekuka dake karamar hukumar.
Text2 Translation: Attackers killed 13 people in Karekuka village in the local government.

Text1: “A jihar Osun Wike bai goyi bayan Adeleke na  PDP, amma kuma Adeleke dai ne ya yi nasarar zama gwamna.
Text1 Translation: "In Osun state, Wike did not support Adeleke of PDP, but it was Adeleke who succeeded as governor.
Text2: Cikin watanni 12 kacal bayan na zama gwamnan Kaduna, matsalar tsaro zai zamo tarihi a jihar – Isah Ashiru
Text2 Translation: In just 12 months after I became the governor of Kaduna, the security problem will become history in the state - Isah Ashiru

Text1: ASUBANCI: Yahaya Bello ya siya fom din takarar shugaban Kasa na APC
Text1 Translation: MORNING: Yahaya Bello bought the APC presidential nomination form
Text2: Gwamnan jihar Kogi Yahaya Bello ya siya fom din takarar shugaban Kasa na APC.
Text2 Translation: Kogi State Governor Yahaya Bello bought the APC presidential nomination form.

Text1: BARKEWAR KWALARA A AREWA: Kwalara ta kashe mutum 146 cikin mako ɗaya a jihar Kebbi
Text1 Translation: CHOLERA OUTBREAK IN THE NORTH: Cholera has killed 146 people in one week in Kebbi state
Text2: Akalla mutum 146 ne suka rasu a dalilin kamuwa da cutar Amai da Gudawa Kwalara a jihar Kebbi.
Text2 Translation: At least 146 people have died due to Cholera infection in Kebbi state.

Text1: Kwamitin wanda  Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Mamman Tsafe ya shugabanta ya ce an gayyaci sarakunan domin su kare kansu a wajen zaman kwamitin.
Text1 Translation: The committee chaired by Mamman Tsafe State Security Commissioner said the chiefs were invited to defend themselves at the committee meeting.
Text2: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Kaduna Samuel Aruwan ya bayyana cewa Talatar wannan mako ce ta karshe da za a ci kasuwar Kawo dake cikin garin Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan, has stated that Tuesday this week will be the last day that the Kawo market in Kaduna will be closed.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 16 a kauyuka jihar Zamfara
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed 16 people in villages in Zamfara state
Text2: Yadda ƴan bindiga suka kashe mutum 16 suka yi garkuwa da mutane da dama a jihar Taraba
Text2 Translation: How bandits killed 16 people and kidnapped many people in Taraba state

Text1: Gwamnan jihar Yobe Mai Mala Buni ya bayyan cewa ambaliyar ruwa ta hana shiga da fice daga karamar hukumar Gulani zuwa sauran bangarorin jihar.
Text1 Translation: The governor of Yobe state, Mai Mala Buni, has stated that the floods have prevented entry and exit from Gulani local government to other parts of the state.
Text2: Wannan shine na uku da ‘yan bindiga ke Kona hedikwatar wata karamar hukumar a jihar Anambra tun bayan da Charles Soludo ya zama gwamnan jihar.
Text2 Translation: This is the third time that bandits have burnt down the headquarters of a local government in Anambra state since Charles Soludo became the governor of the state.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun Kona ginin hedikwatar karamar hukumar Idemili ta Arewa dake jihar Anambra.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen set fire to the headquarters building of Idemili North Local Government in Anambra State.
Text2: Sannan a ranar 31 ga Maris ‘yan bindiga sun kona hedikwatar karamar hukumar Nnewi.
Text2 Translation: Then on the 31st of March, bandits burnt down the Nnewi local government headquarters.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin yadda Rasha ke ci gaba da mamaye Ukraniya.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the story of how Russia continues to invade Ukraine.
Text2: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin cewa NNPC ta ce ‘Su A.Y Maikifi, Oando da Duke Oil ne su ka shigo da shi daga Belgium’.
Text2 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the story that NNPC said 'A.Y Maikifi, Oando and Duke Oil imported it from Belgium'.

Text1: Rundunar ƴan sanda sun yi kira ga matasa da su kwantar da hankalin su cewa jami’an tsaro na yin bincike akai.
Text1 Translation: The police called on the youth to calm down that the security forces are investigating.
Text2: Ya ce rundunar za ta kai Ehem da mutanen da ya basu kwangilar kashe matarta sa kotu da zarar an kammala yin bincike akai.
Text2 Translation: He said the force will take Ehem and the people he contracted to kill his wife to court once the investigation is completed.

Text1: Danmadami ya ce mahara tare da iyalen su 340 sun mika wuya da a cikin su akwai maza 12, mata 133 da yara 195.
Text1 Translation: Danmadami said that the attackers and their 340 families surrendered, including 12 men, 133 women and 195 children.
Text2: Onyeuko ya ce ‘yan Boko Haram 1,755 sun tuba inda a cikinsu akwai maza 280, mata 523 da yara kanana 952.
Text2 Translation: Onyeuko said 1,755 members of Boko Haram have converted, including 280 men, 523 women and 952 children.

Text1: Ayade ya yi takarar shugaban ƙasa, amma bai yi nasara ba.
Text1 Translation: Ayade ran for the presidency, but did not win.
Text2: “A yanzu na san Atiku Abubakar da gaske neman kujerar shugaban ƙasa, tunda bai tattago Peter Obi mataimakin takarar sa ba.
Text2 Translation: "Now I know Atiku Abubakar is really seeking the presidency, since he did not choose Peter Obi as his running mate.

Text1: Wasu ma’aikatu 15 kuma sun ƙi damƙa wa Gwamnatin Tarayya harajin da su ka tara cikin 2019, har na naira biliyan 127.1.
Text1 Translation: Some 15 ministries also refused to hand over to the Federal Government the taxes they collected in 2019, amounting to 127.1 billion naira.
Text2: “Dama kuma ya miƙa wa Gwamnatin Tarayya Naira miliyan 280, sai wasu Naira miliyan 240 da kuma Naira miliyan 40.
Text2 Translation: "Dama also handed over 280 million Naira to the Federal Government, then some 240 million Naira and 40 million Naira.

Text1: Cikin Nuwamba 2022 ne Kotun Ɗaukaka Ƙara a Abuja ta ƙara tabbatar wa Machina halascin takarar sa ta sanata a zaɓen 2023.
Text1 Translation: In November 2022, the Court of Appeal in Abuja further confirmed Machina's legitimacy to run for senator in the 2023 election.
Text2: Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta Abuja ta soke takarar Andy Uba na APC a zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Anambra da aka gudanar cikin watan Nuwamba.
Text2 Translation: The Federal High Court in Abuja annulled the candidacy of Andy Uba of APC in the Anambra State governorship election held in November.

Text1: Sannan akwai mutum 6 da suka ji rauni a dalilin harin.
Text1 Translation: Then there are 6 people who were injured as a result of the attack.

Text2 Translation: As a result, 11 people died and 8 people were injured.

Text1: Atiku ya janye ƙarar ce a ranar Laraba, bayan da INEC ta bai wa lauyoyin sa damar binciken kayan zaɓe a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Atiku withdrew the complaint on Wednesday, after INEC gave his lawyers the opportunity to inspect the election materials on Tuesday.
Text2: Tawagar ta lauyoyin na LP dai sun ziyarci Hedikwatar INEC ce a ranar Litinin, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: A team of LP lawyers visited the INEC headquarters on Monday in Abuja.

Text1: Ya ce zai gana da CBN da kuma Kamfanin Buga Kuɗaɗe na Najeriya domin a fuskanci gaskiyar lamarin.
Text1 Translation: He said he will meet with the CBN and the Nigerian Currency Printing Corporation to face the facts of the matter.

Text2 Translation: In the end, he said that is why he will sit down with the CBN and the Money Printing Company to find out the truth of the matter.

Text1: Premium Times Hausa ta bada labarin yadda Mahara suka yi garkuwa da Dagacin Banye, yankin Charanci tun a tsakiyar watan Oktoba.
Text1 Translation: Premium Times Hausa told the story of how the raiders kidnapped Dagacin Banye, Charanci area since the middle of October.
Text2: Makonni biyu ne  muka bada labarin yadda mahara su ka hana sallar Asubahi, su ka kashe mutum shida, su ka kwashi mutane a yankin Faskari
Text2 Translation: Two weeks ago, we told the story of how their attackers prevented the Fajr prayer, killed six people, and kidnapped people in the Faskari area.

Text1: Jami’in tsaron ya ce mutumin ya rasu a lokacin da likitoci ke duba shi a asibiti.

Text2 Translation: "Tosin died in the hospital while she was being examined in the hospital.

Text1: ‘Yan bindigan sun yi garkuwa da Uboh ranar Lahadi a cikin gidan sa dake cikin haeavar cocin da misalin karfe bakwai na yamma.
Text1 Translation: The bandits abducted Uboh on Sunday in his house in Haeavar Church at around 7pm.
Text2: Wannan abu dai ya auku ne ranar Lahadi da misalin karfe 2 na dare.
Text2 Translation: This happened on Sunday around 2 pm.

Text1: Cikin 2022 ya tuƙa Keke NAPEP ya na haya a cikin Abeokuta, babban birnin jihar Ogun.
Text1 Translation: In 2022 he drove a NAPEP bike for rent in Abeokuta, the capital of Ogun state.
Text2: Tinubu ya yi wannan jawabi a Fatakwal, babban birnin Jihar Ribas, inda ya kai ziyarar buɗe ayyuka bisa gayyatar Gwamna Nyesom Wike na Jihar.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu made this speech in Fatakwal, the capital of Rivers State, where he paid an opening visit at the invitation of Governor Nyesom Wike of the state.

Text1: “Saboda haka ba su kai yawan da za a ce ai za su iya canja sakamakon zaɓen ba.”
Text1 Translation: "Therefore, they are not enough to say that they can change the outcome of the election."
Text2: Saboda ƙididdiga ta nuna cewa nan da 2050 Najeriya za ta kasance ita ce ta uku wajen yawan al’umma a duniya, bayan Chana da Indiya.
Text2 Translation: Because statistics show that by 2050, Nigeria will be the third most populous country in the world, after China and India.

Text1: Laing ta yi wannan kalamin ne a lokacin da ta ke tattaunawa a gidan talabijin na Channels TV a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Laing made this statement during an interview on Channels TV on Tuesday.
Text2: Shittu da ya yi wannan bayani a lokacin da ake ganawa da shi a gidan talabijin NA AIT, a ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: Shittu made this statement during an interview on NA AIT TV on Thursday.

Text1: Shettima ya ce bai kamata gwamnatin tarayya ta bari ana nuna shirin a tashoshin talbijin ba, saboda ana nuna haɗala, tsiraici da iskanci a ciki.
Text1 Translation: Shettima said that the federal government should not allow the program to be shown on television, because it shows promiscuity, nudity and sex.

Text2 Translation: This type of abuse should not be encouraged by the government or shown to the public.

Text1: Babafemi ya ce mutanen su biyu sun yi bahayan hodar ibilis din bayan sun yi kwanaki uku tsare a hannun hukumar.
Text1 Translation: Babafemi said that the two men made the drug after spending three days in custody in the hands of the agency.

Text2 Translation: The team found the drug of the devil in Nwabueze and locked him up until he escaped from them.

Text1: Lamiɗo ya ce Buhari ya ruguza dukkan ayyukan alherin da PDP ta yi a tsawon shekaru 16 da ta yi mulki.
Text1 Translation: Lamido said that Buhari has destroyed all the good deeds done by the PDP during the 16 years of its rule.
Text2: A ranar Asabar ce Jonathan wanda ya yi mulkin Najeriya tsawon shekaru shida a ƙarƙashin PDP ya cika shekaru 64 a duniya.
Text2 Translation: Jonathan, who ruled Nigeria for six years under the PDP, turned 64 on Saturday.

Text1: Waɗanda aka biya cikin Fabrairu ba su taka kara sun karya ba.” Inji Shugaban NLC na Zamfara.

Text2: Ta ce Saheed na yin korafin akan abin da bai taka kara ya karya ba.
Text2 Translation: She said that Saheed is complaining about what he did not complain about.

Text1: Gwamna Akeredolu ya shawarci Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya umarci Gwamnan Babban Bankin Najeriya, Godwin Emefiele ya gaggauta soke tsarin sauya launin kuɗin da ya ƙirƙiro.
Text1 Translation: Governor Akeredolu has advised President Muhammadu Buhari to order the Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele to immediately cancel the currency change scheme he created.
Text2: Ministar kuɗi, Zainab Ahmed, Gwamnan Babban Bankin Najeriya, Godwin Emiefile, da wasu jigajigan gwamnati ne za su raka Buhari.
Text2 Translation: Minister of Finance, Zainab Ahmed, Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emiefile, and other government officials will accompany Buhari.

Text1: ‘Jami’an tsaron sun cimma maharan a Kwanan Bataro inda suka yi musayan wuta da su har jami’an tsaron suka kashe mutum biyar daga cikinsu.
Text1 Translation: The security forces caught up with the attackers in Kanaan Bataro where they exchanged fire with them until the security forces killed five of them.
Text2: “Jami’an tsaron sun kashe mutum biyu daga cikin maharan kuma sun fatattaki sauran.
Text2 Translation: "The security forces killed two of the attackers and chased away the others.

Text1: Sun yi ganawar ce ta sirri a babban ɗakin taro na Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa, a Abuja,a ranar Litinin.
Text1 Translation: They had a private meeting at the main meeting room of the Presidential Palace, in Abuja, on Monday.
Text2: Diramar mai suna “Emir Sanusi: Truth in Time”, an nuna ta ne da babban ɗakin taro na ‘Yar’Adua Centre, Abuja a ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: The movie titled "Emir Sanusi: Truth in Time", was screened at the Yar'Adua Centre, Abuja on Saturday.

Text1: An kashe mutum sama da 500 tun bayan fara yaƙin Sudan a makon da ya gabata.
Text1 Translation: More than 500 people have been killed since the start of the war in Sudan last week.
Text2: Akalla mutum 16 ne ƴan bindiga suka kashe sannan suka yi garkuwa da wasu mutane da dama a ƙauyukan  jihar Taraba ranar Juma’ar makon jiya.
Text2 Translation: At least 16 people were killed by bandits and abducted many others in the villages of Taraba state on Friday last week.

Text1: Buhari ya buga misali da irin nasarorin da Gwmnatin sa ta samu a yankin Arewa maso Gabas da Kudu masu Kudu.
Text1 Translation: Buhari cited the successes of his government in the North-East and the South.
Text2: “Ka dubi irin harkokin kasuwancin da ake yi a yankin Kudu maso Gabas, ai su ne su ka fi buƙatar jiragen ƙasa ba Maraɗi ba.
Text2 Translation: "Look at the kind of businesses that are being done in the South East region, they are the ones that need trains the most, not Maradi.

Text1: Malami ya bayar da dalilan sa a cikin wata sanarwa da Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran sa Umar Gwandu ya raba wa manema labarai a ranar Alhamis.
Text1 Translation: The teacher gave his reasons in a statement that his Broadcasting Spokesman Umar Gwandu shared with the media on Thursday.

Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the command, Wasiu Abiodun, announced this in a document distributed to the press on Monday.

Text1: “Ruth ta ce a wannan rana Zakari ya yi kokarin kwace mata jaka a hanyar zuwa wurin aiki.
Text1 Translation: "Ruth said that on that day Zakari tried to grab her bag on the way to work.
Text2: “Ruth ta ce Zakari ya kwace mata waya da wasu kayan ta masu daraja.
Text2 Translation: "Ruth said Zakari stole her phone and some of her valuables.

Text1: Bayan fitowar su, Sanata Kalu ya shaida wa manema labarai cewa a yanzu hasalallun sun huce, sun haƙura da canja sheƙa.
Text1 Translation: After their appearance, Senator Kalu told reporters that now the violence has calmed down, they have tolerated the change.
Text2: Bayan ya sayi fom ɗin, sanata Uba ya gana da manema labarai a kafin ya koma gida ya huta
Text2 Translation: After buying the form, Senator Uba met with the media before he went home to rest

Text1: Shugaban Jam’iyyar APC na Ƙasa, Abdullahi Adamu, ya amince da cewa zaɓen ranar 25 ga Fabrairu bai cikakkiyar nagartar da aka so ya yi ba.
Text1 Translation: The National Chairman of the APC, Abdullahi Adamu, has admitted that the February 25 election was not as good as it was intended to be.
Text2: Shugaban INEC ya tabbatar wa ‘yan Nijeriya da duniya cewa za a gudanar da sahihin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a ranar 25 Ga Fabrairu, 2023.
Text2 Translation: The Chairman of INEC has assured Nigerians and the world that a valid presidential election will be held on February 25, 2023.

Text1: Hukumar dakile yaduwar cututtuka ta kasa NCDC ta bayyana cewa mutum 859 sun kara kamuwa da cutar sannan mutum 2 sun mutu ranar Litini.
Text1 Translation: The National Center for Disease Control and Prevention (NCDC) announced that 859 people were infected and 2 people died on Monday.
Text2: Hukumar NCDC ta ce a takanin wadannan ranaku mutum uku ne suka mutu a dalilin kamuwa da cutar.
Text2 Translation: The NCDC said that during these days, three people have died due to infection.

Text1: Da ya koma kan kasafi kuwa, Buhari ya ce bashin da ake bin Najeriya ya kai naira tiriliyan 42.8.
Text1 Translation: Returning to the budget, Buhari said that Nigeria's debt is 42.8 trillion naira.
Text2: Buhari ya ce abin da ake bin Najeriya bashi har zuwa watan Disamba, 2022 naira tiriliyan 39.6.
Text2 Translation: Buhari said that Nigeria's debt until December 2022 is 39.6 trillion naira.

Text1: KASUWAR GWAL A KANO: Najeriya za ta magance asarar dala biliyan 9 da ake yi a haƙar zinari duk shekara
Text1 Translation: GOLD MARKET IN KANO: Nigeria to deal with $9 billion loss in gold mining every year
Text2: Najeriya ta na asarar dala bilyan 9 a duk shekara saboda masu sumogal ɗin.
Text2 Translation: Nigeria loses 9 billion dollars every year because of the smugglers.

Text1: Daga cikin titinan da Fashola ya bayyana, akwai aikin kilomita 13 a kan titin Anacha zuwa Owerri har ya dangana da Nnewi a jihar Anambra.
Text1 Translation: Among the roads that Fashola disclosed, there is a 13 kilometer project on the Anacha road from Owerri to Nnewi in Anambra state.
Text2: Fashola ya ce Gwamnatin Tarayya za ta duba yiwuwar karɓar aikin kwalta mai tsawon kilomita 30 daga Takum zuwa Chanchangi, daga hannun Gwamnatin Jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Fashola said the Federal Government will look into the possibility of receiving the 30km asphalt project from Takum to Chanchangi, from the Taraba State Government.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba, lokacin yaƙin neman zaɓe, sai da Tinubu ya kai wa Wike ziyara a Gidan Gwamnatin Jihar Ribas.
Text1 Translation: If it is not forgotten, during the election campaign, Tinubu had to pay Wike a visit at the Rivers State Government House.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, lokacin da Tinubu ya fito takara, ya miƙa sunan Ibrahim Masari a matsayin ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, when Tinubu ran for office, he submitted the name of Ibrahim Masari as the vice presidential candidate.

Text1: Cikin watan Oktoba ne Kungiyar Likitoci ta Najeriya (NMA) ta ce aƙalla 24,000 ne kaɗai a Najeriya, sauran sun gudu Ingila, Saudiyya da Qatar.
Text1 Translation: In October, the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA) said that at least 24,000 are alone in Nigeria, the rest have fled to England, Saudi Arabia and Qatar.
Text2: Rowland ya ce ƙasar Indiya ce ta fi yawan likitoci baƙi a Ingila, sai Pakistan, sai kuma Najeriya wadda ita ce ta uku.
Text2 Translation: Rowland said that India has the largest number of foreign doctors in England, followed by Pakistan, followed by Nigeria which is the third.

Text1: NRC ta ce zuwa yanzu an ƙara tabbatar da cewa wasu fasinjoji 14 daga cikin waɗanda ake cigiya, lafiyar su ƙalau.
Text1 Translation: The NRC said that so far it has been confirmed that 14 passengers among those who were stranded, are safe.
Text2: “Daga cikin fasinjoji 168 da ake cigiya, an tabbatar da cewa 22 na hannun ‘yan bindiga.
Text2 Translation: "Out of the 168 passengers who were picked up, it was confirmed that 22 were in the hands of bandits.

Text1: Wannan amincewa ta zo ne daidai lokacin da ɗimbin bashi ta ko’ina ya yi wa gwamnatin tarayya katutu.
Text1 Translation: This approval came at the same time that the federal government was hit hard by the huge amount of debt everywhere.

Text2 Translation: This statement of his came at the same time as the Federal Government announced that the 'Omicron' type of corona has developed in Nigeria.

Text1: Rundunar ta ce Ezennaya ya yi wa wadannan mata fashi ranar Talatan da ta gabata a layin  Falolu dake Surulere.
Text1 Translation: The command said that Ezennaya robbed these women last Tuesday at Falolu Street in Surulere.
Text2: Dan sandan da ya shigar da karar ASP Samuel Sule ya ce rundunar ta kama wadannan mutane a ranar biyar ga Oktoba 2020.
Text2 Translation: The police officer who filed the complaint, ASP Samuel Sule, said that the force arrested these people on October 5, 2020.

Text1: Ita Egobeke ta karyata duk abin da Anya ya fadi a kanta a kotu tana mai cewa bata so a raba auren.
Text1 Translation: Egobeke denied everything Anya said about her in court saying that she did not want the marriage to be dissolved.

Text2 Translation: Alhassan said Bilkisu is asking the court to dissolve her marriage with Musa because she no longer loves him as a husband.

Text1: Sarkin kauyen Agodo dake karamar hukumar Ewekoro Ayinde Odetola ya gamu da ajalinsa bayan wasu mutane sun afka fadarsa.
Text1 Translation: The chief of Agodo village in Ewekoro Local Government Area Ayinde Odetola met his death after some people attacked his palace.

Text2 Translation: Adamu said the force arrested these people in Dasin Bwate village in Fufore local government.

Text1: ZALUNCI KO MUGUNTA: Yadda saurayi ya shake budurwarsa sai da ta mutu saboda ta ki zubar da cikin da yayi mata a Kano
Text1 Translation: CRUELTY OR EVIL: How a young man strangled his girlfriend until she died because she refused to abort his pregnancy in Kano
Text2: A hannun jami’an tsaro Ibrahim ya ce ya kashe budurwarsa saboda yadda ta ki amincewa a zubar da cikin da yayi mata na wata biyu.
Text2 Translation: In the hands of the security forces, Ibrahim said that he killed his girlfriend because she refused to have an abortion that he performed on her for two months.

Text1: Hakan ya haifar da Gwamnatin Buhari za ta sauka ta bar bashin naira tiriliyan 23.7  da karɓa ba bisa ƙa’ida ba a CBN.
Text1 Translation: As a result, the Buhari government will step down and leave the debt of 23.7 trillion naira illegally received from the CBN.
Text2: Lokacin da Buhari ya hau mulki a Mayu, 2015, ya taras da bashin naira biliyan 789.7 da gwamnatin baya ta ciwo daga CBN.
Text2 Translation: When Buhari came to power in May, 2015, he had a debt of 789.7 billion naira that the previous government incurred from the CBN.

Text1: Ta ce a cikin Yuli kuwa bashin ya zarce geji da naira tiriliyan 1.26.
Text1 Translation: She said that in July the debt exceeded 1.26 trillion naira.
Text2: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin cewa Buhari ya ce Za a ciwo bashin naira tiriliyan 8:8, don a cike giɓin Kasafin 2023.
Text2 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the story that Buhari said that the debt of 8:8 trillion naira will be reduced to fill the gap in the 2023 budget.

Text1: ‘INKONKULUSIB’: Yadda NNPP ta ƙwace kujerar Majalisar Tarayya  ta Fagge daga hannun APC a Kano
Text1 Translation: 'INKONKULUSIB': How the NNPP wrested the Fagge Federal Assembly seat from the APC in Kano
Text2: Rahotanni daga Kano sun tabbatar da NNPP ta ƙwace kujerar Majalisar Tarayya ta Ƙaramar Hukumar Fagge daga hannun Aminu Goro na APC.
Text2 Translation: Reports from Kano have confirmed that the NNPP has wrested the seat of the Federal Assembly of Fagge Local Government from Aminu Goro of APC.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun dagargaza ginin ofishin ‘yan sanda da bamabamai a Ihiala dake karamar hukumar Ihiala a jihar Anambra.
Text1 Translation: Bandits destroyed the police station building with bombs in Ihiala in Ihiala local government of Anambra state.
Text2: Shugaban hukumar Bamidele Makinde ya sanar da haka da yake zantawa da manema labarai a ofishin hukumar dake Idiroko a karamar hukumar Ipokia.
Text2 Translation: The chairman of the board, Bamidele Makinde, announced this while talking to the media at the board's office in Idiroko, Ipokia local government.

Text1: Babafemi ya ce hukumar ta kama kwalaben ruwan  Akuskura 7,800 daga hannun wani Mohammed Kyari mai shekara 42 dake safarar maganin.
Text1 Translation: Babafemi said the agency seized 7,800 bottles of Akuskura water from a 42-year-old Mohammed Kyari who was transporting the drug.

Text1: Suma mazauna kauyen Gidan Kane sun ce maharan sun ce za su daina kawo musu hari ne idan aka cire jami’an tsaron dake yankin.
Text1 Translation: The residents of Gidan Kane village also said that the attackers said that they will stop attacking them if the security officers in the area are removed.
Text2: Mazauna kauyen Zak dake karamar hukumar Wase sun ce maharan sun afka kauyen su domin kashe kowa a kauyen.
Text2 Translation: Residents of Zak village in Wase local government said the attackers attacked their village to kill everyone in the village.

Text1: An tabbatar da cewa Akanta Janar ya karkatar da naira biliyan 84 ta hannun wani kamfanin tuntuɓa na wani mai suna Gbenga Akindele.
Text1 Translation: It has been confirmed that the Accountant General misappropriated 84 billion naira through a consulting company of a man named Gbenga Akindele.
Text2: “Daga cikin fasinjoji 168 da ake cigiya, an tabbatar da cewa 22 na hannun ‘yan bindiga.
Text2 Translation: "Out of the 168 passengers who were picked up, it was confirmed that 22 were in the hands of bandits.

Text1: Hajiya Bintou ta rasu a wani asibiti a kasar Faransa bayar fama da ta yi da ƴar gajeruwar rashin lafiya.
Text1 Translation: Hajiya Bintou died in a hospital in France after a short illness.
Text2: Adnan ya rasu a ranar Juma’a, bayan ya sha fama da rashin lafiya.
Text2 Translation: Adnan died on Friday, after suffering from illness.

Text1: Bankin CBN ya yi wa IMF raddi, ya ce kashi 52% na waɗanda su ka ci bashin ‘Anchor Borrowers’ sun biya
Text1 Translation: The CBN has responded to the IMF, saying that 52% of the 'Anchor Borrowers' have paid
Text2: Cikin makon jiya ne dai IMF ya ce ‘Shirin Lamunin CBN Ga Manoma shiririta ce, kashi 24% kacal su ka biya bashin’.
Text2 Translation: Last week, the IMF said, 'The CBN Loan Program for Farmers is my plan, only 24% of them have paid the loan'.

Text1: Hyacinth Alia na APC ya lashe zaben gwamnan jihar Benuwai
Text1 Translation: Hyacinth Alia of APC won the Benue state governorship election
Text2: Dan takarar gwamna na jam’iyyar APC Hyacinth Alia ya lashe zaben gwamnan jihar Benuwai.
Text2 Translation: The APC gubernatorial candidate Hyacinth Alia won the Benue state governorship election.

Text1: Kawai kina ta yin abu ba a iya ce miki komai.
Text1 Translation: You're just doing things and you can't be told anything.
Text2: Sannan kuma ke kina da baki ba a iya ce miki komai.
Text2 Translation: And you're speechless and can't say anything to you.

Text1: Babayo Liman kodinatan dan takarar Shugaban kasa na jami’yyar NNPP Rabi’u Ƙwankwaso na jihar Bauchi ya yi watsi da tafiyar ya koma jami’yyar PDP.
Text1 Translation: Babayo Liman, the coordinator of the presidential candidate of NNPP Rabi'u Kwankwaso of Bauchi state has abandoned the trip and joined PDP.
Text2: “Na Kuma sauka daga kujerar kodinatan kamfen din Rabi’u  Ƙwankwaso da matsayina na sakataren jami’yyar na shiyar Arewa maso Gabas.
Text2 Translation: "I have also stepped down from the seat of Rabi'u Kwankwaso's campaign coordinator and from my position as the secretary of the university for the North East zone.

Text1: Buhari ya kirkiro sabbin manyan makarantu biyu a jihar Jigawa
Text1 Translation: Buhari has created two new high schools in Jigawa state
Text2: Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya kirkiro sabbin manyan makarantun gaba da sakandare a jihar Jigawa.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has created new pre-secondary schools in Jigawa state.

Text1: Buhari ya ce abin da ake bin Najeriya bashi har zuwa watan Disamba, 2022 naira tiriliyan 39.6.
Text1 Translation: Buhari said that Nigeria's debt until December 2022 is 39.6 trillion naira.
Text2: Buhari ya ce gwamnatin sa ta biya kuɗaɗen tallafin fetur har naira tiriliyan 1.59 cikin wannan shekarar, tsakanin Janairu zuwa Yuni.
Text2 Translation: Buhari said his government has paid fuel subsidies amounting to 1.59 trillion naira this year, between January and June.

Text1: Shugaban majalisar Kaduna, Honarabul Yusuf Zailani tare da daruruwan ƴan uwa da makusanta sun halarci sallar jana’izar marigayiya Hajiya Maimunatu a Zaria.
Text1 Translation: Kaduna House Speaker, Honorable Yusuf Zailani along with hundreds of relatives and friends attended the funeral prayers of the late Hajiya Maimunatu in Zaria.
Text2: Marigayiya Maimunatu kakace ga Kakakin majalisar Kaduna, Yusuf Zailani.
Text2 Translation: The late Maimunatu spoke to the Speaker of the Kaduna House, Yusuf Zailani.

Text1: Za a kulle jami’o’in ne daga ranar 22 ga Fabrairu zuwa 14 ga Maris, kafin da kuma bayan zaɓe.
Text1 Translation: The universities will be closed from February 22 to March 14, before and after the elections.
Text2: A tsakanin ranar 11 ga Afrilu zuwa ranar 30 ga Yuni kuma za a ci gaba da gudanar da aikin rajistar masu zaɓe.
Text2 Translation: Between April 11 and June 30, voter registration will continue.

Text1: SHUGABANCIN MAJALISAR DATTAWA: Gwamnonin APC sun ce Akpabio ne zaɓin su – Ganduje
Text1 Translation: LEADERSHIP: APC governors say Akpabio is their choice - Ganduje
Text2: SHUGABANCIN MAJALISAR DATTAWA:  Akpabio da zaɓaɓɓun sanatocin APC sun gana da Tinubu a Fatakwal
Text2 Translation: LEADERSHIP LEADERSHIP: Akpabio and elected APC senators meet Tinubu at Fatakwal

Text1: Majalisar ta kuma yi kira ga jami’an tsaro su zaƙulo waɗanda ke karkashe mutane su kama su, domin doka ta hukunta su.
Text1 Translation: The council also called on the security forces to hunt down those who kill people and arrest them, so that the law punishes them.
Text2: Ya ƙara da cewa wasu ɓatagari ne, kuma jami’an tsaro sun Kama wadanda ake zargi, za a hukunta su.
Text2 Translation: He added that some are miscreants, and the security forces arrested the suspects, they will be punished.

Text1: Wike ya bayyana haka a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a Fatakwal.
Text1 Translation: Wike stated this when he was meeting with the press at Fatakwal.
Text2: Ndume ya yi wannan tsokaci a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a ranar Alhamis, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: Ndume made this comment during a press conference on Thursday in Abuja.

Text1: Ya ce rundunar ta gano cewa shahararren mai garkuwa da mutane Ado Aleru ne ya yi garkuwa da wadannan mutane.
Text1 Translation: He said the command found out that the famous kidnapper Ado Aleru had kidnapped these people.
Text2: Ya ce rundunar ta gano cewa ‘yan sumogal na amfani da wadannan ababen hawa suna siyan  fetur domin siyar wa ‘yan bindiga.
Text2 Translation: He said the force found that smugglers were using these vehicles to buy fuel to sell to bandits.

Text1: Bayan haya kakakin rundunar ‘yan  sandan jihar Tochukwu Ikenga ya tabbatar da aukuwar haka a wani takarda da ya fitar daga ofishinsa.
Text1 Translation: After hiring the spokesperson of the state police force, Tochukwu Ikenga, confirmed the incident in a document he issued from his office.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar wanda shine ya tabbatar da aukuwar abin ya ce tuni ‘yan sanda sun damke Munkaila yana tsare hannun su.
Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the state police who confirmed the incident said that the police have already arrested Munkaila and are holding their hands.

Text1: Obasanjo dai na ɗaya daga cikin masu goyon bayan jam’iyyar LP, wadda Peter Obi ne ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na jam’iyyar.
Text1 Translation: Obasanjo is one of the supporters of the LP party, whose presidential candidate is Peter Obi.
Text2: Ta ce Birtaniya ba ta goyon bayan kowane ɗan takara daga cikin masu takarar shugaban ƙasa su 18.
Text2 Translation: She said that the UK does not support any of the 18 presidential candidates.

Text1: Ya kara da cewa Bola Tinubu ne dan takarar sa wanda zai yi wa aiki yake kuma fatan zai yi nasara a zaben dake tafe.
Text1 Translation: He added that Bola Tinubu is his candidate for whom he will work and hopes that he will win in the upcoming election.
Text2: Daga nan ya yi kiran cewa a daina ɗora wa ɗan takarar APC, wato Bola Tinubu laifin gazawar wannan gwamnati.
Text2 Translation: He then called that the APC candidate, Bola Tinubu, should not be blamed for the failure of this government.

Text1: An nuno Tinubu ɗin hannun sa na rawa, ya na cewa,  “wannan ne lokacin da zan zama shugaban ƙasa.”
Text1 Translation: Tinubu was shown his dancing hand and said, "this is the time for me to become the president of the country."
Text2: Bayanin sa ya zo daidai lokacin da ake watsa rahotannin cewa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya fi son Sanata Adamu ya zama shugaban APC na ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: His statement coincided with reports that President Muhammadu Buhari prefers Senator Adamu to become the national chairman of the APC.

Text1: Wani mazaunin garin Haruna shika ya ce an ceto yaran a unguwar Kasuwan Da’a dake Karamar hukumar Zariya.
Text1 Translation: A resident of Haruna Shika said that the children were rescued in Kasuwan Da'a neighborhood in Zaria Local Government.
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe mutum 7 kuma sun babbake gidaje 250 a masarautar Miango dake karamar hukumar Bassa jihar Filato.
Text2 Translation: Bandits killed 7 people and looted 250 houses in Miango Emirate in Bassa Local Government Area of ​​Plateau State.

Text1: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta bayyana cewa za ta yi gagarimin binciken ƙwaƙwaf domin bankaɗo yadda aka shigo da gurɓataccen man fetur a cikin ƙasar nan.
Text1 Translation: The Federal Government has stated that it will conduct a thorough investigation to find out how contaminated fuel was imported into the country.
Text2: Sylva ya ce za a bayyana sunayen kamfanonin da suka shigo da gurɓataccen fetur ɗin, nan ba da daɗewa ba.
Text2 Translation: Sylva said that the names of the companies that imported the contaminated fuel will be revealed soon.

Text1: Kuna ta gargaɗe su cewa kada su kuskura su sake zaɓen shugabannin.
Text1 Translation: You have been warning them that they should not dare to re-elect the leaders.
Text2: Bayan soke zaɓen ɓangaren Ganduje, kotu ta gargaɗe su kada su kuskura su sake wani zaɓe daban.
Text2 Translation: After canceling Ganduje's election, the court warned them not to dare to hold another election.

Text1: NDLEA ta kama hodar ibilis da wasu haramtattun kwayoyi da aka shigo da su Najeriya daga Brazil da Canada
Text1 Translation: The NDLEA seized Ibilis and other illegal drugs imported into Nigeria from Brazil and Canada
Text2: NDLEA ta kama dan Najeriya da ya hadiye kullin hodar ibilis 92 a filin jirgin saman Abuja
Text2 Translation: NDLEA has arrested a Nigerian man who swallowed 92 packets of narcotics at the Abuja airport

Text1: Abdullahi Adamu ya yi gwamna tsawon shekaru takwas, daga 1999 zuwa 2007 a jihar Nasarawa.
Text1 Translation: Abdullahi Adamu served as governor for eight years, from 1999 to 2007 in Nasarawa state.
Text2: Sai kuma Raji Fasshola ya yi shekaru takwas, shi ma a ƙarƙashin AD, daga 2007 zuwa 2015.
Text2 Translation: Then Raji Fasshola spent eight years, also under AD, from 2007 to 2015.

Text1: Kotun ta gurfanar da Isma’ila bisa laifin hada baki da sata.
Text1 Translation: The court prosecuted Isma'ila for conspiracy and theft.
Text2: Kotun ta gurfanar da wadannan mutane bisa laifin hada baki da korar dan haya ta karfi da tsiya.
Text2 Translation: The court prosecuted these people for conspiring to evict a tenant by force.

Text1: Ya ce shi ba zai tsaya sake wani zaɓen fidda gwani ba, ko ma da jam’iyya ta ce a sake ɗin.
Text1 Translation: He said that he will not stand for another primary election, even if the party asks for it to be held again.
Text2: Amaechi ya ce ” Ina taya ka murnar nasarar da ka samu a zaɓen fidda gwani na shugaban kasa da aka kammala ranar Laraba.
Text2 Translation: Amaechi said, "I congratulate you on your victory in the presidential primaries that concluded on Wednesday.

Text1: “Mu fa har yanzu ba mu amince da Tinubu a matsayin shugaban ƙasa mai jiran gado ba.
Text1 Translation: "We still do not accept Tinubu as the next president.
Text2: “Ba don ni da na tsaya bayan Buhari ba, da bai zama shugaban ƙasa ba.” Haka Tinubu ya furta a wurin.
Text2 Translation: "If I had not stood behind Buhari, he would not have become the president." That's what Tinubu said there.

Text1: Rashin kula, shan duka suka sa nake so a raba ni da mijina – Tawakalitu a Kotu
Text1 Translation: Negligence, abuse made me want to be separated from my husband - Tawakalitu in Court
Text2: Ina rokon kotu ta raba aure na da Yusuf kada wata rana ya kashe ni da duka – Ramatu a Kotu
Text2 Translation: I am asking the court to dissolve my marriage with Yusuf so that one day he will kill me and beat me - Ramatu in Court

Text1: Akalla mutum 20 ne ‘yan bindiga suka kashe daga ranakun 26 ga Disambar 2021 zuwa 1 ga Janairu 2022.
Text1 Translation: At least 20 people were killed by bandits from December 26, 2021 to January 1, 2022.
Text2: Zuwa yanzu samfurin Delta ce ta fi yaduwa a Najeriya inda a ranar 20 ga Disambar 2021 mutum 2,237 suke ɗauke da ita.
Text2 Translation: So far, Delta is the most popular model in Nigeria where on December 20, 2021, 2,237 people are carrying it.

Text1: Hukumar Tsaro na DSS ta ja hankalin mazauna Babban Birnin Tarayya Abuja cewa kowa ya ci gaba da gudanar da harkokin sa, kuma ya natsu.
Text1 Translation: The DSS security agency has appealed to the residents of the Federal Capital, Abuja, that everyone should go about their business and remain calm.
Text2: Hukumar  babban birnin tarayya Abuja ta garkame wasu ma’aikatu a Abuja  a dalilin tulin bashi da take binsu.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Capital Authority, Abuja, has arrested some ministries in Abuja because of the pile of debt it owes them.

Text1: A kasashin dai Gwamnatin Tarayya za ta ciwo bashin naira tiriliyan 8.27, kuma za ta biya bashin naira tiriliyan 6.31.
Text1 Translation: In the country, the Federal Government will incur a debt of 8.27 trillion naira, and will pay the debt of 6.31 trillion naira.
Text2: Wanda za a ɗauka a matakin Level 8 na ma’aikacin gwamnatin tarayya, zai biya naira 800,000.
Text2 Translation: The person who will be hired at Level 8 of the federal government employee, will pay 800,000 naira.

Text1: Onu ya ce matarsa bata da dabaran yadda za ta iya tafiyar da harkokin cikin gidanta yadda ya kamata a matsayinta na matar aure.
Text1 Translation: Onu said that his wife does not know how to manage her household properly as a married woman.
Text2: “Kamata ya yi a ce Ma’aikatar Kasuwanci da Zuba Jari ce za ta tafiyar da raba tallafin Ƙanana Da Matsakaitan Masana’antu (MSME), ba CBN.
Text2 Translation: “It should be said that the Ministry of Trade and Investment will manage the allocation of support to Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME), not the CBN.

Text1: Gwamna Lalong ya roƙi Fulanin Ondo da Gwamnatin jihar su yafe kisan da ɓatagari su ka yi wa matafiya a Jos
Text1 Translation: Governor Lalong has appealed to the Ondo Fulani and the state government to forgive the killing of travelers in Jos by their bandits
Text2: Lalong ya shaida wa Gwamnatin Ondo da Fulanin cewa ba da yawun Gwamnantin Filato ko al’ummar jihar aka kashe Fulanin ba.
Text2 Translation: Lalong told the Ondo Government and the Fulanis that the Fulanis were killed not by the people of Plateau Governorate or the people of the state.

Text1: Lokacin da Adamu ke Gwamnan Nasarawa a matsayin ɗan PDP, shi ne Shugaban Ƙungiyar Gwamnonin Najeriya (NGF),
Text1 Translation: When Adamu was the Governor of Nasarawa as a member of the PDP, he was the Chairman of the Nigerian Governors Federation (NGF).
Text2: A wannan lokacin an zabi Chief Olusegun Obasanjo 1999 a matsayin shugaban kasa.
Text2 Translation: At this time, Chief Olusegun Obasanjo was elected in 1999 as the president.

Text1: Tunanin da ake yi cewa zai kwashi miliyoyin ƙuri’u a ɓagas, zaɓen Osun ya nuna ba haka siyasar za ta kasance ba.
Text1 Translation: It is thought that he will win millions of votes, the Osun election shows that politics will not be like that.
Text2: “Idan ku ka duba, za ku ga cewa ba a yi wa Kawu Sumaila adalci a zaɓen 2019 ba.
Text2 Translation: "If you look, you will see that Uncle Sumaila was not treated fairly in the 2019 election.

Text1: Shugaban ƙasa Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa wanda zai mika wa mulki a 2023, mutum ne wanda ƴan Najeriya suka zaɓa.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has stated that the person who will hand over power in 2023 is a person chosen by Nigerians.
Text2: Shugaban kamfanin na Abuja, Iyobosa Uwugiaren Iyobosa ya bayyana cewa tuni sun sanar wa rundunar ƴan sanda dake Jabi domin bin a bi sawun su.
Text2 Translation: The CEO of the company in Abuja, Iyobosa Uwugiaren Iyobosa stated that they have already informed the police force in Jabi to follow their footsteps.

Text1: RAWA MA DA RANAR TA: An rantsar da gwanin rawa Adeleke Gwamnan Osun, har ya kulle dukkan asusun ajiyar gwamnatin jihar zai yi bincike
Text1 Translation: DANCING TO DANCING: Osun Governor Adeleke has been sworn in as a dancer, and he has locked all the accounts of the state government and will investigate
Text2: Jim kaɗan bayan rantsar da shi, Adeleke ya bayyana cewa ya kulle dukkan asusun gwamnatin Jihar Osun, kada wanda ya ƙara kashe ko sisi.
Text2 Translation: Shortly after his swearing-in, Adeleke announced that he has locked all the accounts of the Osun State government, so that no one spends any more.

Text1: Hakan ya nuna farashin shiga takarar Shugaban Ƙasa a 2023, ya nunƙa na shekarar 2015 kusan da kashi 300%.
Text1 Translation: This shows that the cost of participating in the presidential race in 2023, compared to 2015, is almost 300%.
Text2: Kusan farashin komai na abinci ya nunka daga hawan Buhari a 2015 zuwa yau.
Text2 Translation: The price of almost everything for food has increased from the rise of Buhari in 2015 to today.

Text1: Sake fantsamar cutar korona a Turai, Rasha da Chana ta fara karya farashin gangar ɗanyen mai a duniya
Text1 Translation: The re-emergence of the corona virus in Europe, Russia and China has started to break the price of crude oil in the world
Text2: Haka kuwa ya faru ne saboda sake fantsamar cutar korona a ƙasashen Turai ta Yamma, Rasha da kuma wasu sassan yankunan Chana.
Text2 Translation: The same happened because of the spread of the corona virus in Western Europe, Russia and some parts of China.

Text1: Adam ya ce rundunar za ta kai Muhammad kotu bayan ta gama bincike.
Text1 Translation: Adam said that the force will take Muhammad to court after completing the investigation.
Text2: Ya ce Mohammed da Sadiya na tsare a ofishinsu sannan za a kai su kotu da zaran rundunar ta kammala yin bincike.
Text2 Translation: He said that Mohammed and Sadiya are detained in their office and will be taken to court as soon as the force completes its investigation.

Text1: Su biyun dai Bola Tinubu ne na APC INEC ta bayyana cewa ya yi nasara a kan su.
Text1 Translation: Both of them are Bola Tinubu of APC, INEC has declared that he has won against them.
Text2: Ya kara da cewa Bola Tinubu ne dan takarar sa wanda zai yi wa aiki yake kuma fatan zai yi nasara a zaben dake tafe.
Text2 Translation: He added that Bola Tinubu is his candidate for whom he will work and hopes that he will win in the upcoming election.

Text1: Mai Shari’a ya ce EFCC ta gabatar masa hujjojin da kotu ta yi watsi da su a baya.
Text1 Translation: The Judge said that the EFCC presented him with evidence that the court had previously ignored.
Text2: Lauya Olujimi ya ce EFCC ta yi ƙoƙarin yin sumogal ɗin shaidun da kotu ta yi watsi da su a baya.
Text2 Translation: Lawyer Olujimi said that the EFCC tried to smuggle the evidence that the court had previously rejected.

Text1: Dan sandan da ya shigar da kara a kotu E. O. Adaraloye ya ce rundunar ta kama Moyosoreoluwa bisa ga laifin sata da lalata wuri.
Text1 Translation: The police officer who filed the case in court E. O. Adaraloye said the force arrested Moyosoreoluwa for theft and vandalism.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Legas ta kama Ifeanyi Ezennaya mai shekaru 36 da laifin sace wa mata shida wayoyin hannu su a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The Lagos State Police has arrested 36-year-old Ifeanyi Ezennaya for stealing the mobile phones of six women in the state.

Text1: CIKIN SHEKARU SHIDA: Yadda Buhari ya shafe fiye da kwanaki 200 wurin ganin likita a Landan
Text1 Translation: IN SIX YEARS: How Buhari spent more than 200 days seeing a doctor in London
Text2: Daga hawan sa mulki zuwa ƙarshen watan Yuli 2021, Buhari ya kwashe kwanaki fiye da 200 a Landan wajen ganin likitocin sa.
Text2 Translation: From his assumption of power to the end of July 2021, Buhari spent more than 200 days in London to see his doctors.

Text1: “Ai wata rana za su buɗe asusun banki ko mallakar lambobin waya.
Text1 Translation: "One day they will open bank accounts or own phone numbers.
Text2: Ita lambar BVN, sai idan ka buɗe asusun ajiya a banki za ka iya mallakar ta.
Text2 Translation: It is BVN number, only if you open a bank account you can own it.

Text1: A wannan rana kuma alkalin kotun ya yanke wa wani mai sana’a irin na Tosin, Tunde Adejuwon shima hukuncin sharar kotu na tsawon watanni biyar.
Text1 Translation: On the same day, the judge sentenced a businessman like Tosin, Tunde Adejuwon, to be a waste of court for five months.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba kotu a Kaduna ta yanke hukuncin shari’ar Elzakzaky da ake ta kai komo akai shekaru sama da biyar.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, the court in Kaduna has decided the case of Elzakzaky which has been going back and forth for more than five years.

Text1: Mataimakin Shugaban Majalisa Musa Bawa ne ya miƙa tulin takardun bayanan da ke ƙunshe da laifuka da buƙatun tsige Mataimakin Gwamna.
Text1 Translation: The Deputy Speaker of Parliament Musa Bawa handed over the pile of documents containing the crimes and demands for the impeachment of the Deputy Governor.
Text2: Bawa wanda kuma shi ne Shugaban Kwamitin ya nemi a tsige Mahdi daga kujerar sa ta mataimakin gwamna.
Text2 Translation: Bawa, who is also the Chairman of the Committee, asked to remove Mahdi from his position as deputy governor.

Text1: Ƴan sanda sun kama Gaddafi da ya kashe kishiyar mahaifiyar sa da ‘Sukodireba’ ya haɗa da ƴar ta ya kashe a Kano
Text1 Translation: Police arrested Gaddafi who killed his mother's rival 'Sukodireba' and killed her daughter in Kano
Text2: Ƴan sanda sun kama direban dake haɗa baki da ƴan fashi suna yi wa mutane sata a Jigawa
Text2 Translation: The police have arrested the driver who conspired with robbers to steal from people in Jigawa

Text1: A ƙarshen makon da ya gabata ne dai Atiku ya ce ya na maraba da tayin sulhun da rundunar Wike ta nemi a yi.
Text1 Translation: At the end of last week, Atiku said that he welcomes the reconciliation offer that Wike's command asked for.
Text2: A ƙarshen shekarar 2020, NBS ta ce kashi 33.3 na ‘yan Najeriya masu ƙarfin iya yin aiki, ba su da aikin yi.
Text2 Translation: At the end of 2020, NBS said that 33.3 percent of Nigerians who are able to work, are unemployed.

Text1: Hakan na nufin INEC ba za ta iya tura ma’aikatan ta a yi zaɓe a irin waɗannan wuraren ba.” Inji shi.
Text1 Translation: This means that INEC cannot send its staff to conduct elections in such places." He said.
Text2: “Amma INEC na ta nanata cewa wai za ta shirya zaɓe a dukkan ƙananan hukumomi 774 na faɗin ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: "But INEC has insisted that it will organize elections in all 774 local governments across the country.

Text1: Wani mazaunin kauyen Gidan Kane ya ce ‘yan bindiga sun kashe mutane uku a wasu kauyuka a daren Lahadin da ya gabata.
Text1 Translation: A resident of Gidan Kane village said that bandits killed three people in other villages last Sunday night.
Text2: Onyeuko ya ce sojojin sun kashe kwamandan Boko Haram Abubakar Sarki da wasu mabiyansa a dajin Sambisa dake kauyen Yuwe a karamar hukumar Konduga.
Text2 Translation: Onyeuko said the soldiers killed the Boko Haram commander Abubakar Sarki and some of his followers in Sambisa forest in Yuwe village in Konduga local government.

Text1: Kafofin yada labarai a Kano irin su Freedom Radio da Sahelian Times duk sun buga labarin dakatarwar.
Text1 Translation: Media in Kano such as Freedom Radio and Sahelian Times all published the news of the suspension.
Text2: Babu wata sahihiyar kafar yada labarai da ta buga irin wannan labarin a kasar.

Text1: ” Idan har ba a baiwa wanda muke so ba, ba zan zaɓi jam’iyyar APC ba a zabe mai zuwa.
Text1 Translation: "If the person we want is not given, I will not vote for APC in the next election.
Text2: Sanata Abbo Elisha wanda dan jam’iyyar APC ne ya ce ba zai bi Tinubu ba a zabe mai zuwa.
Text2 Translation: Senator Abbo Elisha who is a member of the APC said he will not follow Tinubu in the next election.

Text1: RIKICIN GWAMNATI DA ASUU: Malaman jami’o’i sun yi asarar albashin watanni takwas na yajin aikin su – Ministan Ilmi
Text1 Translation: GOVERNMENT AND ASUU CONFLICT: University teachers have lost eight months of their strike wages - Minister of Education
Text2: An dai shafe watanni biyar kwanan malaman jami’o’i na yajin aiki, wanda su ka fara tun a ranar 14 Ga Fabrairu.
Text2 Translation: It has been five months since university teachers went on strike, which started on February 14.

Text1: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta ɗora laifin ƙaruwar fatara, talauci da ƙuncin rayuwar da ‘yan Najeriya ke fuskanta a kan gwamnonin jihohi.
Text1 Translation: The Federal Government has laid the blame for the increase in poverty, poverty and hardships faced by Nigerians on state governors.
Text2: Gwamnatin Najeriya ta ɗora laifin a kan ƙarancin gas ne ke yawan haddasa jefa ilahirin biranen ƙasar nan cikin duhu.
Text2 Translation: The Nigerian government blames it on the lack of gas that often causes the cities of the country to be in darkness.

Text1: Hakan ya nuna farashin shiga takarar Shugaban Ƙasa a 2023, ya nunƙa na shekarar 2015 kusan da kashi 300%.
Text1 Translation: This shows that the cost of participating in the presidential race in 2023, compared to 2015, is almost 300%.
Text2: Hakan na nufin ya tashi da kashi 91 bisa 100, bayan ya yi ƙasa zuwa dala 1,740 a cikin watan da ya gabata.
Text2 Translation: That means it rose 91 percent, after dropping to $1,740 in the previous month.

Text1: Laifin da matan suka aikata ya saba wa dokar hukunta masu aikata laifuka na jihar Legas na shekarar 2015 sashe na 287 da 411.
Text1 Translation: The crime committed by the women is against the Criminal Code of Lagos State of 2015 section 287 and 411.
Text2: Ya ce laifin da Onyega ya aikata ya saba wa dokar hukunta masu aikata miyagun aiyukka ta shekara 2015 ta jihar Legas.
Text2 Translation: He said that Onyega's crime was against the 2015 Penalty Act of Lagos State.

Text1: Wani ƙabilar Igbo da ya haifi ‘ya’ya 300, ya mutu bayan ya auri mata 59
Text1 Translation: An Igbo man who fathered 300 children, died after marrying 59 women
Text2: Wani ɗan ƙabilar Igbo mai suna Simon Odo, ya mutu bayan ya haifi ‘ya’ya sama da 300 daga mata 59 da ya aura.
Text2 Translation: An Igbo man named Simon Odo died after fathering more than 300 children from 59 wives he married.

Text1: Volodymyr Zelenskyy ya ce ƙin shata wannan gargaɗin ya sa Rashawa na samun galaba sosai a kan ƙasar ta.
Text1 Translation: Volodymyr Zelenskyy said that refusing to sign this warning made the Russians gain a lot of power over their country.
Text2: A cikin wata sanarwa, Gwamnatin Tarayya ta ce ta na sane da ƙalubalen tsaro a ƙasar nan, kuma ta na bakin ƙoƙarin ta.
Text2 Translation: In a statement, the Federal Government said that it is aware of the security challenges in this country, and it is ready to do its best.

Text1: An fara gwabzawa ne tun a daren Talata ya kai har safiyar Laraba ana balla tsakanin abokan zaman biyu.
Text1 Translation: The fight started on Tuesday night and lasted until Wednesday morning between the two partners.
Text2: Bayan haka an gano ashe ba tun yanzu ba ƴan uwan biyu suna zaman doya da manja ne a tsakanin su.
Text2 Translation: After that, it was discovered that the two cousins ​​are not living with each other.

Text1: Tuni dai Wike ya bayyana cewa yau Laraba ranar hutu ce, kuma ya yi kira ga jama’a a fito a yi tururuwar tarbar Tinubu
Text1 Translation: Wike has already declared that today Wednesday is a day off, and he called on the public to come out and welcome Tinubu.
Text2: A ranar Laraba ce Tinubu ya bayyana haka a wurin kamfen a Enugu.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu said this on Wednesday at a campaign rally in Enugu.

Text1: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Ogun ta kama Michael Ogundele mai shekara 30 da ake zargin bindige  saurayin budurwarsa Tobi Olabisi.
Text1 Translation: The Ogun State Police has arrested 30-year-old Michael Ogundele who allegedly shot his girlfriend's boyfriend, Tobi Olabisi.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Anambra ta kama Sunday Nwadiagha mai shekara 30 da laifin yi wa tsohuwa mai shekaru 75 fyade.
Text2 Translation: Anambra State Police has arrested 30-year-old Sunday Nwadiagha for raping a 75-year-old woman.

Text1: To ku sani albashi ke cinye kashi 80 bisa 100  na kasafin kuɗin Sojojin Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: You should know that salaries consume 80 percent of the budget of the Nigerian Army.
Text2: Kenan an yi ƙarin kashi 29 bisa 100 na kuɗin jarabawar fita sakandare kenan.
Text2 Translation: Kenan has been increased by 29 percent of the cost of the high school exit exam.

Text1: RIGIMAR SHUGABANCIN MAJALISA: Zaɓaɓɓun gamayyar jam’iyyun adawa sun kafa kwamitin fito da ɗan takara ɗaya tilo
Text1 Translation: CONFLICT OF ASSEMBLY LEADERSHIP: Elected coalition of opposition parties formed a committee to nominate a single candidate
Text2: Haka kuma a jihar Bauchi, ɗan takara ɗaya tilo da ya fito takarar kujerar gwamnan jihar Ibrahim Kashim ne aka zaba ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar.
Text2 Translation: Also in Bauchi state, the only candidate who ran for the governorship of the state, Ibrahim Kashim, was elected as the candidate for the governorship of the state.

Text1: Babban sakataren ma’aikatar aiyukkan cikin gida Shuaib Belgore ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ya fitar ranar Laraba a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Home Affairs Shuaib Belgore announced this in a document he issued on Wednesday in Abuja.
