Text2 Translation: The head of this department, Shehu Ahmad, announced this at a press conference on Wednesday in Abuja.

Text1: Hakan ya nuna cewa kasar ta samu ragowa a yawan kisar mutanen da ‘yan bindiga ke yi.
Text1 Translation: This shows that the country has reduced the number of people killed by bandits.
Text2: Bincike ya nuna cewa mutanen sun yi sama da kwanaki 60 a hannun ‘yan bindiga sannan sun sato su daga kauyuka 3.
Text2 Translation: Research shows that the people spent more than 60 days in the hands of bandits and stole them from 3 villages.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun sace sama da mutum 20 a unguwar Gimbiya dake Sabon Tasha, Kaduna
Text1 Translation: Bandits kidnapped more than 20 people in Gimbiya neighborhood in Sabon Tasha, Kaduna
Text2: Idan ba a ranar 31 ga watan Oktoba 2021 ‘yan bindiga sun sace mutum 70 a cocin Emmanuel Baptist dake kauyen Kakau Daji.
Text2 Translation: If not on October 31, 2021, bandits kidnapped 70 people at Emmanuel Baptist Church in Kakau Daji village.

Text1: Haka kuma ya hana na dukkan ƙananan hukumomin Jihar Legas, wadda ke ƙarƙashin jam”iyyar AD a lokacin.
Text1 Translation: He also banned all local governments in Lagos State, which was under the AD party at the time.
Text2: Ɗan Majalisar Tarayya mai wakiltar Ƙananan Hukumomin Sandamu/Daura/Mai’aduwa, Fatuhu Muhammad, ya yi barazanar tarwatsa jam’iyyar su APC, a Jihar Katsina.
Text2 Translation: The member of the Federal Assembly representing Sandamu/Daura/Maiaduwa Local Government, Fatuhu Muhammad, has threatened to disband their party, APC, in Katsina State.

Text1: An yi garkuwa da ɗan takarar mataimakin gwamnan Jihar Cross River na jam’iyyar YPP, Agbor Onyi.
Text1 Translation: The deputy governorship candidate of Cross River State of YPP, Agbor Onyi, has been kidnapped.
Text2: Hakan ya tabbatar da takarar Uba cewa shine sahihin ɗan takarar gwamna na Jam’iyyar APC a jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: This confirms Uba's candidacy that he is the authentic governorship candidate of the APC in Kaduna state.

Text1: Majalisar ta kuma yi kira ga jami’an tsaro su zaƙulo waɗanda ke karkashe mutane su kama su, domin doka ta hukunta su.
Text1 Translation: The council also called on the security forces to hunt down those who kill people and arrest them, so that the law punishes them.
Text2: Malison ya yi kira ga gwamnati da ta aiko da ƙarin zaratan jami’an tsaro domin kare rayukan da dukiyoyin mutane a masarautar su.
Text2 Translation: Malison called on the government to send more security forces to protect the lives and property of people in their kingdom.

Text1: Okiro ya bayyana haka a wani taron  Mashahuran Mutanen da Tinubu ya yi wa Alfarma masu goyon bayan Takarar Tinubu/Shettima 2023.
Text1 Translation: Okiro stated this at a meeting of celebrities held by Tinubu for the supporters of the Tinubu/Shettima 2023 candidacy.
Text2: “Lokacin da Tinubu ya ƙi goyon bayan takarar Obasanjo a 2003, ba a kira shi maci amanar jinsin Yarabawa ba ko maci amanar Afenifere.
Text2 Translation: "When Tinubu refused to support Obasanjo's candidacy in 2003, he was not called a traitor to the Yoruba race or a traitor to the Afenifere.

Text1: “Mu na gode wa Gwamnatin Tarayya saboda nasarar da aka samu a aikin ceto ‘yan Nijeriyar da ke Sudan.
Text1 Translation: "We thank the Federal Government for the success achieved in the rescue of Nigerians in Sudan.
Text2: Saboda naira biliyan 219 su ne kashi 5% na adadin kuɗaɗen shigar da gwamnatin tarayya ta samu a shekarar 2021.
Text2 Translation: Because 219 billion naira is 5% of the federal government's revenue in 2021.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe jami’in hukumar NDLEA a harin da suka kai ofishin hukumar dake jihar Ebonyi ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed an officer of the NDLEA in an attack on the agency's office in Ebonyi state on Tuesday.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun harbe mutum daya cikin jami’an hukumar NDLEA dake aiki a hanyar Enugu zuwa Abakaliki ranar Lahadin da ya gabata a jihar Ebonyi.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen shot dead one of the NDLEA officers working on the Enugu to Abakaliki road last Sunday in Ebonyi state.

Text1: Akalla mutum 21 ne suka rasa rayukansu a cikin makon jiya a Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: At least 21 people lost their lives last week in Nigeria.
Text2: Mutum uku ne suka rasa rayukansu a wani harin da ‘yan bindiga suka kai a tashar motoci dake jihar Delta ranar Alhamis din makon jiya.
Text2 Translation: Three people lost their lives in an attack by bandits at a bus station in Delta state on Thursday last week.

Text1: Lekia da kungiyar sa sun rika aikata wannan ta’asa ne a kauyen Okwali dake karamar hukumar Khana.
Text1 Translation: Lekia and his group used to commit this atrocity in Okwali village in Khana local government.
Text2: Okasanmi ya ce wannan abin takaicin ya auku a kauyen Dutse Gogo dake karamar hukumar Kaiama.
Text2 Translation: Okasanmi said this unfortunate incident happened in Dutse Gogo village in Kaiama local government.

Text1: “Zuwa yanzu mutum 5,518 dake dauke da cutar na amsar magani inda daga ciki mutum 5,192 sun warke.
Text1 Translation: "So far, 5,518 people with the disease are responding to treatment, out of which 5,192 people have recovered.
Text2: Zuwa yanzu mutum 238,420 suka kamu, an sallami mutum 212,770 sannan akwai mutum 21,989 dake dauke da cutar.
Text2 Translation: So far 238,420 people have been infected, 212,770 people have been discharged and there are 21,989 people with the disease.

Text1: Kotun majistare dake Iyaganku ta gurfanar da dan bautan kasa mai suna Ukanwa Ikechukwu ranar Juma’a bisa laifin damfaran wata ‘yar sanda naira 235,000.
Text1 Translation: The Magistrate's Court in Iyaganku prosecuted a national servant named Ukanwa Ikechukwu on Friday for defrauding a policewoman of 235,000 naira.
Text2: A ranar Juma’a ne kotun majistare dake Iyaganku jihar Oyo ta gurfanar da wasu matasa biyu da da laifin sace fiffike da kundun kaza.
Text2 Translation: On Friday, the Magistrate's Court in Iyaganku, Oyo State, prosecuted two youths for stealing wings and chicken wings.

Text1: Ya ce maharan sun fara kai hari a kauyen Ungwan Fada sannan suka gangaro zuwa Ungwan Turawa da Ungwan Makama sannan suka afka kauyen Rubu.
Text1 Translation: He said the attackers first attacked Ungwan Fada village and then went down to Ungwan Turawa and Ungwan Makama and then attacked Rubu village.
Text2: “Maharan sun  saka wa kauyen harajin Naira 2,500 akan kwani gida sannan za a hada kudin daga ranar Alhamis zuwa Litini wato yau.
Text2 Translation: "The attackers have taxed the village 2,500 naira per house and the money will be collected from Thursday to Monday that is today.

Text1: “Babu sauran soyayya ko zaman aure tsakani na da Zainab sho yasa nake so a raba auren mu.
Text1 Translation: "There is no more love or marriage between me and Zainab, that's why I want to break up our marriage.
Text2: “Na gano cewa Isyaku baya girmama iyayen matarsa  hakan ya sa nake so a raba auren.
Text2 Translation: "I found out that Isyaku does not respect his wife's parents, that's why I want to divorce the marriage.

Text1: Wancan bayani da Lai ya yi a ranar Laraba, a lokacin ya na Washington DC, Amurka.
Text1 Translation: That statement that Lai made on Wednesday, at that time he was in Washington DC, USA.
Text2: Shittu da ya yi wannan bayani a lokacin da ake ganawa da shi a gidan talabijin NA AIT, a ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: Shittu made this statement during an interview on NA AIT TV on Thursday.

Text1: Mazauna yankin sun ƙara da cewa maharan sun kwashi mutane da dama ciki har da ‘yan Chana, su ka arce da su a ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: Residents of the area added that the attackers took many people, including the Chana people, and killed them on Wednesday.
Text2: Mazauna karamar hukumar sun tabbatar cewa ‘yan bindigan sun yi garkuwa da mutane da dama inda a ciki akwai mata biyu.
Text2 Translation: Residents of the local government have confirmed that the bandits have kidnapped many people including two women.

Text1: TAƘADDAMAR ‘FARFESA’ PANTAMI: Tsoffin Ɗaliban FUTO sun ce ba a bi matakin da ya dace aka bai wa Pantami farfesa ba
Text1 Translation: PANTAMI'S 'PROFESSOR' CERTIFICATE: Former FUTO students say that due process was not followed when Pantami was given a professorship
Text2: “Mu tsoffin ɗaliban FUTO mun ƙara nanata matsayin mu cewa farfesan da aka bai wa Minista Isa Pantami, bai dace ba.
Text2 Translation: "We former students of FUTO reiterate our position that the professor given to Minister Isa Pantami is not appropriate.

Text1: ” Wannan Shari’a ba nan bane huruminta, rashin jituwa ce ta jam’iyya, domin ba akai ga za a ce wai kotu ta saka baki ba.
Text1 Translation: "This Sharia is not within its jurisdiction, it is a disagreement between the parties, because it will not be said that the court intervened.
Text2: Amma kuma daga baya sai ya ce ba zai tsoma baki a lamarin da ke gaban kotu ba.
Text2 Translation: But later he said that he will not interfere in the case before the court.

Text1: A lokaci da dama matsalar rashin nuna godiya na daga cikin dalilan da ya sa mata ke ficewa daga  gidajen auren su.
Text1 Translation: In many cases, the problem of not showing gratitude is one of the reasons why women leave their marriages.
Text2: “Akwai kuma matsalar ma’aikatan PYRAMIDT, waɗanda aka kwashe shekaru da dama a na yin ƙwallo da su.
Text2 Translation: "There is also the problem of PYRAMIDT employees, who have been playing with them for many years.

Text1: Daidai lokacin ne kuma ɗan takarar gwamnan PDP a Jigawa ya fatattaki Gwamna Badaru saboda watsi da waɗanda ambaliya ya yi wa ta’adi.
Text1 Translation: It was the same time that the PDP gubernatorial candidate in Jigawa defeated Governor Badaru for neglecting those affected by the floods.
Text2: Gwamna Muhammad Badaru na Jigawa ya bayyana cewa ba zai iya tsayawa takarar shugaban ƙasa shi da Rotimi Amaechi a ƙarƙashin APC ba.
Text2 Translation: Governor Muhammad Badaru of Jigawa has stated that he cannot contest for the presidency with Rotimi Amaechi under the APC.

Text1: Sakataren Gwamnatin Jihar Bauchi Ibrahim Kashim ya lashe takarar Gwamna a ƙarƙashin PDP a jihar, a ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: The Secretary to the Bauchi State Government, Ibrahim Kashim won the governorship contest under the PDP in the state, on Wednesday.
Text2: Adamu wanda tsohon ɗan PDP ne, ya shafe shekaru takwas ya na gwamna a Jihar Nasarawa ƙarƙashin PDP, tsakanin 1999 zuwa 2007.
Text2 Translation: Adamu who is a former member of PDP, spent eight years as governor in Nasarawa State under PDP, between 1999 and 2007.

Text1: Akintayo ya ce za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 1 ga Maris.
Text1 Translation: Akintayo said that the trial will continue on March 1.
Text2: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 25 ga Janairu 2022.
Text2 Translation: The trial will continue on January 25, 2022.

Text1: Ya kan yi wahalakafin  a gano cutar a jikin mutum domin yakan dauki akalla kwanaki shida zuwa 21 kafin ta bayyana a jikin mutum.
Text1 Translation: It is difficult to detect the disease in the human body because it takes at least six to 21 days before it appears in the human body.

Text2 Translation: At least 189 people have contracted the corona virus in Nigeria from Monday to Tuesday.

Text2 Translation: The teacher made this additional statement on Monday, when he was answering questions to Channels Television, in Abuja.

Text1: Waƙar dai shegantaka ce ta Tinubu tun bayan kakkausan kalaman da ya yi a Gidan Gwamnatin Ogun kafin a yi zaɓen fidda gwani.
Text1 Translation: The song is Tinubu's latest since the harsh words he made at the Ogun Government House before the primary election.
Text2: SIYASA ROMON JAƁA: Mashawarcin Buhari ya ce ba zai goyi bayan Tinubu a zaɓen 2023 ba
Text2 Translation: ROMON JAƁA POLITICS: Buhari's adviser says he will not support Tinubu in the 2023 election

Text1: Can a Jihar Adamawa kuwa, Atiku ya lashe ƙananan hukimomi 11, Peter Obi 1, ana jiran sakamakon sauran 10.
Text1 Translation: In Adamawa State, Atiku won 11 local governments, Peter Obi 1, the results of the other 10 are awaited.
Text2: Sakamakon Jihar Gombe ya tabbatar da Atiku ya lashe dukkan ƙananan hukumomin Gombe, ya nunka Tinubu samun ƙuri’un jihar.
Text2 Translation: The result of Gombe State confirmed that Atiku won all the local governments of Gombe, and pointed to Tinubu getting the votes of the state.

Text1: “Tun lokacin da Gwamnan CBN ya fito takarar shugaban ƙasa mu ka ce a cire shi, amma aka yi biris da mu.
Text1 Translation: "Since the time the CBN Governor ran for the presidency, we have asked him to be removed, but we have been ignored.
Text2: Gwamna Aminu Tambuwal na Sokoto ya yi haka a 2019, lokacin da ya fito takarar shugabancin ƙasa a ƙarƙashin PDP.
Text2 Translation: Governor Aminu Tambuwal of Sokoto did this in 2019, when he ran for the presidency under the PDP.

Text1: Sarkin Zazzau Bamalli, jami’an gwamnatin Kaduna sun halarci jana’izar kakar kakakin majalisar Kaduna, Zailani
Text1 Translation: Emir Zazzau Bamalli, Kaduna government officials attended the funeral of the speaker's grandmother, Zailani
Text2: Shugaban majalisar Kaduna, Honarabul Yusuf Zailani tare da daruruwan ƴan uwa da makusanta sun halarci sallar jana’izar marigayiya Hajiya Maimunatu a Zaria.
Text2 Translation: Kaduna House Speaker, Honorable Yusuf Zailani along with hundreds of relatives and friends attended the funeral prayers of the late Hajiya Maimunatu in Zaria.

Text1: GADANGARƘAMAR ALMUNDANA A OFISHIN MALAMI: Yadda Ministan Shari’a ya bayar da kwangilar tantance kadarorin gwamnati a asirce
Text1 Translation: ALMUNDANA'S MISCONDUCT IN THE TEACHER'S OFFICE: How the Minister of Justice awarded the contract to assess government assets in secret
Text2: Malami ya bayar da kwangilar ga M. E. SHeriff & Co cewa ya gano tare da tantance kadarorin a cikin watanni shida.
Text2 Translation: The teacher gave the contract to M. E. SHeriff & Co to find and appraise the property within six months.

Text1: Yadda wasu ‘yan Najeriya 3 suka makale a kafadar jirgin ruwa tun daga Legas har kasar Spain
Text1 Translation: How 3 Nigerians got stuck on the shoulder of a boat from Lagos to Spain
Text2: Sai dai har yanzu babu tabbacin ko wadannan mutane sun makale a kafadar jirgin ne tun daga Najeriya har tsibirin Canary Islands.
Text2 Translation: However, there is still no confirmation whether these people are stuck on the shoulder of the plane from Nigeria to the Canary Islands.

Text1: Wasu maza a babban birnin tarayya Abuja sun koka da yadda ba a samun kudi da yawa a harkan sitar da maniyi a Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: Some men in the federal capital, Abuja, have complained that there is not much money in the sale of sperm in Nigeria.

Text2 Translation: The Federal Capital Authority, Abuja, has complained about the influx of disciples and beggars into the city of Abuja.

Text1: Sai kuma Ɗan Majalisar Tarayya  na Bauchi, shi ma ya fice bayan ya kasa cin zaɓen fidda gwani.
Text1 Translation: Then the Member of Federal Assembly of Bauchi, he also left after failing to win the primary election.
Text2: Ɗan majalisan dake wakiltar Kabba/Buni a majalisar Tarayya, Tajuddeen Yusuf ya kada fitaccen ɗan siyasa Dino Melaye a zaɓen fidda gwani na kujerar sanata.
Text2 Translation: The member of parliament representing Kabba/Buni in the Federal Parliament, Tajuddeen Yusuf defeated prominent politician Dino Melaye in the primary election for the senatorial seat.

Text1: Onyeuko ya ce ‘yan Boko Haram 1,755 sun tuba inda a cikinsu akwai maza 280, mata 523 da yara kanana 952.
Text1 Translation: Onyeuko said 1,755 members of Boko Haram have converted, including 280 men, 523 women and 952 children.
Text2: Ya ce a cikinsu akwai maza 331, mata 441 da yara 855.
Text2 Translation: He said that among them there are 331 men, 441 women and 855 children.

Text1: NDLEA ta kama mutum biyu da suka kantara bahayan ƙullin hodar ibilis 193 da suka haɗiya a Abuja
Text1 Translation: NDLEA arrests two men who were found in possession of 193 pills of Ibil that they swallowed in Abuja
Text2: Babafemi ya ce mutanen su biyu sun yi bahayan hodar ibilis din bayan sun yi kwanaki uku tsare a hannun hukumar.
Text2 Translation: Babafemi said that the two men made the drug after spending three days in custody in the hands of the agency.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin cewa Soyinka da Falana sun goyi bayan ‘Yan Majalisar da ke so tsige Buhari.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the story that Soyinka and Falana supported the Members of Parliament who want to impeach Buhari.
Text2: Premium Times Hausa ta buga labarin cewa ‘Yan Majalisar Tarayya Reshen PDP sun bi sahun Sanatocin PDP, sun bai wa Buhari wa’adin sati shida.
Text2 Translation: Premium Times Hausa published the news that the members of the PDP branch of the Federal Assembly followed the PDP senators and gave Buhari a six-week deadline.

Text1: Bayan haya kakakin rundunar ‘yan  sandan jihar Tochukwu Ikenga ya tabbatar da aukuwar haka a wani takarda da ya fitar daga ofishinsa.
Text1 Translation: After hiring the spokesperson of the state police force, Tochukwu Ikenga, confirmed the incident in a document he issued from his office.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan Abuja ta tabbatar da afkuwar wannan hatsari a wata sanarwa da ta fitar ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: The Abuja Police confirmed the accident in a statement issued on Thursday.

Text1: Haka nan kuma ya ce a cikin kasafin, za a kashe naira tiriliyan 6.31 wajen biyan basussuka.
Text1 Translation: He also said that in the budget, 6.31 trillion naira will be spent on debt repayment.
Text2: Buhari dai zai sauka a ranar 29 Ga Mayu, ya nemi a maida biyan bashin na Naira tiriliyan 22.7 zuwa nan da shekaru 40.
Text2 Translation: Buhari will step down on May 29, he asked to repay the debt of 22.7 trillion Naira within 40 years.

Text1: Bisa ga sashe 137 na dokar hukuncin duk wanda aka kama da laifin fyade shine daurin rai da rai a kurkuku.
Text1 Translation: According to section 137 of the law, the punishment for anyone who is arrested for the crime of rape is life imprisonment.
Text2: Wannan shine dalilan da ya sa naji gaba daya ta fita min a rai kuma na hakura da auren kowa ya kama gaban sa kawai.
Text2 Translation: This is the reason why I felt that she was completely out of my mind and I gave up on marrying anyone who was just in front of him.

Text1: A ƙarshe Kiyawa ya ce da zarar rundunar ta kammala bincike za ta kai wadannan mutane kotu domin a yi musu hukunci.
Text1 Translation: Finally, Kiyawa said that once the force completes its investigation, it will take these people to court so that they can be punished.
Text2: Ya ce da idan fannin dake gurfanar da masu aikata laifi irin haka ta kammala gudanar da bincike za a kai wadannan mutane kotu.
Text2 Translation: He said that if the department that prosecutes such criminals completes the investigation, these people will be taken to court.

Text1: An tabbatar da cewa fiye da ƙwararrun likitoci ‘yan Najeriya 5,000 ne su ka tsallake zuwa Ingila a cikin shekaru takwas.
Text1 Translation: It has been confirmed that more than 5,000 Nigerian doctors have migrated to England in eight years.
Text2: An tabbatar da cewa akwai ƙwararrun likitoci ‘yan a Ingila za su kai 9,976.
Text2 Translation: It has been confirmed that there are 9,976 qualified doctors in England.

Text1: Jami’an da su ka yi sakaci a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa, ba za su yi aikin zaɓen gwamnoni ba – INEC
Text1 Translation: The officials who were negligent in the presidential election, will not do the work of the governorship election - INEC
Text2: Shugaban INEC ya tabbatar wa ‘yan Najeriya da duniya cewa za a gudanar da sahihin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a ranar 25 Ga Fabrairu, 2023.
Text2 Translation: The Chairman of INEC has assured Nigerians and the world that a valid presidential election will be held on February 25, 2023.

Text1: A cikin bidiyon an nuno Ganduje tare da wasu gwamnoni ciki har da Ben Ayade na Kuros Riba a wurin taro da wasu mutane.
Text1 Translation: In the video, Ganduje was shown with other governors including Ben Ayade of Kuros Riba at a meeting with other people.
Text2: An ce Gwamnan Jihar Kuros Riba Ben Ayade ya lashi takobin cewa ba zai shiga harkokin kamfen ɗin Tinubu ba.
Text2 Translation: It is said that the Governor of Kuros Riba State, Ben Ayade has vowed that he will not participate in Tinubu's campaign.

Text1: Kalu ya ce sun yi wa yankin ƙabilar Igbo rashin adalci, domin su ya kamata a bai wa damar mulkin Najeriya a 2023.
Text1 Translation: Kalu said they have treated the Igbo tribe unfairly, because they should be given the opportunity to rule Nigeria in 2023.
Text2: Daga nan kuma sun nemi lallai a bai wa ƙabilar Igbo damar yin shugabancin Najeriya a 2023.
Text2 Translation: They also asked that the Igbo tribe be given the chance to become the president of Nigeria in 2023.

Text1: Buba ya fadi haka ne a taron tallafawa talakawa 4,000 da gwamnati ta yi a kauyukan Mairi da Maimusari dake karamar hukumar Jere.
Text1 Translation: Buba said this at a meeting to support 4,000 poor people held by the government in Mairi and Maimusari villages in Jere local government.

Text2 Translation: Buba said the government has supported 4,000 poor people, including 2,000 men and 2,000 women.

Text1: “Ko kuma a kama yaro a ƙarƙashin gada, ba a same shi da laifin komai ba, an tsare shi shekaru a gidan kurkuku.
Text1 Translation: "Or a child is caught under a bridge, he was not found guilty of anything, he was kept in prison for years.
Text2: Mai Shari’a Fadaunsi Adefioye ya bada umarnin a tsare Abodunri Ohai, bayan an same shi da laifin taimaka wa mai laifi guduwa.
Text2 Translation: Justice Fadaunsi Adefioye ordered the detention of Abodunri Ohai, after he was found guilty of assisting a criminal to escape.

Text1: Na koma PDP ne don in kawo karshen mulkin kama karyar da APC ke yi a Jigawa – Saminu Turaki
Text1 Translation: I joined the PDP to end the APC's dictatorship in Jigawa - Saminu Turaki
Text2: ” A matsayina na shugaba, ba na koma PDP bane don neman mun’ƙami, nakoma domin muhaɗa hannu jam’iyyar ta yi nasara a zabukan 2023.
Text2 Translation: "As a leader, I am not returning to PDP to seek favor, I am returning to join hands for the party to win the 2023 elections.

Text1: Zam ya tsaya takara ne a APC, shi kuma Ortom ya tsaya takarar ta Sanata, amma Zam ya kayar Ortom na PDP.
Text1 Translation: Zam ran for APC, and Ortom ran for senator, but Zam defeated Ortom of PDP.
Text2: Tinubu ya kayar da ‘yan takara 14 sannan ya zama ɗan takarar jam’iyya mai mulki a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 da ke tafe.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu defeated 14 candidates and became the candidate of the ruling party in the upcoming 2023 presidential election.

Text1: Wase ne ya bayyana wannan matsaya ta su a ranar Litinin a otal ɗin Hilton, wurin ƙaddamar da takarar Muktar Betara, a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: Wase expressed this position on Monday at the Hilton Hotel, the venue for the launch of the Muktar Betara contest, in Abuja.
Text2: A yanzu haka dai ana tantancewar a otal ɗin Hilton, Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The screening is currently being conducted at the Hilton Hotel, Abuja.

Text1: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Anambra ta kama Sunday Nwadiagha mai shekara 30 da laifin yi wa tsohuwa mai shekaru 75 fyade.
Text1 Translation: Anambra State Police has arrested 30-year-old Sunday Nwadiagha for raping a 75-year-old woman.
Text2: ‘Yan sandan jihar Ogun sun kama matar aure Kehinde Abdulwasiu mai shekara 32 da laifin cina wa budurwar mijinta  Tosin Olugbade mai shekara 23 wuta.
Text2 Translation: The Ogun state police have arrested a 32-year-old wife, Kehinde Abdulwasiu, for setting fire to her husband's 23-year-old girlfriend, Tosin Olugbade.

Text1: Nnamani ya bayyana haka cikin wata sanarwar da ya aiko wa PREMIUM TIMES a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Nnamani disclosed this in a statement he sent to PREMIUM TIMES on Tuesday.

Text1 Translation: There was an increase in the number of people killed last week where 49 people were killed that week, three were policemen.

Text2 Translation: Last Thursday, gunmen killed two policemen and five people in Edo state.

Text1: “Mun auna cewa za a samu kyakkyawan shugabanci a hannun Abbas da Ben Kalu a majalisa.
Text1 Translation: "We have measured that there will be good leadership in the hands of Abbas and Ben Kalu in the parliament.
Text2: “Don haka masu ƙoƙarin ɓata mana suna har su na cewa mun karɓi maƙudan kuɗaɗe a hannun Hushpuppi, za su ji kunya.
Text2 Translation: "Therefore, those who try to discredit us, including those who say that we received a lot of money from Hushpuppi, will be ashamed.

Text1: Ben Kalu, wanda ɗan majalisa ne daga Jihar Abiya, q yankin Kudu maso Gabas, an ɗauko shi ne domin a saisaita giɓin yankin na su.
Text1 Translation: Ben Kalu, who is a Member of Parliament from Abia State, South East Region, was recruited to bridge the gap in their region.

Text2 Translation: Reports on Thursday confirmed that South-Easterners Ahmed Lawan will do the same.

Text1: Kanawa sun yi ragaraga da NECO cikin Ɗalibai 89,000 da suka rubuta jarabawar, ɗalibai 80,000 sun cinye duka darussa 9 – Kwamishina Kiru
Text1 Translation: Kanawa beat NECO out of 89,000 students who wrote the exam, 80,000 students passed all 9 courses - Commissioner Kiru
Text2: ” A cikin shekarar 2021, ɗaliban mu 89,000 suka rubuta jarabawar kammala sakandare, ciki kuwa 80,000 duk sun samu Kiredit a darussa 9 duka.
Text2 Translation: "In the year 2021, 89,000 of our students wrote the high school graduation exam, of which 80,000 all received credits in all 9 subjects.

Text1: Peter Obi na LP ya lashe sakamakon Ƙaramar Hukumar Numan.
Text1 Translation: Peter Obi of LP won the results of the Numan Local Government.

Text1: An kashe mutum 8 sannan da dama an yi garkuwa da su har yanzu suna tsare a hannun ƴan bindigan.

Text2 Translation: And the Parliament ordered to pay compensation of 160 million Naira to 8 people who were killed by customs in Oyo State.

Text1: Bayan sun kama Mamu, SSS sun ce sun samu kakin sojoji da wasu kuɗaɗe a gidan sa.

Text1: Hukumar AEPB ta garƙame ma’aikatun  ranar Talata saboda tulin bashin naira biliyan 10 da take bin ma’aikatun na haraji da sauransu.
Text1 Translation: The AEPB ordered the ministries on Tuesday because of the pile of debts of 10 billion naira that it owes to the ministries for taxes and others.

Text2 Translation: And the pile of debt as of December 31, 2021, the debt owed to Anambra is 109 billion naira.” Soludo said.

Text1: Da yake tattaunawa da Idris Illiyasu daga jihar Sokoto dake siyar da raguna a kasuwar ya koka da rashin cinikin raguna a bana a kasuwar.
Text1 Translation: While talking to Idris Illiyasu from Sokoto state who sells lambs in the market, he complained about the lack of sale of lambs this year in the market.

Text2 Translation: Illiyasu Wanda, who is the leader of the lamb sellers in the market, said that this year the sale of lambs was very low because of the high prices.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’ar sa bayan ya kammala wa’adin sa na gwamna a Bauchi.

Text1: Ya ce za a fara da zaran an kammala gyaran manyan titinan Gwamnantin Tarayya.

Text1: Sai dai kuma INEC ta je Kotun Ɗaukaka Ƙara ta na neman a ɗage mata hukuncin hana ta taɓa na’urorin BVAS bayan zaɓen shugaban ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: However, INEC went to the Court of Appeal to request that the ban on her from touching the BVAS devices be lifted after the presidential election.

Text1: “An samu ci gaba sosai a wannan zaɓen na shugaban ƙasa, idan aka kwatanta da zaɓukan da aka yi a baya.
Text1 Translation: "There has been a lot of progress in this presidential election, compared to previous elections.

Text2 Translation: "But it is impossible to say that the same region has a presidential candidate, a party leader and a general director of the campaign." Said Wike.

Text1: Daraktan Yaɗa Labarai na riƙo na Hedikwatar Tsaro, Burgediya Janar Tukur Gusau ne ya sanya wa sanarwar hannu a Abuja.

Text1: Farashin kayan abinci kamar shinkafa, biredi, nama da sauran su duk ya tashi, kuma a kullum ci gaba da tsada su ke yi.

Text1: Shiisu ya ce wannan abin tashin hankali ya auku ranar 5 ga Janairu a kauyen Sabuwa Takur dake karamar hukumar Dutse.
Text1 Translation: Shiisu said that this incident happened on January 5 in Sabuwa Takur village in Dutse local government.

Text1: Ministan yaɗa labarai, Lai Mohammed ne ya bayyana haka wa manema labarai bayan kammala taron majalisar zartaswa ta kasa a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The Minister of Information, Lai Mohammed disclosed this to journalists after the National Cabinet meeting in Abuja.

Text2 Translation: On Monday, the CNPD made this call at a press conference in Abuja.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe daya daga cikin hadiman gwamnan jihar Taraba Darius Ishaku, Levi Gbashi a karamar hukumar Donga.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have killed one of the servants of Taraba State Governor Darius Ishaku, Levi Gbashi in Donga local government.

Text2 Translation: Gunmen broke into a mosque and killed 9 people in Ba'are town in Mashegu Local Government of Niger State.

Text1: Zulum ya bayyana haka a Abuja a ranar Alhamis, lokacin da ya bayyana gaban Tawagar Jami’an Yaɗa Labaran Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: Zulum stated this in Abuja on Thursday, when he appeared before the Presidential Press Officers Team.
Text2: Amaechi ya sha ragargazar ce a ranar Alhamis, lokacin da ya bayyana a gaban Kwamiti domin kare kasafin 2022 na ma’aikatar sa.
Text2 Translation: Amaechi was defeated on Thursday, when he appeared before the Committee to defend the 2022 budget of his ministry.

Text1: Gwamnatin Kaduna za ta kashe naira biliyan 4 wajen tallafawa matalauta miliyan 2 – In ji Sani

Text2 Translation: Buhari's government will spend 38.4 billion naira to complete roads in five states

Text1: Buhari ya tashi zuwa Saudiyya a yau Talata, 11 Ga Afrilu domin zuwa aikin Umra.
Text1 Translation: Buhari left for Saudi Arabia today, Tuesday, April 11 to perform Umrah.

Text2 Translation: Between April 11 and June 30, voter registration will continue.

Text1: Ta ce a cikin Yuli kuwa bashin ya zarce geji da naira tiriliyan 1.26.
Text1 Translation: She said that in July the debt exceeded 1.26 trillion naira.

Text2 Translation: Many Nigerians have said that the 22.7 trillion Naira loan that Buhari received from the CBN is illegal.

Text1: Fasinjojin sun shafe kwanaki sama da ɗari tsare a hannun ƴan bindiga.

Text2 Translation: The King of Bungudu was released after spending 32 days in the hands of bandits

Text1: FARGABAR KORONA: An gindaya tsauraran sharuɗɗa ga masu kai ziyara Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa
Text1 Translation: CORONA FEAR: Strict conditions have been set for visitors to the Presidential Palace

Text2 Translation: He said that the rules have been laid down for anyone to visit the Presidential Palace.

Text1: Haka Ganduje ya bayyana a wurin gangamin kamfen ɗin APC a garin Tsanyawa, a ranar Lahadi.

Text2: A ranar Laraba ce Tinubu ya bayyana haka a wurin kamfen a Enugu.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu said this on Wednesday at a campaign rally in Enugu.

Text1: A safiyar Litinin aka bayyana sakamakon zaɓen ƙananan hukumomi 38 daga cikin 44 na jihar Kano.
Text1 Translation: On Monday morning, the results of the 38 out of 44 local government elections in Kano state were announced.
Text2: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa INEC, ta bayyana Ademola Adeleke na PDP cewa ya yi nasara a zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Osun.
Text2 Translation: The National Electoral Commission, INEC, has declared Ademola Adeleke of the PDP that he has won the governorship election in Osun State.

Text1: Kamfanin dai a garin Kabba a Jihar Kogi ya ke, kuma an yi masa rajista a cikin 2018, ranar 16 Ga Fabrairu.
Text1 Translation: The company is located in Kabba town in Kogi State and was registered in 2018, on the 16th day of February.
Text2: An yi wa kamfanin iyalan Dasuƙi rajista a ranar 13 Ga Nuwamba, 2013.
Text2 Translation: The Dasuki family company was registered on November 13, 2013.

Text1: Ya ce rundunar za ta kai Ehem da mutanen da ya basu kwangilar kashe matarta sa kotu da zarar an kammala yin bincike akai.

Text1: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa (INEC), ta tabbatar wa ‘yan Nijeriya da duniya cewa za ta gudanar da sahihin zaɓe kuma wanda zai kasance karɓaɓɓe.
Text1 Translation: The National Electoral Commission (INEC) has assured Nigerians and the world that it will conduct a fair and credible election.

Text2 Translation: 2023 ELECTIONS: Yakubu assures Thabo Mbeki of the CommonWealth team, that a valid presidential election will be held

Text1: Ana batakashi tsakanin ‘yan ta’adda da Sojojin Najeriya a Madallah Abuja
Text1 Translation: There is a conflict between the terrorists and the Nigerian Army in Madallah, Abuja

Text2 Translation: The reports that reached us at this time show that the Nigerian army is fighting against terrorists in Madalla, which is near Abuja.

Text1: Ibrahim Wanda ke zama a hanyar ofishin ‘yan sanda dake Rigasa ya ce Zainab ta hana matarsa dawowa gida saboda shi ba mai arziki bane.
Text1 Translation: Ibrahim Wanda who lives on the road to the police station in Rigasa said that Zainab stopped his wife from coming home because he is not rich.

Text1: Ya ce har yanzu rundunar na gudanar da bincike domin gano sauran mutum shida din da suka rage.

Text1: ‘Yan Najeriya sun cika da mamaki ganin yadda jam’iyya mai mulki APC, ta yanka farashin fam ɗin takarar shugabancin ƙasa kan naira miliyan 100.
Text1 Translation: Nigerians are shocked to see how the ruling party, APC, has cut the price of the presidential ticket to 100 million naira.
Text2: Tsohon gwamnan Kgaz RabiuKwankwaso ya siya fom ɗin takarar shugaban kasa a inuwar jam’iyya mai alamar kayan daɗi har naira miliyan 30.
Text2 Translation: The former governor of Kgaz, Rabiu Kwankwaso, bought the presidential candidacy form in the shadow of the party with a luxury brand of up to 30 million naira.

Text1: Akalla mutum 78 ne ‘yan bindiga suka kashe a makon jiya a Najeriya, daga ranar 1 zuwa 5 ga Mayu.
Text1 Translation: At least 78 people were killed by bandits last week in Nigeria, from May 1 to May 5.
Text2: A karshen makon jiya an kashe akalla mutum 40 a karamar hukumar Giwa dake jihar Kaduna bayan mahara sun afkawa wasu ƙauyuka a yankin.
Text2 Translation: At the end of last week, at least 40 people were killed in Giwa local government in Kaduna state after assailants attacked some villages in the area.

Text1: Rundunar ta kuma kashe ‘yan bindiga 33 ranar 30 ga Maris bayan rundunar sojin sama ta hango ‘yan bindigan a jirgi a kusa da Kusasu.
Text1 Translation: The command also killed 33 bandits on March 30 after the Air Force spotted the bandits in a plane near Kusasu.
Text2: Dakarun sojin saman Najeriya sun kashe ‘yan bindiga sama da 40 a Katsina
Text2 Translation: The Nigerian Air Force has killed more than 40 bandits in Katsina

Text1: Gwamnatin Kaduna ta ce mutum 8 ƴan bindigan suka kasa sannan da yawa daga cikin matafin sun ji rauni.
Text1 Translation: The Kaduna government said 8 people were killed by the bandits and many of the attackers were injured.
Text2: Ƴan bindigan sun yi garkuwa da mutum 17 a wannan hari da suka kai kuma mutum 8 sun ji rauni.
Text2 Translation: The gunmen kidnapped 17 people in this attack and 8 people were injured.

Text1: Mutum biyu sun mutu wasu mutum shida sun bace a hadarin jirgin ruwan da aka yi a karamar hukumar Ringim, jihar Jigawa.
Text1 Translation: Two people died and six others went missing in the boat accident in Ringim Local Government, Jigawa State.
Text2: Ambaliya sanadiyar ruwan sama mai karfi ya share kadar Barsika dake a karamar hukumar Gwaram ta Jihar Jigawa.
Text2 Translation: Flooding caused by heavy rains has wiped out Barsika property located in Gwaram local government of Jigawa State.

Text1: An taron neman sulhu ɗin ne a otal ɗin Lane Carlton Hotel.
Text1 Translation: The settlement meeting was held at the Lane Carlton Hotel.
Text2: An gudanar da taron a Ɗakin Taro na otal ɗin Prosperous Royal Hotels and Resort Centre.
Text2 Translation: The event was held at the Conference Room of Prosperous Royal Hotels and Resort Centre.

Text1: Buhari ya yi bayanin yayin da ya sa wa Ƙudirin Gyaran Dokar Zaɓe hannu, inda yanzu ya zama Sabuwar Dokar Zaɓe.
Text1 Translation: Buhari made the statement as he signed the Electoral Law Amendment Bill, which has now become the New Electoral Law.
Text2: Cikin wannan makon ne wannan jarida ta buga labarin cewa INEC ta aika wa Buhari wasiƙa amincewa da Ƙudirin Gyaran Dokar Zaɓe.
Text2 Translation: Within this week, this newspaper published the news that INEC has sent a letter to Buhari approving the Electoral Law Amendment Bill.

Text1: A ranar Lahadi ‘yan bindiga sun kashe sojoji biyu a jihar Imo.
Text1 Translation: On Sunday, gunmen killed two soldiers in Imo state.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe jami’in hukumar NDLEA a harin da suka kai ofishin hukumar dake jihar Ebonyi ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen killed an officer of the NDLEA in an attack on the agency's office in Ebonyi state on Tuesday.

Text1: Mutum da ya rasa ransa a taron jami’iyyar APC da aka yi a karamar hukumar Kazaure jihar Jigawa ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: A person who lost his life at the APC meeting held in Kazaure Local Government of Jigawa State on Tuesday.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum uku a garin Bali dake karamar hukumar Bali a jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Bandits killed three people in Bali town in Bali local government in Taraba state.

Text1: Ahmed Baba wanda magidanci ne mai ‘ya’ya 19, ya ce inda ya fi daɗi a sassan jikin mutum shi ne maƙogaro.
Text1 Translation: Ahmed Baba, who is a householder with 19 children, said that the most pleasant part of the human body is the throat.
Text2: Zuwa yanzu samfurin Delta ce ta fi yaduwa a Najeriya inda a ranar 20 ga Disambar 2021 mutum 2,237 suke ɗauke da ita.
Text2 Translation: So far, Delta is the most popular model in Nigeria where on December 20, 2021, 2,237 people are carrying it.

Text1: Ƙauyen Randa wanda ke cikin Mazaɓar Matumji a Ƙaramar Hukumar Maru a Jihar Zamfara, ya na ƙarƙashin Masarautar Ɗansadau.
Text1 Translation: Randa village which is in Matumji Constituency in Maru Local Government in Zamfara State, is under the Kingdom of Dansadau.
Text2: ‘Yan Sanda sun tabbatar da kashe mutumin mai suna Obinwanne Iwu, ɗan asalin ƙauyen Ahiara a Ƙaramar Hukumar Ahiazu Mbaise a Jihar Imo.
Text2 Translation: The police have confirmed the killing of a man named Obinwanne Iwu, a native of Ahiara village in Ahiazu Mbaise Local Government Area of ​​Imo State.

Text1: Yakubu ya ce a zaɓen ranar tilas ma’aikatan INEC su zage damtse sosai a lokacin zaɓen ranar 11 ga Maris.
Text1 Translation: Yakubu said that on the day of the election, the INEC staff must be very strict during the election on March 11.
Text2: Shugaban INEC Mahmood Yakubu ne ya yi wannan gargaɗin a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da Kwamishinonin Zaɓe na Tarayya, ranar Alhamis a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The Chairman of INEC, Mahmood Yakubu, gave this warning when he was meeting with the Federal Electoral Commissioners, on Thursday in Abuja.

Text1: Daruruwan magoya baya ne suka raka sanata Uba wajen mika fom ɗin a Abuja ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Hundreds of supporters accompanied Senator Uba to hand over the form in Abuja on Tuesday.
Text2: Kwankwaso ya siya fom ɗin ne a ofishin jam’iyyar dake Abuja ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: Kwankwaso bought the form at the party office in Abuja on Tuesday.

Text1: Akintayo ta raba auren sannan ta bai wa Muibat ikon kula da ƴaƴan natsu.
Text1 Translation: Akintayo divorced the marriage and gave Muibat custody of the children.
Text2: Akintayo ta bai wa Mujidat ikon kula da ƴaƴan su biyu sannan duk wata Saheed zai rika biyan Mujidat naira 10,000 na kula da su.
Text2 Translation: Akintayo gave Mujidat the right to take care of their two children and every month Saheed will pay Mujidat 10,000 naira to take care of them.

Text1: “Za mu hanzarta aiwatar da aiki da fasahar na’ura da sadarwar zamani domin ƙirƙira da kuma gano sababbin damarmaki a cikin jiharmu.
Text1 Translation: "We will speed up the process of working with modern technology and communication to create and discover new opportunities in our state.
Text2: Za mu samar da dandazon ƙwararru a fannin fasahar na’ura da sadarwar zamani a jiharmu, inji Malam Umar.
Text2 Translation: We will create a pool of experts in the field of computer technology and modern communication in our state, said Malam Umar.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaba Buhari, Garba Shehu ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar.
Text1 Translation: President Buhari's Broadcasting Spokesman, Garba Shehu stated this in a statement he issued.
Text2: Haka Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaban Ƙasa Femi Adesina ne ya bayyana haka a ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: This was disclosed by the Presidential Press Officer Femi Adesina on Thursday.

Text1: “Na gano cewa Isyaku baya girmama iyayen matarsa  hakan ya sa nake so a raba auren.
Text1 Translation: "I found out that Isyaku does not respect his wife's parents, that's why I want to divorce the marriage.
Text2: “Ya alkali na gano cewa saurayin Fisayo na sallah a masallacin da nake limanci.
Text2 Translation: "O judge, I found out that Fisayo's boyfriend is praying in the mosque where I am a priest.

Text1: Ya zuwa lokacin rubuta wannan labari dai Babbar Kotun Tarayya ba ta kai ga damƙa wannan ƙara a hannun kowane mai shari’a ba.
Text1 Translation: As of the time of writing this article, the Federal High Court has not handed over this case to any judge.
Text2: Kanu na fuskantar tuhuma a gaban Mai Shari’a Binta Nyako ta Babbar Kotun Tarayya da ke Abuja.
Text2 Translation: Kanu is facing charges before Justice Binta Nyako of the Federal High Court in Abuja.

Text1: Kotu ta yanke wa barawon buhun dankalin Hausa zaman gidan yari a Abuja
Text1 Translation: The court sentenced the thief of a bag of Hausa potatoes to prison in Abuja
Text2: Kotu a Abuja ta yanke wa ɓarawon jaka hukuncin zama gidan kaso na tsawon shekaru 4
Text2 Translation: A court in Abuja sentenced the bag thief to prison for 4 years

Text1: RUNDUNAR ATIKU A BENIN: ‘Zan ƙara wa jihohi da ƙananan hukumomi ƙarfin iko’ idan na zama shugaban kasa – Atiku
Text1 Translation: ATTIKU'S ARMY IN BENIN: 'I will increase the power of states and local governments' if I become president - Atiku
Text2: Rahoton ya ƙara da cewa matsalar abinci za ta fuskanci aƙalla jihohi 21 na Najeriya tare da yankin Gundumar FCT Abuja, mai ƙananan hukumomi shida.
Text2 Translation: The report added that food crisis will affect at least 21 states of Nigeria including the FCT Abuja District, which has six local governments.

Text1: Hukumar tara Haraji ta Jihar Kaduna ta garkame wasu bankuna 4 saboda kin biyan tulin harajin naira miliyan N300.5
Text1 Translation: The Kaduna State Tax Collector has arrested 4 banks for refusing to pay N300.5 million in taxes.
Text2: “Kin biyan bashin harajin da gwamnati ke bin wadannan bankuna ne ya sa hukumar KADIRS ta rufe su.
Text2 Translation: "The refusal to pay the tax owed by the government to these banks has caused the KADIRS board to close them down.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin ganawar Tinubu da Sanatocin APC, inda ya nemi su taimaka masa ya cika burin shugabancin Najeriya.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the story of Tinubu's meeting with APC senators, where he asked them to help him fulfill his dream of being the president of Nigeria.
Text2: ZAƁEN 2023: Tinubu ya gana da Sanatocin APC, ya nemi su taimaka masa ya cika burin shugabancin Najeriya
Text2 Translation: 2023 ELECTIONS: Tinubu meets with APC senators, asks them to help him fulfill his dream of becoming Nigeria's president

Text1: “Daga nan wadanda suka yi garkuwa da Sadiya suka kira mahaifin ta inda suka bukaci ya biya Naira miliyan 5 kudin fansa.
Text1 Translation: "Then those who kidnapped Sadiya called her father and demanded that he pay 5 million naira as ransom.
Text2: Sai dai kuma bayan tattaunawa da aka yi da su mahaifin Sadiya ya biya naira miliyan ɗaya.
Text2 Translation: However, after a discussion with them, Sadiya's father paid one million naira.

Text1: A cikin wata sanarwa, Gwamnatin Tarayya ta ce ta na sane da ƙalubalen tsaro a ƙasar nan, kuma ta na bakin ƙoƙarin ta.
Text1 Translation: In a statement, the Federal Government said that it is aware of the security challenges in this country, and it is ready to do its best.
Text2: Ƙididdigar Hukumar Kula da Jami’o’i ta Ƙasa (NUC) ta ce akwai jami’o’i mallakar gwamnatin tarayya guda 45 a ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: According to the National Universities Commission (NUC), there are 45 federally owned universities in the country.

Text1: Maza sun koka kan yadda kasuwancin ‘Maniyyi’ ba ya kawo kudi masu daraja a Abuja
Text1 Translation: Men have complained about how the 'Maniyyi' business is not bringing in valuable money in Abuja
Text2: Wasu maza a babban birnin tarayya Abuja sun koka da yadda ba a samun kudi da yawa a harkan sitar da maniyi a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: Some men in the federal capital, Abuja, have complained that there is not much money in the sale of sperm in Nigeria.

Text1: Tuni dai Majalisar  Dattawa ta ce a binciki ayyukan da aka ce an yi da kuɗin.
Text1 Translation: The Senate has already asked to investigate the activities that were said to have been done with the money.
Text2: An bi Saraki da sharri a lokacin, ta yadda duk matsalar da ta faru sai a ce don Saraki na Shuagaban Majalisar Dattawa ne.
Text2 Translation: Saraki was treated badly at that time, so that all the problems that happened had to be said to be because of Saraki, the President of the Senate.

Text1: Lambobin waya miliyan 70 ne ba su da rajistar banki (BVN) a Najeriya – Shugaban eTranzact
Text1 Translation: 70 million phone numbers do not have bank registration (BVN) in Nigeria - CEO of eTranzact
Text2: An nuna damuwar cewa aƙalla layukan waya miliyan 70 ne ba a haɗa su da lambar ajiyar banki ba, wato BVN.
Text2 Translation: Concerns have been raised that at least 70 million phone lines are not linked to a bank account number, that is BVN.

Text1: Sanata Orji Uzor Kalu ya taɓa yin kira a yi bincike kan maƙudan kuɗaɗen da gwamnati ke asara saboda masu harƙallar zinari.
Text1 Translation: Senator Orji Uzor Kalu once called for an investigation into the amount of money the government is losing due to gold miners.
Text2: Gungun ‘yan jarida masu yaƙi Da ɓarayin kuɗaɗen gwamnati a duniya ne su ka bankaɗo wannan ƙazamar harƙallar da ake kira ‘Pandora Papers’.
Text2 Translation: It is the group of journalists who fight against the thieves of government funds in the world to expose this scandal called 'Pandora Papers'.

Text1: Ta kuma umarci Lawal ya rika ba Muhibbat naira 15,000 duk wata don ciyar da su da kula da su.
Text1 Translation: She also ordered Lawal to give Muhibbat 15,000 naira every month to feed them and take care of them.
Text2: Akintayo ta bai wa Mujidat ikon kula da ƴaƴan su biyu sannan duk wata Saheed zai rika biyan Mujidat naira 10,000 na kula da su.
Text2 Translation: Akintayo gave Mujidat the right to take care of their two children and every month Saheed will pay Mujidat 10,000 naira to take care of them.

Text1: Tuni dai har an aika da wannan gargaɗi ga Hukumar Kula da Gidajen Kurkuku ta Ƙasa (NCS).
Text1 Translation: This warning has already been sent to the National Prison Service Commission (NCS).
Text2: Sai dai kuma ya ce Hukumar Kula da Gidajen Kurkuku ta Ƙasa ta kafa kwamitin binciken lamarin.
Text2 Translation: However, he said that the National Board of Prisons has established a committee to investigate the matter.

Text1: Mutane da dama a kauyen sun ji rauni a jikinsu a dalilin harin.
Text1 Translation: Many people in the village were injured as a result of the attack.
Text2: Mutanen sun ce a dalilin harin mutane da dama sun ji rauni a jikkunan su.
Text2 Translation: The people said that as a result of the attack, many people were injured in their bodies.

Text1: Haka nan kuma INEC ta bada umarnin a ci gaba da tattara sakamakon zaɓe a lokacin da Baturen Zaɓe na Jihar Adamawa ya kimtsa sosai.
Text1 Translation: In addition, INEC ordered to continue collecting the results of the election when the electoral roll of Adamawa State is very important.
Text2: Mele Lamiɗo wanda shi ne Baturen Zaɓe, ba ya cikin ɗakin tattara sakamakon zaɓen a lokacin da aka yi sanarwar.
Text2 Translation: Mele Lamido, who is the Electoral Officer, was not in the election results collection room when the announcement was made.

Text1: Wannan gargadi na kunshe ne a wata sabarwa wanda Kwamishinan Tsaron Jihar, Samuel Aruwan ya fidda ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: This warning was contained in a statement issued by the State Security Commissioner, Samuel Aruwan on Saturday.
Text2: Hakan na kunshe ne a wata sako da ya aika wa Vanguard ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: This was contained in a message he sent to Vanguard on Saturday.

Text1: Buhari yayi alhinin kisan matafiya 23 da ‘yan bindiga suka yi a Sokoto
Text1 Translation: Buhari mourned the killing of 23 travelers by bandits in Sokoto
Text2: Shugaban ƙasa Buhari ya yi alhinin kisan matafiya da ‘yan bindigan suka yi a jihar.
Text2 Translation: President Buhari mourned the killing of travelers by bandits in the state.

Text1: SHARI’AR ZAƁEN 2023: Atiku ya janye ƙarar neman kotu ta tilasta INEC ta  bada damar binciken kayan zaɓe
Text1 Translation: 2023 ELECTIONS CASE: Atiku withdraws court case to compel INEC to allow inspection of election materials
Text2: SHARI’AR ZAƁEN 2023: Kotu ta bai wa Atiku da Obi izinin duba na’urorin aikin zaɓen INEC
Text2 Translation: 2023 ELECTION CASE: Court allows Atiku and Obi to inspect INEC election machines

Text1: Haka kuma Hydropower Investments Limited zai mallaki hannayen jari miliyan 10 a cikin kamfanin Sunrise Power & Transmission (Nigeria) Co. Limited.
Text1 Translation: Hydropower Investments Limited will also own 10 million shares in Sunrise Power & Transmission (Nigeria) Co. Limited.
Text2: Waɗanda ke da hannayen jari a cikin kamfanin na Hydropower Investments & Transmission Co. Limited, akwai Abubakar Atiku Dasuƙi, mai hannayen jari 17,000.
Text2 Translation: Those who have shares in Hydropower Investments & Transmission Co. Limited, there is Abubakar Atiku Dasuqi, who has 17,000 shares.

Text1: Bayan haka PDP ce ta cinye kujerun kansiloli 9 APC mai mulki ta yi nasara a kujera ɗaya tal.
Text1 Translation: After that, the PDP won 9 councilor seats while the ruling APC won one seat.
Text2: Haka kuma PDP ce ta yi nasara a zaɓen kujerun kansiloli da aka yi.
Text2 Translation: Also, PDP won the election of councilor seats.

Text1: Sai dai kuma mataimakin shugaban kasa Yemi Osinbajo wanda ya zo na uku a zaɓen bai aika da sakon taya murnar ga Tinubu.
Text1 Translation: However, Vice President Yemi Osinbajo who came third in the election did not send a congratulatory message to Tinubu.
Text2: A karshe dai shine ya zo ma uku a zaɓen inda Amaechi ya zo na biyu Ahmed Lawan ya zo na hudu.
Text2 Translation: In the end, he came third in the election where Amaechi came second and Ahmed Lawan came fourth.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES ta bada labarin NDLEA sun gurfanar da Abba Kyari a kotun Abuja.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES reported that the NDLEA prosecuted Abba Kyari in the Abuja court.
Text2: Premium Times Hausa ta bada labarin yadda Mahara suka yi garkuwa da Dagacin Banye, yankin Charanci tun a tsakiyar watan Oktoba.
Text2 Translation: Premium Times Hausa told the story of how the raiders kidnapped Dagacin Banye, Charanci area since the middle of October.

Text1: “Cikin 2018 kuwa an tabbatar da tafiyar likitoci 856, sai kuma cikin 2019 har likitoci 1,347 su ka tafi Ingila yin aiki a can.
Text1 Translation: "In 2018, the departure of 856 doctors was confirmed, and in 2019, 1,347 doctors went to England to work there.
Text2: An tabbatar da cewa akwai ƙwararrun likitoci ‘yan a Ingila za su kai 9,976.
Text2 Translation: It has been confirmed that there are 9,976 qualified doctors in England.

Text1: Gwamnatin Jihar dai ta fitar sanarwar ta’aziyya da jajentawa ga iyalan fararen hular da yaƙin ya ritsa da rayuwar su.
Text1 Translation: The state government has issued a statement of condolence and condolence to the families of the civilians whose lives were lost in the war.
Text2: Shugaban na NGF ya nuna tsantsar jimami da ta’aziyya ga iyalan waɗanda harin ya ritsa da su da kuma Gwamnatin Jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The president of the NGF expressed his sincere condolences and condolences to the families of the victims of the attack and to the Kaduna State Government.

Text1: Kotun Kano ta ki bada belin Sheikh Abduljabbar, za a ci gaba da Shari’a a Oktoba
Text1 Translation: The Kano court refused to grant bail to Sheikh Abduljabbar, the trial will continue in October
Text2: Babbar kotun shari’ar musulunci ta Jihar Kano ta ki bayar da belin Sheikh Abduljababr Nasir Kabara.
Text2 Translation: The High Islamic Court of Kano State refused to grant bail to Sheikh Abduljababr Nasir Kabara.

Text1: Bala na cikin ‘yan takara, amma ya samu ƙuri’u 20 kacal.
Text1 Translation: Bala was among the candidates, but he got only 20 votes.
Text2: Shi dai Bala ya samu ƙuri’u 20 ne kacal a zaɓen fidda gwani na shugaban ƙasa a PDP.
Text2 Translation: Bala only got 20 votes in the PDP presidential primaries.

Text1: Sai dai makusancin ya nuna cewa lamarin wata ƙullalliya ce kawai aka shirya don a tatsi kuɗaɗe a hannun kakakin.
Text1 Translation: However, the source indicated that the incident was just a plot arranged to steal money from the speaker.
Text2: “Don haka masu ƙoƙarin ɓata mana suna har su na cewa mun karɓi maƙudan kuɗaɗe a hannun Hushpuppi, za su ji kunya.
Text2 Translation: "Therefore, those who try to discredit us, including those who say that we received a lot of money from Hushpuppi, will be ashamed.

Text1: Ministan Shari’a Abubakar Malami ya ce ya janye daga takarar gwamnan Kebbi.
Text1 Translation: Minister of Justice Abubakar Malami said he has withdrawn from the Kebbi governorship race.
Text2: Cikin wadanda za su ajiye muƙamansu akwai ministan Shari’a Abubakar Malami wanda yake takarar gwamnan jihar Kebbi.
Text2 Translation: Among those who will leave their positions is the minister of Sharia Abubakar Malami who is running for the governorship of Kebbi state.

Text1: Adamu ya yi bayanin a lokacin da ya ke zantawa da manema labarai a Abuja, a ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: Adamu made the disclosure while talking to journalists in Abuja, on Saturday.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar yansandan jihar Ramhan Nansel ya sanar da haka ranar Lahadi a garin Lafia a lokacin da yake zantawa da manema labarai.
Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the state police, Ramhan Nansel, announced this on Sunday in Lafia town while talking to the media.

Text1: Makonni biyu da su ka gabata ne dai Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa (INEC) ta fitar da jadawalin ranakun rajistar masu zaɓe
Text1 Translation: Two weeks ago, the National Electoral Commission (INEC) released the schedule of voter registration dates.
Text2: Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa (INEC) ta bayyana ranaku da abubuwan da za a yi dangane da rajistar masu jefa ƙuri’a da ake gudanarwa a yanzu.
Text2 Translation: The National Electoral Commission (INEC) has announced the dates and activities to be done in relation to the voter registration that is currently underway.

Text1: Ƴan sanda sun kama wasu masu gadi biyu da suka ci zarafin dan sanda a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The police have arrested two security guards who assaulted a police officer in Abuja.
Text2: JIHAR NASARAWA: Ƴan sanda sun damke  Ɗan’Asabe da ya ci zarafin tsohuwa mai shekaru 80 a Lokonga
Text2 Translation: NASARAW STATE: Police arrested Dan'Asabe who assaulted an 80-year-old woman in Lokonga

Text1: MATSALAR TSARO: Buhari ya kira Majalisar Tsaron Ƙasa zuwa taron gaggawa
Text1 Translation: SECURITY PROBLEM: Buhari called the National Security Council to an emergency meeting
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya kira Majalisar Tsaron Ƙasa taron gaggawa domin tattauna batutuwan da su ka shafi tsaron ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has called an emergency meeting of the National Security Council to discuss issues related to national security.

Text1: ‘Yan sanda sun kama matar da ta cina wa budurwar mijinta wuta ta rasu
Text1 Translation: The police arrested the woman who set her husband's girlfriend on fire and she died
Text2: ‘Yan sandan jihar Ogun sun kama matar aure Kehinde Abdulwasiu mai shekara 32 da laifin cina wa budurwar mijinta  Tosin Olugbade mai shekara 23 wuta.
Text2 Translation: The Ogun state police have arrested a 32-year-old wife, Kehinde Abdulwasiu, for setting fire to her husband's 23-year-old girlfriend, Tosin Olugbade.

Text1: Cikin makon jiya ne Shugaba Buhari ce masu hannu wajen shigo da gurɓataccen mai za su girbi abin da su ka shuka.
Text1 Translation: Last week President Buhari said those involved in the importation of contaminated oil will reap what they have sown.
Text2: Shugaba Buhari dai shi ne Ministan Fetur, kuma a ƙarƙashin Ma’aikatar sa ce aka shigo da wannan gurɓataccen fetur ɗin, wanda za a yi bincike.
Text2 Translation: President Buhari is the Minister of Petroleum, and it is under his Ministry that this contaminated fuel was imported, which will be investigated.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 28 ga Afrilu.
Text1 Translation: The trial will continue on April 28.
Text2: Za a ci gaba da shari’a  ranar 20 ga Mayu.
Text2 Translation: The trial will continue on May 20.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta bada labarin yadda Abdul’aziz Yari ya taya Akanta Janar Jidar naira biliyan 84.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa told the story of how Abdul'aziz Yari gave the Accountant General Jidar 84 billion naira.
Text2: Majiya ta ce Yari ya danne kashi ɗaya na kuɗaɗen, sai ya bai wa Akanta Janar Naira biliyan 22.
Text2 Translation: The source said that Yari withheld part of the money and gave 22 billion Naira to the Accountant General.

Text1: Inda aka samu hatsaniya da cikas ɓa su kai ko kashi 1 bisa 100 na yawan rumfunan zaɓen ƙasar ba .”
Text1 Translation: Where there were conflicts and obstacles, they did not even reach 1 percent of the number of polling booths in the country."

Text1: EFCC ta kama Obiano a filin jirgin saman Murtala Mohammed da ke Abuja, sa’o’i kaɗan bayan ya miƙa mulki a Enugu.
