Text2: Cikin makon jiya wannan jarida ta buga labarin yadda EFCC ta damƙe wasu ‘yan ruguguwa da katin ATM 1,144 a filin jirgin saman Kano.
Text2 Translation: Last week this newspaper published the story of how the EFCC arrested some fraudsters with 1,144 ATM cards at the Kano airport.

Text1: Minista Agba ya ce kashi 72 cikin 100 na matalauta duk a yankunan karkara su ke.
Text1 Translation: Minister Agba said that 72 percent of the poor are in rural areas.
Text2: Ministan Harkokin Lafiya Osagie Ehanire ya ce aƙalla akwai buƙatar a yi wa kashi 70 cikin 100 na ‘yan Najeriya allurar rigakafin korona.
Text2 Translation: The Minister of Health Osagie Ehanire has said that at least 70 percent of Nigerians need to be vaccinated against the corona virus.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 16 a kauyuka jihar Zamfara
Text1 Translation: Gunmen killed 16 people in villages in Zamfara state
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum uku a garin Bali dake karamar hukumar Bali a jihar Taraba.
Text2 Translation: Bandits killed three people in Bali town in Bali local government in Taraba state.

Text1: An yi masa gwajin jini a Legas, inda aka tabbatar cewa rukunin jinin sa iri ɗaya ne da na Sonia, ‘yar ka kai Ekweremadu.
Text1 Translation: He underwent a blood test in Lagos, where it was confirmed that his blood type is the same as that of Sonia, Ekweremadu's daughter.
Text2: “An Kai wadannan mutane babban asibitin Ringim inda a asibitin likita ya tabbatar cewa mutum biyu sun mutu.
Text2 Translation: "These people were taken to Ringim General Hospital where the doctor confirmed that two people died.

Text1: BIDIYO: Yadda jami’in KASTLEA ya lakaɗawa wani direba dukan tsiya ya jefa shi ciki kwata a Kaduna
Text1 Translation: VIDEO: How a KASTLEA officer beat up a driver and threw him into a quarter in Kaduna
Text2: Wani jami’in hukumar KSTLEA ya rufe wani direba da dukan tsiya bayan kokuwa ya kaure a tsakanin su daga binciken takardun mota.
Text2 Translation: A KSTLEA officer beat up a driver after a fight broke out between them from checking car documents.

Text1: Zan samar wa duk wani dan Najeriya tsaro daga ‘yan bindiga da mahara a duk inda yake – Buhari
Text1 Translation: I will provide security to every Nigerian from bandits and attackers wherever he is - Buhari
Text2: Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari ya sha alwashin samar wa ‘yan Najeriya tsaro a duk inda suka a fadin kasar nan.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has vowed to provide security to Nigerians wherever they are across the country.

Text1: Haka kuma Hydropower Investments Limited zai mallaki hannayen jari miliyan 10 a cikin kamfanin Sunrise Power & Transmission (Nigeria) Co. Limited.
Text1 Translation: Hydropower Investments Limited will also own 10 million shares in Sunrise Power & Transmission (Nigeria) Co. Limited.
Text2: Shi kuma Sunrise Power & Transmission Co., shi ne aka fara bai wa kwangilar aikin gina tashar wutar lantarki a Mambilla.
Text2 Translation: Sunrise Power & Transmission Co. was the first to be awarded the contract for the construction of a power station in Mambilla.

Text1: A harin wanda aka kai ranar Alhamis, kwanaki biyu kafin zaɓen gwamnoni, sun kuma lalata kayayyaki masu yawa mallakar magoya bayan APC.
Text1 Translation: In the attack which was carried out on Thursday, two days before the governorship election, they also destroyed a lot of goods belonging to APC supporters.
Text2: Ya ce Abubakar ya nemi a soke walimar ana saura kwanaki biyu kacal kafin ranar walimar.
Text2 Translation: He said that Abubakar asked for the cancellation of the party only two days before the day of the party.

Text1: Ko a ranar Litinin sai da INEC ta ce zargin aringizon ƙuri’u a zaɓen Ekiti ba gaskiya ba ne.
Text1 Translation: Even on Monday, INEC said that the allegations of vote rigging in the Ekiti election are not true.
Text2: Melaye tun da farko ya yi zargin an yi aringizon ƙuri’u 800 a zaɓen jihar Ekiti.
Text2 Translation: Melaye earlier alleged that 800 votes were rigged in the Ekiti state election.

Text1: “Ni ban ce ba na goyon bayan takarar sa ba, kuma ban ce masa ina goyon bayan takarar sa ba.” Cewar Obasanjo.
Text1 Translation: "I did not say that I do not support his candidacy, and I did not say that I support his candidacy." Said Obasanjo.
Text2: Ban ce ba zan goyi bayan takarar Tinubu ba, ban kuma ce ina goyon bayan sa ba – Obasanjo
Text2 Translation: I didn't say I won't support Tinubu's candidacy, I didn't say I support him - Obasanjo

Text1: Don haka a biya naira miliyan 80 kenan,” inji Sani.
Text1 Translation: Therefore, 80 million naira should be paid," said Sani.
Text2: Su ma za a biya su diyyar Naira miliyan 80 da Naira miliyan 2 diyya da kowane da aka ji wa rauni.
Text2 Translation: They will also be paid 80 million Naira in compensation and 2 million Naira in compensation to each injured person.

Text1: Rundunar ‘yan sanda sun kashe ‘yan IPOB biyu a kauyen Agwa dake karamar hukumar Oguta.
Text1 Translation: The police killed two members of IPOB in Agwa village in Oguta local government.
Text2: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutane  uku da ‘yan sanda 10 a garin Ngaski da Gafara dake karamar hukumar Ngaski a jihar Kebbi.
Text2 Translation: Bandits have killed three people and 10 policemen in Ngaski and Gafara town in Ngaski local government in Kebbi state.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaba Buhari Buhari, Garba Shehu ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wasu bayanai biyu da ya fitar ƙarshen mako.
Text1 Translation: President Buhari's Broadcasting Spokesperson, Garba Shehu, made this known in two other statements he released at the end of the week.
Text2: Yayin da ya ke sanar da tabbacin dawowar Buhari, Kakakin sa Garba Shehu ya ce Buhari bai fasa zuwa Landan ba.
Text2 Translation: While announcing the confirmation of Buhari's return, his spokesman Garba Shehu said that Buhari has not left for London.

Text1: Dan majalisar dokoki na jihar Kano ya doka ‘Ribas’ bayan ya tsunduma lambun jam’iyyar NNPP, ya ya rungumi tsintsiyar sa ya dawo APC
Text1 Translation: The member of the Kano State Legislative Assembly said 'Ribas' after joining the NNPP party, he embraced his broom and returned to the APC
Text2: Kakakin jam’iyyar na Legas, Seye Oladepo ne ya bayyana haka a ranar Asabar, biyo bayan komawar wani dandazon mambobin APC na jihar zuwa PDP.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the party in Lagos, Seye Oladepo, said this on Saturday, following the return of a large number of members of the APC in the state to the PDP.

Text1: Alkalin kotun ya bai wa Musa zabin zama kurkuku ko ya biya kudin belin Naira 10,000.
Text1 Translation: The judge gave Musa the choice of being in prison or paying a bail of 10,000 Naira.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Muhammed Wakili ya ce kowani mai gadi zai biya kudin belin naira 100,000 sannan kowannen su zai gabatar da shaida a kotun.
Text2 Translation: Judge Muhammed Wakili said that each guard will pay a bail of 100,000 naira and each of them will present evidence in the court.

Text1: Kakakin rundunar Abimbola Oyeyemi ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da ranar Litinin a garin Abeokuta.
Text1 Translation: The spokesman of the command, Abimbola Oyeyemi, announced this in a document on Monday in Abeokuta.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar Dungus Abdulkarim ya sanar da haka ranar Asabar a garin Damaturu.
Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the command, Dungus Abdulkarim, announced this on Saturday in Damaturu town.

Text1: Gwamnan Edo ya bijire wa umarnin kotu, ya ce sai mai shaidar rigakafin korona zai yi sallar jam’i a masallaci
Text1 Translation: The governor of Edo has defied the court's order, saying that the person who testified against the corona virus will perform congregational prayers in the mosque
Text2: A na shi jawabin gwamnan jihar Edo Godwin Obaseki ya bayyana cewa an yi wa mutum sama da 130,000 rigakafin korona a jihar.
Text2 Translation: In his speech, the governor of Edo state, Godwin Obaseki, stated that over 130,000 people have been vaccinated against corona in the state.

Text1: Rowland ya ce ƙasar Indiya ce ta fi yawan likitoci baƙi a Ingila, sai Pakistan, sai kuma Najeriya wadda ita ce ta uku.
Text1 Translation: Rowland said that India has the largest number of foreign doctors in England, followed by Pakistan, followed by Nigeria which is the third.
Text2: Cikin watan Nuwamba, 2022, Kungiyar Likitocin Najeriya ta ce likitoci 24,000 ne kaɗai a Najeriya, sauran sun gudu Ingila, Saudiyya da Qatar.
Text2 Translation: In November, 2022, the Nigerian Medical Association said there are only 24,000 doctors in Nigeria, the rest have fled to England, Saudi Arabia and Qatar.

Text1: ‘Yan sumoga na yi wa yaki da ‘yan bindiga kafar angulu a Katsina – Kwastam
Text1 Translation: The smugglers are fighting against the bandits in Katsina - Customs
Text2: Hukumar kwastam ta ƙasa dake jihar Katsina ta zargi ‘yan sumoga da yi wa yaki da ‘yan bindiga a jihar kafar angulu.
Text2 Translation: The National Customs Commission in Katsina State has accused drug traffickers of fighting bandits in Kafar Angulu State.

Text1: Ya ce ya kwashe sama da shekaru 30 ya na neman kuɗi a aikin lauya,  ba a cikin Najeriya kaɗai ba,  har a ƙasashen waje.
Text1 Translation: He said he has spent more than 30 years seeking money in the work of a lawyer, not only in Nigeria, but also abroad.
Text2: A ƙarshen shekarar 2020, NBS ta ce kashi 33.3 na ‘yan Najeriya masu ƙarfin iya yin aiki, ba su da aikin yi.
Text2 Translation: At the end of 2020, NBS said that 33.3 percent of Nigerians who are able to work, are unemployed.

Text1: Akpanudoedehe ya yi kira ga mutane su rika sanar da jami’an tsaro ayyukan yan bindiga a yankunan su.
Text1 Translation: Akpanudoedehe called on people to inform the security forces about the activities of bandits in their areas.
Text2: A karshe ya yi kira ga mutanen gari da su rika taimakawa jami’an tsaro da bayanan sirri da min kamo bata gari a fadin jihar.
Text2 Translation: In the end, he called on the people of the city to help the security forces with secret information to arrest the missing people across the state.

Text1: A Gusau, bayanin  sirri ya nuna cewa za su fara yada zango ne su na sajewa da mutanen Unguwar Gwaza, kusa da kurkukun Gusau.
Text1 Translation: In Gusau, secret information shows that they will start setting up camp to meet the people of Gwaza neighborhood, near the Gusau prison.
Text2: Rahotanni da suka iske mu a wannan lokaci sun nuna cewa sojojin  Najeriya na batakashi da ‘yan Ta’adda a Madalla, dake kusa da Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The reports that reached us at this time show that the Nigerian army is fighting against terrorists in Madalla, which is near Abuja.

Text1: “MASSOB na kuma tunatar da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari cewa ci gaba da tsare Kanu a hannun DSS zai ƙara tunzirawa da ruruta wutar fitintinun kawai.
Text1 Translation: "MASSOB is also reminding President Muhammadu Buhari that the continued detention of Kanu in the hands of the DSS will only aggravate and inflame the fire of the riots.
Text2: Zan iya zuwa kai tsaye na shaida da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari cewa na ga inda aka kashe naira biliyan 157.
Text2 Translation: I can go directly and testify to President Muhammadu Buhari that I saw where 157 billion naira was spent.

Text1: Ezeh ya ce kamfanin za ta hada hannu da jami’an tsaro domin ganin an hukunta barayin dake lalata tiransifoma.
Text1 Translation: Ezeh said that the company will cooperate with the security forces to ensure that the thieves who destroy the transformer are punished.
Text2: Ezeh ya ce duk barayin dake lalata tiransifoma da Kamfanin ta kama ta damka su ga hannun ‘yan sanda.
Text2 Translation: Ezeh said that all the thieves who were destroying transformers were caught by the company and handed over to the police.

Text1: An kama Karmanawa tun cikin watan Satumba, 2021, amma bidiyon tambayoyin da aka yi masa ya ɓulla a soshiyal midiya ne kwanan nan.
Text1 Translation: Karmanawa was arrested in September, 2021, but the video of his interrogation has only recently surfaced on social media.
Text2: Cikin bidiyon da Premium Times ta saurara a cikin watan Yulin 2021, an ji Bello Turji ne cewa:
Text2 Translation: In the video that Premium Times listened to in July 2021, Bello Turji was heard saying:

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaba Buhari, Garba Shehu ya bayyana cewa Buhari zai yi kwanaki takwas kafin ya dawo Najeriya a ranar 19 Ga Afrilu.
Text1 Translation: President Buhari's Media Spokesperson, Garba Shehu has stated that Buhari will be eight days away before returning to Nigeria on April 19.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Zamfara, Mohammed Shehu ya sanar da cewa ‘yan sanda sun yi arangama da ‘yan bindiga a yankunan Gumi da Bukkuyum.
Text2 Translation: Zamfara Police Broadcasting Spokesman, Mohammed Shehu has announced that the police have clashed with bandits in Gumi and Bukkuyum areas.

Text1: Ya rasu safiyar Talata bayan ya yi fama da wata gajeriyar rashin lafiya.
Text1 Translation: He died Tuesday morning after a short illness.
Text2: Adnan ya rasu a ranar Juma’a, bayan ya sha fama da rashin lafiya.
Text2 Translation: Adnan died on Friday, after suffering from illness.

Text1: A yayin ziyarar da Minista Zainab ta kai, Gwamnan Jihar Anambra Charles Soludo ne ya karɓe ta, a ƙarƙashin wakilcin Mataimakin Gwamna Onyeka Ibizim.
Text1 Translation: During the visit of Minister Zainab, she was received by Anambra State Governor Charles Soludo, represented by Deputy Governor Onyeka Ibizim.
Text2: Omisore kuwa kafin ya koma PDP, ya yi Mataimakin Gwamna a Jihar Osun, ƙarƙashin jam’iyyar AD.
Text2 Translation: Before Omisore joined the PDP, he served as Deputy Governor in Osun State, under the AD party.

Text1: APCn Kano sai tsiyayewa ta ke yi, ƴan majalisa uku sun koma Jam’iyya mai alamar kayan maimari, NNPP
Text1 Translation: APC in Kano is on its way, three members of parliament have switched to the party with the symbol of wealth, NNPP
Text2: ‘Yan majalisan dokokin jihar Kano uku sun tuma tsalle daga jami’iyyar APC sun tsunduma jam’iyyar NNPP mai alamar kayan marmari.
Text2 Translation: The three members of the Kano State Legislative Assembly have jumped from the APC party and joined the NNPP party with the brand of vegetables.

Text1: Rohotanni sun nuna cewa ‘yan bindiga suna sanya dokan karban haraji a wasu yankuna na Jihar Zamfara.
Text1 Translation: Rumors indicate that bandits are imposing tax collection laws in some areas of Zamfara State.
Text2: Mazauna wasu kauyukan jihar sun koka cewa haka kowa ke fama da matsalar ‘yan bindiga a yankin.
Text2 Translation: Residents of some villages in the state have complained that everyone is suffering from the problem of bandits in the area.

Text1: Kotun majistare dake Iyaganku ta gurfanar da dan bautan kasa mai suna Ukanwa Ikechukwu ranar Juma’a bisa laifin damfaran wata ‘yar sanda naira 235,000.
Text1 Translation: The Magistrate's Court in Iyaganku prosecuted a national servant named Ukanwa Ikechukwu on Friday for defrauding a policewoman of 235,000 naira.
Text2: Kotun ta gurfanar da wadannan mutane bisa laifin hada baki da korar dan haya ta karfi da tsiya.
Text2 Translation: The court prosecuted these people for conspiring to evict a tenant by force.

Text1: Kotu ta yanke wa Habila da Joy hukuncin zaman kurkuku bayan kama su da laifin satar N700,000
Text1 Translation: The court sentenced Abel and Joy to prison after arresting them for stealing N700,000
Text2: HATTARA IYAYE: Kotu ta yanke wa ‘malamin gida’ hukuncin ɗaurin rai da rai bayan an akam shi da laifin ɗirka wa ‘ƴar maigida ciki
Text2 Translation: PARENTS BEWARE: The court sentenced the 'home teacher' to life imprisonment after he was found guilty of impregnating the owner's daughter

Text1: A Daura Tinubu ya bayyana sunan Shettima matsayin ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa, yayin da ya kai wa Buhari ziyasa.
Text1 Translation: In Daura, Tinubu announced the name of Shettima as the vice presidential candidate, while visiting Buhari.
Text2: A kan haka ne APM ta ce Shettima ya fito takara a wurare biyu, wato takarar sanata da ta mataimakin shugaban ƙasa a lokaci guda.
Text2 Translation: Based on this, APM said that Shettima ran for two positions, that is, the senatorial and vice-presidential contests at the same time.

Text1: Akpanudoedehe ya ce jami’iyyar APC ba ta ji dadin yadda yadda ‘yan bindiga ke kisan mutane a jihar Zamfara da sauran jihohin Arewacin kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: Akpanudoedehe said that the APC party is not happy with the way bandits are killing people in Zamfara state and other northern states of the country.
Text2: Musa ya bayyana ci gaba da rajistar da ake yi na mambobin APC a Jihar Zamfara a yanzu, karyawa ce da bijire wa umarnin kotu.
Text2 Translation: Musa explained that the ongoing registration of APC members in Zamfara State is a violation and defiance of the court order.

Text1: A Arewa maso Gabas kuma an kashe mutum 19, ciki har da Burgediya Janar Dzarma Zirkusu.
Text1 Translation: In the North East, 19 people were killed, including Brigadier General Dzarma Zirkusu.
Text2: Mayaƙan Boko Haram ɓangaren ‘yan ISWAP sun kashe Burgediya Janar Dzarma Zirkusu a yankin Ƙaramar Hukumar Askira Uba, cikin Jihar Barno.
Text2 Translation: Boko Haram fighters from ISWAP have killed Brigadier General Dzarma Zirkusu in Askira Uba Local Government Area, Barno State.

Text1: Mataimakin dan takarar shugaban ƙasa na jam’iyyar APC
Text1 Translation: Deputy presidential candidate of the APC party
Text2: Shugaban Jam’iyyar APC Abdullahi Adamu ya gargaɗi dukkan ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC su guji caccakar Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari.
Text2 Translation: The Chairman of the APC, Abdullahi Adamu, has warned all presidential candidates under the APC to refrain from criticizing President Muhammadu Buhari.

Text1: TSARO: An kashe ‘yan sanda uku da wasu mutane 18 a cikin makon jiya a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: SECURITY: Three policemen and 18 other people were killed last week in Nigeria
Text2: RASHIN TSARO: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe sojoji shida, ɗan sanda ɗaya da wasu mutane 13 a cikin  mako daya a Najeriya
Text2 Translation: UNSAFE: Gunmen kill six soldiers, one policeman and 13 others in one week in Nigeria

Text1: Zulum ya bayyana haka a Abuja a ranar Alhamis, lokacin da ya bayyana gaban Tawagar Jami’an Yaɗa Labaran Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: Zulum stated this in Abuja on Thursday, when he appeared before the Presidential Press Officers Team.
Text2: Haka Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaban Ƙasa Femi Adesina ne ya bayyana haka a ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: This was disclosed by the Presidential Press Officer Femi Adesina on Thursday.

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba, Nafeesat ta rubuta a shafinta cewa iyaye su daina haifan ƴaƴan da ba zasu iya kula da su ba.
Text1 Translation: In case it is not forgotten, Nafeesat wrote on her page that parents should stop giving birth to children that they cannot take care of.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, Shugaban Cibiyar Kula da Kansa na Najeriya ya Bayyana cewa cutar kansa ta kashe mutum 78,000 cikin 2020 a Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, the President of the Nigerian Cancer Center stated that cancer killed 78,000 people in 2020 in Nigeria.

Text1: Kotun Ƙoli ta aza ranar yanke hukuncin shari’ar cancantar takarar sanata tsakanin Bashir Machina da Sanata Ahmad Lawan
Text1 Translation: The Supreme Court has set a date for deciding the eligibility trial for the senatorial contest between Bashir Machina and Senator Ahmad Lawan
Text2: Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta aza ranar 12 Ga Oktoba domin yanke hukuncin ƙarar Tinubu da jam’iyyar ‘Action Allience’ (AA) ta maka shi.
Text2 Translation: The Federal High Court has set October 12 to decide on Tinubu's case brought against him by the 'Action Alliance' (AA) party.

Text1: IDAN KURA NA MAGANIN ZAWO…: PDP ta ce APC ta ji da matsalolin da ke jikin Tinubu, ta daina magana kan rikicin rundunar ATIKU 2023
Text1 Translation: IF THE DUST OF THE MEDICINE COMES...: PDP says APC is aware of the problems in Tinubu's body, it has stopped talking about the ATIKU 2023 crisis
Text2: IDAN KURA NA MAGANIN ZAWO:  Wata ƙungiyar matan Igbo ta yi alkawarin sheƙa wa Yahaya Bello ƙuri’u miliyan 25 a zaben 2023
Text2 Translation: IF THE DUST IS THE MEDICINE: An Igbo women's group has promised to get 25 million votes for Yahaya Bello in the 2023 election

Text1: Rundunar ƴan sanda sun yi kira ga matasa da su kwantar da hankalin su cewa jami’an tsaro na yin bincike akai.
Text1 Translation: The police called on the youth to calm down that the security forces are investigating.
Text2: Jami’an tsaro sun tafka kuskure, an yi zaton ƴan bindiga ne aka kama ashe ba haka bane, a gafarce mu – Rundunar Ƴan sanda
Text2 Translation: The security forces made a mistake, it was thought that they were bandits and they were arrested, is that not the case, please forgive us - Police Force

Text1: Adewinmbi ya ce rundunar ta kama barawon da na’urar hada sauyi, na’urar microphones, ganguna da sauran su.
Text1 Translation: Adewinmbi said the team caught the thief with a mixer, microphones, drums and others.
Text2: Ya ce an kama wadannan bisa laifukan da suka hada da sata, shiga kungiyar asiri, fashi da makami, garkuwa da mutane da dai sauran su.
Text2 Translation: He said that these were arrested for crimes including theft, joining a cult, armed robbery, kidnapping and many others.

Text1: “Bayan kwanaki biyu da Uwadiegwu ya yi wa matarsa duka ne aka kwantar da Ogochukwu a asibiti inda daga nan ta ce ga garin kunan.
Text1 Translation: "Two days after Uwadiegwu beat his wife, Ogochukwu was admitted to the hospital where she then said to the town that she was dead.
Text2: ” Daga nan ne jami’an tsaro suka dira dajin inda suka kama su duka suka rika loda su a bayan mota.
Text2 Translation: "Then the security officers went to the forest where they arrested them all and loaded them into the back of a car.

Text1: Cikin makon jiya ne wannan jarida ta buga labarin yadda Boko Haram sun kafa sansanoni a yankunan Shiroro da Borgu.
Text1 Translation: Last week, this newspaper published the story of how Boko Haram have established camps in Shiroro and Borgu areas.
Text2: Wannan jarida ta buga labarin Boko Haram sun kashe Janar ɗin sojan Najeriya da wasu sojoji uku.
Text2 Translation: This newspaper published the story of Boko Haram killing a Nigerian army general and three other soldiers.

Text1: Jigida na taimakawa wa mace wajen ƙara girman  kugu wato Hips a Turance, dakuma samun farin jini cikin mutane
Text1 Translation: Jigida helps a woman to increase the size of her waist, which is Hips in English, and to gain popularity among people
Text2: Okunna ya ce jima’i na taimakawa wajen kara dankon soyayya tsakanin mace da miji a aure.
Text2 Translation: Okunna said that sex helps to increase the bond of love between husband and wife in marriage.

Text1: Uba Sani ya ziyarci masarautar Lere ya yi alwashin kwarara ayyukan ci gaba idan ya zama gwamna
Text1 Translation: Uba Sani visited Lere emirate and vowed to carry out development activities if he becomes governor
Text2: Tun yanzu zan fara kwarara wa marayun Kaduna lagwada kafin in zama gwamna – Uba Sani
Text2 Translation: From now on, I will start pouring money for the Kaduna orphans before I become governor - Uba Sani

Text1: Ƴan sanda sun kama mutumin da ya saba Yi wa mata fashi bayan ya zuba musu maganin barci a lemu
Text1 Translation: The police arrested a man who used to rob women after pouring sleeping pills on them
Text2: Ƴan sanda sun kama direban dake haɗa baki da ƴan fashi suna yi wa mutane sata a Jigawa
Text2 Translation: The police have arrested the driver who conspired with robbers to steal from people in Jigawa

Text1: Jihar Jigawa kuwa, ɗan tsohon gwamnan jihar ne, Mustapha Sule Lamido ya yi nasara a zaben gwamnan.
Text1 Translation: In Jigawa State, the son of the former governor of the state, Mustapha Sule Lamido won the governorship election.
Text2: Adamu wanda tsohon ɗan PDP ne, ya shafe shekaru takwas ya na gwamna a Jihar Nasarawa ƙarƙashin PDP, tsakanin 1999 zuwa 2007.
Text2 Translation: Adamu who is a former member of PDP, spent eight years as governor in Nasarawa State under PDP, between 1999 and 2007.

Text1: Sun nuna masa tsoron cewa wahalar da jama’a ke ciki za ta iya shafar nasarar jam’iyyar su a zaɓen 2023.
Text1 Translation: They expressed their fear that the suffering of the people could affect the success of their party in the 2023 elections.
Text2: Tunanin da ake yi cewa zai kwashi miliyoyin ƙuri’u a ɓagas, zaɓen Osun ya nuna ba haka siyasar za ta kasance ba.
Text2 Translation: It is thought that he will win millions of votes, the Osun election shows that politics will not be like that.

Text1: Ina tabbatar maka cewa zan baka goyon baya na don ganin APC ta yi nasara a zaɓen dake tafe
Text1 Translation: I assure you that I will give you my support to see APC win the upcoming election
Text2: A 2014, Buhari ya yi ƙorafi ganin cewa APC ta sayar da fam na takarar shugaban ƙasa, a kan naira miliyan 27.5.
Text2 Translation: In 2014, Buhari complained that the APC sold the presidential ticket for 27.5 million naira.

Text1: Yadda dakarun Najeriya suka kashe Boko Haram 29, suka ceto mutum 52 da suka yi garkuwa da su
Text1 Translation: How Nigerian forces killed 29 Boko Haram and rescued 52 people they kidnapped
Text2: Askarawan Najeriya sun kashe ƴan bindiga 42, sun kama 20 sannan sun ceto mutum 63 da aka yi garkuwa da su – DHQ
Text2 Translation: Nigerian soldiers kill 42 gunmen, arrest 20 and rescue 63 hostages - DHQ

Text1: CIkin wata sanarwar da babban ɗan sa Segun Ajibola ya sa wa hannu, kuma ya fitar, ya ce Ajibola ya rasu a Abeokuta, ranar Lahadi.
Text1 Translation: In a statement signed and issued by his eldest son, Segun Ajibola, he said Ajibola died in Abeokuta, on Sunday.
Text2: Sanarwar barazanar fara yajin aikin na cikin wata takardar da shugabannin NUPENG suka fitar, bayan tashi daga taron da suka yi a ranar Litinin.
Text2 Translation: The announcement of the strike threat is contained in a document issued by the leaders of NUPENG, after leaving their meeting on Monday.

Text1: Fadar ta fitar da sanarwa cewa, “zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 ya fi zaɓukan baya inganci.”
Text1 Translation: The palace issued a statement saying, "the 2023 presidential election is more valid than previous elections."
Text2: Tinubu ya kayar da ‘yan takara 14 sannan ya zama ɗan takarar jam’iyya mai mulki a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2023 da ke tafe.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu defeated 14 candidates and became the candidate of the ruling party in the upcoming 2023 presidential election.

Text1: Shi ma Adamu Aliero ya fice ya koma PDP kuma yanzu haka a ƙarƙashin PDP ɗin zai sake yin takarar sanata ɗin.
Text1 Translation: Adamu Aliero also left and joined the PDP and now under the PDP he will run for the senator again.
Text2: Awowi kadan bayan ficewar sa daga jam’iyyar APC, sanata Adamu Aliero yayi nasara a zaben fidda dan takarar sanatan Kebbi ta tsakiya.
Text2 Translation: A few hours after his departure from the APC, Senator Adamu Aliero won the Kebbi central senatorial election.

Text1: Ta ce kasar Amurka a shirye take ta ci gaba da tallafa wa gwamnati wajen yaki da cutar a jihar.
Text1 Translation: She said that the United States is ready to continue supporting the government in fighting the disease in the state.
Text2: Aisha ta ce ta raba takin ne domin mara wa gwamnati baya wajen samar da isasshen abinci a jihar.
Text2 Translation: Aisha said that she distributed the fertilizer to support the government in providing enough food in the state.

Text1: Majalisa ta umarci Hukumar Kwastan ta biya diyyar Naira miliyan 360 ga iyalan mutum 18 da ta bindige
Text1 Translation: Parliament orders the Customs Commission to pay compensation of 360 million naira to the families of 18 people it shot
Text2: Sannan kuma Majalisa ta umarci a biya diyyar Naira miliyan 160 ga mutum 8 da su kwastan ɗin su ka kashe a Jihar Oyo.
Text2 Translation: And the Parliament ordered to pay compensation of 160 million Naira to 8 people who were killed by customs in Oyo State.

Text1: Sun samu nasarar tone nakiyar ce (IED) bayan wasu masu kishi sun gaggauta kai rahoton ganin bam ɗin a ofishin ‘yan sanda.
Text1 Translation: They managed to unearth the IED after some enthusiasts immediately reported the sighting of the bomb to the police station.
Text2: Cikin Ikon Allah kuwa sun samu nasarar cafke wasu mahara kusan 10 suka kuma kawo su ofishin ‘yan sanda.
Text2 Translation: By the power of God, they managed to arrest about 10 assailants and brought them to the police station.

Text1: TSARO: An kashe ‘yan sanda uku da wasu mutane 18 a cikin makon jiya a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: SECURITY: Three policemen and 18 other people were killed last week in Nigeria
Text2: Bisa ga ƙididdigar da aka yi an samu raguwar akalla kashi 80 cikin 100 akan waɗanda aka kashe a makon jiya a kasar.
Text2 Translation: According to the estimates, there has been a reduction of at least 80 percent on those who were killed last week in the country.

Text1: Ministan Harkokin Sufuri, Mu’azu Sambo ne ya bayyana haka, a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai na Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: This was stated by the Minister of Transport, Mu'azu Sambo, when he was meeting with the press at the Presidential Palace.
Text2: Wike ya bayyana haka a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a Fatakwal.
Text2 Translation: Wike stated this when he was meeting with the press at Fatakwal.

Text1: Hukumar ta kama shi a ranar 3 ga Yuly a Ojoo park za shi jihar Sokoto inda daga nan ya wuce zuwa kasar Algeria.
Text1 Translation: The agency arrested him on the 3rd of July in Ojoo Park, Sokoto State, from where he went to Algeria.
Text2: Hukumar ta kama Ijabula a Yola jihar Adamawa yayin da hukumar ke caje mutane da motoci a kan hanyar Legas zuwa Ibadan.
Text2 Translation: The agency arrested Ijabula in Yola, Adamawa state while the agency was charging people and vehicles on the road from Lagos to Ibadan.

Text1: Ɗalibai 13,634 cikin duka ɗaliban kasar nan da suka samu gurbin karatu a jami’o’in kasar nan ska shiga jami’ar Ilori.
Text1 Translation: 13,634 students out of all the students in the country who got admission in the universities of the country joined Ilori University.
Text2: A 2020, ɗalibai 12,336 suka samu gurbin karatu a jami’ar Benin.
Text2 Translation: In 2020, 12,336 students were admitted to the University of Benin.

Text1: “A dalilin haka muka kama mutum 1,078 dake da alaka da Sha ko safaran haramtattun kwayoyi inda a ciki akwai mata 127 da maza 951.
Text1 Translation: "Because of this, we have arrested 1,078 people who are related to drinking or trafficking illegal drugs, including 127 women and 951 men.
Text2: Daga cikin wadanda aka ceto akwai yara maza 5 da mata 25 inda a ciki akwai masu ciki da masu shayarwa.
Text2 Translation: Among those rescued are 5 boys and 25 women, including pregnant and lactating women.

Text1: “An kashe hawarwakin mutum 11 da ƴan bindigan suka kashe sannan mutane da dama sun ji rauni sanadiyyar wannan hari.
Text1 Translation: "11 people were killed by the bandits and many people were injured due to this attack.
Text2: Yadda Ƴan bindiga suka kashe mutum uku suka yi garkuwa da mutane da dama a jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: How bandits killed three people and kidnapped many people in Katsina state

Text1: Daga nan ya ce mafita kawai ita ce mu yi tururuwa mu fita mu yi zaɓe a ranar 25 Ga Fabrairu, 2023.
Text1 Translation: He then said that the only way out is for us to rush out and vote on February 25, 2023.
Text2: Wutar wadda aka banka wa ofishin, ita ce ta huɗu da aka cinna wa ofishin hukumar zaɓe a kudancin ƙasar nan a cikin makonni huɗu.
Text2 Translation: The fire that was set on the office, is the fourth that was set on the office of the electoral commission in the south of the country in four weeks.

Text1: ‘YAN BINDIGA: An hana siyar da fetur a jarka a Jigawa
Text1 Translation: GUNS: The sale of gasoline at the bar is prohibited in Jigawa
Text2: Gwamnatin Jihar Jigawa ta haramta siyar da man fetur a jarka a duk fadin Jihar a yunkurinta na dakele ayukan yan bindaga.
Text2 Translation: The Jigawa State Government has banned the sale of petrol in bulk across the state in its bid to curb the activities of gunmen.

Text1: A wani labarin kuma, an yi garkuwa da ɗan takarar mataimakin gwamna kan hanyar zuwa jefa ƙuri’a.
Text1 Translation: In another story, a deputy governor candidate was kidnapped on his way to vote.
Text2: Amma ana saura kwana ɗaya sai ya kira ɗan takarar mataimakin gwamna ya ce ba zai halarta ba, don haka a fasa kawai.
Text2 Translation: But with one day left, he called the deputy governor candidate and said that he will not attend, so just break it up.

Text1: ZABEN KADUNA: PDP ta lashe kujerar shugaban karamar hukumar Kajuru, ta cinye kujerun kansiloli
Text1 Translation: KADUNA ELECTION: PDP won the Kajuru local government chairperson seat, won the councilor seats
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ce ta lashe kujerar shugaban karamar hukumar Kajuru a zaben Kaduna da ka yi ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: The PDP won the seat of Kajuru local government chairman in the Kaduna election held on Saturday.

Text1: LISSAFIN DAWAKAN RANO:  Buhari na neman ƙara kasafin 2022 daga naira tiriliyan 13.98 zuwa naira tiriliyan 16.4
Text1 Translation: HORSE LIST OF THE DAY: Buhari wants to increase the 2022 budget from 13.98 trillion naira to 16.4 trillion naira
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya nemi ƙara yawan kasafin 2022 daga naira tiriliyan 13.98 zuwa naira tiriliyan 16.45
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has requested to increase the 2022 budget from 13.98 trillion naira to 16.45 trillion naira

Text1: Sai dai kuma a ɓangaren PDP ma Gwamna Aminu Tambuwal na Sokoto da Ademola Adeleke na Osun sun fito sun yi tir.
Text1 Translation: However, on the part of the PDP, Governor Aminu Tambuwal of Sokoto and Ademola Adeleke of Osun also came out and denounced it.
Text2: An rantsar da Ademola Adeleke na PDP sabon Gwamnan Jihar Osun a ranar Lahadi.
Text2 Translation: Ademola Adeleke of PDP was sworn in as the new Governor of Osun State on Sunday.

Text1: Tun a ranar Litinin ce dai APC ta tantance ‘yan takara 22, saura 11
Text1 Translation: Since Monday, APC has identified 22 candidates, 11 remain
Text2: Kwamitin Tantance ‘Yan Takarar Shugaban Ƙasa na APC ya tantance ‘yan takara 12 a ranar Litinin.
Text2 Translation: The APC Presidential Candidates Screening Committee screened 12 candidates on Monday.

Text1: Kyaudai ya ce za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 30 ga Agusta sannan ya ce ma’auratan su gabatar da iyayensu a wannan rana.
Text1 Translation: Kyaudai said that the trial will continue on August 30 and asked the couple to present their parents on the same day.
Text2: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu.
Text2 Translation: The trial will continue on February 18.

Text1: “Ɗan takarar da Wike ya goyi baya a Cross River ya faɗi zaɓe.”
Text1 Translation: "The candidate supported by Wike in Cross River has dropped out."
Text2: “A Akwa Ibom Wike bai goyi bayan ɗan takarar PDP ba, ya goyi bayan mai adawa da PDP, wato Albert, Kuma faɗuwa zaɓe ya yi.
Text2 Translation: "In Akwa Ibom, Wike did not support the PDP candidate, he supported the opponent of the PDP, that is Albert, and he lost the election.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun yi garkuwa da dalibai mata da ba a san adadin yawan su ba a kwalejin kiwon lafiya da ke Tsafe jihar Zamfara.
Text1 Translation: Gunmen have kidnapped an unknown number of female students at a medical college in Tsafe, Zamfara state.
Text2: AN GUDU NA A TSIRA BA: Ƴan bindiga sun yi garkuwa da mutane 11 a Shimfiɗa, jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: 11 people have been kidnapped by bandits in Shimfida, Katsina state

Text1: Sai sai kuma bai yi nasara ba a zaɓen fidda gwani da aka yi zargin tafka maguɗi a wajen yin sa.
Text1 Translation: Then he did not win in the primary election which was allegedly rigged.
Text2: “Sai dai ku matasa a matsayin ku na farkon shiga siyasa, zaɓen fidda gwani a ƙarƙashin wakilai zai fi sauƙi wajen tsayawar ku takara.
Text2 Translation: "But for you young people, as you are the first to join politics, primary elections under representatives will be easier for you to run for office.

Text1: Atiku na samun tangarɗa a kamfen ɗin sa, ta hanyoyi da dama.
Text1 Translation: Atiku is gaining ground in his campaign, in many ways.
Text2: Wasu da dama na cewa Atiku bai fitar da kuɗi a kamfen ɗin sa na 2019 ba, kamar yadda aka yi tsammanin zai yi.
Text2 Translation: Many are saying that Atiku did not spend money in his 2019 campaign, as expected.

Text1: ” Mun yi ta aika masa da gayyata ya bayyana a ofishin EFCC amma yadda kasan kana yi da dutse bai amsa gayyatar ba.
Text1 Translation: "We sent him an invitation to appear at the EFCC office, but he did not accept the invitation.
Text2: PREMIUM TIMES ta aika masa da saƙon tes, domin jin ta bakin sa, har yau bai maido amsa ba.
Text2 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES sent him a text message to hear from him, but he has not yet responded.

Text1: Shugaban Jam’iyyar APC Abdullahi Adamu ya gargaɗi dukkan ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC su guji caccakar Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari.
Text1 Translation: The Chairman of the APC, Abdullahi Adamu, has warned all presidential candidates under the APC to refrain from criticizing President Muhammadu Buhari.
Text2: Aƙalla akwai masu takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin APC har mutum 23.
Text2 Translation: There are at least 23 presidential candidates under the APC.

Text1: Hukumar NDLEA ta bayyana yadda ta kama muggan kwayoyi masu nauyin kilogiram 500 da masu safarae kwayoyin a jihohi 8 a kasar nan.
Text1 Translation: The NDLEA has disclosed how it has seized drugs weighing 500 kilograms and drug traffickers in 8 states in the country.
Text2: Hukumar ta kuma kama wata babban mota mai lamba AA462QAP jihar Filato dauke muggan kwayoyi da aka boye a cikin kwalaben abinci.
Text2 Translation: The agency also seized a truck with the number AA462QAP Plateau state carrying drugs hidden in food bottles.

Text1: “A karo na farko gwamnoni 20 da ke kan mulki duk ba su kawo yawan ƙuri’un da aka jefa a jihohin su ba.
Text1 Translation: "For the first time, the 20 governors who are in power did not bring the number of votes cast in their states.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, ba wannan ne karo na farko da aka soki shirin BBNaija ba.
Text2 Translation: Not to forget, this is not the first time the BBNaija show has been criticized.

Text1: Okorocha ya ce ya amince da a tsayar da ɗan takara bisa yarjejeniya, ba tare da an yi zaɓe ba.
Text1 Translation: Okorocha said he agreed to appoint a candidate based on consensus, without holding elections.
Text2: “Shugaba Buhari ya yi amanna da a samu matsayar cimma amincewa da shugaba, ba sai an yi zaɓe tsakanin ‘yan takara ba.
Text2 Translation: "President Buhari believes that in order to reach a consensus on the president, there is no need to vote between candidates.

Text1: Ya ce PDP za ta ƙara ruftawa cikin rikici muddin ba a bai wa kudu shugabancin jam’iyya ba.
Text1 Translation: He said that the PDP will continue to be engulfed in conflict as long as the leadership of the party is not given to the south.
Text2: “Yanzu ba a keɓance wasu an ce ba za a ƙara masu tsawon lokacin yin ritayar ba.
Text2 Translation: "Now some are not excluded and it is said that those who have a long retirement period will not be extended.

Text1: Sentence 1
Text1 Translation: Sentence 1
Text2: Sentence 2
Text2 Translation: Sentence 2

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya jaddada wa Gwamnonin APC cewa ba zai yi wa zaɓen 2023 katsalandan ba.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari assured the APC Governors that he will not interfere with the 2023 elections.
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya jaddada cewa gwamnatin sa ta ɗauki rayukan ‘yan Najeriya da muhimmanci.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari emphasized that his government takes the lives of Nigerians seriously.

Text1: Atiku na PDP da Obi na LP sun ƙi amincewa da sakamakon zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na da Majalisar Dattawa da ta Tarayya.
Text1 Translation: Atiku of the PDP and Obi of the LP refused to accept the results of the presidential election, the Senate and the Federal Assembly.
Text2: ZAƁEN SHUGABAN KASA: Yadda Peter Obi na LP ya lallasa Tinubu a ƙaramar hukumar sa ta Ikeja
Text2 Translation: PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION: How LP's Peter Obi defeated Tinubu in his Ikeja local government

Text1: A karshe Baraje ya yi kira ga mutane da su hada hannu da hukumar domin yakar muggan kwayoyi a jihar kwatakwata.
Text1 Translation: Finally, Baraje called on people to join hands with the agency to fight against drugs in the state.
Text2: Hukumar ta kuma kama wata babban mota mai lamba AA462QAP jihar Filato dauke muggan kwayoyi da aka boye a cikin kwalaben abinci.
Text2 Translation: The agency also seized a truck with the number AA462QAP Plateau state carrying drugs hidden in food bottles.

Text1: Goro na APC wanda kuma shi ke kan kujerar, ya zo na uku da ƙuri’u 8,668.
Text1 Translation: APC's Goro, who is also in the seat, came third with 8,668 votes.
Text2: Tinubu na APC ya zo na biyu da ƙuri’u 161,600, sai Atiku Abubakar na PDP ya zo na uku da ƙuri’u 90,183.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu of APC came second with 161,600 votes, while Atiku Abubakar of PDP came third with 90,183 votes.

Text1: Wakilan zaɓen sun jefa masa ƙuri’u 656, sai ƙwaya ɗaya tal ce ba a dangwala daidai ba.
Text1 Translation: The election representatives cast 656 votes for him, but one nut was not cast correctly.
Text2: Ya ce Ƙaramar Hukuma ɗaya tal APC ta yi nasara a zaɓen Shugaban Ƙasa a Jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: He said that the Local Authority of the APC won the Presidential election in Kaduna State.

Text1: Har yanzu akwai sauran fasinjoji tsare a hannun ƴan bindigan wanda ke jiran tsammani.
Text1 Translation: There are still other passengers in the hands of the gunmen who are waiting to be arrested.
Text2: Har yanzu akwai ɗalibai da dama dake tsare hannun ƴan bindiga ba a sako su ba.
Text2 Translation: There are still many students who are in the hands of gunmen and have not been released.

Text1: Alkalin kotun ya bai wa Musa zabin zama kurkuku ko ya biya kudin belin Naira 10,000.
Text1 Translation: The judge gave Musa the choice of being in prison or paying a bail of 10,000 Naira.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Mrs Patricia Adetuyibi ta ce  kowannen su, Precious da Idris za su biya belin Naira 500,000 sannan su gabatar da shaida Kuma
Text2 Translation: Judge Mrs Patricia Adetuyibi said each of them, Precious and Idris will pay a bail of 500,000 Naira and present evidence.

Text1: Tuni dai su ka kafa kwamitin mambobi 13 ƙarƙashin shugabancin Nicholas Mutu, ɗan PDP daga jihar Delta a matsayin shugaban kwamiti.
Text1 Translation: They have already formed a committee of 13 members under the leadership of Nicholas Mutu, a PDP member from Delta state as the chairman of the committee.
Text2: Gwamnan Jihar Delta kuma ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa na Atiku Abubakar a PDP, Ifeanyi Okowa, ya roƙi jama’a a kai zuciya nesa.
Text2 Translation: The governor of Delta State and the vice-presidential candidate of Atiku Abubakar in the PDP, Ifeanyi Okowa, has appealed to the people to be vigilant.

Text1: Kotu a Karu, ta yanke wa Musa hukuncin zaman gidan Kaso bisa laifin kokarin yin kisan kai
Text1 Translation: The court in Karu sentenced Musa to stay in Kaso's house for the crime of attempted murder
Text2: Kotu ta yanke wa Habila da Joy hukuncin zaman kurkuku bayan kama su da laifin satar N700,000
Text2 Translation: The court sentenced Abel and Joy to prison after arresting them for stealing N700,000

Text1: “Muna kira ga gwamnati da ta aiko mama da sojoji domin samar mana da tsaro a kauyen.
Text1 Translation: "We are calling on the government to send the army to provide security for us in the village.
Text2: Malison ya yi kira ga gwamnati da ta aiko da ƙarin zaratan jami’an tsaro domin kare rayukan da dukiyoyin mutane a masarautar su.
Text2 Translation: Malison called on the government to send more security forces to protect the lives and property of people in their kingdom.

Text1: A Ƙa’ida, Bashin Naira Biliyan 219 Ya Kamata CBN Ya Ba Gwamantin Buhari A 2022, Ba Naira Tiriliyan 5 Ba:
Text1 Translation: In principle, the 219 billion naira debt should be given to the Buhari government by the CBN in 2022, not 5 trillion naira:
Text2: Majalisar Tarayya ta amince kada a biya bashin Naira tiriliyan 23.7 da Buhari ya karɓa a CBN, sai nan da shekaru 40.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Council has agreed that the 23.7 trillion Naira loan that Buhari received from the CBN should not be paid for 40 years.

Text1: An yi garkuwa da ɗan takarar mataimakin gwamnan Jihar Cross River na jam’iyyar YPP, Agbor Onyi.
Text1 Translation: The deputy governorship candidate of Cross River State of YPP, Agbor Onyi, has been kidnapped.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba, a cikin watan jiya wata kotu ta soke takarar sanatan ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Taraba, na Jam’iyyar APC.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, last month a court annulled the senatorial candidacy of the candidate for the governorship of Taraba state, of the APC party.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun saki Sarki Bunguɗu Hassan Attahiru, bayan ya shafe kwanaki 32 tsare cikin daji a hannun su.
Text1 Translation: The bandits released Sarki Bungudu Hassan Attahiru, after spending 32 days in the forest in their hands.
Text2: An saki ɗaliban 75 bayan sun shafe kwanaki 12 a hannun ‘yan bindiga.
Text2 Translation: The 75 students were released after spending 12 days in the hands of the bandits.

Text1: Melaye tun da farko ya yi zargin an yi aringizon ƙuri’u 800 a zaɓen jihar Ekiti.
Text1 Translation: Melaye earlier alleged that 800 votes were rigged in the Ekiti state election.
Text2: Daga baya Yakubu ya maida raddin cewa babu wani abu mai kama da aringizon ƙuri’u a zaɓen Jihar Ekiti.
Text2 Translation: Yakubu later retorted that there was no such thing as vote rigging in the Ekiti State election.

Text1: Kakakin rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Yemisi Opalola ta ce rundunar za na gudanar da bincike domin ceto wadanda aka yi garkuwa da su.
Text1 Translation: The spokesperson of the state police force, Yemisi Opalola, said that the force will conduct investigations to rescue the hostages.
Text2: Abutu ya ce rundunar za ta kai mutanen kotu da zarar ta kammala bincike akan su.
Text2 Translation: Abutu said that the force will take the people to court once it has completed its investigation.

Text1: Mazaunan Shimfida inda sojojin suka yi batakashi da ‘yan bindigan sun ce sojin sun kashe ‘yan bindiga da dama a harin.
Text1 Translation: Residents of Shimfida, where the army clashed with the bandits, said that the army killed many bandits in the attack.
Text2: Abiodun ya ce rundunar ta kashe ‘yan bindiga da dama a arangamar da suka yi da ‘yan bindigan a kauyen.
Text2 Translation: Abiodun said the army killed many bandits in the clash they had with the bandits in the village.

Text1: Idan aka ce ƴan Najeriya ne za su rika tara kuɗi suna baiwa malaman don su janye ya jin aiki ai koma baya kenan.
Text1 Translation: If it is said that Nigerians are going to collect money and give it to the teachers so that they can withdraw and feel like working, that is backwards.
Text2: Usman ya ce lokaci ya yi da ƴan Najeriya za su rika haɗa mutane irin haka da hukuma domin a kawo karshen abin.
Text2 Translation: Usman said it is time for Nigerians to connect people like this with the authorities to put an end to it.

Text1: Tuni dai Buhari ya bada umarnin a gudanar da binciken ƙwaƙwaf a NDDC, bayan samun rahoton cewa an yi shagalin da kuɗaɗen hukumar ta NDDD.
Text1 Translation: Buhari has already ordered an investigation to be carried out in NDDC, after receiving reports that the party was organized with the funds of NDDD.
Text2: Mai Shari’a Fadaunsi Adefioye ya bada umarnin a tsare Abodunri Ohai, bayan an same shi da laifin taimaka wa mai laifi guduwa.
Text2 Translation: Justice Fadaunsi Adefioye ordered the detention of Abodunri Ohai, after he was found guilty of assisting a criminal to escape.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Nuhu Falalu ya yanke hukuncin cewa Bilkisu za ta maida wa Musa kudin sadakinta naira 20,000.
Text1 Translation: Judge Nuhu Falalu ruled that Bilkisu will return her dowry of 20,000 naira to Musa.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Nuhu Falalu ya yanke hukuncin cewa Bilkisu za ta mayar wa Musa kudin sadakin sa naira 20,000.
Text2 Translation: Judge Nuhu Falalu ruled that Bilkisu will return his dowry of 20,000 naira to Musa.

Text1: ANA WATA GA WATA: Jam’iyyar APM ta garzaya kotu, ta nemi a ƙwace nasarar Tinubu a bai wa Atiku da ya zo na biyu
Text1 Translation: ANA MOTH TO MONTH: APM party went to court, asked to take away Tinubu's victory and give it to Atiku who came second
Text2: Tinubu na APC ya zo na biyu da ƙuri’u 161,600, sai Atiku Abubakar na PDP ya zo na uku da ƙuri’u 90,183.
Text2 Translation: Tinubu of APC came second with 161,600 votes, while Atiku Abubakar of PDP came third with 90,183 votes.

Text1: Sojojin Najeriya sun kawato sama da  shanu 2,000 bayan bata kashi da suka yi da ‘yan bindiga a karamar hukumar Mariga a jihar Neja.
Text1 Translation: The Nigerian Army has captured over 2,000 cattle after defeating bandits in Mariga Local Government Area of ​​Niger State.
Text2: Haka kuma Ɗanmadami ya ce sojojin da ke sintiri sun bindige  ‘yan bindiga bakwai a Ungwan  Birni cikin Ƙaramar Hukumar Kajuru duk a Jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: Danmadami also said that the soldiers on patrol shot dead seven bandits in Ungwan Birni in Kajuru Local Government, all in Kaduna State.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kai hari wasu coci biyu, sun kashe mutum uku, sun yi garkuwa da mutane da dama daga Kaduna
Text1 Translation: Gunmen attacked two churches, killed three people and kidnapped many people from Kaduna
Text2: Ya ce sun kashe mutane sannan sun yi garkuwa da wasu mutum 10 sannan suka kaɗa shanu akalla 300.
Text2 Translation: He said they killed people and kidnapped 10 people and looted at least 300 cattle.

Text1: Cikin watan Oktoba ne Kungiyar Likitoci ta Najeriya (NMA) ta ce aƙalla 24,000 ne kaɗai a Najeriya, sauran sun gudu Ingila, Saudiyya da Qatar.
Text1 Translation: In October, the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA) said that at least 24,000 are alone in Nigeria, the rest have fled to England, Saudi Arabia and Qatar.
Text2: Cikin watan Nuwamba, 2022, Kungiyar Likitocin Najeriya ta ce likitoci 24,000 ne kaɗai a Najeriya, sauran sun gudu Ingila, Saudiyya da Qatar.
Text2 Translation: In November, 2022, the Nigerian Medical Association said there are only 24,000 doctors in Nigeria, the rest have fled to England, Saudi Arabia and Qatar.

Text1: Daga nan Minista Malami ya ce za a bincika domin a bankaɗo waɗanda su ka kitsa wannan tantagaryar iskanci.
Text1 Translation: Then the Minister of Education said that an investigation will be conducted to find out who is responsible for this scandal.
Text2: A ƙarshe Jajire ya ce nan ba da daɗewa ba za a kama waɗanda suka aikata wannan harin bazata a kuma hukunta su.
Text2 Translation: In the end, Jajire said that the perpetrators of this accidental attack will soon be arrested and punished.

Text1: A yau Talata ne sanata Uba Sani ya mika fom din takarar gwamna da ya siya ga uwar jam’iyya a Abuja bayan ya cika.
Text1 Translation: Today, Tuesday, Senator Uba Sani handed over the gubernatorial candidacy form he bought to the mother of the party in Abuja after it was filled.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba a cikin waran Afrilu ne sanata Uba Sani ya siya fom ɗin rakarar gwamnan jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: If we don't forget, it was in the month of April that Senator Uba Sani bought the Kaduna state governorship form.

Text1: Ya ce Zaɓaɓɓen Shugaban Ƙasa, Bola Tinubu ne ya yi zurfin tunani da hangen nesa cewa kada Musulmi ya yi Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa.
Text1 Translation: He said that the President-elect, Bola Tinubu, had a deep thought and vision that a Muslim should not be the President of the Senate.
Text2: Sun ce daga Kudu maso Gabas ya kamata a ce Tinubu ya fidda ɗan takarar da zai goya wa bayan zama shugaban majalisar dattawa.
Text2 Translation: They said that from the South-East, Tinubu should nominate a candidate who will support him to become the president of the Senate.

Text1: Shi ko Chinonso Okoye ya kara da cewa maharan sun saki wasu masu laifukan da ke tsare a ofishin ‘yan  sandan.
Text1 Translation: He or Chinonso Okoye added that the attackers released some criminals who were detained in the police station.
Text2: Mun samu labarin cewa maharan sun saki wasu masu laifi dake tsare a ofishin.
Text2 Translation: We have learned that the attackers released some criminals who were detained in the office.

Text1: Umar Bago na APC ya lashe zaben gwamnan Neja
Text1 Translation: Umar Bago of APC won the governorship election in Niger
Text2: Dan takarar jami’yyar APC Umar Bago ya lashe zaben gwamnan jihar Neja.
Text2 Translation: APC candidate Umar Bago has won the Niger state governorship election.

Text1: Kakakin rundunar Dungus Abdulkarim ya sanar da haka ranar Asabar a garin Damaturu.
Text1 Translation: The spokesperson of the command, Dungus Abdulkarim, announced this on Saturday in Damaturu town.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar Mohammed Shehu ya sanar da haka a wata takarda da aka raba wa manema labarai a garin Gusau.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the army, Mohammed Shehu, announced this in a document distributed to the media in Gusau town.

Text1: Wasu ma’aikatu 15 kuma sun ƙi damƙa wa Gwamnatin Tarayya harajin da su ka tara cikin 2019, har na naira biliyan 127.1.
Text1 Translation: Some 15 ministries also refused to hand over to the Federal Government the taxes they collected in 2019, amounting to 127.1 billion naira.
Text2: A cikin su, Hukumar Kwastan ta Ƙasa ce ta fi ƙin damƙa wa gwamnatin tarayya abin da ta tara, har Naira biliyan 125.
Text2 Translation: Among them, the National Customs Commission is the one that refuses to hand over to the federal government what it has collected, up to 125 billion Naira.

Text1: Idan za a tuna, a farkon watan Fabrairu, Atiku ya ce Buhari ne sanadin ɗora Najeriya a koma bayan lalatattun ƙasashe.
Text1 Translation: If you will remember, at the beginning of February, Atiku said that Buhari is the cause of putting Nigeria behind the corrupt countries.
Text2: Lawan ya ce a yanzu dai Majalisar Tarayya na hutu, sai watan Janairu za su koma aikin.
Text2 Translation: Lawan said that now the Federal Council is on vacation, they will return to work in January.

Text1: Makonni biyu da suka gabata, wannan jarida ta buga labarin yadda zaɓaɓɓun gamayyar jam’iyyun adawa sun kafa kwamitin fito da ɗan takara ɗaya tilo.
Text1 Translation: Two weeks ago, this newspaper published the story of how the elected coalition of opposition parties formed a committee to nominate a single candidate.
Text2: RIGIMAR SHUGABANCIN MAJALISA: Zaɓaɓɓun gamayyar jam’iyyun adawa sun kafa kwamitin fito da ɗan takara ɗaya tilo
Text2 Translation: CONFLICT OF ASSEMBLY LEADERSHIP: Elected coalition of opposition parties formed a committee to nominate a single candidate

Text1: Buhari ya jefa ƙuri’a ƙarfe 10.06, daga nan kuma ya zarce zuwa gidan sa a Daura ɗin, bayan ya gana da ‘yan jarida.
Text1 Translation: Buhari cast his vote at 10.06 a.m. and then went to his house in Daura, after meeting with journalists.
Text2: Bayan san sako su dai an zarce tare da su da wani malamin su ɗaya zuwa Gidan Gwamnanti, inda Gwamna Matawalle ya gana da su.
Text2 Translation: After hearing the news, they were accompanied by one of their teachers to the Governor's House, where Governor Matawalle met them.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Suleiman Lawal ya raba auren duk da kokarin da kotun ta yi na ganin ta sasanta ma’auratan.
Text1 Translation: Judge Suleiman Lawal dissolved the marriage despite the court's efforts to reconcile the couple.
Text2: Alkalin kotun Adeniyi Koledoye ya raba auren ne bayan Mojidi ya yi watsi da kokarin daidaita su da kotu da mutane suka yi kokarin yi.
Text2 Translation: Judge Adeniyi Koledoye dissolved the marriage after Mojidi abandoned efforts to reconcile them with the court that people tried to do.

Text1: RIKICIN PDP: Jonathan ya ƙaryata zargin cewa shi ke tunzira gwamnonin PDP 5 da su ka ‘fanɗare’ wa jam’iyya
Text1 Translation: PDP CONFLICT: Jonathan denies the allegation that he is instigating the 5 PDP governors to 'defraud' the party
Text2: RIKICIN JAM’IYYA: Gwamnonin PDP sun ƙaryata zargin sun nemi Uche Secondus ya sauka daga shugabancin jam’iyya
Text2 Translation: PARTY CONFLICT: PDP governors deny allegations they asked Uche Secondus to step down as party chairman

Text1: “Amma ba gaskiya rahotannin ba su ce takamaimai ga wurin da za a kai harin ba.
Text1 Translation: "But it is not true that the reports do not say exactly where the attack will be carried out.
Text2: Kuma ba a ce hususan a Kurkukun Kuje za a kai harin ba.”
Text2 Translation: And it is not said that the attack will be carried out in Kuje Prison in particular."

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga cikakken labarin a lokacin.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the full story at that time.
Text2: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta taɓa buga labarin yadda aka riƙa watandar maƙudan biliyoyin kuɗaɗe a NDDC.
Text2 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa once published the story of how billions of dollars were stolen from NDDC.

Text1: Shugaban majalisar Dattawa Ahmed Lawan ya naɗana mambobin kwamitin Kamfen ɗin sa.
Text1 Translation: Senate President Ahmed Lawan has appointed members of his Campaign Committee.
Text2: Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa Ahmad Lawan da Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya, Femi Gbajabiamila ne su ka karanta wasikar ga mambobin majalisar baki ɗaya.
Text2 Translation: The President of the Senate, Ahmad Lawan and the Speaker of the Federal Assembly, Femi Gbajabiamila read the letter to the members of the House.

Text1: Darektan yada labarai na hukumar Femi Babafemi ya sanar da haka a Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The agency's director of information, Femi Babafemi, announced this in Abuja.
Text2: Manajan kula da shashen yaɗuwar cututtuka na Hukumar NCDC, Luka Lawal, ne ya sanar haka a taron da ya yi da manema labarai a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: NCDC's Communicable Diseases Division Manager, Luka Lawal, announced this at a press conference in Abuja.

Text1: An tabbatar da cewa fiye da ƙwararrun likitoci ‘yan Najeriya 5,000 ne su ka tsallake zuwa Ingila a cikin shekaru takwas.
Text1 Translation: It has been confirmed that more than 5,000 Nigerian doctors have migrated to England in eight years.
Text2: “Cikin 2018 kuwa an tabbatar da tafiyar likitoci 856, sai kuma cikin 2019 har likitoci 1,347 su ka tafi Ingila yin aiki a can.
Text2 Translation: "In 2018, the departure of 856 doctors was confirmed, and in 2019, 1,347 doctors went to England to work there.

Text1: ‘Yan Sanda sun tabbatar da kashe mutumin mai suna Obinwanne Iwu, ɗan asalin ƙauyen Ahiara a Ƙaramar Hukumar Ahiazu Mbaise a Jihar Imo.
Text1 Translation: The police have confirmed the killing of a man named Obinwanne Iwu, a native of Ahiara village in Ahiazu Mbaise Local Government Area of ​​Imo State.
Text2: An haifi mantu a wani ƙauye da ake kira Chanso da ke ƙarƙashin gundumar Gindiri, ta cikin Ƙaramar Hukumar Mangu a Jihar Filato.
Text2 Translation: Mantu was born in a village called Chanso under Gindiri District, in Mangu Local Government Area of ​​Plateau State.

Text1: Kano ta wayi gari da rasuwar dattijo Muktar Adnan, Sarkin Ban Kano
Text1 Translation: Kano has woken up with the death of the elder Muktar Adnan, the Emir of Kano
Text2: Birnin Kano da kewaye, musamman garin Ɗambatta, an tashi da rasuwar Muktar Adnan, Sarkin Ban Ɗambatta.
Text2 Translation: The city of Kano and its surroundings, especially the town of Dambatta, was shocked by the death of Muktar Adnan, the Emir of Ban Dambatta.

Text1: Haka nan kuma INEC ta bada umarnin a ci gaba da tattara sakamakon zaɓe a lokacin da Baturen Zaɓe na Jihar Adamawa ya kimtsa sosai.
Text1 Translation: In addition, INEC ordered to continue collecting the results of the election when the electoral roll of Adamawa State is very important.
Text2: “Azarɓaɓin da Kwamishinan Zaɓe na INEC na Jihar Adamawa ya yi ya bayyana nasarar wani ko wata ‘yar takara, ba abin amincewa ba ne.
Text2 Translation: "The criticism made by the INEC Electoral Commissioner of Adamawa State to declare the victory of any candidate, is not acceptable.

Text1: Yadda ƴan bindiga suka kashe mutum 11 a Zamfara a karshen makon jiya
Text1 Translation: How bandits killed 11 people in Zamfara last weekend
Text2: TABARBAREWAR TSARO: ‘Yan bindiga sun kashe mutum 78 a makon jiya a Najeriya
Text2 Translation: SECURITY BREAKDOWN: Gunmen killed 78 people last week in Nigeria

Text1: Ya ce idan har ana son zaman lafiya a cikin PDP, to tilas sai jam”iyyar ta bi tsarin da dokokin ta su ka gindaya.
Text1 Translation: He said that if peace is desired in the PDP, then the party must follow the rules set by its laws.
Text2: Gaba ɗaya jam’iyyar ta ruguza tsarin zaman lafiya a ƙasar wanda talakawa suka saba da ita.
Text2 Translation: The party has completely destroyed the peaceful system in the country that the poor people are used to.

Text1: Buhari ya umarci jami’an tsaro su kara ƙaimi wajen ceto fasinjojin jirgin kasa dake tsare hannun ‘ƴan bindiga
Text1 Translation: Buhari ordered the security forces to step up efforts to rescue the train passengers who are being held by bandits
Text2: Osinbajo ka saka baki a sako mu, mun galabaita – Inji ‘yar ajin Osinbajo dake tsare hannun ƴan bindiga
Text2 Translation: Osinbajo, please let us go, we have won - said the girl from Osinbajo's class who was in custody of the bandits

Text1: Ya ce albashin Sojojin Najeriya kaɗai na lashe Naira biliyan 400, alhali kuma adadin kuɗaɗen kasafin manyan ayyuka ba su wuce Naira biliyan 30 ba.
Text1 Translation: He said that the salary of the Nigerian Army alone is 400 billion naira, while the budget for major projects is not more than 30 billion naira.
Text2: Kamfanin Buga Kuɗaɗe na Najeriya (Nigeria Printing and Minting Company) ya zabge naira biliyan 97 ya biya kuɗaɗen alawus ba tare da neman amincewa ba.
Text2 Translation: The Nigeria Printing and Minting Company (Nigeria Printing and Minting Company) chose to pay 97 billion naira in allowances without seeking approval.

Text1: Ya ce a kullum sojojin Najeriya ba su zuwa su yi tattaki har maɓuyar Boko Haram da ISWAP su ragargaje su.
Text1 Translation: He said that the Nigerian army does not always come and march until the hideouts of Boko Haram and ISWAP are destroyed.
Text2: Sojojin Najeriya shida sun ji rauni a wani gumurzu da Boko Haram ɓangaren ISWAP
Text2 Translation: Six Nigerian soldiers were injured in a clash with Boko Haram, part of ISWAP

Text1: Dokar Zaɓe a Sashe na 92(3) ta 2010, ta ce tilas kowace jam’iyya ta kai wa INEC rahoto uku na waɗannan kuɗaɗe na ta.
Text1 Translation: The Electoral Act in Section 92(3) of 2010, says that every party must submit three reports to INEC of these expenses.
Text2: Lauyan ya na so kotu ta nuna idan INEC ta ƙi bayar da kwafen bayanan, to ta karya Dokar Zaɓe  ta 2022, Sashe na 29(4).
Text2 Translation: The lawyer wants the court to show that if INEC refuses to provide copies of the information, then it has violated the 2022 Elections Act, Section 29(4).

Text1: GADANGARƘAMAR NAIRA MILIYAN 702: Kotu ta yanke wa Okupe, Daraktan Kamfen ɗin Peter Obi ɗaurin shekaru biyu a kurkuku
Text1 Translation: 702 MILLION NAIRA SCAM: Court sentences Okupe, Peter Obi's Campaign Director to two years in prison
Text2: A cikin shekaru huɗu, zai karɓi naira miliyan 56.2, kusan rabin kuɗin fam ɗin da ya saya na Naira miliyan 100 kenan.
Text2 Translation: In four years, he will receive 56.2 million naira, almost half of the money he bought for 100 million naira.

Text1: ZAZZABIN LASSA: Mutum 26 sun kamu da cutar a jihar Edo
Text1 Translation: LASSA FEVER: 26 people have contracted the disease in Edo state
Text2: Sam da mutum 10,000 ne suka kamu da cutar a jihar Ribas, mutum sama da 100 kuma sun mutu.
Text2 Translation: More than 10,000 people have contracted the disease in Rivers state, and more than 100 people have died.

Text1: Ya ce bai ga yadda za a yi nasara ba, idan gwamnonin biyar su ka ƙi bayar da haɗin kai lokacin zaɓe a jihohin su.
Text1 Translation: He said he did not see how to succeed if the five governors refused to cooperate during the election in their states.
Text2: “Idan ba mu bayar da haɗin kai ba, to PDP kamfen ɗin banza ta ke yi, ba cin zaɓe za ta yi ba.
Text2 Translation: "If we don't cooperate, then PDP is running a futile campaign, it will not win the election.

Text1: ‘Idan EFCC ta taka ruwan cikin ma’aikatan Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa da Ministoci za su yi aman kuɗaɗe – Gwamna Matawalle
Text1 Translation: 'If the EFCC intervenes in the staff of the Presidency and Ministers, they will steal money - Governor Matawalle
Text2: EFCC ta faɗaɗa binciken ta har kan manyan jami’an Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa da Ministoci na Majalisar Zartaswa.””
Text2 Translation: The EFCC has expanded its investigation to include senior officials of the Presidency and Cabinet Ministers.

Text1: Ya ce Akpabio ya cancanta, domin ya nuna tsantsar biyayya ga jam’iyyar APC da kuma ɗa’a ga Zaɓaɓɓen Shugaban Ƙasa, Bola Tinubu.
Text1 Translation: He said Akpabio deserved it, because he showed strict loyalty to the APC party and ethics to the President-elect, Bola Tinubu.
Text2: Zaɓaɓɓun sanatocin APC sun gana da Zaɓaɓɓen Shugaban Ƙasa, Bola Tinubu a Fatakwal babban birnin Jihar Ribas.
Text2 Translation: APC senators-elect met with the President-elect, Bola Tinubu at the Port of Rivers State capital.

Text1: “Alkaluman yawan yaran da basu makarantar boko a kasar nan ya ragu a dalilin Shirin BESDA da gwamnatin Buhari bullo da shi.
Text1 Translation: "The number of children who do not have formal education in this country has decreased due to the BESDA program launched by the Buhari government.
Text2: “A cikin shekara daya Shirin BESDA ta saka yara 1,053,422 cikin makarantar boko a jihohi 17.
Text2 Translation: "In one year, the BESDA Program enrolled 1,053,422 children in formal schools in 17 states.

Text1: Tsohon gwamnan jihar Imo, Rochas Okorocha ya shiga hannun hukumar EFCC bayan mamaye gidan da da jami’an tsaro suka yi tun karfe 11 na safe.
Text1 Translation: The former governor of Imo state, Rochas Okorocha was arrested by the EFCC after the security forces raided his house at 11am.
Text2: Hukumar EFCC ta damke tsohon gwamnan jihar Abia da dansa a filin jirgin sama an Nnamdi Azikwe, Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The EFCC arrested the former governor of Abia state and his son at Nnamdi Azikwe Airport, Abuja.

Text1: “Za Kuma a yi amfani da wani kaso na kudin domin samar da magunguna da sauran kayan aiki domin asibitoci da cibiyoyin lafiya a jihar.
Text1 Translation: "A portion of the money will be used to provide medicines and other equipment for hospitals and health centers in the state.
Text2: “Idan wadanda suke rike da madafun Iko sun yi aiki da gaskiya na yi imani za a iya kawar da rashin tsaro a jihar.
Text2 Translation: "If those in power work honestly, I believe insecurity in the state can be eliminated.

Text1: Haka kuma ya hana na dukkan ƙananan hukumomin Jihar Legas, wadda ke ƙarƙashin jam”iyyar AD a lokacin.
Text1 Translation: He also banned all local governments in Lagos State, which was under the AD party at the time.
Text2: A Ƙananan Hukumomin Jos ta Kudu da Bassa kuma an hana fita daga ƙarfe 6 na safiya zuwa ƙarfe 6 na yamma.
Text2 Translation: In Jos South and Bassa Local Government Areas, exiting is prohibited from 6 am to 6 pm.

Text1: Shugaban kungiyar SCKLA Emmanuel Kure ya ce SCKLA ta shirya wannan zama ne domin taimakawa kiristoci wajen zabar shugaba na gari a zaben 2023.
Text1 Translation: SCKLA President Emmanuel Kure said that SCKLA organized this session to help Christians elect a good leader in the 2023 election.
Text2: Hasali ma yawancin mutane sun yi tunanin dabara ce irin ta ‘yan siyasa saboda karatowan zaben shugaban kasa na 2023.
Text2 Translation: In fact, most people thought it was a ploy by politicians because of the readings of the 2023 presidential election.

Text1: Shugaban Ukraniya Volodymyr Zelenskyy ya tabbatar da cewa yanzu tashar nukiliyar ta na hannun dakarun Rasha.
Text1 Translation: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy confirmed that the nuclear power plant is now in the hands of Russian forces.
Text2: Putin na Rasha ya zargi Shugaban Ukraniya na yanzu Volodymyr Zelenskyy da ƙoƙarin assasa aƙidar Yahudanci ta NAZI a yankin.
Text2 Translation: Russia's Putin has accused current Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy of trying to establish Nazi-Jewish ideology in the region.

Text1: To lamarin ya haifar da ruɗani da hargitsi har sai da gwamnatin Ondo ta ƙaƙaba dokar hana fita a garin.
