Text2 Translation: The curfew has been imposed in Jos North, South and Bassa:

Text1: Kwamandan rundunar Bashir Adewinmbi ya ce mutumin ya shiga cocin da misalin karfe 4 na safiyar wannan rana lokacin da babu kowa a cocin.
Text1 Translation: The commander of the army, Bashir Adewinmbi, said that the man entered the church at about 4 o'clock in the morning that day when there was no one in the church.
Text2: Mazauna kauyen Ihiala sun ce maharan sun dirka wa ginin ofishin ƴan sandan bam da misalin karfe uku na safiyar Laraba.
Text2 Translation: Residents of Ihiala village said that the attackers bombed the police office building at around three o'clock on Wednesday morning.

Text1: A labarin wannan jarida ta buga cewa naira miliyan 120 na neman hargitsa PDP.
Text1 Translation: In this article, this newspaper published that 120 million naira is seeking to disrupt the PDP.
Text2: A 2014, Buhari ya yi ƙorafi ganin cewa APC ta sayar da fam na takarar shugaban ƙasa, a kan naira miliyan 27.5.
Text2 Translation: In 2014, Buhari complained that the APC sold the presidential ticket for 27.5 million naira.

Text1: Sanarwar da ya fito daga Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na Ma’aikatar ‘Yan Sanda, ta ƙara da cewa dama akwai batun kashe kuɗaɗen a cikin kasafin 2021.
Text1 Translation: The announcement from the Publicity Spokesperson of the Ministry of Police, added that there is a possibility of spending money in the 2021 budget.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na Ma’aikatar Harkokin Jiragen Sama, James Odaudu a ranar Alhamis.
Text2 Translation: The Publicity Spokesperson for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, James Odaudu on Thursday.

Text1: Ya ce Joshua Bawa na jami’yyar LP ya samu kuri’u 3,415 sai kuma Ibrahim Yahaya daga jami’yyar NNPP da ya samu kuri’u 3,378.
Text1 Translation: He said Joshua Bawa from LP University got 3,415 votes and Ibrahim Yahaya from NNPP University got 3,378 votes.
Text2: Ibrahim ya ce Yusuf ya doke abokin hamayyarsa kuma mataimakin gwamnan jihar mai ci Nasiru Gawuna na jam’iyyar APC wanda ya samu kuri’u 892,705.
Text2 Translation: Ibrahim said that Yusuf defeated his opponent and the current deputy governor of the state, Nasiru Gawuna of the APC who got 892,705 votes.

Text1: ‘Yan sanda sun ce sun fara binciken waɗanda su ka yi kisan domin a kamo su a hukunta su.
Text1 Translation: The police said they have started investigating the killers so that they can be caught and punished.
Text2: Ta ce da an kammala bincike ne a ofishin CID za a miƙa waɗanda ake zargin da safarar yara ƙanana, domin a hukunta su.
Text2 Translation: She said that once the investigation is completed at the CID office, those suspected of trafficking minors will be handed over to be punished.

Text1: Sai dai kuma wata majiya ta shaida mana cewa Obiano ya san EFCC ta na bin sa tun cikin 2021.
Text1 Translation: However, a source told us that Obiano knows that the EFCC has been following him since 2021.
Text2: Majiya ta shaida wa PREMIUM TIMES cewa tun da misslinkarfe 6 na yamman  Litinin ta ke tsare a EFCC din har zuwa safiyar Talata.
Text2 Translation: A source told PREMIUM TIMES that she was detained at the EFCC since 6pm on Monday until Tuesday morning.

Text1: Kotu ta yanke wa dan damfara hukuncin sharar kotu na tsawon watanni shida
Text1 Translation: The court sentenced the fraudster to six months of contempt of court
Text2: A wannan rana kuma alkalin kotun ya yanke wa wani mai sana’a irin na Tosin, Tunde Adejuwon shima hukuncin sharar kotu na tsawon watanni biyar.
Text2 Translation: On the same day, the judge sentenced a businessman like Tosin, Tunde Adejuwon, to be a waste of court for five months.

Text1: Da dama dake zama a karamar hukumar sun nemi mafaka a Damba Estate dake cikin garin Gusau.
Text1 Translation: Many residents of the local government have sought refuge in Damba Estate located in Gusau town.
Text2: Wani mazaunin garin Haruna shika ya ce an ceto yaran a unguwar Kasuwan Da’a dake Karamar hukumar Zariya.
Text2 Translation: A resident of Haruna Shika said that the children were rescued in Kasuwan Da'a neighborhood in Zaria Local Government.

Text1: Haka kuma a jihar Bauchi, ɗan takara ɗaya tilo da ya fito takarar kujerar gwamnan jihar Ibrahim Kashim ne aka zaba ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar.
Text1 Translation: Also in Bauchi state, the only candidate who ran for the governorship of the state, Ibrahim Kashim, was elected as the candidate for the governorship of the state.
Text2: A na shi jawabin gwamnan jihar Edo Godwin Obaseki ya bayyana cewa an yi wa mutum sama da 130,000 rigakafin korona a jihar.
Text2 Translation: In his speech, the governor of Edo state, Godwin Obaseki, stated that over 130,000 people have been vaccinated against corona in the state.

Text1: Dukkan jam’iyyu 18 sun zaɓi ‘yan takarar su na zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Kogi, kuma jam’iyyu 17 ne su ka yi hakan a Imo da Bayelsa.
Text1 Translation: All 18 parties have chosen their candidates for the governorship election in Kogi State, and 17 parties have done so in Imo and Bayelsa.
Text2: Gwamnan Jihar Delta kuma ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa na Atiku Abubakar a PDP, Ifeanyi Okowa, ya roƙi jama’a a kai zuciya nesa.
Text2 Translation: The governor of Delta State and the vice-presidential candidate of Atiku Abubakar in the PDP, Ifeanyi Okowa, has appealed to the people to be vigilant.

Text1: An dai zargin gwamnonin da umartar Secondus ya sauka, duk kuwa da maida shi kan kujerar sa da Babbar Kotun Birnin Kebbi ta yi.
Text1 Translation: It has been alleged that the governors ordered Secondus to step down, even though he was restored to his seat by the High Court of Birnin Kebbi.
Text2: Premium Times ta buga yadda Kotun Birnin Kebbi ta maida Secondus kan kujera, bayan dakatarwar da Kotun Fatakwal ta yi masa
Text2 Translation: Premium Times published how Secondus was reinstated by Birnin Kebbi Court, after his suspension by Fatakwal Court.

Text1: Chibuikem ya zana jarabawar a jihar Legas kuma ya samu maki 358 daga cikin maki 400.
Text1 Translation: Chibuikem sat the exam in Lagos state and scored 358 out of 400.
Text2: Isaiah Dan asalin jihar Legas ne ya zana jarabawar kuma a Legas.
Text2 Translation: Isaiah, a native of Lagos state, drew the test in Lagos.

Text1: Wani ɗan Kwamitin Zartaswar PDP ya tabbatar wa PREMIUM TIMES cewa tabbas an rubuta wasiƙun.
Text1 Translation: A member of the PDP Executive Committee confirmed to PREMIUM TIMES that the letters were definitely written.
Text2: Premium Times Hausa ta buga labarin iƙirarin da PDP ta yi cewa ‘shugabancin Abdullahi Adamu haramtacce ne, an bai wa kura ajiyar nama.’
Text2 Translation: Premium Times Hausa published an article about the claim made by the PDP that 'the leadership of Abdullahi Adamu is illegal, it has been given to dust.'

Text1: An fara gurfanar da Sadiya a shekaran 2019 a kotu saboda zargin kazafin da ta yi wa Isah a wannan bidiyon.
Text1 Translation: Sadiya was first prosecuted in 2019 in court for allegedly slandering Isah in this video.
Text2: “Dukkan wadanda ake zargin dai nan ba da daɗewa ba za a gurfanar da su a kotu da zaran an kammala bincike.” Inji Uwujaren.
Text2 Translation: "All the suspects will soon be arraigned in court as soon as the investigation is completed." Uwujaren said.

Text1: Wike ya bayyana haka a lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a Fatakwal.
Text1 Translation: Wike stated this when he was meeting with the press at Fatakwal.
Text2: Ya bayyana haka a ranar Litinin lokacin da ya ke ganawa da manema labarai a otal ɗin Hilton, ranar Talata, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: He disclosed this on Monday when he was meeting with the press at the Hilton Hotel, on Tuesday, in Abuja.

Text1: Maharan sun kashe mazauna garin mutum 6 a harin da suka yi a daren ranar Lahadi.
Text1 Translation: The attackers killed 6 people in their attack on Sunday night.
Text2: A ranar Asabar ɗin ce kuma su ka shiga garin Maɗaci su ka kashe mutum biyu.
Text2 Translation: It was Saturday and they entered the town of Madaci and killed two people.

Text1: An yi masa gwajin jini a Legas, inda aka tabbatar cewa rukunin jinin sa iri ɗaya ne da na Sonia, ‘yar ka kai Ekweremadu.
Text1 Translation: He underwent a blood test in Lagos, where it was confirmed that his blood type is the same as that of Sonia, Ekweremadu's daughter.
Text2: Hakan ya tabbatar da takarar Uba cewa shine sahihin ɗan takarar gwamna na Jam’iyyar APC a jihar Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: This confirms Uba's candidacy that he is the authentic governorship candidate of the APC in Kaduna state.

Text1: Atiku ya yi wannan kalamin ne a wajen taron yaƙin neman zaɓen PDP da aka yi a Minna, babban birnin Jihar Neja, a ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: Atiku made this statement at the PDP campaign meeting held in Minna, the capital of Niger State, on Saturday.
Text2: Atiku ya bayyana haka a rangandin yaƙin neman zaɓen PDP a Benin, babban birnin Jihar Edo.
Text2 Translation: Atiku stated this during the PDP campaign in Benin, the capital of Edo State.

Text1: Kwamishinan rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar  Ayuba ElkanaElkana ya ce rundunar ba za ta ja da baya ba wajen yaki da duk ‘yan bindiga a jihar.
Text1 Translation: The state police commissioner Ayuba Elkana Elkana said the force will not back down in the fight against all bandits in the state.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar ta ce ‘yan jagaliyan siyasa ne suka kashe daya daga cikin mutanen da suka mutu a taron Toib Mutallib
Text2 Translation: The state police said that one of the people who died in the Toib Mutallib meeting was killed by political gangs.

Text1: A Najeriya dai yanzu naira 30,000 ce mafi ƙarancin albashi a matakin gwamnatin tarayya da jihohi, kamar yadda gwamnati ta amince tun cikin 2019.
Text1 Translation: In Nigeria, 30,000 naira is now the minimum wage at the federal and state level, as agreed by the government since 2019.
Text2: ALAMOMIN ƘARSHEN WA’ADIN MULKI: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta ce gwamnoni ne su ka ƙaƙaba wa jama’a talauci da ƙuncin rayuwa a Najeriya
Text2 Translation: SIGNS OF THE END OF THE PERIOD OF RULE: The Federal Government has said that the governors are the ones to prevent the people from poverty and hardship in Nigeria.

Text1: A jawabin godiya da yayi, Alhaji Dantata ya mika godiyar sa Farfesa Gwarzo saboda karrama shi da jami’ar ta yi.
Text1 Translation: In his speech of thanks, Alhaji Dantata thanked Professor Gwarzo for honoring him by the university.
Text2: A jawabin godiya da yayi a wajen kaddamar da ginin, Pantami ya mika godiyar ga mahukuntan jami’ar bisa wannan karamci da suka yi masa.
Text2 Translation: In his speech of thanks at the inauguration of the building, Pantami thanked the university authorities for the generosity they have shown him.

Text1: Jami’an rundunar Sibul Difens sun kama wata babbar mota danƙare da jabun Kananzir har lita 45,000 a jihar Neja
Text1 Translation: Officers of the Sibul Defense Force arrested a truck with 45,000 liters of fake Kananzir in Niger State.
Text2: Rundunar tsaro na Sibul Difens NSCDC a jihar Neja sun kama wata mota danƙare da lita 45,000 na jabun kananzir a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The security forces of Sibul Defense NSCDC in Niger state have arrested a car with 45,000 liters of fake kerosene in the state.

Text1: Daga nan ya ce mafita kawai ita ce mu yi tururuwa mu fita mu yi zaɓe a ranar 25 Ga Fabrairu, 2023.
Text1 Translation: He then said that the only way out is for us to rush out and vote on February 25, 2023.
Text2: Za a yi zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a ranar 25 Ga Fabrairu, 2023.
Text2 Translation: The presidential election will be held on February 25, 2023.

Text1: NDLEA ta kama mata 127 cikin ƴan kwaya 1,078 da hukumar ta kama  a jihar Kano a 2022
Text1 Translation: NDLEA arrested 127 women out of 1,078 drug dealers caught by the agency in Kano state in 2022
Text2: Hukumar Hisbah ta jihar Kano ta kama wasu matasa su 19 da suka halarci taron daurin auren wasu maza biyu, Abba da Mujahid a jihar.
Text2 Translation: The Kano State Hisbah Commission has arrested 19 youths who attended the wedding ceremony of two men, Abba and Mujahid in the state.

Text1: Bayan fitowar su, Sanata Kalu ya shaida wa manema labarai cewa a yanzu hasalallun sun huce, sun haƙura da canja sheƙa.
Text1 Translation: After their appearance, Senator Kalu told reporters that now the violence has calmed down, they have tolerated the change.
Text2: Lalong na magana ne da manema labarai a Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa, lokaci kaɗan bayan fitowar sa daga taron sirri da ya yi da Shugaban Ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: Lalong was speaking to reporters at the Presidential Palace, shortly after he emerged from a private meeting with the President.

Text1: A ciki mun shaida musu cewa ba a gudanar da sahihin taron na wakilai a jihar ba da zabuka kamar yadda ɓangaren jam’iyyar cewa anyi.
Text1 Translation: In it, we told them that there was no proper assembly of representatives in the state and elections as the party said.
Text2: Haka kuma ko a jihar Kano, jam’iyyar a rabe take, ɓangaren Kwankwaso da na Aminu Wali.
Text2 Translation: Also, even in Kano state, the party is divided, Kwankwaso's side and Aminu Wali's side.

Text1: “A Akwa Ibom Wike bai goyi bayan ɗan takarar PDP ba, ya goyi bayan mai adawa da PDP, wato Albert, Kuma faɗuwa zaɓe ya yi.
Text1 Translation: "In Akwa Ibom, Wike did not support the PDP candidate, he supported the opponent of the PDP, that is Albert, and he lost the election.
Text2: Sai dai kuma ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na PDP Atiku Abubakar da Peter Obi na PDP duk sun goyi bayan canjin kuɗin.
Text2 Translation: However, PDP presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar and PDP's Peter Obi both supported the change of currency.

Text1: Yadda sojoji suka kashe gaggan ƴan bindiga biyu a Kaduna, suka ƙwato tulin kayan sojoji
Text1 Translation: How the soldiers killed two armed bandits in Kaduna, and seized a pile of military equipment
Text2: A ranar Lahadi ‘yan bindiga sun kashe sojoji biyu a jihar Imo.
Text2 Translation: On Sunday, gunmen killed two soldiers in Imo state.

Text1: Abdullahi Adamu ya yi gwamna tsawon shekaru takwas, daga 1999 zuwa 2007 a jihar Nasarawa.
Text1 Translation: Abdullahi Adamu served as governor for eight years, from 1999 to 2007 in Nasarawa state.
Text2: Bola Tinubu ne ya yi mulki tsawon shekaru takwas daga 1999 zuwa 2007, a ƙarƙashin AD.
Text2 Translation: Bola Tinubu ruled for eight years from 1999 to 2007, under AD.

Text1: Tun a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa dai NNPP ta nuna da gaske ta ke yi sai ta ƙwace kujerar gwamna daga APC.
Text1 Translation: Since the presidential election, the NNPP has shown what it is really doing by wresting the governorship seat from the APC.
Text2: Gwamna Okowa dai shi ne ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa na Atiku Abubakar a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: Governor Okowa is the vice presidential candidate of Atiku Abubakar in the 2023 election.

Text1: Shugaban Marasa Rinjaye na Majalisar Tarayya Ndudi Elumelu ne ya nemi a amince da su, kuma nan take aka amince.
Text1 Translation: Ndudi Elumelu, the leader of the Independents of the Federal Assembly, asked for their approval, and it was immediately approved.
Text2: Shugaban madu rinjaye na majalisar Tarayya Honarabul Ado Doguwa ya kalubalanci hwamnatin tarayya ta kyale ƴan Najeriya su Mallaki bindigogi fomin kare kansu.
Text2 Translation: The Majority Leader of the Federal Assembly, Honorable Ado Doguwa, has challenged the federal government to allow Nigerians to own firearms for self-defense.

Text1: Ya bayyana haka ne a wata tattaunawa da ya yi da Kamfanin Dillancin Labarai na Najeriya (NAN).
Text1 Translation: He stated this in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN).
Text2: Mazauna garin Abuja sun bayyana ra’ayoyinsu game da saka gwanjo a tattaunawar sanin ra’ayoyin mutane wanda kamfanin Dillancin Labaran Najeriya NAN.
Text2 Translation: Residents of Abuja have expressed their views on auctioning in an opinion poll conducted by the Nigerian News Agency NAN.

Text1: Hukumar NHRC ta saurari kararrakin  cin zarafin mata da yara 158,517 a Najeriya
Text1 Translation: The NHRC heard 158,517 cases of violence against women and children in Nigeria
Text2: “Hukumar ta saurari kararraki 913,197 a shekarar 2021 inda a ciki ta saurari kararrakin cin zarafin mata da yara kanana 158,517.
Text2 Translation: "The commission heard 913,197 cases in 2021, in which it heard 158,517 cases of violence against women and children.

Text1: Iran ta gamu da gudumar Ingila a Qatar, ta jibga mata kwallaye 6 da raga
Text1 Translation: Iran met England in Qatar, scoring 6 goals
Text2: Kafa n karshe wasa kuwa, Ingila ta zura wa Iran kwallaye har 6 a raga.
Text2 Translation: In the last leg of the game, England scored 6 goals against Iran.

Text1: Nwafoaku ya ce bayan ‘yan sanda sun kama Enema ne suka gano cewa ya siyar da sarkar akan naira 463,000.
Text1 Translation: Nwafoaku said that after the police arrested Enema, they discovered that he had sold the chain for 463,000 naira.
Text2: Bayan haka kuma rundunar ta bayyana cewa ta kama wata mata mai shekaru 23, wanda ta sai da jaririn ta akan naira ₦600,000.
Text2 Translation: After that, the force revealed that they arrested a 23-year-old woman, who she gave away with her baby for ₦600,000 naira.

Text1: Gidauniyar ‘Smile Attract Smile (SAS)’ ta tallafa wa mata zawarawa 105 a babban birnin tarayya Abuja.
Text1 Translation: The 'Smile Attract Smile (SAS)' foundation supported 105 widows in the capital, Abuja.
Text2: ‘Yan sandan babban birnin tarayya sun bayyana cewa sun kama ‘yan shi’a 57 cikin wadanda suka yi arangama da sua a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Capital Police have announced that they have arrested 57 Shiites among those who clashed with them in Abuja.

Text1: Shugaban ƙasa Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa wanda zai mika wa mulki a 2023, mutum ne wanda ƴan Najeriya suka zaɓa.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has stated that the person who will hand over power in 2023 is a person chosen by Nigerians.
Text2: Shugaban kasar Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari ya mika ta’aziyyar sa ga iyayen marigayiya Haneefa.
Text2 Translation: The President of Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari has sent his condolences to the parents of the late Haneefa.

Text1: Kodinatan Kwankwaso na NNPP a jihar Bauchi ya watsar da tafiyar, ya koma PDP
Text1 Translation: Governor Kwankwaso of the NNPP in Bauchi state abandoned the trip and joined the PDP
Text2: Babayo Liman kodinatan dan takarar Shugaban kasa na jami’yyar NNPP Rabi’u Ƙwankwaso na jihar Bauchi ya yi watsi da tafiyar ya koma jami’yyar PDP.
Text2 Translation: Babayo Liman, the coordinator of the presidential candidate of NNPP Rabi'u Kwankwaso of Bauchi state has abandoned the trip and joined PDP.

Text1: Jagoran tawagar lauyoyin LP, Uzoukwu ya shaida wa Yakubu cewa dalilin ziyarar shi ne domin su share hanyar fara nazarin kayan zaɓen shugaban ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: The leader of the LP legal team, Uzoukwu told Yakubu that the reason for the visit was to pave the way for the examination of the presidential election materials.
Text2: Babban Bankin Najeriya (CBN), ya shaida wa Shugaban Hukumar Zaɓe na Ƙasa, Mahmood Yakubu cewa sauya launin kuɗi ba zai shafi zaɓen 2023 ba.
Text2 Translation: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), has told the Chairman of the National Electoral Commission, Mahmood Yakubu that the change in currency color will not affect the 2023 elections.

Text1: Babbar Kotun Birnin Kebbi ta maida Shi Jam’iyyar PDP, Uche Secondus a kan kujerar sa a ranar Alhamis.
Text1 Translation: The Birnin Kebbi High Court reinstated Uche Secondus of the PDP on Thursday.
Text2: Lauyan mutanen uku mai suna Ibrahim Jibril, ya riƙa kotun ta dubi ƙarar da su ka shigar, a maida Uche Secondus kan shugabancin PDP.
Text2 Translation: The lawyer of the three men, Ibrahim Jibril, asked the court to look into the case filed by them, to restore Uche Secondus to the PDP leadership.

Text1: Akpan ya ce a dalilin haka Nseobot da Anirdi za su biya Iniubong Naira miliyan 4.2.
Text1 Translation: Akpan said that for this reason Nseobot and Anirdi will pay Iniubong 4.2 million Naira.
Text2: Majiyar ta ce an shaida masu sansanonin sun fi shida, don haka su na neman sai dai a biya kowane sansani naira miliyan biyar.
Text2 Translation: The source said that the owners of the camps have been told that there are more than six, so they are only asking for five million naira to be paid for each camp.

Text1: Sannan kuma a jihar Oyo hukumar ta kama wani  dillalin kwayoyi mai suna Mustapha Ijabula mai shekara 22 da kwayoyin tramadol 1,900.
Text1 Translation: And in Oyo state, the agency arrested a drug dealer named Mustapha Ijabula, 22 years old, with 1,900 pills of tramadol.
Text2: NDLEA dake aiki a ruwa ta kama  Fonkou Dassi mai shekara 31 da kwayoyin tramadol 6,000 ranar Juma’a.
Text2 Translation: NDLEA operating in the water arrested 31-year-old Fonkou Dassi with 6,000 pills of tramadol on Friday.

Text1: ZARGIN ZAMBAR NAIRA BILIYAN 1.2: Kotu ta ba Shamsuddeen ɗan Gwamnan Bauchi damar ceton kan sa
Text1 Translation: 1.2 BILLION NAIRA SCAM ALLEGATION: Court allows Shamsuddeen son of Bauchi Governor to save himself
Text2: ZARGIN HARƘALLAR SAYEN KADARORI: Kotu ta ce har yanzu ɗan Bala Gwamnan Bauchi na ruwa, kusa da kada
Text2 Translation: PROPERTY PURCHASE ALLEGATION: Court says Bala son of Bauchi governor is still in water, close to crocodile

Text1: Ya yi kira ga shugaban ƙasa Muhammadu Buhari da ya tsananin bada umarnin a saki sauran fasinjojin dake tsare.
Text1 Translation: He called on President Muhammadu Buhari to order the release of the other detained passengers.
Text2: Shugaban ƙasa Muhammadu Buhari ya bayyana cewa wanda zai mika wa mulki a 2023, mutum ne wanda ƴan Najeriya suka zaɓa.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has stated that the person who will hand over power in 2023 is a person chosen by Nigerians.

Text1: “PDP ta riƙe mulki shekaru 16, waɗanda daga ciki Kudu maso Yamma ta riƙe shekaru takwas a ƙarƙashin Obasanjo.
Text1 Translation: “PDP held power for 16 years, of which the South West held eight years under Obasanjo.
Text2: Sai Arewa maso Yamma ce ta yi mulkin shekaru biyu kacal, a ƙarƙashin marigayi Umaru ‘Yar’Adua.” Inji Lawal.
Text2 Translation: It was the North-West that ruled for two years only, under the late Umaru 'Yar'Adua." Lawal said.

Text1: Salele ya bayyana a kotun cewa yana kaunar Bilkisu sai dai bai shirya aure ba sai nan da shekaru biyu masu zuwa.
Text1 Translation: Salele stated in the court that he loves Bilkisu but he is not ready to marry until the next two years.
Text2: “CDA ta shirya don daukar nauyin mutum 37,000 dake dauke da cutar daga nan zuwa shekaru biyu masu zuwa.
Text2 Translation: "CDA is ready to take care of 37,000 people with the disease from now to the next two years.

Text1: “Idan ka dubi halin da ake ciki yanzu a Najeriya, zan iya cewa an samu gagarimin ci gaba a cikin ‘yan shekarun nan,” inji Aregbesola.
Text1 Translation: "If you look at the current situation in Nigeria, I can say that there has been great progress in recent years," said Aregbesola.
Text2: To a yanzu ya na so ya yi wa Najeriya gyara kamar yadda ya gyara Legas ta samu gagarimin ci gaba.
Text2 Translation: So now he wants to reform Nigeria as he reformed Lagos and it has made great progress.

Text1: Bayan haka wani faston cocin Katolika a jihar Kaduna da ‘yan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da shi a kwanakin baya ya rasu a hannun maharan.
Text1 Translation: After that, a pastor of a Catholic church in Kaduna state who was kidnapped by bandits a few days ago died in the hands of the attackers.
Text2: Cocin Katolika na jihar Kaduna ta ce fasto Joseph Bako ya rasu tsakanin ranakun 18 zuwa 20 ga Afrilu.
Text2 Translation: The Kaduna State Catholic Church said Pastor Joseph Bako died between the 18th and 20th of April.

Text1: Kotun Ƙoli ta ce a ci gaba da karɓar tsoffin kuɗaɗe, amma kowa ya ƙi bin umarnin kotu.
Text1 Translation: The Supreme Court said to continue accepting the old bills, but everyone refused to comply with the court order.
Text2: Musa ya bayyana ci gaba da rajistar da ake yi na mambobin APC a Jihar Zamfara a yanzu, karyawa ce da bijire wa umarnin kotu.
Text2 Translation: Musa explained that the ongoing registration of APC members in Zamfara State is a violation and defiance of the court order.

Text1: Boko Haram sun kai wa Kurkukun Kuje hari wajen ƙarfe 10 na dare a ranar Talata.
Text1 Translation: Boko Haram attacked Kuje Prison around 10pm on Tuesday.
Text2: Ya ce za a fara zaman tantance su a ranar Alhamis, da ƙarfe 10 na safe.
Text2 Translation: He said that their evaluation session will begin on Thursday, at 10 o'clock in the morning.

Text1: Kotu ta ce Ayu a yanzu ba shugaban PDP ba ne, daga yanzu har zuwa ranar da za ta yi hukunci tukunna.
Text1 Translation: The court said that Ayu is not the president of the PDP, from now until the day she decides.
Text2: Ɓangaren Wike ya ce tun da aka kafa PDP ba a taɓa yin shugaban jam’iyya wanda ya rarraba kawunan ‘yan jam’iyya kamar Ayu ba.
Text2 Translation: Bongaren Wike said that since the establishment of PDP, there has never been a party leader who has divided party leaders like Ayu.

Text1: “Na gano cewa Isyaku baya girmama iyayen matarsa  hakan ya sa nake so a raba auren.
Text1 Translation: "I found out that Isyaku does not respect his wife's parents, that's why I want to divorce the marriage.
Text2: Ita Egobeke ta karyata duk abin da Anya ya fadi a kanta a kotu tana mai cewa bata so a raba auren.
Text2 Translation: Egobeke denied everything Anya said about her in court saying that she did not want the marriage to be dissolved.

Text1: Sarkin kauyen Agodo dake karamar hukumar Ewekoro Ayinde Odetola ya gamu da ajalinsa bayan wasu mutane sun afka fadarsa.
Text1 Translation: The chief of Agodo village in Ewekoro Local Government Area Ayinde Odetola met his death after some people attacked his palace.
Text2: Wannan hari ya auku ne kwanaki 12 da wasu ‘yan bindiga suka kashe mutane a kasuwar Unguwar Lalle dake karamar hukumar Sabon Birni.
Text2 Translation: This attack happened 12 days after some bandits killed people in Unguwar Lalle market in Sabon Birni local government.

Text1: A Arewa maso Yamma Danmadami ya ce Operation Hadarin Daji sun kashe mahara 16 sannan sun kama wasu mutum 7 a yankin.
Text1 Translation: In the North West, Danmadami said that Operation Hadarin Daji killed 16 attackers and arrested 7 others in the area.
Text2: ” Sannan kuma wanda ake zargin (Mamu) ya kitsa kashe jami’an tsaro da dama a yankin Arewa ta tsakiya da Arewa maso Gabashin Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: And the suspect (Mamu) killed many security officers in the North Central and North Eastern regions of Nigeria.

Text1: Haka Buhari ya furta a wata tattaunawa da aka yi da shi a Gidan Talabijin na Channels, wadda aka nuna a ranar Laraba da dare.
Text1 Translation: This is what Buhari said in an interview with him on Channels Television, which was shown on Wednesday night.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na Buhari, Femi Adesina ne ya bayyana haka a ciki wata tattaunawa da gidan Talabijin na Channels ya yi da shi.
Text2 Translation: Buhari's Publicity Spokesperson, Femi Adesina, said this in an interview with Channels Television.

Text1: Shugaban kwamitin dattawan jam’iyyar PDP, Walid Jibrin ya bayyana cewa lallai jam’iyyar PDP ba ta yi adalci ba wajen rabon mukaman siyasa a jam’iyyar.
Text1 Translation: The Chairman of the Elders Committee of the PDP, Walid Jibrin stated that the PDP has not been fair in the allocation of political positions in the party.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ta bayyana cewa gwamnatin Muhammadu Buhari mai mulki ta ci amanar ƴan Najeriya a tsawon mulkinta a ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has declared that the ruling Muhammadu Buhari government has betrayed Nigerians during its rule in this country.

Text1: Majiya ta bayyana cewa masu garkuwa sun nemi a biya su Naira miliyan 60, amma daga baya su ka rage zuwa Naira miliyan 40.

Text1: Kwamishinan tsaron jihar Kaduna, Samuel Aruwan ya sanar da haka ranar Juma’a a garin Kaduna.

Text1: ” Kawai a kyale mutane su mallaki makamai kawai su kare kansu domin gwamnati ta gaza, jami’an tsaro sun gaza.

Text2 Translation: "If the security forces fail, all citizens should not be involved in this disaster, everyone should be allowed to own a weapon.

Text1: Mutum 9 sun mutu a dalilin kamuwa da cutar a jihohi shida daga Satumba 2017 zuwa 12 ga Yuni 2022.

Text1: APC ta ce bai wa Abba nasara da INEC ta yi, ya kauce wa Dokar Zaɓe ta 2022.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES ta buga labarin yadda ɗan aiken Gwamna Ortom ya kayar da shi a zaɓen sanata.

Text1: Idan aka yi haka, za a yarda da masu cewa ƙoƙarin maida Najeriya ƙasar Musulunci zalla gaskiya su ke faɗa kenan.

Text1: Idan ka ci zaɓe, za a ba ka albashin shekaru huɗu na zangon shugaban ƙasa na farko.

Text1: OK ya bayyana haka a ranar Laraba lokacin da ya ke kare kasafin ofishin sa na 2023 a Majalisar Tarayya.

Text1: Rundunar Yaƙin Tinubu 2023 ta ce  turnuƙun rikicin da wasu hasalallun gwamnonin PDP ke yi da shugabannin jam’iyyar su, alheri ne ga jam’iyyar APC.

Text1: Haka nan kuma don taya murna ga Atiku bisa nasarar da ya samu a zaben fidda gwanin PDP wanda aka yi kwanakin baya.

Text1: Ya ce za a kammala horas da su cikin Fabrairu, 2023, inda za a sallame su su koma cikin jama’a.

Text1: Wannan ne karo na farko da babu sunan Muhammadu Buhari a cikin ‘yan takarar shugaban ƙasa, tun daga 2003 har zuwa yau tsawon shekaru 20.

Text2 Translation: "But it is impossible to say that the same region has a presidential candidate, a party leader and a general director of the campaign." Said Wike.

Text1: Mahmud Gaya wanda shine ɗan majalisan da ke kan kujera ya lashe zaɓen da ƙuri’u 198 inda shi kuma Bashir ya samu kuri’u 16 kacal.

Text1: Yanzu dai darajar dala 1 na daidai da naira 775 a kasuwar ‘yan canji, ba kamar yadda ta ke naira 790 a ranar Juma’a.

Text1: Akintayo ta dage ci gaba da shari’ar  zuwa ranar 28 ga Yuni domin Afsat ta samu daman gabatar da nata shaidun a kotu.

Text1: Sun zargi Ayu wanda tsohon Shugaban Majalisar Dattawa ne da rashin taɓuka komai a zaɓen gwamna da PDP ta yi a jihar Benuwai.

Text1: A jihohi kamar Kaduna, Legas, Oyo, Enugu, Babban birnin tarayya, Abuja da wasu birane, har zuwa cikin daren Laraba babu wutan lantarki a faɗin biranen.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya nuna takaicin yadda mace ɗaya tilo ce ke takarar gwamna a zaɓen 2023.

Text1: Saka wa jami’ar Maryam Abacha sunan mahaifiyar mu da Farfesa Gwarzo yayi abin alfahari ne gare mu – Mohammed Abacha
Text1 Translation: It is a matter of pride for us to name Maryam Abacha University after our mother - Mohammed Abacha
Text2: A hira da yayi da Tubeless, Abacha ya ce wannan karamci da Farfesa Gwarzo yayi abin alfahari ne garesu da ita mahaifiyar ta su.
Text2 Translation: In an interview with Tubeless, Abacha said that Professor Gwarzo's generosity is a source of pride for him and his mother.

Text1: “Amma fa in dai son Buhari ne a ƙasar nan, to ba wanda ya kai Tinubu son Buhari.”
Text1 Translation: "But if it is Buhari's love in this country, no one loves Buhari as much as Tinubu."
Text2: “To ko ta fannin inganta rayuwar al’umma ɗin nan da muke yi a faɗin ƙasar nan, ai mun bambanta da PDP.
Text2 Translation: "Even in terms of improving the lives of the people that we are doing across the country, we are different from the PDP.

Text1: Majalisa ta umarci Hukumar Kwastan ta biya diyyar Naira miliyan 360 ga iyalan mutum 18 da ta bindige
Text1 Translation: Parliament orders the Customs Commission to pay compensation of 360 million naira to the families of 18 people it shot
Text2: Daga cikin kuɗaɗen za a biya Naira miliyan 200 ga iyalan mutum 10 da kwastan su ka kashe a Jibiya, Jihar Katsina.
Text2 Translation: Among the funds, 200 million Naira will be paid to the families of 10 people whose customs were killed in Jibiya, Katsina State.

Text1: ” Na nemi in ga Buhari bayan sakin bidiyon da ƴan ta’adda suka ce za su sace shi da ni.
Text1 Translation: "I asked to see Buhari after the release of the video that the terrorists said they would kidnap him and me.
Text2: An kama shi cikin Satumba, bayan ya yi ta shiga tsakani ‘yan ta’adda na sakin wasu da su ka tsare rukuni bayan rukuni.
Text2 Translation: He was arrested in September, after intervening with the terrorists to release others and detain them group after group.

Text1: Hedikwatar Hukumar tsaron ƙasa DHQ ta bayyana cewa dakarun rundunar ‘Operation Hadin Kai OPHK sun kashe Boko Haram/ISWAP 31 sannan sun kama ƴan ta’adda 70.
Text1 Translation: The headquarters of the National Security Agency DHQ stated that the forces of Operation Hadin Kai OPHK killed 31 Boko Haram/ISWAP and captured 70 terrorists.
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Kwara ta bayyana cewa tana farautar wani matashi da ya kashe kanensa a jihar, sannan ya arce.
Text2 Translation: The Kwara State Police Force has revealed that it is hunting a young man who killed his younger brother in the state, then disappeared.

Text1: Akintayo ya raba auren saboda rashin kauna tsakanin ma’auratan.
Text1 Translation: Akintayo broke up the marriage because of the lack of love between the couple.
Text2: Alkalin kotun S.M Akintayo ta ce ta raba auren ne saboda rashin zaman lafiya a tsakanin ma’auratan.
Text2 Translation: Judge S.M Akintayo said that she divorced the marriage because of the lack of peace between the couple.

Text1: “Ƙungiyar mu za ta shirya gagarimin gangamin taro a Abuja, domin tabbatar da an samu adadin yawan mutanen, kuma su nuna goyon bayan Yahaya Bello.
Text1 Translation: "Our organization will organize a large rally in Abuja, to ensure that the number of people is reached, and to show their support for Yahaya Bello.
Text2: Sai dai kuma IPOB ba ta nuna goyon bayan kowace jam’iyya ɗaya ba, daga cikin jam’iyyu 18 da suka tsaida ɗan takarar gwamna a zaɓen.
Text2 Translation: However, IPOB did not show support for any single party, out of the 18 parties that nominated the governorship candidate in the election.

Text1: Ya ce maharan sun fara kai hari a kauyen Ungwan Fada sannan suka gangaro zuwa Ungwan Turawa da Ungwan Makama sannan suka afka kauyen Rubu.
Text1 Translation: He said the attackers first attacked Ungwan Fada village and then went down to Ungwan Turawa and Ungwan Makama and then attacked Rubu village.
Text2: Sannan a kauyen Unguwar Ayaba mazauna kauyen na ta yin hijira zuwa kauyen Unguwar Gimbiya domin guje wa maharan da suka addabe su.
Text2 Translation: Then in the village of Unguwar Ayaba, the villagers migrated to the village of Unguwar Gimbiya to escape the attackers who harassed them.

Text1: Ficewar Najatu Mohammed daga APC ta koma wurin Atiku na PDP ya ƙara fito wa abin da wasu ke ganin cewa matsalolin Tinubu ne.
Text1 Translation: The departure of Najatu Mohammed from the APC to Atiku of the PDP further exposes what some see as Tinubu's problems.
Text2: Wasu na ganin cewa Tinubu ne ya turo su wajen Wike ɗin.
Text2 Translation: Some believe that Tinubu sent them to Wike.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun buɗe wa motocin jami’an tsaron da ke yi wa matafiya jagora zuwa Ɗansadau daga Gusau
Text1 Translation: Gunmen opened fire on the vehicles of the security officers who were guiding the travelers to Dansadau from Gusau
Text2: ” Yanzu dole sai an yi wa matafiya jagora zuwa garin Ɗansadau daga Gusau idan ba haka ba kuwa tafiyar bashi yiwuwa.
Text2 Translation: " Now the travelers must be guided to the town of Dansadau from Gusau, otherwise the journey is impossible.

Text1: Wasu na ƙoƙarin azurta kan su ta hanyar kamfen ɗin, ta yadda ko an faɗi zaɓe, to ba ta ɓare da su ba.
Text1 Translation: Some are trying to provide for themselves through the campaign, so that even if the election is announced, it will not leave them alone.
Text2: Ya ƙara da cewa gwamnati na ƙoƙarin bin wata hanyar sako yaran ba tare da an biya diyya ba.
Text2 Translation: He added that the government is trying to find a way to release the children without compensation.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Zamfara, Mohammed Shehu ya sanar da cewa ‘yan sanda sun yi arangama da ‘yan bindiga a yankunan Gumi da Bukkuyum.
Text1 Translation: Zamfara Police Broadcasting Spokesman, Mohammed Shehu has announced that the police have clashed with bandits in Gumi and Bukkuyum areas.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari, Garba Shehu ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwar da ya aika wa PREMIUM TIMES a ranar Litinin.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari's Broadcasting Spokesperson, Garba Shehu disclosed this in a statement he sent to PREMIUM TIMES on Monday.

Text1: Ƴan bindiga sun saki wasu saga cikin fasinjojin da suka tsare hannun sa ranar Litinin da yamma.
Text1 Translation: The gunmen released some of the passengers who detained him on Monday evening.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba ƴan bindiga sun saki bidiyo dake nuna yadda ake jibgar fasinjojin ranar Lahadi.
Text2 Translation: If we don't forget, the bandits released a video showing how the passengers were dumped on Sunday.

Text1: APC ta maida wa Shehu Sani martani, ta ce Kaduna ba ta masu ‘kashe wando a yanar gizo ba ce’
Text1 Translation: APC responds to Shehu Sani, says Kaduna is not for those who 'take off their pants on the internet'
Text2: Jam’iyyar APC ta maida wa sanata Shehu Sani martani inda ta ce shugabancin jihar Kaduna ba ta masu kashe wando bane a yanar gizo.
Text2 Translation: The APC party responded to Senator Shehu Sani saying that the leadership of Kaduna state does not belong to those who kill pants on the internet.

Text1: Ɗaruruwan mutane a yanzu haka sun yi gudun hijira tare da dabbobin su a wasu garuruwa cikin jihar.
Text1 Translation: Hundreds of people have now fled with their animals in other towns in the state.
Text2: Dubban ɗaruruwan mutane a jihar Katsina sun yi gudun hijira saboda farmakin da ake kai masu.
Text2 Translation: Hundreds of thousands of people in Katsina state have fled because of the attack on them.

Text1: Dino Melaye ya sha ƙasa a zaben fidda gwani na jam’iyyar PDP a Kogi
Text1 Translation: Dino Melaye lost in the PDP primaries in Kogi
Text2: Ɗan majalisan dake wakiltar Kabba/Buni a majalisar Tarayya, Tajuddeen Yusuf ya kada fitaccen ɗan siyasa Dino Melaye a zaɓen fidda gwani na kujerar sanata.
Text2 Translation: The member of parliament representing Kabba/Buni in the Federal Parliament, Tajuddeen Yusuf defeated prominent politician Dino Melaye in the primary election for the senatorial seat.

Text1: Salele ya bayyana a kotun cewa yana kaunar Bilkisu sai dai bai shirya aure ba sai nan da shekaru biyu masu zuwa.
Text1 Translation: Salele stated in the court that he loves Bilkisu but he is not ready to marry until the next two years.
Text2: A kotun Mujidat ta bayyana cewa tun da suka yi  aure da Saheed ta daina samun kwanciyan hankali saboda yawan korafi da masifar sa.
Text2 Translation: In the court, Mujidat stated that since they got married to Saheed, she stopped having peace of mind because of his many complaints and misfortunes.

Text1: TAKARAR GWAMNAN KADUNA: Uba Sani ya mika fom din takara ga uwar jam’iyya
Text1 Translation: KADUNA GOVERNOR CANDIDATE: Uba Sani submitted the nomination form to the mother of the party
Text2: Haka kuma shima ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Honarabun Sani Shaaban ya sayi fom din yin takarar.
Text2 Translation: Also, the candidate for governor of the state Honorable Sani Shaaban has bought the form to contest.

Text1: KURUNKUS: Mr LA ne ɗan takarar kujerar Sanatan Kaduna ta Tsakiya na PDP ba Sardaunan Badarawa ba – Kotun Koli
Text1 Translation: KURUNKUS: Mr LA is the candidate for the Kaduna Central Senatorial seat of the PDP and not Sardaunaun Badarawa - Supreme Court
Text2: Babbar Kotun Tarayya dake Kaduna ta yanke hukuncin tabbatar wa sanata Uba Sani, ɗan takarar gwamnan Kaduna na APC kujerar takarar sa.
Text2 Translation: The Federal High Court in Kaduna has decided to confirm Senator Uba Sani, the Kaduna governorship candidate of the APC.

Text1: A ranar 8 Ga Disamba ne Buhari ya aika wa Babbar Kotun Tarayya ta Abuja wannan wasiƙar rashin amincewar ta ta saurari ƙarar.
Text1 Translation: On December 8, Buhari sent this letter of objection to the Federal High Court in Abuja to hear the case.
Text2: A ranar Litinin ce Babbar Kotun Tarayya a Abuja ta yanke hukuncin hana damƙa dakataccen Mataimakin Kwamishinan ‘Yan Sanda Abba Kyari ga mahukuntan Amurka.
Text2 Translation: On Monday, the Federal High Court in Abuja ruled against the extradition of the Deputy Commissioner of Police, Abba Kyari, to the American authorities.

Text1: Nasel ya ce ‘yan sanda sun yi gaggwar kai Nasela asibiti inda a asibitin ya rasu yayin da likitoci ke duba shi.
Text1 Translation: Nasel said that the police rushed Nasela to the hospital where he died while the doctors were examining him.
Text2: “Ochai ya ce Alfred ya gudu sannan Augustine ya rasu yayin da likitoci ke duba shi.
Text2 Translation: "Ochai said Alfred ran away and Augustine died while doctors were examining him.

Text1: Hukumar Tsaro na DSS ta ja hankalin mazauna Babban Birnin Tarayya Abuja cewa kowa ya ci gaba da gudanar da harkokin sa, kuma ya natsu.
Text1 Translation: The DSS security agency has appealed to the residents of the Federal Capital, Abuja, that everyone should go about their business and remain calm.
Text2: Hukumar Inganta al’umma dake babban birnin tarayya Abuja SDS ta cafke wani mutum da ya rika lalata da yara kanana har 19 ta dubura.
Text2 Translation: The Community Development Agency in the capital, Abuja, SDS, has arrested a man who molested children as young as 19 years old.

Text1: Ɗan rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan Adam Chidi Odinkalu ya ce ba lallai ba ne INEC ta shirya sahihin zaɓe a 2023.
Text1 Translation: Human rights activist Chidi Odinkalu said it is not necessary for INEC to organize a fair election in 2023.
Text2: “A doka INEC ce kaɗai ke da nauyin shirya zaɓe sahihi, ba shugaban ƙasa ba.
Text2 Translation: "According to the law, only INEC is responsible for organizing valid elections, not the president.

Text1: ‘Yan bindiga sun kai hari wasu coci biyu, sun kashe mutum uku, sun yi garkuwa da mutane da dama daga Kaduna
Text1 Translation: Gunmen attacked two churches, killed three people and kidnapped many people from Kaduna
Text2: Yadda Ƴan bindiga suka kashe mutum uku suka yi garkuwa da mutane da dama a jihar Katsina
Text2 Translation: How bandits killed three people and kidnapped many people in Katsina state

Text1: A labarin, Shugaban Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa ya tabbatar wa Thabo Mbeki za a gudanar da sahihin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa.
Text1 Translation: In the news, the Chairman of the National Electoral Commission assured Thabo Mbeki that a valid presidential election will be held.
Text2: Amma mu na da yaƙinin cewa za a gudanar da sahihin zaɓe cikin lumana.”
Text2 Translation: But we have the fight to ensure that a valid election will be held in a peaceful manner."

Text1: Ɗan rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan Adam Chidi Odinkalu ya ce ba lallai ba ne INEC ta shirya sahihin zaɓe a 2023.
Text1 Translation: Human rights activist Chidi Odinkalu said it is not necessary for INEC to organize a fair election in 2023.
Text2: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya tabbatar wa ‘yan Najeriya da duniya cewa zai tabbatar da an shirya sahihin zaɓe a shekarar 23 kuma a cikin lumana.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has assured Nigerians and the world that he will ensure that the 23rd election is organized in a peaceful manner.

Text1: Mutum biyu sun mutu, shida sun bace a hadarin jirgin ruwa a Jigawa
Text1 Translation: Two people died, six are missing in a boat accident in Jigawa
Text2: Mutum biyu sun mutu wasu mutum shida sun bace a hadarin jirgin ruwan da aka yi a karamar hukumar Ringim, jihar Jigawa.
Text2 Translation: Two people died and six others went missing in the boat accident in Ringim Local Government, Jigawa State.

Text1: A Najeriya dai yanzu naira 30,000 ce mafi ƙarancin albashi a matakin gwamnatin tarayya da jihohi, kamar yadda gwamnati ta amince tun cikin 2019.
Text1 Translation: In Nigeria, 30,000 naira is now the minimum wage at the federal and state level, as agreed by the government since 2019.
Text2: Daga nan Buhari ya ce a gaskiya a yanzu gwamnatin tarayya ba za ta iya ɗaukar nauyin kula da jami’o’iita kaɗai ba.
Text2 Translation: Buhari then said that now the federal government cannot take care of the universities alone.

Text1: Domin da na fito takarar gwamna ma a 2019, sai da Wike ya ba ni gudunmawar dala 220,000.
Text1 Translation: Because when I ran for governor in 2019, Wike had to give me a donation of 220,000 dollars.
Text2: Gwamna Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi na Jihar Enugu ya sha ƙasa a takarar Sanatan Enugu ta Arewa da ya fito a ƙarƙashin PDP.
Text2 Translation: Governor Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi of Enugu State has lost in the Enugu North Senatorial contest that he contested under the PDP.

Text1: Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya rantsar da Olukayode Ariwoola a matsayin sabon Cif Jojin Najeriya na riƙo.
Text1 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari has sworn in Olukayode Ariwoola as the new Acting Governor of Nigeria.
Text2: “MASSOB na kuma tunatar da Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari cewa ci gaba da tsare Kanu a hannun DSS zai ƙara tunzirawa da ruruta wutar fitintinun kawai.
Text2 Translation: "MASSOB is also reminding President Muhammadu Buhari that the continued detention of Kanu in the hands of the DSS will only aggravate and inflame the fire of the riots.

Text1: “Sannan kwarara wa Aisha da Ahmed ruwan batir da Agu ya yi ya nuna cewa da gangar ya aikata hakan.
Text1 Translation: "Then the flow of the battery water that Agu did to Aisha and Ahmed shows that he did it on purpose.
Text2: Aisha da Ahmed sun gabatar da hotunan raunin da suka ji a dalilin ruwan batir din da Agu ya kwarara musu a kotu.
Text2 Translation: Aisha and Ahmed presented photos of the injuries they felt as a result of the battery water that Agu poured on them in court.

Text1: Kamfanin dillancin Labaran Najeriya ya ruwaito cewa sakataren gwamnatin tarayya Boss Mustapha ne ya wakilci shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buharia wannan taro.
Text1 Translation: The News Agency of Nigeria reported that the Secretary to the Federal Government, Boss Mustapha, represented President Muhammadu Buhari at this meeting.
Text2: Babban sakataren ma’aikatar ilimi na jihar Yusuf Saleh ya sanar da haka wa Kamfanin Dillancin Labaran Najeriya NAN.
Text2 Translation: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Education of the state, Yusuf Saleh, disclosed this to the News Agency of Nigeria NAN.

Text1: Lauyan da ya shigar da karar Simon Uche ya ce Goodness da Agnes sun aikata satar ne tun a watan Faburairu
Text1 Translation: The lawyer who filed the case, Simon Uche, said that Goodness and Agnes committed the theft in February
Text2: Lauyan da ya shigar da karan Festus Ojo, ya bayyana cewa Tosin ya aikata wannan laifi ne takanin watan Faburairu 2020 da Janairu 2021.
Text2 Translation: The lawyer who filed the case, Festus Ojo, stated that Tosin committed this crime between February 2020 and January 2021.

Text1: A ƙarshen makon da ya gabata ne dai Atiku ya ce ya na maraba da tayin sulhun da rundunar Wike ta nemi a yi.
Text1 Translation: At the end of last week, Atiku said that he welcomes the reconciliation offer that Wike's command asked for.
Text2: Ortom ya ce Atiku ya nemi afuwar Ortom, saboda ya ce ‘yan ‘uwan Ortom su na satar wa Fulani shanu a Benuwai.
Text2 Translation: Ortom said that Atiku apologized to Ortom, because he said that Ortom's brothers were stealing cattle from the Fulani in Benue.

Text1: Kwankwaso ya siya fom ɗin takarar shugaban kasa a jam’iyya mai alamar kayan daɗi, NNPP
Text1 Translation: Kwankwaso bought the presidential nomination form from the party with the brand of luxury goods, NNPP
Text2: Kwankwaso ya siya fom ɗin ne a ofishin jam’iyyar dake Abuja ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: Kwankwaso bought the form at the party office in Abuja on Tuesday.

Text1: Rahotanni sun nuna a cikin garin Awka ana sayar da fetur lita ɗaya naira 180, wasu gidajen man kuma har 195.
Text1 Translation: Reports show that in Awka, one liter of petrol is sold at 180 naira, some petrol stations up to 195 naira.
Text2: Rahotanni sun tabbatar ana sayar da gas daga naira 850 duk lita ɗaya, wasu wuraren kuwa naira 900 su ke sayar da lita ɗaya.
Text2 Translation: Reports confirm that gas is sold from 850 naira per liter, while some places sell it for 900 naira per litre.

Text1: Shugaban kungiyar Atiyap Sam Timbuwak ya ce maharan sun afka kauyen su da misalin karfe 9 na safiyar Laraba ne.
Text1 Translation: The leader of Atiyap Sam Timbuwak said that the attackers attacked their village at around 9 am on Wednesday.
Text2: Jaridar Daily Post wanda ta wallafa labarin ya ce maharan sun afka kauyen a safiyar Asabar bisa babura.
Text2 Translation: The Daily Post, which published the story, said the attackers attacked the village on Saturday morning on motorcycles.

Text1: A ranar 10 ga Agusta ne maharan suka sako mutum 6 cikin fasinjojin.
Text1 Translation: On the 10th of August, the attackers released 6 people from the passengers.
Text2: Maharan sun kashe mazauna garin mutum 6 a harin da suka yi a daren ranar Lahadi.
Text2 Translation: The attackers killed 6 people in their attack on Sunday night.

Text1: “Za Kuma a yi amfani da wani kaso na kudin domin samar da magunguna da sauran kayan aiki domin asibitoci da cibiyoyin lafiya a jihar.
Text1 Translation: "A portion of the money will be used to provide medicines and other equipment for hospitals and health centers in the state.
Text2: Wadannan kayan aiki za a yi amfani dasu wajen ragargaza yan ta’adda, mahara da duk wanda ya shiga wa kasa gaba don tada zaune tsaye.
Text2 Translation: These tools will be used to defeat terrorists, invaders and anyone who joins the country to create unrest.

Text1: SHARI’AR ZARGIN  SHETTIMA YA FITO TAKARA WURI BIYU: Kotu ta kori ƙarar da PDP ta nemi a soke takarar Tinubu da Shettima
Text1 Translation: SHETTIMA'S ALLEGATION COURT HAS BROUGHT OUT TWO CANDIDATES: Court dismisses PDP's appeal to cancel Tinubu's and Shettima's candidacy
Text2: PDP ta ce Shettima ya karya doka, don haka bai kamata shi da ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa Bola Tinubu su tsaya takara ba.
Text2 Translation: PDP said Shettima broke the law, so he and the presidential candidate Bola Tinubu should not contest.

Text1: ‘Yan Boko Haram ɗin da su ka yi saranda sun nemi sauran kangararrun su fito su miƙa wuya
Text1 Translation: The members of Boko Haram, who have attacked them, have asked the other factions to come forward and surrender
Text2: Don haka ya roƙi sauran kangararrun da ba su miƙa wuya ba cewa su fito su yi saranda kawai.
Text2 Translation: So he asked the other rebels who had not surrendered to come out and just fight.

Text1: Alabi, dan asalin jihar Osun ne, mai lamba 10115691FG kuma ya zana jarabawar a jihar sa ta asali ne.
Text1 Translation: Alabi, a native of Osun state, number 10115691FG and sat for the examination in his native state.
Text2: Oreoluwa, shima namiji ne, mai lamba 10109964GI, dan asalin jihar Ogun ne wanda ya zana jarabawarsa a jihar.
Text2 Translation: Oreoluwa, also male, number 10109964GI, is a native of Ogun State who sat his examination in the state.

Text1: Zaɓen Atiku Abubakar ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa bai shafi kujerar da shugaban jam’iyya ke kai ba.
Text1 Translation: The election of Atiku Abubakar as the presidential candidate did not affect the position held by the party leader.
Text2: Peter Obi, mataimakin shugaban kasa na takarar Atiku Abubakar a zaɓen 2019, ya ƙaddamar da fitowa takarar shugaban ƙasa a ƙarƙashin PDP a zaɓen 2023.
Text2 Translation: Peter Obi, the vice presidential candidate for Atiku Abubakar in the 2019 election, has announced that he will contest for the presidency under the PDP in the 2023 election.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Katsina, Gambo Isah, ya tabbatar wa PREMIUM TIMES kama matasan.
Text1 Translation: Katsina State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson, Gambo Isah, confirmed to PREMIUM TIMES the arrest of the youth.
Text2: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Katsina Gambo Isa ya shaida wa wakilin mu cewa zai bibiyi lamarin sannan ya kira shi.
Text2 Translation: Katsina State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson Gambo Isa told our correspondent that he will follow up on the matter and call him.

Text1: Hukumar kwastam reshen jihar Ogun ta kama manyan motoci 73 da suka shigo kasarnan dankare da buhunan shinkafa 44,933 jihar.
Text1 Translation: The Ogun state branch of customs has seized 73 trucks that brought 44,933 bags of potatoes and rice into the state.
Text2: Hukumar Kwastam dake kula da shiyar jihar Ogun ta kama motar ‘yan sanda dauke da shinkafar gwamnati makil.
Text2 Translation: The Customs Agency in charge of the Ogun state market has seized a police vehicle loaded with government rice.

Text1: ABIN DA KAMAR WUYA: Ace wai Peter Obi na jam’iyyar Labour ya yi nasara a zaben shugaban kasa – Atiku
Text1 Translation: IT'S SO DIFFICULT: Let's say that Peter Obi of the Labor Party won the presidential election - Atiku
Text2: “ lallai zai zama abin mamaki da al’ajabi ace wai Peter Obi yayi nasara a zaben 2023.
Text2 Translation: "It will certainly be a surprise and a miracle if Peter Obi wins the 2023 election.

Text1: An karanta masu cewa sun karya dokar Hukumar NDLEA, ta Sashe na 14(b), ta 30 a ƙarƙashin Dokar 2004.
Text1 Translation: It was read that they violated the NDLEA Act, Section 14(b), 30 under the 2004 Act.
Text2: Batun cewa gwamnatin jihar Kano na shirin saka dokar haramtawa mata tuka mota a jihar karya ne.
Text2 Translation: The issue that the Kano state government is planning to introduce a law prohibiting women from driving in the state is false.

Text1: Shiisu ya ce wannan abin tashin hankali ya auku ranar 5 ga Janairu a kauyen Sabuwa Takur dake karamar hukumar Dutse.
Text1 Translation: Shiisu said that this incident happened on January 5 in Sabuwa Takur village in Dutse local government.
Text2: Ya ce an tsinci gawar Nneka ranar 29 ga Agusta a gonar rogo dake kauyen Nguzu Edda kusa da jihar Abia.
Text2 Translation: He said Nneka's body was found on August 29 in a cassava field in Nguzu Edda village near Abia state.

Text1: Tun a ranar Lahadi sai da Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa ta ƙaryata zargin wasoson naira tiriliyan 89 da Gudaji Kazaure ya yi.
Text1 Translation: Since Sunday, the Presidential Palace has denied the allegation of 89 trillion naira fraud made by Gudaji Kazaure.
Text2: Shugaban Hukumar Jiragen Ƙasa Fidet Okhiria ne ya tabbatar da haka a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar ranar Lahadi a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The Chairman of the Civil Aviation Authority, Fidet Okhiria, confirmed this in a statement he issued on Sunday in Abuja.

Text1: CUTAR DIPHTHERIA: Kano ce a gaba, mutum 123 sun rasu, 38  na kwance a asibiti
Text1 Translation: DIPHTHERIA: Kano is in the front, 123 people died, 38 are in hospital
Text2: Bunza ya ce zuwa yanzu mutum 2,028 sun kamu kwalara a jihar kuma cutar ta yadu zuwa kananan hukumomin 20 na jihar.
Text2 Translation: Bunza said that so far 2,028 people have contracted cholera in the state and the disease has spread to 20 local governments in the state.

Text1: “Ina taya ka murnar lashe zaɓen fidda gwani na APC.
Text1 Translation: "I congratulate you for winning the APC primaries.
Text2: Makonni biyu da su ka gabata Tinubu ya taya Atiku murnar lashe zaɓen fidda gwani na PDP.
Text2 Translation: Two weeks ago, Tinubu congratulated Atiku on winning the PDP primaries.

Text1: Sanata Emmanuel Bwacha ke wakiltar Taraba ta Kudu a majalisar Dattawa kuma shine ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Taraba a jam’iyyar APC.
Text1 Translation: Senator Emmanuel Bwacha represents Taraba South in the Senate and is the governorship candidate of Taraba State in the APC party.
Text2: Ɗan Majalisar Tarayya mai wakiltar Ƙananan Hukumomin Sandamu/Daura/Mai’aduwa, Fatuhu Muhammad, ya yi barazanar tarwatsa jam’iyyar su APC, a Jihar Katsina.
Text2 Translation: The member of the Federal Assembly representing Sandamu/Daura/Maiaduwa Local Government, Fatuhu Muhammad, has threatened to disband their party, APC, in Katsina State.

Text1: Wancan bayani da Lai ya yi a ranar Laraba, a lokacin ya na Washington DC, Amurka.
Text1 Translation: That statement that Lai made on Wednesday, at that time he was in Washington DC, USA.
Text2: Ministan ya yi wannan umarni ne a ranar Laraba, lokacin da ya ke ganawa da Sarkin Kuje, wato Gomo na Kuje, Haruna Jibrin.
Text2 Translation: The minister made this order on Wednesday, when he was meeting with the Emir of Kuje, that is Gomo na Kuje, Haruna Jibrin.

Text1: “Sakamakon binciken da muka gudanar ya tabbatar mana da cewa Kabiru ya yi lalata da yara kanana maza har su 19 a wannan kauye.
Text1 Translation: "The results of our investigation confirmed that Kabiru sexually assaulted 19 young boys in this village.
Text2: “A nan take bayan an kama shi yara da dama a kauyen ke fada cewa Kabiru ya yi lalata da su ta dubura.
Text2 Translation: "Immediately after he was arrested, many children in the village are saying that Kabiru sexually assaulted them.

Text1: “A jihar Osun Wike bai goyi bayan Adeleke na  PDP, amma kuma Adeleke dai ne ya yi nasarar zama gwamna.
Text1 Translation: "In Osun state, Wike did not support Adeleke of PDP, but it was Adeleke who succeeded as governor.
Text2: “A Akwa Ibom Wike bai goyi bayan ɗan takarar PDP ba, ya goyi bayan mai adawa da PDP, wato Albert, Kuma faɗuwa zaɓe ya yi.
Text2 Translation: "In Akwa Ibom, Wike did not support the PDP candidate, he supported the opponent of the PDP, that is Albert, and he lost the election.

Text1: Shin da gaske ne kotu a Najeriya ta umurci kamfanin MTN ya biya Mr Anenih naira miliyan 5.5?
Text1 Translation: Did the court in Nigeria really order MTN to pay Mr Anenih 5.5 million naira?
Text2: Bayan da Emmanuel ya kai kamfanin MTN kotu a shekarar 2014 bayan da suka cire mi shi naira 50 ba da izinin sa ba.
Text2 Translation: After Emmanuel took MTN to court in 2014 after they took 50 naira from me without his consent.

Text1: Ahmed Baba wanda magidanci ne mai ‘ya’ya 19, ya ce inda ya fi daɗi a sassan jikin mutum shi ne maƙogaro.
Text1 Translation: Ahmed Baba, who is a householder with 19 children, said that the most pleasant part of the human body is the throat.
Text2: “Ahmed Baba ne ya sa na samo masa sassan naman jikin mutum domin ya biya shi ladar Naira 500,000.00, kuma ya je ya samo.
Text2 Translation: "Ahmed Baba made me get him the human body parts so that he could pay him a reward of 500,000.00 Naira, and he went to get them.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta bada labarin yadda Abdul’aziz Yari ya taya Akanta Janar Jidar naira biliyan 84.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa told the story of how Abdul'aziz Yari gave the Accountant General Jidar 84 billion naira.
Text2: Premium Times Hausa ta bada labarin yadda Mahara suka yi garkuwa da Dagacin Banye, yankin Charanci tun a tsakiyar watan Oktoba.
Text2 Translation: Premium Times Hausa told the story of how the raiders kidnapped Dagacin Banye, Charanci area since the middle of October.

Text1: Rundunar ta ce Ezennaya ya yi wa wadannan mata fashi ranar Talatan da ta gabata a layin  Falolu dake Surulere.
Text1 Translation: The command said that Ezennaya robbed these women last Tuesday at Falolu Street in Surulere.
Text2: Kakakin rundunar Adigun Daniel wanda ya sanar da haka ranar Litini a Osogbo ya ce tun a ranar Juma’a jami’an tsaron suka cafke wadannan mutane.
Text2 Translation: The spokesman of the command, Adigun Daniel, who announced this on Monday in Osogbo, said that since Friday, the security forces arrested these people.

Text1: Hukumar kwastam ta ƙasa dake jihar Katsina ta zargi ‘yan sumoga da yi wa yaki da ‘yan bindiga a jihar kafar angulu.
Text1 Translation: The National Customs Commission in Katsina State has accused drug traffickers of fighting bandits in Kafar Angulu State.
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun kashe mutum 7 kuma sun babbake gidaje 250 a masarautar Miango dake karamar hukumar Bassa jihar Filato.
Text2 Translation: Bandits killed 7 people and looted 250 houses in Miango Emirate in Bassa Local Government Area of ​​Plateau State.

Text1: Hankalin manyan jami’an kurkukun ya tashi da su ka gano cewa Yohanna tsohon ɗan Boko Haram ne.
Text1 Translation: The attention of the senior officials of the prison was raised and they found out that Yohanna is a former member of Boko Haram.
Text2: “Sannan kuma jami’an tsaron mu  ba su da manyan bindigogi irin waɗanda Boko Haram su ka kai wa Kurkukun Kuje hari da su.”
Text2 Translation: "And our security forces don't have big guns like the ones Boko Haram used to attack Kuje Prison."

Text1: Oseji ta ce tallafin da kasar Birtaniya ke badawa duk shekara a Najeriya ya kai kashi 80% na kuɗaɗen da ake kashewa daga  asusun.
Text1 Translation: Oseji said that the support given by the UK every year in Nigeria is 80% of the money spent from the fund.
Text2: Ta ce hakan ya nuna cewa Najeriya za ta cika kashi 80% na gurbin da kasar UK za ta bari a asusun.
Text2 Translation: She said that this shows that Nigeria will fill 80% of the space that the UK will leave in the account.

Text1: Amaechi ya bi sahun Lawal wajen taya Tinubu murnar nasarar da ya samu a zaɓe, Osinbajo shiru har yanzu
Text1 Translation: Amaechi joined Lawal in congratulating Tinubu on his victory in the election, Osinbajo is still silent
Text2: Amaechi ya ce ” Ina taya ka murnar nasarar da ka samu a zaɓen fidda gwani na shugaban kasa da aka kammala ranar Laraba.
Text2 Translation: Amaechi said, "I congratulate you on your victory in the presidential primaries that concluded on Wednesday.

Text1: Sannan kuma rahoton ya ce matsalar tsadar kayan abinci da ya haddasa ƙuncin rayuwa a yanzu, zai ƙara ruruta wutar ƙarancin abincin sosai.
Text1 Translation: And the report said that the problem of high food prices, which has caused the current poverty, will further fuel the food shortage.
Text2: Matsalar ƙuncin rayuwa da tsadar kayan abinci a Najeriya ba ta buƙatar dogon bincike.
Text2 Translation: The problem of poverty and the high cost of food in Nigeria does not require a long analysis.

Text1: An haifi Diya a ranar 3 Ga Afrilu, 1944 a Odogbolu, Jihar Ogun.
Text1 Translation: Diya was born on April 3, 1944 in Odogbolu, Ogun State.

Text2 Translation: Ariwoola was born on August 22, 1958, in Iseyin, Oyo State.

Text1: Ya ce rundunar za ta kai Ehem da mutanen da ya basu kwangilar kashe matarta sa kotu da zarar an kammala yin bincike akai.

Text1: Rahotanni sun nuna a cikin garin Awka ana sayar da fetur lita ɗaya naira 180, wasu gidajen man kuma har 195.
Text1 Translation: Reports show that in Awka, one liter of petrol is sold at 180 naira, some petrol stations up to 195 naira.

Text2 Translation: "Currently, the price of petrol at petrol stations is 168 naira per litre.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 6 ga Oktoba.
Text1 Translation: The trial will continue on October 6.

Text2 Translation: Adedayo said the trial will continue on August 17.

Text1: Kusan farashin komai na abinci ya nunka daga hawan Buhari a 2015 zuwa yau.
Text1 Translation: The price of almost everything for food has increased from the rise of Buhari in 2015 to today.
Text2: A ɓangaren cinikayya a ƙasashen waje kuwa, yawancin farashin kaya a ƙasashen ƙetare bai canja ba tun daga 2015 zuwa yau.
Text2 Translation: In the field of foreign trade, most of the prices of goods in foreign countries have not changed since 2015 to date.

Text1: “Tun lokacin da Gwamnan CBN ya fito takarar shugaban ƙasa mu ka ce a cire shi, amma aka yi biris da mu.

Text2 Translation: NOT RUNNING WITH COLD BODY: Ken Nnamani ran for the presidency in APC, he was disappointed by the price of 100 million naira

Text1: Farkon makon nan ne kuma Matawalle ya ce idan ka amince Emefiele ya tafi karatu waje, guduwa zai yi.

Text1: Jam’iyyun sun haɗa da PDP, LP, NNPP, APGA, SDP, ADC da YPP.
Text1 Translation: The parties include PDP, LP, NNPP, APGA, SDP, ADC and YPP.

Text2 Translation: The parties that broke this law include APC, PDP, APGA, AA, AAC, ADC, LP, PRP, and NNPP.

Text1: “Idan ka dubi halin da ake ciki yanzu a Najeriya, zan iya cewa an samu gagarimin ci gaba a cikin ‘yan shekarun nan,” inji Aregbesola.
Text1 Translation: "If you look at the current situation in Nigeria, I can say that there has been great progress in recent years," said Aregbesola.
Text2: An yi kintacen cewa a tsawon shekarun 30 za a samu kuɗaɗen shiga har dala biliyan 40 ko sama da haka.
Text2 Translation: It has been estimated that over the course of 30 years there will be revenues of up to 40 billion dollars or more.

Text1: Kungiyar Kiristoci TEKAN, ta bukaci gwamnati ta biya diyyar wadanda suka rasa rayukan su rikicin Filato
Text1 Translation: The Christian organization TEKAN requested the government to pay compensation to those who lost their lives in the Plateau conflict
Text2: “ Muna kira ga gwamnati da ta biya diyyar ga iyalan da wadanda suka rasa rayukansu a rikicin kananan hukumomin Bokkos, Riyom, Bassa da Barkin Ladi.

Text1: “Hukumar ta gano cewa Kwasare dan asalin karamar hukumar  Kware ne, jihar Sokoto amma yana zaune a Goron Dutse jihar Kano.
Text1 Translation: "The commission found that Kwasare is a native of Kware local government, Sokoto state but lives in Goron Dutse, Kano state.

Text1: INEC ta tattara yawan ƙuri’un da aka soke sakamakon aringizo da tarzoma sun kai a faɗin jihar lokacin zaɓe sun kai 273,442.
Text1 Translation: INEC has collected the number of votes that were canceled due to riots and riots across the state during the election period which reached 273,442.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ta bayyana cewa ba ta amince da sakamakon yawan ƙuri’un da jam’iyyar LP ta Peter Obi ta samu a Jihar Legas ba.
Text2 Translation: The People's Democratic Party (PDP) has declared that it does not accept the results of the majority of votes that Peter Obi's LP got in Lagos State.

Text1: Jihar Kano kuwa, wakilai sun zaɓi ɗan tsohon shugaban kasa Mohammed Abacha ne ɗan takarar gwamna na jam’iyyar PDP.
Text1 Translation: In Kano state, the representatives chose the son of the former president, Mohammed Abacha, as the governorship candidate of the PDP party.
Text2: Idan ba a manta ba Peter Obi ne ɗan takarar mataimakin shugaban kasa a zaben 2019, na jam’iyyar PDP ta re da Atiku Abubakar.
Text2 Translation: If it is not forgotten, Peter Obi is the vice presidential candidate in the 2019 election, of the PDP party against Atiku Abubakar.

Text1: Haka Ganduje ya bayyana a wurin gangamin kamfen ɗin APC a garin Tsanyawa, a ranar Lahadi.
Text1 Translation: This is what Ganduje said at the APC campaign rally in Tsanyawa town, on Sunday.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ta yi wa APC gori tare da gwasale shugaban jam’iyyar da aka naɗa a wurin Gangamin Taron ranar 26 Ga Maris, a Abuja.
Text2 Translation: The PDP party mocked the APC and dismissed the appointed leader of the party at the campaign meeting on March 26, in Abuja.

Text1: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin da Gwamna Ganduje na Kano ya ce gwamnonin APC sun ce Akpabio ne zaɓin su.
Text1 Translation: PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published an article in which Governor Ganduje of Kano said that APC governors said Akpabio was their choice.
Text2: A ƙarshen makon jiya ne PREMIUM TIMES Hausa ta buga labarin cewa Tinubu ya ‘yarda’ Tajuddeen Abbas ya zama Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya.
Text2 Translation: At the end of last week, PREMIUM TIMES Hausa published the news that Tinubu has 'approved' Tajuddeen Abbas to become the Speaker of the Federal Assembly.

Text1: Sojin Najeriya dake aiki a karkashin rundunar ‘Operation Hadin Kai’ sun kashe Boko Haram/ ISWAP 29 sun kuma kama 55 cikin su.
Text1 Translation: The Nigerian Army operating under the command 'Operation Hadin Kai' killed 29 Boko Haram/ISWAP and captured 55 of them.
Text2: Ya ce a kullum sojojin Najeriya ba su zuwa su yi tattaki har maɓuyar Boko Haram da ISWAP su ragargaje su.
Text2 Translation: He said that the Nigerian army does not always come and march until the hideouts of Boko Haram and ISWAP are destroyed.

Text1: Gwamna Akeredolu ya shawarci Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya umarci Gwamnan Babban Bankin Najeriya, Godwin Emefiele ya gaggauta soke tsarin sauya launin kuɗin da ya ƙirƙiro.
Text1 Translation: Governor Akeredolu has advised President Muhammadu Buhari to order the Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele to immediately cancel the currency change scheme he created.
Text2: “Ni ina ganin ba a bai wa Shugaba Buhari cikakken bayanin yadda batun sauya launin kuɗin ya ke ba.
Text2 Translation: "I think that President Buhari has not been given full information about the issue of changing the color of the currency.

Text1: Fasinjojin sun shafe samada kwanaki 120 a hannun ƴan bindigan.

Text1: Alkalin kotun Damilola Sekoni ya bada belin Okunola akan Naira miliyan daya tare da gabatar da shaidu biyu dake aiki.
Text1 Translation: Magistrate Damilola Sekoni granted Okunola bail at one million naira with the presentation of two active witnesses.
Text2: Alkalin kotun A. O. Adeyemi ta bada belin Moyosoreoluwa akan naira 100,000 tare da gabatar da shaida daya a kotun.
Text2 Translation: Judge A. O. Adeyemi granted bail to Moyosoreoluwa at 100,000 naira and presented one witness in the court.

Text1: Onyeuko ya ce ‘Operation Whirl Stroke’ sun kashe ‘yan bindiga 13 a jihohin Benue da Taraba
Text1 Translation: Onyeuko said 'Operation Whirl Stroke' killed 13 militants in Benue and Taraba states

Text1: MURNA TA KOMA CIKI: Kotu a Jalingo ta kori Bwala daga takarar gwamna na jam’iyyar APC
Text1 Translation: MURNA IS BACK: A court in Jalingo dismissed Bwala from the APC governorship race
Text2: Gwamna Muhammad Badaru na Jigawa ya bayyana cewa ba zai iya tsayawa takarar shugaban ƙasa shi da Rotimi Amaechi a ƙarƙashin APC ba.
Text2 Translation: Governor Muhammad Badaru of Jigawa has stated that he cannot contest for the presidency with Rotimi Amaechi under the APC.

Text1: Sun yi ganawar ce ta sirri a babban ɗakin taro na Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa, a Abuja,a ranar Litinin.
Text1 Translation: They had a private meeting at the main meeting room of the Presidential Palace, in Abuja, on Monday.
Text2: “Amma bai yiwuwa a ce yanki ɗaya ke da ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa, shugaban jam’iyya da kuma Darakta Janar na kamfen.” Cewar Wike.
Text2 Translation: "But it is impossible to say that the same region has a presidential candidate, a party leader and a general director of the campaign." Said Wike.

Text1: Duk da cewa su ukun kowane ya lashe mazaɓar sa, hakan bai hana Soludo saɓule masu wando a ƙaramar hukumar kowanen su ba.
Text1 Translation: Even though the three of them each won their constituencies, that did not stop Soludo from picking pants in each of them.

Text2 Translation: In the Local Government, Aguata won the majority, where both of them, when their votes are combined, are not equal to the number of Soludo.

Text1: A ranar Litinin makon jiya mahara suna kashe mutum daya a taron karshen shekara da ake yi a kauyen Igbaye jihar Osun.
Text1 Translation: On Monday last week, assailants killed one person at the end of the year gathering in Igbaye village, Osun state.

Text1: A janwabin sa, Abubakar ya bayyana cewa ya na irin karimcin da Gwamna Bala Mohammed ya nuna masa, kuma ya shirya masa.
Text1 Translation: In his speech, Abubakar stated that he appreciates the hospitality shown to him by Governor Bala Mohammed, and he prepared for him.
Text2: Tun lokacin dakatarwar dai Kakakin Yaɗa Labarai na APC a Jihar Adamawa, Mohammed Abdullahi ya bayyana cewa kalaman na Sulaiman abin damuwa ne matuƙa.
Text2 Translation: Since the suspension, the APC Media Spokesperson in Adamawa State, Mohammed Abdullahi has stated that Sulaiman's comments are very worrying.

Text1: Haka Shugaban Ƙungiyar Gwamnonin APC, Atiku Bagudu bai yi nasara a Kebbi a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa ba, kuma an kayar da shi.
Text1 Translation: The Chairman of the APC Governors Association, Atiku Bagudu did not win in Kebbi in the presidential election, and he was defeated.

Text2 Translation: The governor of Delta State and the vice-presidential candidate of Atiku Abubakar in the PDP, Ifeanyi Okowa, has appealed to the people to be vigilant.

Text1: Farfesa Adamu Gwarzo ne ke da mallakin rukunin jam’oin Maryam Abacha dake Kano da Maradi jamhuriyar Nijar.

Text1: “Ko kuma a kama yaro a ƙarƙashin gada, ba a same shi da laifin komai ba, an tsare shi shekaru a gidan kurkuku.

Text1: Yawaita suma: Idan hat mutum ya kamu da wannan cuta za a rika yawan sums saboda rashin lafiyar dake jikin mutum.

Text1: Sanata Emmanuel Bwacha ke wakiltar Taraba ta Kudu a majalisar Dattawa kuma shine ɗan takarar gwamnan jihar Taraba a jam’iyyar APC.

Text1: ” Ya kai ga an wayi gari a Najeriya ƴan bindiga na karɓar haraji a ƙasar nan.

Text1: “Shi ya sa ba za ka taɓa ganin wani aikin raya karkara ba, saboda a cikin babban birnin jiha kaɗai za ka ga ana aiki.

Text1: Za a ci gaba da shari’a ranar 25 ga Janairu 2022.

Text1: Ya ce a lokacin da yake kauye an bayyana masa cewa zinnan da matarsa ke yi ne ya sa yake fama da rashin lafiya.

Text1: Aregbesola ya bada wannan tabbacin lokacin da ya ke tattaunawa da Kamfanin Dillancin Labarai na Najeriya (NAN), a Abuja.
