Text2 Translation: The spokesperson of the agency, Femi Babafemi, made this known during an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) on Sunday in Abuja.

Text1: Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Delta, Bright Edafe, ya ce matasa sun cinna wa bankuna biyu wuta a ƙananan hukumomin Udu cikin jihar Delta.
Text1 Translation: Delta State Police Publicity Spokesperson, Bright Edafe, said youths set fire to two banks in Udu Local Government Area in Delta State.
Text2: Haka dai Kakakin Yaɗa Labaran ‘Yan Sandan Jihar Edo, Chidi Nwabuzor ya tabbatar.
Text2 Translation: This was confirmed by the Edo State Police Broadcasting Spokesperson, Chidi Nwabuzor.

Text1: Siddiki ya ce ƴan bindigan sun kira iyalan waɗanda suka yi garkuwa da su kuma sun buƙaci a biya su naira miliyan hudu kudin fansa.
Text1 Translation: Siddiki said the bandits called the families of their kidnappers and demanded a ransom of four million naira.
Text2: Ƙungiyar Gwamnonin Najeriya (NGF) ta bayar da gudunmawar naira miliyan 50 ga iyalan waɗanda harin jirgin ƙasa ya ritsa da su a dajin Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: The Nigerian Governors' Federation (NGF) has donated 50 million naira to the families of the victims of the train attack in Kaduna forest.

Text1: Waƙar dai shegantaka ce ta Tinubu tun bayan kakkausan kalaman da ya yi a Gidan Gwamnatin Ogun kafin a yi zaɓen fidda gwani.
Text1 Translation: The song is Tinubu's latest since the harsh words he made at the Ogun Government House before the primary election.
Text2: Da ya ke jawabi, Tinubu ya ce duk da ya san Badaru ya fito takara, to zai kayar da shi a zaɓen fidda gwani.
Text2 Translation: While speaking, Tinubu said that even if he knew Badaru was contesting, he would defeat him in the primary election.

Text1: Shin da gaske ne Kano na shirin saka dokar hana mata tukin mota?
Text1 Translation: Is Kano really planning to ban women from driving?
Text2: Batun cewa gwamnatin jihar Kano na shirin saka dokar haramtawa mata tuka mota a jihar karya ne.
Text2 Translation: The issue that the Kano state government is planning to introduce a law prohibiting women from driving in the state is false.

Text1: Mai Shari’a Nkeonye Maha ta Kotun Tarayya ta bayar da belin su a kan naira miliyan 5 kowanen su.
Text1 Translation: Judge Nkeonye Maha of the Federal Court granted their bail at 5 million naira each.
Text2: Lifu ya bayar da belin sa a kan naira miliyan 50, sai kuma mutum biyu da za su tsaya masa.
Text2 Translation: Lifu gave his bail for 50 million naira, and two people who will stand in for him.

Text1: “Yanzu ba a keɓance wasu an ce ba za a ƙara masu tsawon lokacin yin ritayar ba.
Text1 Translation: "Now some are not excluded and it is said that those who have a long retirement period will not be extended.
Text2: NRC ta ce zuwa yanzu an ƙara tabbatar da cewa wasu fasinjoji 14 daga cikin waɗanda ake cigiya, lafiyar su ƙalau.
Text2 Translation: The NRC said that so far it has been confirmed that 14 passengers among those who were stranded, are safe.

Text1: Ambaliya sanadiyar ruwan sama mai karfi ya share kadar Barsika dake a karamar hukumar Gwaram ta Jihar Jigawa.
Text1 Translation: Flooding caused by heavy rains has wiped out Barsika property located in Gwaram local government of Jigawa State.
Text2: A karshen makon jiya an kashe akalla mutum 40 a karamar hukumar Giwa dake jihar Kaduna bayan mahara sun afkawa wasu ƙauyuka a yankin.
Text2 Translation: At the end of last week, at least 40 people were killed in Giwa local government in Kaduna state after assailants attacked some villages in the area.

Text1: Ba zan amsa gayyatar majalisar Zamfara ba – Mataimakin gwamna Mahdi
Text1 Translation: I will not accept the invitation of Zamfara council - Deputy governor Mahdi
Text2: Mataimakin gwamnan jihar Zamfara, Mahdi Ali Gusau ya ce ba zai amsa gayyatar majalisar dokokin jihar ba saboda ya maka majalisar a kotu.
Text2 Translation: The deputy governor of Zamfara state, Mahdi Ali Gusau said he will not accept the invitation of the state assembly because he has sued the assembly in court.

Text1: Hukumar EFCC ta damke Akanta Janar ɗin Najeriya Ahmed Idris a filin jirgin saman Kano zai yi tafiya.
Text1 Translation: The EFCC arrested the Accountant General of Nigeria Ahmed Idris at the Kano Airport to travel.
Text2: EFCC ta kama Obiano a filin jirgin saman Murtala Mohammed da ke Abuja, sa’o’i kaɗan bayan ya miƙa mulki a Enugu.
Text2 Translation: The EFCC arrested Obiano at the Murtala Mohammed Airport in Abuja, a few hours after he handed over power in Enugu.

Text1: MAJALISAR DATTAWA: Tinubu ne ya ce abinda ya fi dacewa shine kirista ya zama shugaban majalisa tunda shi da ni duk musulmai ne – Shettima
Text1 Translation: COUNCIL OF ELDER: Tinubu said the best thing is for a Christian to be the Speaker of the House since he and I are both Muslims - Shettima
Text2: Ya ce idan ana kwatanta kwarewa da cancantar zama shugaban ƙasa, ai Tinubu ko kaɗan ya fi ƙarfin a kwatanta shi da Peter Obi.
Text2 Translation: He said that when comparing the skills and qualifications to be the president, Tinubu is at least stronger than Peter Obi.

Text1: Zuwa yanzu hukumar zabe INEC bayyana sakamakon zabe inda Charles Soludo na jami’iyyar APGA ya yi nasara a kananan hukumomi 18 cikin 21.
Text1 Translation: So far, INEC has announced the election results where Charles Soludo of the APGA party won in 18 out of 21 local governments.
Text2: A Ƙaramar Hukumar Aguata ya yi masu fintinkau, inda su biyun idan aka haɗa ƙuri’un su, ba su kai yawan na Soludo ba.
Text2 Translation: In the Local Government, Aguata won the majority, where both of them, when their votes are combined, are not equal to the number of Soludo.

Text1: Ya ce ‘yan Najeriya sun kashe juna a wancan lokacin don dai a tabbatar cewa Najeriya ta ci gsba da kasancewa dunƙulalliyar ƙasa ɗaya.
Text1 Translation: He said that Nigerians killed each other at that time to make sure that Nigeria is a united country.
Text2: Wanda kowa ya sani cewa ya matsa a wancan lokacin amma kuma daga baya ya fito ya ce ba haka bane.
Text2 Translation: Everyone knows that he moved at that time but later he came out and said that it was not so.

Text1: Jaridar Daily Post wanda ta wallafa labarin ya ce maharan sun afka kauyen a safiyar Asabar bisa babura.
Text1 Translation: The Daily Post, which published the story, said the attackers attacked the village on Saturday morning on motorcycles.
Text2: Ya ce maharan sun fara kai hari a kauyen Ungwan Fada sannan suka gangaro zuwa Ungwan Turawa da Ungwan Makama sannan suka afka kauyen Rubu.
Text2 Translation: He said the attackers first attacked Ungwan Fada village and then went down to Ungwan Turawa and Ungwan Makama and then attacked Rubu village.

Text1: Sakataren Yaɗa Labarai na PDP na Ƙasa, Ɗebo Ologunagba ne ya bayyana haka a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar yau Laraba.
Text1 Translation: The Publicity Secretary of the PDP, Dbo Ologunagba stated this in a statement he issued today Wednesday.
Text2: Haka Kalu ya bayyana a cikin wata sanarwa da ya fitar a ranar Talata.
Text2 Translation: This is what Kalu said in a statement he issued on Tuesday.

Text1: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Jigawa ta bayyana cewa ta fara farautar wani matashi mai shekara 22 da ya kashe wansa da wuka a jihar.
Text1 Translation: The Jigawa State Police has announced that it has started hunting for a 22-year-old man who killed his brother with a knife in the state.
Text2: A na shi jawabin gwamnan jihar Edo Godwin Obaseki ya bayyana cewa an yi wa mutum sama da 130,000 rigakafin korona a jihar.
Text2 Translation: In his speech, the governor of Edo state, Godwin Obaseki, stated that over 130,000 people have been vaccinated against corona in the state.

Text1: Minsitan Ayyuka da Gida Babatunde Fashola ne ya bayyana wa manema labarai haka, a Fadar Shugaban Ƙasa, bayan kammala taron Majalisar Zartaswa a ranar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: The Minister of Works and Housing Babatunde Fashola disclosed this to the press at the Presidential Palace after the Executive Council meeting on Wednesday.
Text2: Moses Ebuga, yayi wannan kiran a wani taron da kungiyar ta yi da manema labarai a ranar Litinin a garin Jos.
Text2 Translation: Moses Ebuga, made this call at a press conference held by the group on Monday in Jos.

Text1: Bayan haka Obinabo ta ce ma’aikatar kula da al’amuran mata za ta hada hannu da gwamnati domin ganin an bi mata hakki.
Text1 Translation: After that, Obinabo said that the Ministry of Women's Affairs will join hands with the government to ensure that women's rights are met.
Text2: Ezeh ya ce kamfanin za ta hada hannu da jami’an tsaro domin ganin an hukunta barayin dake lalata tiransifoma.
Text2 Translation: Ezeh said that the company will cooperate with the security forces to ensure that the thieves who destroy the transformer are punished.

Text1: Daga zaɓen 2023 ba za a ƙara jin ɗuriyar APC ba – Atiku
Text1 Translation: From the 2023 election, APC will no longer be strong - Atiku
Text2: Sai dai kuma ba a san irin sakayyar da za a yi masu ba, tunda ba za su wakilci APC a zaɓen 2023 ba.
Text2 Translation: However, it is not known what will be done to them, since they will not represent APC in the 2023 elections.

Text1: RASHIN TSARO: ‘Yan bindiga sun arce da Kwamishinan Hukumar Ƙidaya ta Ƙasa, sun nemi a biya su Naira miliyan 500
Text1 Translation: INSECURITY: The bandits appealed to the Commissioner of the National Census Commission, they asked for a payment of 500 million naira
Text2: Majiya ta bayyana cewa masu garkuwa sun nemi a biya su Naira miliyan 60, amma daga baya su ka rage zuwa Naira miliyan 40.
Text2 Translation: The source stated that the kidnappers asked to be paid 60 million Naira, but later they reduced it to 40 million Naira.

Text1: Dokar Kafa Hukumar Gyaran Dokokin Najeriya, Ta 2022:
Text1 Translation: The Nigerian Law Reform Commission Act, 2022:
Text2: A yanzu ta zama Dokar kafa Hukumar Gyaran Dokokin Najeriya ta 2022.
Text2 Translation: It is now the Nigerian Law Reform Commission Act 2022.

Text1: Garin Banye ya na cikin Ƙaramar Hukumar Charanci ta Jihar Kstsina.
Text1 Translation: Banye town is part of Charanci Local Government of Kstsina State.
Text2: Banye ta na cikin Ƙaramar Hukumar Charanci, kuma ta yi iyaka da garin Barkiya ta ɓangaren Ƙaramar Hukumar Kurfi.
Text2 Translation: Banye is part of the Charanci Local Government, and it borders the town of Barkiya in the Kurfi Local Government.

Text1: Rashin kula, shan duka suka sa nake so a raba ni da mijina – Tawakalitu a Kotu
Text1 Translation: Negligence, abuse made me want to be separated from my husband - Tawakalitu in Court
Text2: Rashin So tsakanin wasu ma’aurata a Kaduna ya sa sun garzaya kotu ta raba su
Text2 Translation: The lack of love between some couples in Kaduna made them go to court to separate them

Text1: Hukumar NDLEA ta kama wasu ‘yan kasuwa biyu da suka hadiyi kullin hodar ibilis guda 193.
Text1 Translation: The NDLEA has arrested two businessmen who swallowed 193 bundles of Ibilis.
Text2: NDLEA ta kama hodar ibilis da wasu haramtattun kwayoyi da aka shigo da su Najeriya daga Brazil da Canada
Text2 Translation: The NDLEA seized Ibilis and other illegal drugs imported into Nigeria from Brazil and Canada

Text1: To tunda ya na ta nanata cewa zai yi zaɓe sahihi, ya nuna INEC ba ta da ‘yancin cin gashin kan ta kenan.
Text1 Translation: Since he has been insisting that he will hold a fair election, he has shown that INEC does not have the right to be independent.
Text2: Lauyan ya na so kotu ta nuna idan INEC ta ƙi bayar da kwafen bayanan, to ta karya Dokar Zaɓe  ta 2022, Sashe na 29(4).
Text2 Translation: The lawyer wants the court to show that if INEC refuses to provide copies of the information, then it has violated the 2022 Elections Act, Section 29(4).

Text1: Sojoji sun kashe ‘yan ta’adda 31, sun kama 70 a yankin Arewa maso Gabas
Text1 Translation: The army killed 31 terrorists and arrested 70 in the North East region
Text2: ” Sannan kuma wanda ake zargin (Mamu) ya kitsa kashe jami’an tsaro da dama a yankin Arewa ta tsakiya da Arewa maso Gabashin Najeriya.
Text2 Translation: And the suspect (Mamu) killed many security officers in the North Central and North Eastern regions of Nigeria.

Text1: A Najeriya dai yanzu naira 30,000 ce mafi ƙarancin albashi a matakin gwamnatin tarayya da jihohi, kamar yadda gwamnati ta amince tun cikin 2019.
Text1 Translation: In Nigeria, 30,000 naira is now the minimum wage at the federal and state level, as agreed by the government since 2019.
Text2: Kera ya yi murnar wannan hukunci inda ya ce yanzu ya samu sauki tunda dama tun a farko ba laifi yayi wa gwamnatin ba.
Text2 Translation: Kera celebrated this decision saying that he is now relieved since he did not commit any crime against the government in the first place.

Text1: Mazauna kauyen Ihiala sun ce maharan sun dirka wa ginin ofishin ƴan sandan bam da misalin karfe uku na safiyar Laraba.
Text1 Translation: Residents of Ihiala village said that the attackers bombed the police office building at around three o'clock on Wednesday morning.
Text2: Wani mazaunin Talatan Mafara Mustapha Lawan ya ce maharan sun shigo kauyen a kan babura da misalin karfe 6:14 na yamma.
Text2 Translation: A resident of Talatan Mafara, Mustapha Lawan, said the attackers entered the village on motorcycles at around 6:14 pm.

Text1: Adamu ya yi tir da irin kalaman da Tinubu ya yi, waɗanda ya ce za a ɗauki matakin ladabtar da shi.
Text1 Translation: Adamu denounced Tinubu's comments, which he said will be disciplinary action taken against him.
Text2: “Za mu so a ce sun ɗauki matakin fatattakar maharan tun kafin su kai ga kashe rayukan jama’a.
Text2 Translation: "We would like it to be said that they have taken action to defeat the attackers before they end up killing people's lives.

Text1: “Ni da shi duk yaran Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ne, kuma ya na son mu ƙwarai da gaske.
Text1 Translation: “He and I are both children of President Muhammadu Buhari, and he loves us very much.
Text2: Bayanin sa ya zo daidai lokacin da ake watsa rahotannin cewa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya fi son Sanata Adamu ya zama shugaban APC na ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: His statement coincided with reports that President Muhammadu Buhari prefers Senator Adamu to become the national chairman of the APC.

Text1: TAYA JONATHAN MURNAR CIKA SHEKARU 64: PDP ta kira shi gwarzon shugaban da ‘yan Najeriya ke tutiya da shi
Text1 Translation: CONGRATULATIONS TO JONATHAN 64 YEARS OLD: PDP calls him the hero of the president that Nigerians look up to
Text2: A ranar Asabar ce Jonathan wanda ya yi mulkin Najeriya tsawon shekaru shida a ƙarƙashin PDP ya cika shekaru 64 a duniya.
Text2 Translation: Jonathan, who ruled Nigeria for six years under the PDP, turned 64 on Saturday.

Text1: INEC kuma na aikin raba kati a faɗin ƙananan hukumomi 774.
Text1 Translation: INEC is also working to distribute cards in 774 local governments.
Text2: RASHIN TSARO A FILATO: INEC ta tsaida aikin rajistar zaɓe a ƙananan hukumomi biyar
Text2 Translation: UNSAFE IN PLATO: INEC has stopped the electoral registration process in five local governments

Text1: Mataimakin gwamnan jihar Anambra Nkem Okeke ya sauya sheka daga jam’iyyar APGA zuwa APC.
Text1 Translation: Anambra State Deputy Governor Nkem Okeke has defected from APGA to APC.
Text2: Wannan canji da Nkem yayi baraka ce babba ga jam’iyyar APGA a halin yanzu ganin ga zaben gwamnan jihar ya matso gaban goshi.
Text2 Translation: This change made by Nkem is a big rift for the APGA party at the moment as the state governorship election is approaching.

Text1: Sannan kuma ranar Juma’a da dare ‘yan ta’adda su ka kai wa dogaran tsaron Buhari hari, su ka kashe sojoji takwas.
Text1 Translation: And on Friday night, the terrorists attacked Buhari's security and killed eight soldiers.
Text2: Yadda ‘yan ta’adda su ka kai wa dogaran tsaron Buhari hari, su ka kashe sojoji takwas
Text2 Translation: The way the terrorists attacked Buhari's security, they killed eight soldiers

Text1: “Tilas kuma ya kasance an kai kayan zaɓe kwanaki kafin ranar zaɓe a dukkan ƙananan hukumomi.
Text1 Translation: "Election materials must be delivered days before the election day in all local governments.
Text2: Amma ya kasance an sanar wa Hukumar Zaɓe ta Ƙasa kafin a kai ga saura kwanaki 45 a yi zaɓen da ya janye tsayawa takarar.”
Text2 Translation: But he was notified to the National Electoral Commission before the 45 days left for the election to withdraw his candidacy."

Text1: Ambaliyar ruwa ya yanke karamar hukumar Gulani daga yankin jihar Yobe – Gwamna Buni
Text1 Translation: Floods have cut off Gulani Local Government Area from Yobe State - Governor Buni
Text2: Gwamnan jihar Yobe Mai Mala Buni ya bayyan cewa ambaliyar ruwa ta hana shiga da fice daga karamar hukumar Gulani zuwa sauran bangarorin jihar.
Text2 Translation: The governor of Yobe state, Mai Mala Buni, has stated that the floods have prevented entry and exit from Gulani local government to other parts of the state.

Text1: A lokacin ƙaddamar da aikin, Ameachi ya ce za a kammala shi kafin ƙarshen wa’adin mulkin Buhari a ranar 29 Ga Mayu.
Text1 Translation: At the launch of the project, Ameachi said it will be completed before the end of Buhari's tenure on May 29.
Text2: A ranar Lahadi ce dai wa’adin kwana 30 su ka ya cika, domin Buhari ya sa wa dokar hannu ko ya ƙi.
Text2 Translation: It was on Sunday that the 30-day deadline was completed, for Buhari to sign the law or reject it.

Text1: Sojin Najeriya dake aiki a karkashin rundunar ‘Operation Hadin Kai’ sun kashe Boko Haram/ ISWAP 29 sun kuma kama 55 cikin su.
Text1 Translation: The Nigerian Army operating under the command 'Operation Hadin Kai' killed 29 Boko Haram/ISWAP and captured 55 of them.
Text2: “Rundunar sojin Najeriya ta bamu shawarar katse layukan sadarwa a wasu kananan hukumomin dake jihar.
Text2 Translation: "The Nigerian Army has advised us to disconnect communication lines in some local governments in the state.

Text1: A ranar Talata Rundunar ‘Yan Sandan Legas ta ce ta kama manyan masu hidima biyu na ɓangarorin masu faɗan.
Text1 Translation: On Tuesday, the Lagos Police Command said it had arrested two senior officers of the warring factions.
Text2: Dan sandan da ya shigar da karar ASP Samuel Sule ya ce rundunar ta kama wadannan mutane a ranar biyar ga Oktoba 2020.
Text2 Translation: The police officer who filed the complaint, ASP Samuel Sule, said that the force arrested these people on October 5, 2020.

Text1: Ƙididdiga ta nuna tsakanin Janairu zuwa ƙarshen Afrilu 2020, Najeriya ta bashin Naira biliyan 943.12.
Text1 Translation: Statistics show that between January and the end of April 2020, Nigeria owed 943.12 billion Naira.
Text2: Sabuwar ƙididdiga ta ranar Alhamis ta nuna daga farkon Janairu zuwa ƙarshen Afrilu 2022 kuma, kuɗaɗen shiga daga fetur Naira biliyan 285.38 ne kacal.
Text2 Translation: The new estimate on Thursday shows that from the beginning of January to the end of April 2022, the income from fuel is only 285.38 billion Naira.

Text1: Usman wanda ya taɓa yin takarar sanatan Kaduna ta Tsakiya, ya ce jam’iyyar PDP ta fi kowace jam’iyya yawan magoya baya a Arewa.
Text1 Translation: Usman, who once contested for the Kaduna Central senatorial position, said the PDP has more supporters than any other party in the North.
Text2: Jam’iyyar PDP ce ta lashe kujerar shugaban karamar hukumar Kajuru a zaben Kaduna da ka yi ranar Asabar.
Text2 Translation: The PDP won the seat of Kajuru local government chairman in the Kaduna election held on Saturday.

Text1: To ka sani dai Fulani su kaɗai ba za su iya sa ka ci zaɓe har ka zama shugaban ƙasa ba.” Inji Ortom.
Text1 Translation: You should know that the Fulani alone cannot make you win the election and become the president of the country." Ortom said.
Text2: “A doka INEC ce kaɗai ke da nauyin shirya zaɓe sahihi, ba shugaban ƙasa ba.
Text2 Translation: "According to the law, only INEC is responsible for organizing valid elections, not the president.

Text1: Yanzu dai aski ya zo gaban goshi batun zaɓen gwamnan Jihar Anambra, wanda za a yi ranar Asabar.
Text1 Translation: The issue of the governorship election in Anambra State, which will be held on Saturday, has now come to the fore.
Text2: Wannan canji da Nkem yayi baraka ce babba ga jam’iyyar APGA a halin yanzu ganin ga zaben gwamnan jihar ya matso gaban goshi.
Text2 Translation: This change made by Nkem is a big rift for the APGA party at the moment as the state governorship election is approaching.

Text1: “An kulle dukkan makarantun Jihar Barno daga watan Disamba 2013 har zuwa Yuni 2015.
Text1 Translation: “All schools in Barno State were closed from December 2013 to June 2015.
Text2: “Su ma jihohin Adamawa da Yobe sun fuskanci irin wannan matsala, an kulle makarantun ba su daɗe sosai kamar jihar Barno ba.”
Text2 Translation: "The states of Adamawa and Yobe have also faced similar problems. The schools were closed for a long time like Barno state."

Text1: Ajibola wanda tsohon Ministan Harkokin Shari’a ne, ya rasu ya na da shekaru 89 a duniya.
Text1 Translation: Ajibola, who was the former Minister of Justice, died at the age of 89.
Text2: Adamu wanda tsohon ɗan PDP ne, ya shafe shekaru takwas ya na gwamna a Jihar Nasarawa ƙarƙashin PDP, tsakanin 1999 zuwa 2007.
Text2 Translation: Adamu who is a former member of PDP, spent eight years as governor in Nasarawa State under PDP, between 1999 and 2007.

Text1: “Lawal kan lakada min duka a duk lokacin da na tambaye sa kudi sannan a kulum yana zargina wai ina yawan neman maza a waje.
Text1 Translation: "Lawal used to beat me every time I asked him for money and every day he accused me of looking for men outside.
Text2: “Musa na yawan duka na sannan da zargin da yake yawan mun na neman mazaje a waje.
Text2 Translation: "Musa used to beat me a lot and then he accused me of looking for men outside.

Text1: Kauyukan da maharan suka shiga sun hada da Garinkuka da Gidado dake karamar hukumar Gassol.
Text1 Translation: The villages that the attackers entered include Garinkuka and Gidado in Gassol local government.
Text2: Kauyukan sun hada da  Adarawa, Gana da Bayawuri dake karamar hukumar Gusau.
Text2 Translation: The villages include Adarawa, Gana and Bayawuri in Gusau local government.

Text1: Ba a dai bayyana irin rashin lafiyar sa ba.
Text1 Translation: It is not clear what his illness is.
Text2: Ya rasu bayan wata rashin lafiyar da ba a bayyana irin ta ba.
Text2 Translation: He died after an undisclosed illness.

Text1: Wani mazaunin Talatan Mafara Mustapha Lawan ya ce maharan sun shigo kauyen a kan babura da misalin karfe 6:14 na yamma.
Text1 Translation: A resident of Talatan Mafara, Mustapha Lawan, said the attackers entered the village on motorcycles at around 6:14 pm.
Text2: Abdulkarim ya ce maharan wanda ke tafiya akan babura sun Kona gidajen malaman makarantar sakandare na gwamnati a Geidam.
Text2 Translation: Abdulkarim said that the assailants who were traveling on motorbikes burnt down the houses of the teachers of the public high school in Geidam.

Text1: RIKICIN APCn KANO : Hadimin Ganduje ya koma tsagin Shekarau, ya ajiye mukaminsa
Text1 Translation: KANO APC CONFLICT: Hadimin Ganduje returned to Shekarau and resigned his post
Text2: Mai baiwa gwamna Abdullahi Ganduje shawara kan harkokin da suka shafi Jiha, Muhammad Shehu, ya ajiye mukaminsa kuma ya koma tsagin Sanata Ibrahim Shekarau.
Text2 Translation: The adviser to Governor Abdullahi Ganduje on matters related to the State, Muhammad Shehu, resigned his position and returned to Senator Ibrahim Shekarau.

Text1: Mataimakin Kakakin Majalisa ya goyi bayan gaggauta haramta baburan acaɓa a ƙasar nan
Text1 Translation: The Deputy Speaker of the House of Representatives has supported the immediate banning of motorcycles in this country
Text2: Mataimakin Kakakin Majalisar Tarayya Idris Wase, ya hana wani ƙudirin neman a dakatar da gwamnatin tarayya daga haramta tuƙa baburan okada a faɗin ƙasar nan.
Text2 Translation: The Deputy Speaker of the Federal Assembly, Idris Wase, has vetoed a resolution seeking to stop the federal government from banning the driving of okada motorcycles across the country.

Text1: Daraktan Kamfen na APC, Simon Lalong bai kawo jihar Filato ba.
Text1 Translation: APC Campaign Director, Simon Lalong did not bring Plateau State.
Text2: Tuni dai Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari da Gwmna  Simon Lalong na Jihar Filato su ka yi tir da wanann kisan.
Text2 Translation: President Muhammadu Buhari and Governor Simon Lalong of Plateau State have already condemned these murders.

Text1: ‘Yan sanda sun rufe kasuwar Mammy dake a jihar Yobe saboda fargabar tashin Bam
Text1 Translation: The police closed Mammy's market in Yobe state due to the fear of a bomb explosion
Text2: Rundunar ‘yan sandan jihar Yobe ta rufe kasuwar Mammy dake cikin barikin ‘yan sanda a Damaturu.
Text2 Translation: The Yobe State Police Force has closed the Mammy market located in the police barracks in Damaturu.

Text1: “Annobar korona ta jefa aƙalla mutum miliyan 120 cikin ƙuncin rayuwa a duniya.

Text1: Daga nan ya ce Najeriya na nan a kan ƙudirin ta na ganin ta kakkaɓe yunwa a faɗin ƙasar nan, nan da shekarar 2025.
Text1 Translation: He then said that Nigeria is committed to ending hunger in the country by 2025.
Text2: Gwamnatin Tarayya ta bayyana cewa ta na shirin haramta haya da baburan acaɓa a faɗin ƙasar nan, domin ƙoƙarin daƙile matsalar tsaro.
Text2 Translation: The Federal Government has announced that it is planning to ban the rental of motorbikes across the country, in an effort to curb the security problem.

Text1: ZABEN TURKIYYA: Erdoğan na kan gaba a sakamakon zaben da aka bayyana zuwa yanzu
Text1 Translation: TURKISH ELECTIONS: Erdoğan is leading in the election results announced so far
Text2: Zuwa yanzu hukumar zabe INEC bayyana sakamakon zabe inda Charles Soludo na jami’iyyar APGA ya yi nasara a kananan hukumomi 18 cikin 21.
Text2 Translation: So far, INEC has announced the election results where Charles Soludo of the APGA party won in 18 out of 21 local governments.

Text1: Farkon shekarar ce aka tashi da rasuwar babban Basaraken Ibadan, Olubadan Saliu Adetunji, wanda ya hau sarauta cikin 2016.
Text1 Translation: It was the beginning of the year that marked the death of the great Chief of Ibadan, Olubadan Saliu Adetunji, who ascended the throne in 2016.
Text2: Babban Basaraken ƙasar Ibadan, Olubadan Saliu Adetunji ya rasu.
Text2 Translation: The Chief Minister of Ibadan, Olubadan Saliu Adetunji has passed away.

Text1: A cikin watan Nuwamba 2021, Dattawan Ƙabilar Igbo sun tura wakilai wurin Buhari, domin neman a saki Kanu.
Text1 Translation: In November 2021, the Elders of the Igbo tribe sent representatives to Buhari, to request the release of Kanu.
Text2: ZIYARAR BUHARI JIHAR IMO: Dattawan ƙabilar Igbo za su sake bijiro da neman a saki Nnamdi Kanu don a zauna lafiya a yankin
Text2 Translation: BUHARI'S VISIT TO IMO STATE: The elders of the Igbo tribe will again demand the release of Nnamdi Kanu for peace in the region
